Zita romurume uyo muIsiraeri akaurawa, iye wakaurawa pamwechete nomukadzi muMidhiani, rakanga riri Zimiri, mwanakomana waSaru, muchinda weimba yamadzibaba pakati pavaSimiyoni.
Zita romukadzi muMidhiani akaurawa, rakanga riri Kozibhi, mwanasikana waZuri; iye akanga ari mukuru wavanhu weimba yamadzibaba pavaMidhiani.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Vambana navaMidhiani, uvaparadze;
nokuti ivo vakavambana nemi namano avo, avakakunyengerai nawo pane zvakaitwa naPeori nezvakaitwa naKozibhi, mwanasikana womuchinda wavaMidhiani, hanzvadzi yavo, akaurawa nomusi wedenda nokuda kwezvakaitwa naPeori.
Zvino denda rakati rapfuura, Jehovha akataura naMozisi naEreazari, mwanakomana womupirisiti Aroni, akati,
Verengai vanhu vose vaIsiraeri, vanamakore ana makumi maviri navanopfuura, nedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, vose vanogona kuenda kuhondo pakati paIsiraeri.
Mozisi naEreazari mupirisiti vakataura navo pamapani aMoabhu, paJorodhani paJeriko, vakati,
Verengai vanhu vana makore ana makumi maviri navanopfuura; Jehovha sezvakaraira Mozisi navana vaIsiraeri, vakabuda panyika yeIjipiti.
Rubheni ndiye aiva mwanakomana wedangwe waIsiraeri, vanakomana vaRubheni ndivo: Hanoki, kwakabva mhuri yavaHanoki; naParu, kwakabva mhuri yavaParu.
NaHezironi, kwakabva mhuri yavaHezironi; naKarimi, kwakabva mhuri yavaKarimi.
Ndidzo mhuri dzavaRubheni: Vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mana nezvitatu, namazana manomwe namakumi matatu.
Vanakomana vaParu vaiva Eriabhu;
navanakomana vaEriabhu, Nemueri naDhatani naAbhiramu; Dhatani naAbhiramu ndivo vakanga vadanwa kumakurukota, vakarwa naMozisi naAroni paboka raKora, nguva yavakarwa naJehovha,
nyika ikashamisa muromo wayo, ikavamedza pamwechete naKora musi wakafa boka iro; nguva iyo moto ukaparadza varume vana mazana maviri namakumi mashanu, vakaitwa chiratidzo.
Asi vanakomana vaKora havana kufa.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaSimiyoni, nemhuri dzavo: Nemueri, kwakabva mhuri yavaNemueri, naJamini, kwakabva mhuri yavaJamini, naJakini, kwakabva mhuri yavaJakini;
naZera, kwakabva mhuri yavaZera; naShauri, kwakabva mhuri yavaShauri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzavaSimiyoni, vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezviviri namazana maviri.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaGadhi nemhuri dzavo: Zefoni, kwakabva mhuri yavaZefoni; naHagi, kwakabva mhuri yavaHagi; naShuni, kwakabva mhuri yavaShuni;
naZini, kwakabva mhuri yava Zini; naEri, kwakabva mhuri yavaEri;
naArodhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaArodhi naAreri kwakabva mhuru yavaAreri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzavanakomana vaGadhi; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mana namazana mashanu.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaJudha: Eri naOnani; asi Eri naOnani vakafira munyika yeKenani.
Ndivo vanakomana vaJudha, nemhuri dzavo: Shera, kwakabva mhuri yavaShera; naPerezi kwakabva mhuri yavaPerezi; naZera, kwakabva mhuri yavaZera.
Ndivo vanakomana vaPerezi: Hezironi, kwakabva mhuri yavaHezironi; naHamuri, kwakabva mhuri yavaHamuri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaJudha; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi manomwe nezvitanhatu namazana mashanu.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaIsakari, nemhuri dzavo: Tora, kwakabva mhuri yavaTora; naPuva, kwakabva mhuri yavaPuva;
naJashubhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaJashubhi, naShimironi, kwakabva mhuri yavaShimironi.
Ndidzo mhuri dzalsakari; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi matanhatu nezvina namazana matatu.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaZebhuruni, nemhuri dzavo: Seredhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaSeredhi; naEroni, kwakabva mhuri yavaEroni; naJareeri, kwakabva mhuri yavaJareeri.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaZebhuruni; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi matanhatu namazana mashanu.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaJosefa, nemhuri dzavo: Manase naEfuremu.
Ndivo vanakomana vaManase: Makiri, kwakabva mhuri yavaMakiri; Makiri wakabereka Giriyadhi; kunaGiriyadhi kwakabva mhuri yavaGiriyadhi.
Ndivo vanakomana vaGiriyadhi: Jezeri, kwakabva mhuri yavaJezeri; naHereki, kwakabva mhuri yavaHereki;
naAsirieri, kwakabva mhuri yavaAsirieri; naShekemu, kwakabva mhuri yavaShekemu;
naShemidha, kwakabva mhuri yavaShemidha; naHeferi, kwakabva mhuri yavaHeferi.
Asi Zerofehadhi, mwanakomana waHeferi, akanga asina vanakomana, asi vanasikana bedzi; mazita avanasikana vaZerofehadhi aiva Makira, naNoa, naHogira, naMirika, naTiriza.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaManase; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mashanu nezviviri namazana manomwe.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaEfuremu, nemhuri dzavo: Shutera, kwakabva mhuri yavaShutera; naBhekeri, kwakabva mhuri yavaBhekeri, naTahani, kwakabva mhuri yavaTahani.
Ndivo vanakomana vaShutera: Erani, kwakabva mhuri yavaErani.
Ndidzo mhuri dzavanakomana vaEfuremu; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezviviri, namazana mashanu.
Ndivo vanakomana vaJosefa, nemhuri dzavo.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaBhenjamini, nemhuri dzavo: Bhera, kwakabva mhuri yavaBhera; naAshibheri, kwakabva mhuri yavaAshibheri; naAhirami, kwakabva mhuri yavaAhirami;
naShefufami, kwakabva mhuri yavaShufami; naHufami, kwakabva mhuri yavaHufami.
Ndivo vanakomana vaBhera: Aridhi naNamani; kuna Aridhi kwakabva mhuri yavaAridhi; naNamani, kwakabva mhuri yavaNamani.
Ndivo vanakomana vaBhenjamini, nemhuri dzavo; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mana nezvishanu namazana matanhatu.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaDhani, nemhuri dzavo: Shuhami, kwakabva mhuri yavaShuhami.
Ndivo vemhuri dzaDhani, nedzimba dzavo.
Mhuri dzose dzavaShuhami, vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi matanhatu nezvina namazana mana.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaAsheri, nemhuri dzavo: Imuna, kwakabva mhuri yavaImuna; naIshivhi, kwakabva mhuri yavaIshivhi; naBheria, kwakabva mhuri yavaBheria.
Ndivo vanakomana vaBheria: Hebheri, kwakabva mhuri yavaHebheri; naMakieri, kwakabva mhuri yavaMakieri.
Zita romwanasikana waAsheri rakanga riri Sera.
Ndidzo. mhuri dzaAsheri; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mashanu nezvitanhatu namazana mana.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaNafutari, nemhuri dzavo: Jazeeri, kwakabva mhuri yavaJazeri; naGuni, kwakabva mhuri yavaGuni;
naJezeri, kwakabva mhuri yavaJezeri; naShiremi, kwakabva mhuri yavaShiremi.
Ndidzo mhuri dzaNafutari, nemhuri dzavo; vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi mana nezvishanu namazana mana.
Ndivo vakaverengwa kuvana vaIsiraeri, vakasvika zviuru zvina mazana matanhatu nechiuru chimwe namazana manomwe namakumi matatu.
Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Nyika inofanira kugoverwa pakati paivava, ive nhaka yavo, vachiverengwa namazita avo.
Vazhinji unofanira kuvapa nhaka zhinji; vashoma unofanira kuvapa nhaka shoma; mumwe nomumwe unofanira kupiwa sezvavakaverengwa.
Kunyange zvakadaro nyika inofanira kugoverwa nemijenya; vachapiwa nhaka namazita amarudzi amadzibaba avo.
Nhaka yavo inofanira kugoverwa nemijenya kana vari vazhinji kana vari vashoma.
Zvino ndivo vakaverengwa kuvaRevhi, nemhuri dzavo: Gerishoni, kwakabva mhuri yavaGerishoni;.
Kohati, kwakabva mhuri yavaKohati; Merari, kwakabva mhuri yavaMerari.
Ndidzo mhuri dzavaRevhi: Mhuri yavaRibhini, nemhuri yavaHebhuroni, nemhuri yavaMari, nemhuri yavaMushi, nemhuri yavaKora.
Kohati akabereka Amuramu.
Zita romukadzi waAmuramu rakanga riri Jokebhedhi, mwanasikana waRevhi, wakaberekerwa Revhi paIjipiti; ndiye wakaberekera Amuramu, Aroni, naMozisi, naMiriami, hanzvadzi yavo.
Aroni akaberekerwa Nadhabhi, naAbhihu, naEreazari, naItamari.
Nadhabhi naAbhihu vakafa, nguva yavakauyisa moto usina kufanira pamberi paJehovha.
Vakaverengwa kwavari vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezvitatu, murume mumwe nomumwe wakanga ano mwedzi mumwe navanopfuura; nokuti havana kuverengwa pakati pavana vaIsiraeri, nokuti havana kupiwa nhaka pakati pavana vaIsiraeri.
Ndivo vakaverengwa naMozisi naEreazari mupirisiti, vakaverenga vana vaIsiraeri pamapani aMoabhu, paJorodhani paJeriko.
Asi pakati pavo kwakanga kusina murume mumwe wavaya vakaverengwa naMozisi naAroni, vakanga vaverenga vana vaIsiraeri murenje reSinai.
Nokuti Jehovha akanga ati napamusoro pavo, Zvirokwazvo vachafira murenje.
Hakuna mumwe wavo akanga asara, asi Karebhu, mwanakomana waJefune, naJoshua, mwanakomana waNuni.
Zvino vanasikana vaZerofehadhi, mwanakomana waHeferi, mwanakomma waGiriyadhi, mwanakomana waMakiri, mwanakomana waManase, wemhuri dzaManase, mwanakomana waJosefa, vakaswedera kuna Mozisi; ndiwo mazita avanasikana vake: Mara, naNoa, naHogira, naMirika, naTiriza;
vakamira pamberi paMozisi napamberi paEreazari mupirisiti, napamberi pamachinda neungano yose, pamukova wetende rokusangana, vakati,
Baba vedu vakafira murenje, asi vakanga vasi pakati peboka ravaya vakaungana kuzorwa naJehovha, veboka raKora; vakafira havo muzvivi zvavo, vasina vanakomana.
Zvino zita rababa vedu richabvisirweiko pakati pemhuri yavo, nokuti vakanga vasina vanakomana?
Tipeiwo nhaka pakati pehama dzababa vedu.
Mozisi akaisa shoko ravo pamberi paJehovha.
Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Vanasikana vaZerofehadhi vanotaura kwazvo; zvirokwazvo, unofanira kuvapa nhaka pakati pehama dzababa vavo; unofanira kuvagarisa nhaka yababa vavo.
Zvino unofanira kutaura navana vaIsiraeri, uchiti, Kana munhu akafa asina mwanakomana, munofanira kugarisa mwanasikana wake nhaka yake.
Kana asina mwanasikana, munofanira kupa vakuru vake navanununa vake nhaka yake.
Kana asina vakuru kana vanununa, munofanira kupa vakuru kana vanununa vababa vake nhaka yake.
Kana baba vake vasina vakuru kana vanununa, munofanira kupa hama yake yomumba nhaka yake, ive yake.
Unofanira kuva mutemo wokutonga nawo pakati pavana vaIsiraeri, sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Joshua muteveri waMozisi
Zvino Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Kwira pagomo iri reAbharimu, uone nyika yandakapa vana vaIsiraeri.
Ipapo kana waiona, newewo uchasanganiswa navanhu vako, sezvakasanganiswa mukuru wako Aroni;
nokuti makaramba shoko rangu murenje reZini, panguva yokurwa kweungano, mukarega kunditsaura pamberi pavo pamvura.
(Ndiyo mvura yeMeribha paKadheshi, murenje reZini.)
Zvino Mozisi akataura naJehovha, akati,
Jehovha, Mwari wemweya yavanhu vose, ngaagadze murume paungano iyi,
achabuda pamberi pavo, nokupinda pamberi pavo, angavabudisa nokuvapinza; kuti ungano yaJehovha irege kuva samakwai asina mufudzi.
Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, Tora Joshua, mwanakomana waNuni, murume uno mweya mukati make, uise ruoko rwako pamusoro pake.
Umuise pamberi paEreazari mupirisiti, napamberi peungano yose, ugomurairira pamberi pavo.
Uise pamusoro pake zvoukuru hwako, kuti ungano yose yavana valsiraeri imuteerere.
Iye anofanira kumira pamberi pomupirisiti Ereazari, iye amuunzire pamberi paJehovha nokutonga kweUrimi; nokuraira kwake, vanofanira kubuda, nokuraira kwake, vanofanira kupinda, iye pamwechete navana vaIsiraeri vose, ungano yose.
Mozisi akaita sezvaakarairwa naJehovha; akatora Joshua, akamuisa pamberi pemupirisiti Ereazari, napamberi peungano yose;
akaisa maoko ake pamusoro pake, akamurairira, sezvakataura Jehovha nomuromo waMozisi.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Raira vana vaIsiraeri, uti kwavari, Munofanira kurangarira kundipa nenguva yazvo yakafanira zvipo zvangu, izvo zvokudya zvangu zvezvipiriso zvangu zvinopiswa, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kwandiri.
Unofanira kuti kwavari, Ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chamunofanira kupa Jehovha: Makwayana amakondohwe egore rimwe, asina kuremara, maviri zuva rimwe nerimwe, chive chipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose.
Rimwe gwayana unofanira kuuya naro mangwanani, rimwe gwayana unofanira kuuya naro madekwana;
nechegumi cheefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, chive chipiriso choupfu, hwakakanyiwa nechechina chehini yamafuta akasviniwa.
Ndicho chipiriso chinofanira kupiswa nguva dzose, chakarairwa pagomo reSinai, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka, chipiriso chinopisirwa Jehovha.
Nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa chinofanira kuva chechina chehini chegwayana rimwe nerimwe; unofanira kudururira Jehovha chipiriso chezvinobata.
Rimwe gwayana unofanira kuuya naro madekwana; unofanira kuuya naro pamwechete nechipiriso choupfu, nechipiriso chinodururwa, zvakafanana nezvamangwanani, chive chipiriso chinopiswa, chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha.
Zvipiriso zveSabata nezvokuvamba kwomwedzi
Asi nomusi weSabata munofanira kuuya namakwayana amakondohwe maviri egore rimwe, asina kuremara, nezvegumi zviviri zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, chive chipiriso choupfu, hwakakanyiwa namafuta, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa cheSabata rimwe nerimwe, kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Pakuvamba kwemwedzi yenyu munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopisirwa Jehovha: Nzombe mbiri duku negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana manomwe amakondohwe egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nezvegumi zvitatu zveefa youpfu hwakatsetseka, chive chipiriso choupfu, hwakakanyiwa namafuta, panzombe imwe neimwe; nezvegumi zviviri zvoupfu hwakatsetseka, chive chipiriso choupfu, hwakakanyiwa namafuta, pagondohwe rimwe nerimwe;
nechegumi chimwe choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta, chive chipiriso choupfu pagwayana rimwe nerimwe; chive chipiriso chinopiswa chinonhuwira zvakanaka chinopisirwa Jehovha.
Zvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa zvinofanira kuva zvehafu yehini pagondohwe rimwe, nechechina chehini pagwayana rimwe; ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chinofanira kuitwa mwedzi mumwe nomumwe wemwedzi yegore rose.
Uye nhongo imwe yembudzi chive chipiriso chezvivi kuna Jehovha; chinofanira kuuyiswa kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Mitambo mikuru
Nomwedzi wokutanga, nezuva regumi namana romwedzi, munofanira kurangarira Pasika yaJehovha.
Mutambo unofanira kuitwa nezuva regumi namashanu romwedzi uyo; chingwa chisina kuviriswa chinofanira kudyiwa mazuva manomwe.
Pazuva rokutanga kunofanira kuva neungano tsvene; musabata mabasa avaranda pazuva iro;
asi munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopiswa, chipiriso chinopisirwa Jehovha: Nzombe mbiri duku, negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana amakondohwe manomwe egore rimwe, zvive zvisina kuremara kwamuri;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta; munofanira kuuya nezvegumi zvitatu panzombe imwe, nezvegumi zviviri pagondohwe rimwe.
Unofanira kuuya nechegumi chimwe pagwayana rimwe nerimwe pamakwayana manomwe;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi, chokuyananisira nacho.
Munofanira kuuya naizvozvo kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa chamangwanani, chinofanira kupiswa nguva dzose.
Saizvozvo munofanira kuuya nezvokudya zvechipiriso chinopiswa zuva rimwe nerimwe pamazuva manomwe, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha; chinofanira kuuyiswa kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Pazuva rechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; musabata mabasa avaranda naro.
Uye pazuva rezvitsva, kana muchiuya nechipiriso chitsva choupfu kuna Jehovha pamutambo wenyu wamavhiki, munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; musabata mabasa avaranda.
Asi munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopiswa chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha, zvinoti: Nzombe mbiri duku, negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana amakondohwe egore rimwe;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta; zvegumi zvitatu panzombe imwe, nezvegumi zviviri pagondohwe rimwe,
nechegumi chimwe pagwayana rimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, zvokuyananisira nazvo.
Munofanira kuuya nazvo (zvive kwamuri zvisina kuremara) nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu.
Nomwedzi wechinomwe, nezuva rokutanga romwedzi, munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; hamufaniri kubata mabasa avaranda naro; rinofanira kuva kwamuri zuva rokuridza hwamanda naro.
Munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopiswa, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha, zvinoti: Nzombe imwe duku, negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana amakondohwe manomwe, egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta, zvegumi zvitatu panzombe, nezvegumi zviviri pagondohwe,
nechegumi chimwe pagwayana rimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi, chokuyananisira nacho;
kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa pakugara kwomwedzi, nechipisiro chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, sezvakarairwa; chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka, chive chipiriso chinopisirwa Jehovha.
Nezuva regumi romwedzi wechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; munofanira kuchema pamweya yenyu; musatongobata basa.
Asi munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chokupisira Jehovha, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka, zvinoti: Nzombe imwe duku, negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana amakondohwe manomwe egore rimwe; zvive zivisina kuremara kwamuri;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta; zvegumi zvitatu panzombe, nezvegumi zviviri pagondohwe rimwe;
nechegumi chimwe pagwayana rimwe nerimwe ramakwayana manomwe,
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chezvivi chokuyananisira nacho, nechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa.
Nezuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wechinomwe munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; hamufaniri kubata basa ravaranda naro; munofanira kuitira Jehovha mutambo wamazuva manomwe.
Munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopiswa, chipiriso chinopiswa nomoto, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha, zvinoti: Nzombe duku dzine gumi nenhatu, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe; zvive zvisina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, choupfu hwakatsetseka, hwakakanyiwa namafuta; zvegumi zvitatu panzombe imwe neimwe panzombe dzine gumi nenhatu, nezvegumi zviviri pagondohwe rimwe nerimwe pamakondohwe maviri;
nechegumi chimwe pagwayana rimwe nerimwe pamakwayana ane gumi nemana
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Nezuva repiri munofanira kuuya nenzombe duku dzine gumi nembiri, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe asina kuremara.
Nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa zvenzombe, namakondohwe namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose; nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa.
Nezuva retatu munofanira kuuya nenzombe duku dzine gumi neimwe, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa zvenzombe, namakondohwe, namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Nezuva rechina munofanira kuuya nenzombe duku dzine gumi, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, zvenzombe, namakondohwe, namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Nezuva reshanu munofanira kuuya nenzombe duku pfumbamwe, nemakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, nenzombe, namakondohwe namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo,, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Nezuva retanhatu munofanira kuuya nenzombe sere, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, zvenzombe, namakondohwe, namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nezvipiriso zvacho zvinodururwa.
Nezuva rechinomwe munofanira kuuya nenzombe duku nomwe, namakondohwe maviri, namakwayana amakondohwe ane gumi namana egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, zvenzombe, namakondohwe, namakwayana, zvakaenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa;
nenhongo imwe yembudzi, chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Nezuva rorusere munofanira kuita ungano tsvene; hamufaniri kubata basa ravaranda naro.
Asi munofanira kuuya nechipiriso chinopiswa, chipiriso chinopiswa nomoto, chive chinonhuwira zvakanaka kuna Jehovha, zvinoti: Nzombe imwe duku, negondohwe rimwe, namakwayana amakondohwe manomwe egore rimwe, asina kuremara;
nechipiriso chazvo choupfu, nezvipiriso zvazvo zvinodururwa, zvenzombe, namakondohwe, namakwayana, zvinofanira kuenzana nokuwanda kwazvo, sezvakarairwa,
nenhongo imwe yembudzi chive chipiriso chezvivi; kunze kwechipiriso chinopiswa nguva dzose, nechipiriso chacho choupfu, nechipiriso chacho chinodururwa.
Ndizvo zvamunofanira kuuya nazvo kuna Jehovha pamitambo yenyu yakatarwa, kunze kwemhiko dzenyu, nezvipo zvokuda kwenyu, zvive zvipiriso zvenyu zvinopiswa, nezvipiriso zvenyu zvoupfu, nezvipiriso zvenyu zvinodururwa, nezvipiriso zvenyu zvokuyananisa.
Mozisi akaudza vana valsiraeri zvose zvakanga zvarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Zvino Mozisi akataura navakuru vamarudzi avana vaIsiraeri, akati, Ndicho chinhu chakarairwa naJehovha:
Kana munhu achinge apikira Jehovha mhiko, kana kuzvisunga nokupika, haafaniri kushandura shoko rake; anofanira kuita zvose zvakabuda mumuromo make.
Nomukadziwo, kana achinge apikira Jehovha, kana kuzvisunga nokusunga kwokupika, achiri mumba mababa vake, achiri musikana;
baba vake vakanzwa kupika kwake, nokuzvisunga kwaakazvisunga nako, baba vake vakamunyararira havo, ipapo kupika kwake kwose kuchava nesimba, nokusunga kwake kwose, kwaakazvisunga nako, kuchava nesimba.
Asi kana baba vake vakamudzivisa nomusi wavanozvinzwa nawo, kupika kwake kwose, nokuzvisunga kwake kwose, kwaakazvisunga nako, hakungavi nesimba; Jehovha achamukanganwira, nokuti baba vake vamudzivisa.
Kana akawanikwa nomurume achakasungwa nokupika kwake, kana namashoko aakareva asina kurangarira zvakanaka, aakazvisunga nawo;
murume wake akazvinzwa, akamunyararira hake nomusi waanozvinzwa nawo, ipapo kupika kwake kuchava nesimba, nokuzvisunga kwake, kwaakazvisunga nako, kuchava nesimba.
Asi kana murume wake akamudzivisa nomusi waanozvinzwa nawo, ipapo iye anokonesa kupika kwake, kwaakazvisunga nako, namashoko aakareva asina kurangarira zvakanaka, aakazvisunga nawo; Jehovha achamukanganwira.
Asi kupika kwechirikadzi, kana kwomukadzi akarambwa nomurume wake, chinhu chipi nechipi chaakazvisunga nacho, zvichava nesimba kwaari.
Kana achinge apika ari mumba momurume wake, kana kuzvisunga nokupika,
murume wake akazvinzwa, akamunyararira, asingamudzivisi, ipapo kupika kwake kuchava nesimba, nokuzvisunga kwose, kwaakazvisunga nako, kuchava nesimba.
Asi kana murume wake akazvikonesa kwazvo nomusi waakazvinzwa nawo, ipapo zvose zvakabuda mumuromo make pakupika kwake, kana kuzvisunga kwake, hazvingavi nesimba; murume wake wazvikonesa; Jehovha achamukanganwira.
Mhiko dzose, nokupika kwose kwaanozvisunga nako kuchema pamweya wake, murume wake angazvikonesa.
Asi kana murume wake akamunyararira chose zuva rimwe nerimwe, ipapo unosimbisa mhiko dzake dzose nokuzvisunga kwake kwose, kwaakazvisunga nako; azvisimbisa, nokuti amunyararira nomusi waakazvinzwa nawo.
Asi kana akazozvikonesa kwazvo, azvinzwa hake, iye anofanira kuva nemhosva yake.
Ndiyo mitemo yakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha, pakati pomurume nomukadzi wake, napakati pababa nomwanasikana wavo, achiri musikana paimba yababa vake.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Tsiva vana vaIsiraeri kuvaMidhiani; shure kwaizvozvo iwe uchasanganiswa navanhu vako.
Mozisi akataura navanhu, akati, Varume pakati penyu ngavazvigadzirire kurwa, kuti vandorwa navaMidhiani, vatsivire Jehovha kuvaMidhiani.
Munofanira kutumira kuhondo vane chiuru chimwe kurudzi rumwe norumwe rwamarudzi avaIsiraeri.
Naizvozvo vakaverenga kuzviuru zvavaIsiraeri chiuru chimwe kurudzi rumwe norumwe, vakasvika zviuru gumi nezviviri vakazvigadzirira kundorwa.
Mozisi akavatuma kundorwa, chiuru chimwe kurudzi rumwe norumwe, ivo naPinehasi, mwanakomana waEreazari mupirisiti, kundorwa, iye akabata nhumbi dzeimba tsvene nehwamanda dzokuridzisa nadzo.
Vakarwa navaMidhiani, sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha, vakauraya varume vose.
Vakaurayawo madzimambo avaMidhiani, pamwechete navamwe vakaurawa, vaiti: Evhi, naRekemu, naZuri, naHuri, naRebha, madzimambo mashanu avaMidhiani; naBharamu, mwanakomana waBheori, vakamuurayawo nomunondo.
Vana vaIsiraeri vakatapa vakadzi vavaMidhiani navana vavo; nemombe dzavo dzose namakwai avo ose, nefuma yavo yose , vakazvitapa.
Namaguta avo ose mavakanga vagere, nemisasa yavo yose, vakazvipisa nomoto.
Vakatora zvavakapamba zvose, nenhapwa dzose dzavanhu nedzezvipfuwo.
Vakauya navatapwa, nezvavakatapa, nezvavakapamba kuna Mozisi, nokuna Ereazari mupirisiti, nokuungano yose yavana vaIsiraeri, kumisasa pamapani aMoabhu, ari paJorodhani paJeriko.
Zvino Mozisi naEreazari mupirisiti, namachinda ose eungano, vakaenda kundosangana navo kunze kwemisasa.
Mozisi akatsamwira vatariri vehondo, navakuru vezviuru navakuru vamazana, vakanga vachidzoka pakundorwa;
Mozisi akati kwavari, Makachengeta vakadzi vose vari vapenyu here?
Tarirai, ndivo vakatadzisa vana vaIsiraeri pamberi paJehovha pazvakaitwa paPeori, vapiwa mano naBharamu, denda rikavapo pakati peungano yaJehovha.
Naizvozvo zvino urayai vakomana vose vari pakati pavana, muurayewo mukadzi mumwe nomumwe akavata nomurume;
asi muzvichengetere vanasikana vose, vasina kumbovata nomurume.
Asi imwi, endai mundogara mazuva manomwe kunze kwemisasa; ani naani akauraya munhu, ani naani akabata munhu akaurawa, muzvinatse pazuva retatu nerechinomwe, imwi navatapwa venyu.
Munofanirawo kusuka nguvo dzenyu dzose, nezvose zvakaitwa namatehwe, nezvose zvakarukwa nemvere dzembudzi, nezvinhu zvose zvakaitwa namatanda.
Ereazari mupirisiti akati kuvarwi vose vakanga vandorwa, Uyu ndiwo murayiro wakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha:
Ndarama, nesirivha, nendarira, nedare, netini, nomutobvu,
zvose zvisingaparadzwi nomoto, munofanira kuzvipinza mumoto kuti zvinatswe; kunyange zvakadaro zvinofanira kucheneswa nemvura yokunatsa; asi zvose zvingaparadzwa nomoto, munofanira kuzvipinza mumvura.
Munofanira kusuka nguvo dzenyu nezuva rechinomwe, kuti muve vakanaka, mugopinda mumisasa pashure.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Verenga vakatapwa zvamakatapa zvavanhu nezvezvipfuwo, iwe naEreazari mupirisiti, navakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba eungano;
mukamure zvakatapwa napakati, ive migove miviri; mugovere pakati pavarume vanoziva kurwa, vakanga vandorwa, neungano yose;
zvino uraire kuti mugove wakatarwa utsaurirwe Jehovha navarume vehondo vakanga vandorwa: Chipenyu chimwe kumazana mashanu, kuvanhu, nokumombe, nokumbongoro, nokumakwai;
uzvitore pahafu yavo, ugozvipa Ereazari mupirisiti, chive chipiriso chinotsaurirwa Jehovha.
Asi pahafu yavana vaIsiraeri unofanira kutora chimwe kumakumi mashanu, kuvanhu, nokumombe, nokumbongoro, nokumakwai, kuzvipfuwo zvose, ugozvipa vaRevhi vanochengeta tabhenakeri yaJehovha.
Mozisi naEreazari vakaita sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Zvino zvakatapwa zvakanga zvasara, varume vehondo vatora mugove wavo, zvaiva makwai ane zviuru zvina mazana matanhatu nezviuru zvina makumi manomwe nezviuru zvishanu,
nemombe dzine zviuru zvina makumi manomwe nezviviri,
nembongoro dzine zviuru zvina makumi matanhatu nechiuru chimwe;
navakadzi vasina kumbovata navarume vane zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezviviri.
Hafu, yakagoverwa vakanga vaenda kundorwa, aiva makwai ane zviuru zvina mazana matatu, nezviuru zvina makumi matatu, nezviuru zvinomwe, namazana mashanu;
mugove wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehovha, waiva makwai ana mazana matanhatu namakumi manomwe namashanu.
Mombe dzaiva zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezvitanhatu; mugove wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehovha kunaidzo, waiva mombe dzina makumi manomwe nembiri.
Mbongoro dzaiva zviuru zvina makumi matatu namazana mashanu; mugove wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehovha kunaidzo, waiva mbongoro dzina makumi matanhatu neimwe.
Vanhu vaiva zviuru zvine gumi nezvitanhatu; mugove wakatarwa, wakatsaurirwa Jehovha kuna ivo, waiva vanhu vana makumi matatu navaviri.
Mozisi akapa Ereazari mupirisiti mugove wakatarwa, chakanga chiri chipiriso chakatsaurirwa Jehovha, sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Pahafu yavana vaIsiraeri, yakanga yakamurwa naMozisi kuvanhu vakanga vandorwa,
(zvino hafu yeungano yaiva makwai ane zviuru zvina mazana matatu namakumi matatu, nezviuru zvinomwe namazana mashanu,
nemombe dzine zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezviuru zvitatu,
nembongoro dzine zviuru zvina makumi matatu namazana mashanu,
navanhu vane zviuru zvine gumi nezvitanhatu).
Pahafu yavana vaIsiraeri Mozisi akatora chimwe kumakumi mashanu, kuvana nokuzvipfuwo, akazvipa vaRevhi vaichengeta tabhenakeri yaJehovha; sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Zvino vatariri vaiva pamusoro pezviuru zvehondo, navakuru vezviuru, navakuru vamazana vakaswedera kuna Mozisi,
vakati kuna Mozisi, Varanda venyu vakaverenga varume vehondo vanorairwa nesu; hakuna mumwe wedu usipo.
Zvino tauya nechipo chaJehovha, zvakawanikwa nomumwe nomumwe: Zvishongo zvendarama, neketani dzomumakumbo nedzomumaoko, nezvindori zveminwe, nezvindori zvomunzeve, nezvomumutsipa, kuyananisira mweya yedu pamberi paJehovha.
Mozisi naEreazari mupirisiti vakagamuchira kwavari ndarama, zviri zvishongo zvamarudzi ose zvakaitwa nayo.
Ndarama yose yechipiriso chakatsaurwa, chavakapa Jehovha, chavakuru vezviuru nechavakuru vamazana, aiva mashekeri ane zviuru zvine gumi nezvitanhatu namazana manomwe namakumi mashanu.
(Nokuti varume vehondo vakanga vatora mugove wavo wezvakatapwa, mumwe nomumwe.)
Mozisi naEreazari mupirisiti vakagamuchira ndarama kuvakuru vezviuru navamazana, vakaiisa mutende rokusangana, kuti chive chirangaridzo kuvana vaIsiraeri pamberi paJehovha.
Vana vaRubheni navana vaGadhi vakanga vane zvipfuwo zvizhinji kwazvo; zvino vakati vachitarira nyika yeJazeri nenyika yeGiriyadhi, vakaona kuti inzvimbo yakafanira zvipfuwo.
Ipapo vana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni vakauya vakataurirana naMozisi naEreazari mupirisiti namachinda eungano, vakati,
Ataroti neDhibhoni neJazeri neNimura neHeshibhoni neEreari neSebhami neNebho neBheoni.
Nyika dzakakundwa naJehovha pamberi peungano yaIsiraeri, inyika yakafanira zvipfuwo; zvino isu varanda venyu, tine zvipfuwo.
Vakati, Kana takawana nyasha pamberi penyu, nyika ino ngaipiwe varanda venyu, ive yavo; musatiyambutsa henyu Jorodhani.
Mozisi akati kuvana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni, Ko hama dzenyu dzingaenda kundorwa, imwi mukagara pano here?
Munoodzereiko moyo yavana vaIsiraeri varege kuenda kunyika yavakapiwa naJehovha?
Ndizvo zvakaita madzibaba enyu nguva yandakavatuma vari paKadheshi-bharinea, kundoshora nyika.
Nokuti vakati vakwira kumupata weEshikori, vakaona nyika, vakaodza moyo yavana vaIsiraeri, kuti varege kupinda munyika yavakanga vapiwa naJehovha.
Jehovha akatsamwa nomusi iwoyo, akapika, akati,
Zvirokwazvo, hakungavi nomumwe wavarume vakabuda Ijipiti, ana makore makumi maviri nounopfuura, ungandoona nyika yandakapikira Abhurahamu naIsaka naJakobho, nokuti havana kunditevera nomoyo wose;
asi Karebhu, mwanakomana waJefune, muKenizi, naJoshua, mwanakomana waNuni, nokuti ivo vakatevera Jehovha nomoyo wose.
Jehovha akatsamwira vaIsiraeri, akavadzungairisa murenje makore ana makumi mana, kusvikira rudzi rwose rwakanga rwatadza pamberi paJehovha rwaparadzwa.
Zvino tarirai, imwi makamuka panzvimbo yamadzibaba enyu, vana chaivo vavanhu vezvivi, kuti muwedzere kutsamwa kukuru kwaJehovha pamusoro paIsiraeri.
Nokuti kana mukatsauka pakumutevera, uchavasiyazve murenje; imwi muchaparadza vanhu ava vose.
Vakaswedera kwaari, vakati, Tichavakira zvipfuwo zvedu matanga navana vedu vaduku maguta pano;
asi isu tichazvigadzirira kurwa, kuti titungamirire vana vaIsiraeri, kudzimana tavasvitsa kunzvimbo yavo; vana vedu vachagara mumaguta akakombwa namasvingo nokuda kwavanhu vagere munyika.
Hatingadzokeri kudzimba dzedu kudzimana vana vaIsiraeri vose vapiwa nhaka yavo.
Nokuti hatingagari nhaka pamwechete navo mhiri kwaJorodhani nemberi; nokuti isu tagoverwa nhaka yedu nechouno mhiri kwaJorodhani kurutivi rwamabvazuva.
Zvino Mozisi akati kwavari, Kana mukaita chinhu ichi, kana mukashonga nhumbi dzenyu dzokurwa, kuti muende pamberi paJehovha kundorwa,
mumwe nomumwe wenyu wakashonga akayambuka Jorodhani pamberi paJehovha, kudzimana iye adzinga vavengi vake pamberi pake,
nyika ikakundwa pamberi paJehovha, ipapo mungadzoka henyu, hamungavi nemhosva kuna Jehovha nokuvaIsiraeri; nyika ino igova nhaka yenyu pamberi paJehovha.
Asi kana mukasaita saizvozvo, tarirai matadzira Jehovha, muzive kuti zvivi zvenyu zvichakuwanai.
Vakirai henyu vana venyu maguta namakwai enyu matanga; itai sezvamakataura.
Vana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni vakataura naMozisi, vakati, Varanda venyu vachaita sezvakaraira tenzi wedu.
Vana vedu, navakadzi vedu, nezvipfuwo zvedu, nemombe dzedu dzose, zvichagara mumaguta eGiriyadhi;
asi varanda venyu vachayambuka, vose vakazvigadzirira kundorwa, kundorwa pamberi paJehovha, sezvakataurwa natenzi wedu.
Naizvozvo Mozisi akaraira pamusoro pavo Ereazari mupirisiti, naJoshua, mwanakomana waNuni, navakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba amarudzi avana vaIsiraeri;
Mozisi akati kwavari, Kana vana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni vakayambuka nemi, murume mumwe nomumwe wakazvigadzira kundorwa pamberi paJehovha, nyika ikakundwa pamberi penyu; ipapo munofanira kuvapa nyika yeGiriyadhi, ive yavo.
Asi kana vasingayambuki nemi, vakashonga nhumbi dzavo dzokurwa, vanofanira kupiwa nhaka yavo pakati penyu panyika yeKenani.
Ipapo vana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni vakapindura, vakati, Sezvakareva Jehovha kuvaranda venyu, ndizvo zvatichaita.
Tichayambukira pamberi paJehovha kunyika yeKenani, takashonga nhumbi dzedu dzokurwa, kuti tipiwe nhaka yedu nechouno mhiri kwaJorodhani.
Zvino Mozisi akavapa, ivo vana vaGadhi navana vaRubheni, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, mwanakomana waJosefa, ushe hwaSihoni, mambo wavaAmori, noushe hwaOgi, mambo weBhashani, nyika namaguta ayo nemiganhu yayo, iwo maguta enyika yose yakapoteredza.
Vana vaGadhi vakavaka Dhibhoni, neAtaroti, neAroeri,
neAtirotishofani, neJazeri, neJogibheha,
neBheti-nimura, neBheti-harani, ari maguta akakombwa namasvingo, ana matanga amakwai.
Vana vaRubheni vakavaka Heshibhoni, neEreari, neKiriataimi,
neNebho, neBhaari-meoni (vashandura mazita awo), neSibhima; vakatumidza maguta avakavaka mamwe mazita.
Vana vaMakiri, mwanakomana waManase, vakaenda Giriyadhi, vakarikunda, vakadzinga vaAmori vakanga vageremo.
Mozisi akapa Makiri, mwanakomana waManase, Giriyadhi, iye akagaramo.
Jairi, mwanakomana waManase, akakunda misha yaro, akaitumidza Misha yaJairi.
Nobha akandokunda Kenati, nemisha yaro yakanga yakabatwa naro, akaritumidza Nobha, nezita rake.
Ndidzo nzendo dzavana vaIsiraeri, pakubuda kwavo panyika yeIjipiti namapoka avo vachitungamirirwa naMozisi naAroni.
Mozisi akanyora kusimuka kwavo nenzendo dzavo, arairwa naJehovha; ndidzo nzendo dzavo nokusimuka kwavo.
Vakasimuka paRamesesi nomwedzi wokutanga, nezuva regumi namashanu romwedzi wokutanga; mangwanani akatevera Pasika vana vaIsiraeri vakabuda noruoko rune simba pamberi pavaIjipiti vose,
vaIjipiti vachiviga matangwe avo ose, akanga aurawa naJehovha pakati pavo; Jehovha akatongawo vamwari vavo.
VaIsiraeri vakasimuka paRamesesi, vakandodzika matende avo paSukoti.
Vakasimuka paSukoti, vakandodzika paEtami, pamuuyo werenje.
Vakasimuka paEtami, vakadzokera Pi-hahiroti, pamberi peBhaari-sefoni, vakadzika pamberi peMigidhori.
Vakasimuka pamberi peHahiroti, vakapinda nomukati megungwa, vakasvika murenje, vakafamba mazuva matatu murenje reEtami, vakandodzika paMara.
Vakasimuka paMara, vakasvika Erimi; paErimi pakanga pana matsime ane gumi namaviri emvura, nemiti yemichindwe ina makumi manomwe; vakadzika matende avo ipapo.
Vakasimuka paErimi, vakandodzika paGungwa Dzvuku.
Vakasimuka paGungwa Dzvuku, vakandodzika murenje reSini.
Vakasimuka murenje reSini, vakandodzika paDhofika.
Vakasimuka paDhofika, vakandodzika paArushi.
Vakasimuka paArushi, vakandodzika paRefidhimu, pakanga pasina mvura yokunwa yavanhu.
Vakasimuka paRefidhimu, vakandodzika murenje reSinai.
Vakasimuka murenje reSinai, vakandodzika paKibhuroti-hatava.
Vakasimuka paKibhuroti hatava, vakandodzika paHazeroti.
Vakasimuka paHazeroti, vakandodzika paRitima.
Vakasimuka paRitima, vakandodzika paRimoni-perezi.
Vakasimuka paRimon-iperezi, vakandodzika paRibhina.
Vakasimuka paRibhina, vakandodzika paRisa.
Vakasimuka paRisa, vakandodzika paKeherata.
Vakasimuka paKeherata, vakandodzika pagomo reSheferi.
Vakasimuka pagomo reSheferi, vakandodzika paHaradha.
Vakasimuka paHaradha, vakandodzika paMakeroti.
Vakasimuka paMakeroti, vakandodzika paTahati.
Vakasimuka paTahati, vakandodzika paTera.
Vakasimuka paTera, vakandodzika paMitika.
Vakasimuka paMitika, vakandodzika paHashimona.
Vakasimuka paHashimona, vakandodzika paMoseroti.
Vakasimuka paMoseroti, vakandodzika paBhene-jakani.
Vakasimuka paBhene-jakani, vakandodzika paHorihagidhigadhi.
Vakasimuka paHori-hagidhigadhi, vakandodzika paJotibhata.
Vakasimuka paJotibhata, vakandodzika paAbhurona.
Vakasimuka paAbhurona, vakandodzika paEZiyoni-gebheri.
Vakasimuka paEZiyoni-gebheri, vakandodzika murenje reZini (ndipo paKadheshi).
Vakasimuka paKadheshi, vakandodzika pagomo reHori, pamuuyo wenyika yeEdhomu.
Aroni mupirisiti akakwira pagomo reHori, arairwa naJehovha, akafirapo, negore ramakumi mana rokubuda kwavana vaIsiraeri paIjipiti, nomwedzi wechishanu,nezuva rokutanga romwedzi.
Aroni wakanga ana makore ane zana namakumi maviri namatatu pakufa kwake pagomo reHori.
Zvino mambo weAradhi, muKenani, wakanga agere kurutivi rweZasi munyika yeKenani, akanzwa kuti vana vaIsiraeri vouya.
Vakasimuka pagomo reHori, vakandodzika matende avo paZarimona.
Vakasimuka paZarimona, vakandodzika paPunoni.
Vakasimuka paPunoni, vakandodzika paObhoti.
Vakasimuka paObhoti, vakandodzika paIye-abharimi, pamuganhu weMoabhu.
Vakasimuka paIyimi, vakandodzika paDhibhoni-gadhi.
Vakasimuka paDhibhoni-gadhi, vakandodzika paArimoni-dhibhurataimi.
Vakasimuka paArimoni-dhibhurataimi, vakandodzika paAbharimu, pamberi peNebho.
Vakasimuka pamakomo eAbharimu, vakandodzika pamapani eMoabhu, paJorodhani paJeriko.
Vakadzika matende avo paJorodhani, kubva paBhetijeshimoti kusvika paAbherishitimu, pamapani eMoabhu.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi pamapani eMoabhu, paJorodhani paJeriko, akati,
Taura navana vaIsiraeri, uti kwavari, Kana mayambuka Jorodhani, mukasvika munyika yeKenani,
munofanira kudzinga vanhu vose vagere munyika pamberi penyu,nokuparadza zvifananidzo zvavo zvamabwe, nokuparadza zvifananidzo zvavo zvakaumbwa, nokuputsa nzvimbo dzavo dzakakwirira.
Munofanira kutora nyika, ive yenyu, mugaremo; nokuti ndakakupai nyika iyo, ive yenyu.
Munofanira kupiwa nhaka yenyika iyo nemijenya, nemhuri dzenyu; vazhinji munofanira kuvapa nhaka zhinji, vashoma munofanira kuvapa nhaka shoma; sezvakagoverwa nemijenya, saizvozvo inofanira kuva nhaka yomunhu; munofanira kugara nhaka namarudzi amadzibaba enyu.
Asi kana musingadi kudzinga vanhu vagere munyika pamberi penyu, ipapo ivo kwavari vamunorega vachava sechinhu chinobaya pameso enyu, neseminzwa panhivi dzenyu, vacharwa nemi munyika mamugere.
Ipapo ndichakuitirai imwi sezvandakafunga kuvaitira ivo.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Raira vana vaIsiraeri, uti kwavari, Kana masvika munyika yeKenani, (ndiyo nyika ichava nhaka yenyu, iyo nyika yeKenani, kusvikira kumiganhu yayo,)
rutivi rwenyu rwezasi runofanira kutanga murenje reZini ruchienda nokurutivi rweEdhomu; muganhu wenyu wezasi uchatanga pamuuyu weGungwa roMunyu, uchienda kumabvazuva;
zvino muganhu wenyu upote nechezasi kwegomo reAkirabhimu, ndokupfuurira kuZini, ugobuda nechezasi kweKadheshi-bharinea; zvino upfuure kuHazari-adhari, ugondosvika Azimoni;
zvino muganhu unofanira kupota uchitanga paAzimoni, kusvika kurukova rweIjipiti, ndokubuda paGungwa.
Muganhu wenyu wokumavirazuva ndiro Gungwa Guru nenyika yaro; ndiwo muganhu wokumavirazuva.
Ndiwo muganhu wenyu wokumusoro: Kubva paGungwa Guru munofanira kutara muganhu wenyu kusvika pagomo reHori;
kubva paHori munofanira kutara muganhu wenyu kusvika pavanopinda paHamati, muganhu ugondogumira paZedhadhi.
Zvino muganhu upfuurire kusvika paZifuroni, ugondoguma paHazari-enani; ndiwo muganhu wenyu wokumusoro.
Munofanira kutarawo muganhu wenyu wokumabvazuva, kubva paHazari-enani kusvika paShefami.
Kubva paShefami muganhu uburukire Ribhira, kumabvazuva kweAini; zvino muganhu uburuke, ugondosvika kurutivi rwegungwa reKinereti kumabvazuva;
zvino muganhu uburukire kuJorodhani, ugondoguma paGungwa roMunyu; ndiyo ichava nyika yenyu nemiganhu yayo kunhivi dzose.
Mozisi akaraira vana vaIsiraeri, akati, Ndiyo nyika yamuchapiwa nemijenya ive nhaka yenyu, yakarairwa naJehovha kuti ipiwe marudzi mapfumbamwe nehafu;
nokuti rudzi rwavana vaRubheni, nedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, norudzi rwavana vaGadhi, nedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, vatopiwa havo, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase vatopiwa havo nhaka yavo;
marudzi awa maviri nehafu akapiwa nhaka yawo nechemhiri kwaJoroclhani paJeriko, kumabvazuva kunobuda zuva nako.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Ndiwo mazita avarume vanofanira kukugoverai nyika kuti ive nhaka yenyu: Ereazari mupirisiti, naJoshua, mwanakomana waNuni.
Munofanira kutsaurawo muchinda mumwe kurudzi rumwe norumwe kugovera nyika ive nhaka yenyu.
Ndiwo mazita avarume ivavo: Kurudzi rwaJudha, Karebhu, mwanakomana waJefune;
kurudzi rwavana vaSimiyoni, Shemueri, mwanakomana waAmihudhi;
kurudzi kwaBhenjamini, Eridhadhi, mwanakomana waKisironi;
kurudzi rwavaDhani, muchinda Bhuki, mwanakomana waJogiri;
kuvana vaJosefa, kurudzi rwavana vaManase, muchinda Hanieri, mwanakomana waEfodhi;
kurudzi rwavana vaEfuremu, muchinda Kemueri, mwanakomana waShifitani;
kurudzi rwavana vaZebhuruni, muchinda Erizafani, mwanakomana waAzani ;
kurudzi rwavana vaIsakari, muchinda Patieri, mwanakomana waAzani,
kurudzi rwavana vaAsheri, muchinda Ahihudhi, mwanakomana waSheromi;
kurudzi rwavana vaNafutari, muchinda Pedhaheri, mwanakomana waAmihudhi.
Ndivo vakarairwa naJehovha kuti vagovere nyika yeKenani, ive nhaka yavana vaIsiraeri.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi pamapani eMoabhu, paJorodhani paJeriko, akati,
Raira vana vaIsiraeri, kuti vape vaRevhi panhaka yavakagara ivo, maguta mavangagara; munofanirawo kupa vaRevhi ruwa runopoteredza maguta avo.
Vanofanira kuva namaguta mavangagara; noruwa rwawo runofanira kuva rwemombe dzavo, nefuma yavo, nezvipfuwo zvavo zvose.
Ruwa rwamaguta, amunofanira kupa vaRevhi, runofanira kutanga parusvingo rweguta ndokupoteredza guta kusvika pamakubhiti ane chiuru chimwe kunhivi dzose.
Munofanira kuyera kunze kweguta, kurutivi rwokumabvazuva makubhiti ane zviuru zviviri, nokurutivi rwezasi makubhiti ane zviuru zviviri, nokurutivi rwokumusoro makubhiti ane zviuru zviviri, guta riri pakati.
Ndirwo runofanira kuva ruwa rwamaguta avo.
Maguta amunopa vaRevhi anofanira kuva maguta matanhatu outiziro, amunofanira kuvapa, kuti muurayi atizire kwaari; kunze kwaiwayo munofanira kuvapa maguta ana makumi mana namaviri.
Maguta ose amunopa vaRevhi anofanira kuva maguta ana makumi mana namasere, iwo noruwa rwawo.
Kana ari maguta amunotora panhaka dzavana vaIsiraeri, kuna vana mazhinji munofanira kutora mazhinji, kuna vana mashoma munofanira kutora mashoma; rudzi rumwe norumwe runofanira kupa vaRevhi mamwe maguta, sezvarwakapiwa nhaka yarwo.
Zvino Jehovha akataura naMozisi, akati,
Taura navana vaIsiraeri, uti kwavari, Kana mayambuka Jorodhani, mukapinda munyika yeKenani,
munofanira kuzvisanangurira maguta, ave maguta outiziro kwamuri; kuti muurayi, anouraya munhu asingaiti nohwoni atizireko.
Maguta iwayo anofanira kuva kwamuri utiziro pamutsivi, kuti muurayi arege kufa, asina kumbotongwa pamberi peungano.
Maguta amunovapa, anofanira kuva kwamuri maguta matanhatu outiziro.
Munofanira kuvapa maguta matatu mhiri kwaJorodhani, namamwe maguta matatu munofanira kuvapa munyika yeKenani; ndiwo anofanira kuva maguta outiziro.
Maguta iwayo matanhatu anofanira kuva utiziro kuvana vaIsiraeri, nokumweni, nokumutorwa ugere pakati pavo; kuti mumwe nomumwe wakauraya munhu, asina kuita nohwoni, atizireko.
Asi kana achinge amurova nenhumbi yedare, akafa, wava muurayi; zvino muurayi anofanira kuurawa zvirokwazvo.
Kana achinge amuuraya nebwe riri muruoko rwake, ringauraya munhu, akafa, wava muurayi; zvino muurayi anofanira kuurawa zvirokwazvo.
Kana achinge amurova nenhumbi yamatanda iri muruoko rwake, ingauraya munhu, akafa, wava muurayi; muurayi anofanira kuurawa zvirokwazvo.
Mutsivi weropa ndiye anofanira kuuraya muurayi amene; kana akasangana naye, unofanira kumuuraya.
Kana achinge amusunga achimuvenga, kana kumuposhera, amuvandira, akafa;
kana zvimwe akamurova noruoko, achimuvenga, akafa, wakamurova anofanira kuurawa zvirokwazvo, muurayi; mutsivi weropa, anofanira kuuraya muurayi, kana akasangana naye.
Asi kana achinge amusunda kamwe-kamwe, asina kumuvenga, kana kumuposhera nechinhu, asina kumuvandira,
kana nebwe, ringauraya munhu, akarikanda pamusoro pake, asingamuoni, akafa, iye asina kumuvenga, kana kutsvaka kumukuvadza;
zvino ungano inofanira kutonga mhosva pakati pomukuvadzi nomutsivi weropa nemirairo iyi:
Ipapo ungano inofanira kurwira muurayi paruoko rwomutsivi weropa, ungano igomudzosera kuguta rake routiziro, kwaakanga atizira; zvino iye anofanira kugaramo kusvikira mupirisiti mukuru afa, iye wakazodzwa namafuta matsvene.
Asi kana nguva ipi neipi muurayi akadarika muganhu weguta rake routiziro, kwaakanga atizira,
mutsivi weropa akamuwana kunze kwomuganhu weguta rako routiziro, mutsivi weropa akauraya muurayi uyo, iye haangavi nemhosva yeropa rake;
nokuti waifanira kugara muguta rake routiziro kusvikira mupirisiti mukuru afa; asi kana mupirisiti mukuru afa, muurayi anofanira kudzokera kunyika yake.
Izvi zvinofanira kuva kwamuri murayiro wokutonga nawo kusvikira kumarudzi enyu ose kwamunogara kwose.
Ani naani unouraya munhu, muurayi anofanira kuurawa nokupupura kwezvapupu; asi chapupu chimwe hachifaniri kupupurira munhu akaurawa.
Uye hamufaniri kugamuchira dzikunuro pamusoro poupenyu hwomuurayi, anofanira kuti aurawe; asi anofanira kuurawa zvirokwazvo.
Musagamuchira dzikunuro pamusoro pomunhu wakatizira kuguta routiziro, kuti adzokere kugara munyika yake, kusvikira mupirisiti afa.
Naizvozvo hamufaniri kusvibisa nyika mamugere, nokuti ropa rinosvibisa nyika; nyika haingayananisirwi pamusoro peropa rakateurirwamo, asi kwoga neropa romunhu wakariteura.
Musasvibisa nyika mamugere, mandigerewo ini; nokuti ini Jehovha ndigere pakati pavana vaIsiraeri.
Zvino vakuru vedzimba dzama dzibaba vemhuri yavana vaGiriyadhi, mwanakomana waManase, vemhuri dzavana vaJosefa, vakaswedera, vakataura pamberi paMozisi, napamberi pamachinda, vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avana vaIsiraeri,
vakati, Jehovha akaraira tenzi wangu, kuti agovere nyika nemijenya pakati pavana vaIsiraeri, ive nhaka yavo; uyezve, tenzi wangu wakarairwa naJehovha kupa vanasikana vaZerofehadhi, munununa wedu, nhaka yake.
Zvino kana ivo vakawanikwa nomumwe wavanakomana vamarudzi mamwe avana vaIsiraeri, nhaka yavo ichafanira kubviswa panhaka yamadzibaba edu, ikawedzerwa panhaka yorudzi kwavanozondogara; saizvozvo ichabviswa panhaka yatakapiwa nemijenya.
Zvino kana gore reJubheri ravana vaIsiraeri richisvika, nhaka yavo ichawedzerwa panhaka yorudzi kwavagere; naizvozvo nhaka yavo ichabviswa panhaka yorudzi rwamadzibaba edu.
Zvino Mozisi akaraira vana vaIsiraeri sezvakataura Jehovha, akati, Rudzi rwavana vaJosefa runotaura kwazvo.
Ndiro shoko rakarairwa naJehovha pamusoro pavanasikana vaZerofehadhi: Ngavawanikwe navavanoda; asi ngavawanikwe naveimba yorudzi rwababa vavo.
Naizvozvo hapana nhaka yavana vaIsiraeri ingabva kuno rumwe rudzi ikaenda kuno rumwe; nokuti vana vaIsiraeri vanofanira, mumwe nomumwe, kunamatira nhaka yorudzi rwamadzibaba avo.
Mwanasikana mumwe nomumwe ane nhaka parudzi rupi norupi rwavana vaIsiraeri, ngaawanikwe nomumwe weimba yorudzi rwababa vake, kuti vana vaIsiraeri, mumwe nomumwe, vagare nhaka yamadzibaba avo.
Naizvozvo hapana nhaka ingazobva kuno rumwe rudzi, ikaenda kuno rumwe rudzi, nokuti marudzi avana vaIsiraeri achanamatira, rumwe norumwe, nhaka yarwo.
Vanasikana vaZerofehadhi vakaita sezvakarairwa Mozisi naJehovha.
Nokuti Mara, naTiriza, naHogira, naMirika, naNoa, ivo vanasikana vaZerofehadhi, vakawanikwa navanakomana vavanunguna vababa vavo.
Vakawanikwa padzimba dzavana vaManase, mwanakomana waJosefa, nhaka ikagara parudzi rweimba yababa vavo.
Ndiyo mirairo nemitemo, yakarairwa vana vaIsiraeri naJehovha nomuromo waMozisi pamapani eMoabhu paJorodhani paJeriko.
Ndiwo mashoko akataurwa naMozisi kuvaIsiraeri vose mhiri kwaJorodhani murenje, muMupata wakatarisana neSufi, pakati peParani, neTofera, neRabhani, neHazeroti, neDhizahabhi.
Kubva paHorebhu, nenzira yokugomo reSeiri, kusvika paKadheshi-bharinea, munhu anofamba mazuva ane gumi nerimwe.
Zvino pagore ramakumi mana, pamwedzi wegumi nomumwe, nezuva rokutanga romwedzi, Mozisi wakaudza vana vaIsiraeri zvose zvavakarairwa naJehovha naye;
wakati akunda Sihoni, mambo wavaAmori, wakanga agere Heshibhoni, naOgi, mambo weBhashani, wakanga agere Ashitaroti, paEdhirei,
Mozisi akatanga kududzira murayiro uyu vari mhiri kwaJorodhani, panyika yokwaMoabhu, akati,
Jehovha Mwari wedu akataura nesu paHorebhu, akati, Makagara nguva yakaringana pagomo iri.
Dzokai, mufambe, muende kumakomo avaAmori nokunzvimbo dzose dziri pedo nawo, kuMupata, nokumakomo, nokumapani, nokurutivi rwezasi, nokumhenderekedzo dzegungwa, nokunyika yavaKenani, nokuRebhanoni, kusvikira kurwizi rukuru, rwizi Yufuratesi.
Tarirai, ndakaisa nyika pamberi penyu; pindai, mutore nyika yakapikirwa madzibaba enyu naJehovha, kuna Abhurahamu, naIsaka, naJakobho, kuti vachaipiwa ivo navana vavo vanovatevera.
Nguva iyo ndakataura nemi, ndikati, Handigoni kukutakurai ndiri ndoga;
Jehovha Mwari wenyu wakakuwanzai; tarirai, nhasi mava senyeredzi dzokudenga pakuwanda kwenyu.
Jehovha Mwari wamadzibaba enyu ngaakuwedzerei rune chiuru chamazana pamakasvika zvino, amuropafadze sezvaakakupikirai.
Ini ndoga ndingatakura seiko kurema kwenyu, nomutoro wenyu, nokurwa kwenyu?
Muzvitsaurirei varume vakachenjera, vakangwara, vanozikanwa, kumarudzi enyu, ndivaite vakuru venyu.
Mukandipindura, mukati, Chinhu icho chamataura chakanaka kuti tichiite.
Ipapo ndakatora vakuru vamarudzi enyu, varume vakanga vakachenjera, vakanga vakazikanwa, ndikavaita vakuru venyu, vave vakuru vezviuru, navakuru vamazana, navakuru vamakumi mashanu, navakuru vevane gumi, navatariri kumarudzi enyu.
Nenguva iyo ndikaraira vatongi venyu, ndikati, teererai mhosva dziri pakati pehama dzenyu, mururamisire pakati pomunhu nehama yake, nomutorwa ugere naye.
Musatsaura vanhu pakutonga kwenyu; munofanira kuteerera muduku nomukuru nomutoo mumwe; musatya munhu; nokuti kutonga ndokwa Mwari; asi kana kune mhaka yamusingagoni, muuye nayo kwandiri kuti ndiinzwe.
Nenguva iyo ndakakurairai zvose zvamunofanira kuita.
Zvino takasimuka paHorebhu, tikafamba murenje iro rose guru rinotyisa, ramakaona panzira yokumakomo avaAmori, sezvatakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wedu; tikasvika paKadheshi-bharinea.
Ndikati kwamuri, Masvika panyika yamakomo yavaAmori, yatinopiwa naJehovha Mwari wedu.
Tarirai, Jehovha, Mwari wenyu wakaisa nyika iyo pamberi penyu; kwirai, muitore, sezvamakaudzwa naJehovha Mwari wamadzibaba enyu; musatya kana kuvhunduka.
Ipapo imwi makaswedera mose kwandiri, mukati, Ngatitume varume vatitungamirire, vatishorere nyika, vagouya kuzotiudza nzira yatinofanira kukwira nayo, namaguta atichandosvika kwaari.
Shoko iro rakandifadza; ndikatsaura varume vane gumi navaviri pakati penyu, murume mumwe kurudzi rumwe norumwe.
Ivo vakaenda vakakwira mugomo, vakasvika mumupata weEshikori, vakaishora,
Vakatora mimwe michero yenyika mumaoko avo, vakaburukira kwatiri nayo, vakadzoka neshoko kwatiri, vakati, Inyika yakanaka, yatinopiwa naJehovha Mwari wedu.
Asi makaramba kukwira, mukamukira kuraira kwaJehovha Mwari wenyu;
mukanyunyuta mumatende enyu, mukati, Jehovha wakativenga, saka wakatibudisa munyika yeIjipiti, kuti atiise mumaoko avaAmori, kuti atiparadze.
Zvino tichaendepiko?
Hama dzedu dzanyawusa moyo yedu, dzichiti, Vanhu avo vanotikunda nokukura nokureba; maguta makuru, akakombwa namasvingo anosvika kudenga; uye, takaonako vana vaEnaki.
Ipapo ini ndakati kwamuri, Musavhunduka henyu, kana kuvatya.
Jehovha Mwari wenyu unokutungamirirai, iye uchakurwirai, sezvaakakuitirai zvose paIjipiti pamberi penyu,
nomurenje pamakaona muberekero wamakaberekwa nawo naJehovha Mwari wenyu, somunhu unobereka mwana wake; panzira dzenyu dzose dzamakafamba nadzo, kudzimara muchisvika panzvimbo iyi.
Asi pachinhu ichi hamuna kutenda Jehovha Mwari wenyu;
iye wakakutungamirirai panzira, kuti akutsvakirei pamungadzika matende enyu, nomoto usiku, kuti akuratidzei nzira yamunofanira kufamba nayo, uye negore masikati.
Zvino Jehovha akanzwa inzwi ramashoko enyu, akatsamwa, akapika, achiti,
Zvirokwazvo, hakungavi nomumwe wavanhu ava, vorudzi urwu rwakaipa, uchaona nyika yakanaka, yandakapika ndichiti ndichaipa madzibaba enyu,
asi Karebhu, mwanakomana waJefune, ndiye uchaiona; ndichamupa iye navana vake nyika yaakatsika, nokuti iye wakatevera Jehovha nomoyo wose.
Jehovha akanditsamwira neniwo nokuda kwenyu, akati, Newewo haungapindi ikoko;
Joshua mwanakomana waNuni, umire pamberi pako, ndiye uchapinda ikoko; umusimbise, nokuti ndiye uchagarisa vaIsiraeri nhaka yavo.
Vana venyu vaduku, vamakati vachatapwa, navana venyu vasingazivi nhasi zvakanaka nezvakaipa, ndivo vachapinda ikoko; ndichavapa iyo, ive yavo.
Asi kana murimwi, dzokai mufambe murenje nenzira yokuGungwa dzvuku
Zvino imwi mukapindura, mukati kwandiri, Takatadzira Jehovha, tichakwira hedu tindorwa, zvose sezvatakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wedu.
Mukashonga mumwe nomumwe nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, mukada kukwira mugomo.
Zvino Jehovha akati kwandiri, Uti kwavari: Musakwira kana kurwa, nokuti ini handizi pakati penyu; kuti murege kukundwa pamberi pavavengi venyu.
Naizvozvo ndakataura nemi, asi makaramba kunditeerera; asi makamukira murayiro waJehovha, mukaita manyawi, mukakwira mugomo.
Zvino vaAmori vakanga vagere mugomo iro, vakabuda kuzorwa nemi, vakakudzingai, sezvinoita nyuchi, vakakuparadzai kusvikira paHoma.
Ipapo makadzoka, mukachema pamberi paJehovha, asi Jehovha haana kuteerera inzwi renyu, kana kurerekera nzeve dzake.
Naizvozvo makagara paKadheshi mazuva mazhinji, nguva yamakagarapo.
Zvino takadzoka, tikafamba tichipinda murenje nenzira inoenda kuGungwa Dzvuku, sezvandakaudzwa naJehovha, tikapota-pota gomo reSeiri mazuva mazhinji.
Zvino Jehovha akataura neni, akati,
Mapota-pota gomo iri nguva yaringana; dzokai muende nechokumusoro.
Raira vanhu, uti, Munofanira kupfuura nomunyika yehama dzenyu, vana vaEsau, vagere Seiri; ivo vachakutyai, saka chenjerai
Musavavamba, nokuti handingakupiyi nyika yavo, kunyange pangatsikwa norutsoka; nokuti ndakapa Esau gomo reSeiri, rive rake.
Munofanira kutenga zvokudya kwavari nemari, mudye, nemvura munofanira kuitengawo kwavari, munwe.
Nokuti Jehovha Mwari wako wakakuropafadza pamabasa ose amaoko ako; iye unoziva kufamba kwako murenje iri guru.
Jehovha Mwari wako wakava newe makore awa makumi mana; hauna kushaiwa chinhu.
Naizvozvo takapfuura hama dzedu, vana vaEsau, vagere Seiri, tikasiya nzira yokuMupata, inobva Erati napaEZiyoni-gebheri.
Takadzoka, tikapfuura nenzira yokurenje rokwaMoabhu.
Zvino Jehovha akati kwandiri, Usarwa navaMoabhu, kana kuvavamba pakurwa; nokuti handingakupi nyika yavo, ive yako; nokuti ndakapa Ari kuvana vaRoti, ive yavo.
(Kare vaEmi vakanga vageremo, vaiva vanhu vakuru, vazhinji, varefu, savaAnaki;
vanonzi vorudzi rwavaRefaimu, savaAnaki, asi vaMoabhu vanovaidza vaEmi.
NavaHoriwo vakanga vagere Seiri kare; asi vana vaEsau vakavatevera, vakavaparadza pamberi pavo, vakagara panzvimbo yavo; sezvakaita vaIsiraeri nenyika yavo yavakapiwa naJehovha ive yavo.)
Zvino simukai, muyambuke rukova Zeredhi.
Tikayambuka rukova Zeredhi.
Zvino mazuva okubva kwedu paKadheshi-bharinea kusvikira tayambuka rukova Zeredhi, aiva makore makumi matatu namasere; kusvikira rudzi rwose rwavarume vehondo vaparadzwa pakati pemisasa, sezvavakanga vapikirwa naJehovha.
Uye ruoko rwaJehovhawo rwairamba ruchirwa navo, kuti vaparadzwe pakati pemisasa kusvikira vapera.
Zvino varume vose vehondo vakati vapera nokufa pakati pavanhu,
Jehovha akataura neni, akati,
Nhasi unofanira kupfuura napaAri, pamuganhu waMoabhu;
kana woswedera pakatarisana navana vaAmoni, usarwa navo, kana kuvavamba; nokuti handingakupi nyika yavana vaAmoni, ive yako; nokuti ndakaipa vana vaRoti, ive yavo.
Naiyowo yainzi inyika yavaRefaimu; vaRefaimu vakanga vageremo kare; asi vaAmoni vaivaidza vaZamuzumi;
vaiva vanhu vakuru, vazhinji, varefu savaAnaki; asi Jehovha wakavaparadza pamberi pavo, vakavatevera, vakagara panzvimbo yavo;
sezvaakaita navana vaEsau, vanogara Seiri, nguva yaakaparadza vaHori pamberi pavo, ivo vakavatevera, vakagara panzvimbo yavo kusvikira nhasi;
vaAvhi, vakanga vagere mumisha kusvikira Gaza, vakaparadzwa navaKafitori, vakabva Kafitori, vakagara panzvimbo yavo.
Simukai, mufambe, muyambuke rwizi Arinoni; tarirai, ndakaisa mumaoko enyu Sihoni muAmori, mambo weHeshibhoni, nenyika yake; tangai kuitora, muvambe kurwa naye.
Nhasi ndichatanga kuvhundusa nokutyisa ndudzi dziri pasi pedenga rose pamusoro penyu, ivo vachanzwa guhu pamusoro penyu, vachabvunda nokutya kwazvo pamusoro penyu.
Zvino ndakatuma nhume mbiri murenje reKedhemoti, kuna Sihoni, mambo weHeshibhoni, namashoko orugare, ndichiti,
Nditendere kupfuura nomunyika yako, ndichafamba nenzira huru, handingatsaukiri kurudyi kana kuruboshwe.
Munganditengesera zvokudya nemari, ndidye; mungandipa mvura ndichiripa nemari, ndinwe, asi nditenderei henyu kupfuura namakumbo;
sezvandakaitirwa navana vaEsau vagere Seiri, navaMoabhu, vagere Ari; kusvikira ndayambuka Jorodhani, ndikapinda munyika yatinopiwa naJehovha Mwari wedu.
Asi Sihoni, mambo weHeshibhoni, wakaramba kutitendera kupfuura nokwaari, nokuti Jehovha Mwari wako wakawomesa mweya wake, akarambidza moyo wake, kuti amuise iye muruoko rwako, sezvazvakaita nhasi.
Zvino Jehovha akati kwandiri, Tarira, ndatanga kuisa Sihoni nenyika yake kwauri; tanga kutora, kuti nyika ive yako.
Ipapo Sihoni akauya, iye navanhu vake vose kuzorwa nesu paJahazi.
Jehovha Mwari wedu akamuisa mumaoko edu, tikamukunda, iye navana vake, navanhu vake vose.
Nenguva iyo tikakunda maguta ake ose, tikaparadza chose maguta ose aiva navanhu, pamwechete navakadzi navana vaduku, hatina kusiya kunyange nomumwe.
Asi zvipfuwo zvoga takazvitora zvive zvedu zvatakatapa, pamwechete nezvatakapamba pamaguta atakakunda.
Kubva paAroeri pamuuyo worwizi Arinoni, nokuguta riri parwizi, kusvikira Giriyadhi, kwakanga kusina guta rakatikurira; Jehovha Mwari wedu wakaaisa ose pamaoko edu;
asi hamuna kuswedera kunyika yavana vaAmoni; kurutivi rwose rworwizi Jabhoki, namaguta enyika yamakomo, napose patakanga tadziviswa naJehovha Mwari wedu.
Zvino takadzoka, tikakwira nenzira inoenda Bhashani; Ogi, mambo weBhashani, akabuda, iye navanhu vake vose, kuzorwa nesu paEdhirei.
Jehovha akati kwandiri, Usamutya, nokuti ndakamuisa paruoko rwako, iye navanhu vake vose, nenyika yake; unofanira kuita naye sezvawakaitira Sihoni, mambo wavaAmori, wakanga agere Heshibhoni.
Naizvozvo Jehovha Mwari wedu wakaisa mumaoko edu naiye Ogiwo, mambo weBhashani, navanhu vake vose; tikamukunda kusvikira asina munhu waakasiyirwa.
Nenguva iyo tikakunda maguta ake ose; kwakanga kusina guta rimwe ratisina kumutorera, maguta ana makumi matanhatu, nenyika yose yeArigobhu, noushe hwaOgi muBhashani.
Iwo akanga ari maguta akapoteredzwa ose namasvingo marefu, namasuo, namazariro, kunze kwemisha mizhinji-zhinji yakanga isina masvingo.
Tikaaparadza chose, sezvatakaitira Sihoni, mambo weHeshibhoni, tikaparadza chose maguta ose akanga ana vanhu, pamwechete navakadzi navana vaduku.
Asi zvipfuwo zvose, nezvakapambwa pamaguta awo, izvo takazvitapa isu.
Nenguva iyo takatorera madzimambo maviri avaAmori, vakanga vagere mhiri kwaJorodhani, nyika yavo kubva parwizi Arinoni, kusvikira pagomo reHerimoni,
(Herimoni rinotumidzwa Sirioni navaSidhoni, asi vaAmori vanoritumidza Seniri;)
maguta ose ebani, neGiriyadhi rose, neBhashani rose, kusvikira paSareka neEdhirei, iwo maguta oushe hwaOgi muBhashani.
(Nokuti Ogi, mambo weBhashani, ndiye woga wakanga asara kuna vakanga vasara vavaRefaimu; mubhedha wake wakanga uri wamatare; ko hauzi paRabha ravana vaAmoni here?
Kureba kwawo kwakanga kuchisvika pamakubhiti mapfumbamwe, noupamhi hwawo pamakubhiti mana, kana zvichienzaniswa nekubhiti romunhu.)
Nyika iyi takaitora nenguva iyo, ikava yedu; ndikapa vaRubheni navaGadhi nyika inobva paAroeri, parwizi Arinoni, nehafu yenyika yamakomo yeGiriyadhi, namaguta ayo;
ndikapa hafu yorudzi rwaManase pakanga pasara paGiriyadhi, neBhashani rose, ushe hwaOgi, nenyika yose yeArigobhu, ndiro Bhashani rose.
(Ndiyo inonzi nyika yavaRefaimu.
Jairi mwanakomana waManase, akatora nyika yose yeArigobhu, kusvikira pamuganhu wavaGeshuri navaMaakati, akaitumidza, iro Bhashani rose, zita rake, Havhoti-jairi, kusvikira nhasi.)
Ndikapa Makiri Giriyadhi.
Asi vaRubheni navaGadhi ndakavapa kubva paGiriyadhi kusvikira parwizi Arinoni, uye pakati pomupata nenyika yawo, kusvikira parwizi Jabhoki, ndiyo nyika yavana vaAmoni.
Uye noMupata, neJorodhani, nenyika inobva paKinereti,kusvikira pagungwa romupata, ndiro Gungwa roMunyu, pajinga pegomo rePisiga, kumabvazuva.
Nenguva iyo ndakakurairai, ndikati, Jehovha Mwari wenyu wakakupai nyika iyo kuti ive yenyu; zvino munofanira kuyambuka pamberi pehama dzenyu, vana vaIsiraeri, makashonga nhumbi dzokurwa, imwi varume vose mhare.
Asi vakadzi venyu, navana venyu vaduku, nezvipfuwo zvenyu (ndinoziva kuti mune zvipfuwo zvizhinji), izvo zvinofanira kusara mumaguta andakakupai;
kusvikira Jehovha apa hama dzenyu zororo semi, kuti naivo vave nenyika yavanopiwa naJehovha Mwari wenyu mhiri kwaJorodhani; ipapo mungadzokera mumwe nomumwe kunhaka yake, yandakakupai.
Nenguva iyo ndikarairawo Joshua, ndikati, Meso ako akaona zvose zvakaitirwa madzimambo awa maviri naJehovha Mwari wenyu; saizvozvo Jehovha uchaitira ushe hwose kwamunoyambuka.
Hamufaniri kuvatya, nokuti Jehovha Mwari wenyu ndiye unokurwirai.
Nenguva iyo ndikanyengetera kuna Jehovha, ndikati,
imwi Jehovha Mwari, makatanga kuratidza muranda wenyu ukuru hwenyu, noruoko rwenyu rune simba; nokuti ndoupiko mwari kudenga kana panyika ungaita zvakafanana namabasa enyu, nesimba renyu?
Donditenderai henyu kuyambuka, ndione nyika yakanaka iri mhiri kwaJorodhani, negomo iro rakanaka, neRebhanoni.
Asi Jehovha wakanditsamwira nokuda kwenyu, akasandinzwa; Jehovha akati kwandiri, Zvaringana!
Chirega kuzotaurazve neni pamusoro peshoko iro.
Kwira pamusoro-soro pePisiga, utarire kumavirazuva, nokumusoro, nezasi nokumabvazuva, uone nameso ako; nokuti haungayambuki Jorodhani urwu.
Asi raira Joshua, umutse moyo wake nokumusimbisa, nokuti iye uchayambuka pamberi pavanhu ava, iye uchavagarisa nhaka yenyika yauchaona.
Zvino tikagara pamupata wakatarisana neBheti-peori.
Zvino imwi vana vaIsiraeri, teererai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa, zvandinokudzidzisai, kuti muzviite; kuti murarame, mupinde mutore nyika, yamunopiwa naJehovha, Mwari wamadzibaba enyu.
Musawedzera kana kutapudza pashoko randinokurairai, kuti muchengete mirairo yaJehovha Mwari wenyu, yandinokurairai.
Meso enyu akaona zvakaitwa naJehovha nokuda kwezvakaitwa paBhaari-peori; nokuti varume vose vakatevera Bhaari-peori, Jehovha Mwari wenyu wakavaparadza pakati penyu.
Asi imwi, makanamatira Jehovha Mwari wenyu, imwi mose muri vapenyu kusvikira nhasi.
Tarirai, ndakakudzidzisai zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa, sezvandakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wangu, kuti muite saizvozvo panyika yamunopinda, kuti ive yenyu.
Naizvozvo muchengete izvozvo, muzviite; nokuti ndiko kuchenjera kwenyu nokungwara kwenyu pamberi pavanhu vachanzwa zvose izvi zvakatemwa, vachiti, Zvirokwazvo, rudzi urwu rukuru ndivanhu vakachenjera vakangwara.
Nokuti rudzi rukuru ruripiko, runa mwari uri pedo navo, saJehovha Mwari wedu nguva ipi neipi yatinodana kwaari?
Rudzi rukuru ruripiko, rune zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa zvakarurama somurayiro uyu wose, wandinoisa pamberi penyu nhasi?
Asi zvichenjererei, mushingaire kuchengeta mweya yenyu, kuti murege kukanganwa zvinhu zvamakaona nameso enyu, zvirege kuzobva pamoyo yenyu mazuva ose oupenyu hwenyu; asi munofanira kuzvizivisa vana venyu navana vavana venyu;
musi wamakanga mumire pamberi paJehovha Mwari wenyu paHorebhu, musi Jehovha waakati kwandiri, Ndiunganidzire vanhu, ndivaudze mashoko angu, kuti vadzidze kunditya mazuva ose avachagara panyika, vagodzidzisa vana vavowo.
imwi mukaswedera, mukamira pajinga pegomo; gomo rikapfuta nomoto kusvikira pakati pedenga, pamwechete nerima, negore, nokusviba kukuru.
Zvino Jehovha wakataura nemi ari mukati momoto; mukanzwa inzwi ramashoko, asi hamuna kuona kuti wakadini; makanzwa inzwi roga.
Ipapo wakadudzira sungano yake kwamuri, yaakakurairai, kuti muiite, iye mirairo ine gumi; akainyora pamahwendefa maviri amabwe.
Nenguva iyo Jehovha akandiraira, kuti ndikudzidzisei zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa, kuti mundozviita panyika iyo, kwamunoenda, kuzoiita yenyu.
Naizvozvo zvichenjererei nokuti hamuna kuona kuti wakanga akadini, musi Jehovha waakataura nemi paHorebhu ari pakati pomoto.
Kuti murege kuzvishatisa, muchizviitira chifananidzo chakavezwa, chakafanana nechinhu chipi nechipi, kana mufananidzo womurume kana womukadzi,
kana mufananidzo wemhuka ipi neipi iri panyika, kana mufananidzo weshiri ipi neipi ina mapapiro, inobhururuka mudenga,
kana mufananidzo wechinhu chipi nechipi chinokambaira pasi, kana mufananidzo wehove ipi neipi iri mumvura pasi penyika;
kuti murege kusimudzira meso enyu kudenga, zvino kana muchiona zuva nomwedzi nenyeredzi, hondo yose yokudenga, mukatsauswa mukanamata kwazviri nokuzvishumira, izvo zvakagoverwa ndudzi dzose dziri pasi pedenga naJehovha Mwari wenyu.
Asi Jehovha wakakutorai imwi, akakubudisai muchoto chamatare, paIjipiti, kuti muve vanhu venhaka yake, sezvamuri nhasi.
Jehovha akanditsamwirawo nokuda kwenyu, akapika kuti ini handingayambuki Jorodhani, ndipinde munyika iyo yakanaka, yamunopiwa naJehovha Mwari wenyu, kuti ive yenyu.
Asi ini ndinofanira kufira munyika ino, handifaniri kuyambuka Jorodhani asi imwi muchayambuka henyu, mukapiwa nyika iyo yakanaka.
Muzvichenjerere, kuti murege kukanganwa sungano yaJehovha Mwari wenyu, yaakaita nemi, mukazviitira chifananidzo chakavezwa chomufananidzo wechinhu chipi nechipi, chawakadziviswa naJehovha Mwari wako.
Nokuti Jehovha Mwari wako, moto unoparadza, naMwari ane godo.
Zvino kana iwe wabereka vana navazukuru, mukagara ,nguva huru panyika, mukazvishatisa, mukaita chifananidzo chakavezwa nomufananidzo wechinhu chipi nechipi, mukaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha Mwari wako, mukamutsamwisa;
ini ndinodana denga napasi zvikupupurirei nhasi, kuti muchakurumidza kuparadzwa chose panyika yamunoyambukira Jorodhani kuti muende kwairi kuiita yenyu; hamungaitimo mazuva mazhinji, asi muchaparadzwa chose.
Jehovha uchakuparadzirai pakati pendudzi, muchasara muri vashoma pakati pendudzi, kwamuchandoiswa naJehovha.
Apo muchashumira vamwari, vakaitwa namaoko avanhu, vamatanda navamabwe, vasingaoni, kana kunzwa, kana kudya, kana kunhuwidza.
Asi kana mukazotsvaka Jehovha Mwari wako, ipapo, uchamuwana, kana ukamutsvaka nomoyo wako wose nomweya wako wose.
Zvino kana uri munjodzi, zvinhu izvi zvose zvakuwira, pamazuva okupedzisira uchadzokera kuna Jehovha Mwari wako, ukateerera inzwi rake.
Nokuti Jehovha Mwari wako ndiMwari une nyasha; haangakusiyi, kana kukuparadza, kana kukanganwa sungano yamadzibaba ako, yaakavapikira.
Nokuti bvunzai henyu zvino pamazuva akapfuura, imwi musati mavapo, kubva pazuva rokusikwa kwavanhu panyika naMwari, kubva panorumwe rutivi rwedenga kusvikira kuno rumwe, kana kwaimbovapo chinhu chikuru chakadai, kunyange kumbonzwika chakadai?
Ko kuna vanhu, vakambonzwa inzwi raMwari richitaura riri mukati momoto, sezvamakanzwa imwi, vakararama here?
Kana Mwari wakatongoidza kundozvitsaurira rudzi pakati porumwe rudzi, nemiidzo, nezviratidzo, nezvinoshamisa, nehondo, nechanza chine simba, noruoko rwakatambanudzwa, nezvinotyisa kwazvo, sezvamakaona zvamakaitirwa zvose naJehovha paIjipiti here?
imwi makaratidzwa izvozvo, kuti muzive kuti Jehovha ndiye Mwari; hakunomumwe kunze kwake.
Wakakunzwisai inzwi rake ari kudenga, kuti akudzidzise; panyika wakakuonesa moto wake mukuru; iwe wakanzwa mashoko ake ari mukati momoto.
Wakada madzibaba ako, naizvozvo akazvitsaurira vana vavo vakavatevera, akakubudisa paIjipiti, iye anewe nesimba rake guru;
kuti adzinge pamberi pako ndudzi dzinokupfuura noukuru nesimba, akupinze iwe, akupe nyika yavo ive nhaka yako, sezvaakaita nhasi.
Naizvozvo uzive nhasi, uzvichengete mumoyo mako, kuti Jehovha ndiye Mwari kudenga kumusoro napanyika pasi; hakunomumwe.
Unofanira kuchengeta zvaakatema, nemirairo yake, yandinokuraira nhasi, kuti ufare iwe navana vako vanokutevera, kuti uwedzere mazuva ako panyika yaunopiwa naJehovha Mwari wako nokusingaperi.
Maguta outiziro kumabvazuva kwaJorodhani
Zvino Mozisi akatsaura maguta matatu mhiri kwaJorodhani kumabvazuva
kuti. muurayi agone kutizirako, iye wakauraya wokwake, asina kuita nobwoni, asina kumuvenga kare; kuti kana achinge atizira kune rimwe ramaguta iwayo, ararame;
aiti: Bhezeri murenje, kunyika yamapani, wavaRubheni, neRamoti paGiriyadhi, wavaGadhi, neGorani paBhashani, wavaManase.
Mirairo ine gumi inogamhidzwa
Zvino ndiwo murayiro wakaiswa naMozisi pamberi pavana vaIsiraeri.
Ndizvo zvakapupurwa, zvakatemwa, nezvakatongwa, zvakataurwa naMozisi kuvana vaIsiraeri, pakubuda kwavo Ijipiti;
vari kumabvazuva kwaJorodhani, pamupata wakatarisana neBheti-peori, munyika yaSihoni, mambo wavaAmori, wakanga agere Heshibhoni, iye wakakundwa naMozisi navana vaIsiraeri, pakubuda kwavo Ijipiti;
vakatora nyika yake, nenyika yaOgi, mambo weBhashani, ikava yavo; iwo madzimambo maviri avaAmori, vakanga vari mhiri kwaJorodhani, kumabvazuva;
kubva paAroeri, pamuuyo womupata weArinoni, kusvikira pagomo reSioni (ndiro Herimoni),
noMupata wose uri mhiri kwaJorodhani kumabvazuva, kusvikira pagungwa romupata, pajinga pePisiga.
Zvino Mozisi akadana vaIsiraeri vose, akati kwavari, Inzwai vaIsiraeri, zvakatemwa nezvakatongwa, zvandinotaura nhasi muchizvinzwa, kuti muzvidzidze nokuzvichengeta mugozviita.
Jehovha Mwari wedu wakaita sungano nesu paHorebhu.
Jehovha haana kuita sungano iyi namadzibaba edu, asi nesu, isu tose tiri vapenyu nhasi pano.
Jehovha akataura nemi, zviso zvakatarisana, ari mukati momoto,
(nenguva iyo ini ndakanga ndimire pakati paJehovha nemi, kuti ndikuzivisei shoko raJehovha; nokuti imi makanga muchitya nokuda kwomoto, mukasakwira mugomo;) akati,
Ndini Jehovha Mwari wako, wakakubudisa munyika yeIjipiti, muimba youranda.
Usava navamwe vamwari kunze kwangu.
Usazviitira mufananidzo wakavezwa, kana uri mufananidzo wechinhu chiri kudenga kumusoro, kana wechiri panyika pasi, kana wechiri mumvura pasi penyika.
Usapfugamira izvozvo, kana kuzvishumira; nokuti ini Jehovha Mwari wako, ndiri Mwari une godo; ndinorova vana nokuda kwezvivi zvamadzibaba avo, kusvikira kurudzi rwechitatu norwechina rwavanondivenga;
ndichiitira nyasha vane zviuru zvamazana vanondida, vanochengeta mirairo yangu.
Usareva zita raJehovha Mwari wako pasina; nokuti Jehovha haangaregi kumupa mhosva unoreva zita rake pasina.
Chengeta zuva reSabata, rive dzvene, sezvawakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wako.
Ubate basa mazuva matanhatu, uite mabasa ako ose.
Asi zuva rechinomwe iSabata raJehovha Mwari wako; usatongobata mabasa naro, iwe, kana mwanakomana wako, kana mwanasikana wako, kana muranda wako, kana murandakadzi wako, kana mombe yako, kana mbongoro yako, kana chimwe chezvipfuwo zvako, kana mweni wako uri mukati mamasuo ako; kuti muranda wako nomurandakadzi wako vazorore sewe.
Unofanira kurangarira kuti newewo waiva muranda panyika Jehovha Mwari wako akakubudisa nechanza chine simba noruoko rwakatambanudzwa; naizvozvo Jehovha Mwari wako wakakuraira kuti uchengete zuva reSabata.
Kudza baba vako namai vako, sezvawakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wako; kuti mazuva ako ave mazhinji, ufare panyika yaunopiwa naJehovha Mwari wako.
Usauraya.
Uye usaita upombwe.
Uye usaba.
Uye usapupurira wokwako nhema.
Uye usachiva mukadzi wowokwako; uye usachochora imba yowokwako, kana munda wake, kana muranda wake, kana murandakadzi wake, kana mombe yake, kana mbongoro yake, kana chimwe chinhu chowokwako.
Jehovha wakataura mashoko awa ose pagomo kuungano yenyu yose, ari mukati memoto negore, nokusviba kukuru, nenzwi guru; haana kuwedzera mamwe.
Akaanyora pamahwendefa maviri amabwe, akandipa iwo.
Zvino imwi makati muchinzwa inzwi richibva mukati merima, negomo richipfuta nomoto, mukaswedera kwandiri, vakuru vose Namarudzi enyu, navakuru venyu,
mukati, Tarirai, Jehovha Mwari wedu watiratidza kubwinya kwake noukuru hwake, tikanzwa inzwi rake richibva mumoto; taona hedu nhasi kuti Mwari ungataura nomunhu, akararama hake.
Naizvozvo zvino tichafireiko?
Nokuti moto uyu mukuru uchatiparadza, kana tikaramba tichinzwa inzwi raJehovha Mwari wedu tichafa.
Nokuti ndianiko pakati pavanhu vose wakanzwa inzwi raMwari mupenyu achitaura ari mumoto, sesu, akararama here?
Swedera hako iwe, unzwe zvose zvicharehwa naJehovha Mwari wedu, ugozotiudza zvose zvauchaudzwa iwe naJehovha Mwari wedu; tichazvinzwa, nokuzviita.
Zvino Jehovha akanzwa inzwi ramashoko enyu, nguva yamakataura neni; Jehovha akati kwandiri, Ndanzwa inzwi ramashoko avanhu ava, avakataura newe; zvose zvavakareva vakataura havo zvakanaka.
Dai vaiva nemoyo yakadai, vakanditya nokuchengeta mirairo yangu nguva dzose, kuti zvive zvakanaka navo, ivo navana vavo, nokusingaperi!
Enda, undoti kwavari, Dzokerai kumatende enyu.
Asi iwe, mira pano kwandiri, ndikuudze murayiro wose, nezvakatemwa, nezvakatongwa, zvaunofanira kuvadzidzisa, kuti vazviite panyika yandinovapa, kuti ive yavo.
Naizvozvo chenjerai, kuti muite sezvamakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wenyu; musatsaukira kurutivi rworudyi kana rworuboshwe.
Munofanira kufamba nenzira yose yamakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wenyu, kuti murarame, zvive zvakanaka nemi, namazuva enyu ave mazhinji panyika iyo, ichava yenyu.
Zvino ndiwo murairo, nezvakatemwa, nezvakatongwa, zvandakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wenyu kuti ndikudzidzisei, kuti muzviite kunyika kwamunoenda kuti ive yenyu;
kuti utye Jehovha Mwari wako, uchengete zvose zvaakatema nemirairo yake, yandinokuraira, iwe, nomwanakomana wako, nomwanakomana womwanakomana wako, mazuva ose oupenyu hwako, kuti mazuva ako ave mazhinji.
Naizvozvo chinzwa Isiraeri, uchenjere kuti uzviite; kuti zvive zvakanaka newe, muwande kwazvo, sezvamakapikirwa naJehovha Mwari wamadzibaba ako, panyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi.
Chinzwa Isiraeri, Jehovha Mwari wedu ndiJehovha mumwe chete.
Ude Jehovha Mwari wako nomoyo wako wose, nomweya wako wose, nesimba rako rose.
Zvino mashoko awa andinokuraira nhasi, anofanira kuva mumoyo mako,
unofanira kushingaira kuadzidzisa vana vako, nokuataura kana ugere mumba mako, kana uchifamba munzira, kana uchivata pasi, kana uchimuka.
Unofanira kuasungira paruoko rwako, chive chiratidzo; uye anofanira kuva rundanyara pakati pameso ako.
Unofanira kuanyora pamagwatidziro emikova yeimba yako, napamasuo ako.
Zvino kana Jehovha Mwari wako achinge akupinza munyika, yaakapikira madzibaba ako, Abhurahamu, naIsaka, naJakobho, kuti uchakupa iyo, namaguta makuru akanaka, ausina kuvaka iwe,
nedzimba dzizere nezvinhu zvose zvakanaka, dzausina kuzadza iwe, namakangwa akacherwa, ausina kuchera iwe, neminda yemizambiringa nemiorivhi, yausina kusima iwe; iwe ukadya ukaguta,
zvino chenjera kuti urege kukanganwa Jehovha, wakakubudisa panyika yeIjipiti paimba youranda.
Unofanira kutya Jehovha Mwari wako, nokumushumira, nokupika nezita rake.
Regai kutevera vamwe vamwari, vamwari vendudzi dzinokupoteredzai,
nokuti Jehovha Mwari wako, ari pakati pako, ndiMwari ane godo; kuti Jehovha Mwari wako arege kukutsamwira, akuparadze panyika pose.
Musaidza Jehovha Mwari wenyu, sezvamakamuidza paMasa.
Munofanira kushingaira kuchengeta mirairo yaJehovha Mwari wenyu, nezvipupuriro zvake, nezvaakatema, zvaakakuraira.
Uye unofanira kuita zvakarurama nezvakanaka pamberi paJehovha, kuti zvive zvakanaka newe, upinde munyika yakanaka ive yako, iyo yakapikirwa madzibaba ako naJehovha,
kuti iye uchadzinga vavengi vako vose pamberi pako, sezvakataurwa naJehovha.
Zvino kana mwanakomana wako akakubvunza pashure, achiti, Ko izvi zvipupuriro, nezvakatemwa, nezvakatongwa, zvamakarairwa naJehovha Mwari wedu, zvinodiniko?
Unofanira kuti kumwanakomana wako, Isu takanga tiri varanda vaFarao, Jehovha akatibudisa nechanza chine simba;
Jehovha akaita zviratidzo nezvinoshamisa kwazvo, zvakaipa, paIjipiti, nokuna Farao, nokuimba yake yose, tichizviona;
akatibudisapo, kuti atipinze pano, atipe nyika yaakapikira madzibaba edu.
Jehovha akaraira kuti tiite izvi zvose zvaakatema, titye Jehovha Mwari wedu, kuti tiitirwe zvakanaka nguva dzose, atichengete tive vapenyu, sezvatakaita nhasi.
Zvichava zvakarurama kwatiri, kana tichichenjerera kuti tiite murayiro wose pamberi paJehovha Mwari wedu, sezvatakarairwa naye.
Zvino kana Jehovha Mwari akupinza munyika maunoenda, kuiita yako, akadzinga ndudzi zhinji pamberi pako, dzinoti: vaHeti, navaGirigashi, navaAmori, navaKenani, navaPerezi, navaHivhi, navaJebhusi, ndudzi nomwe dzinokukunda noukuru nesimba;
kana Jehovha Mwari wako akavaisa mumaoko ako, ukavakunda, iwe unofanira kuvaparadza chose; haufaniri kuita sungano navo, kana kuvanzwira nyasha;
usawanana navo, usapa mwanakomana wake mwanasikana wako, kana kutorera mwanakomana wako mwanasikana wake.
Nokuti uchatsausa mwanakomana wako arege kunditevera, kuti ashumire vamwe vamwari; naizvozvo Jehovha achakutsamwirai kwazvo, akakurumidza kukuparadza.
Asi ndizvo zvamunofanira kuvaitira: Munofanira kuputsa atari dzavo, nokuputsanya shongwe dzavo, nokutema matanda avo avanonamata nawo, nokupisa mifananidzo yavo yakavezwa.
Nokuti uri rudzi rutsvene kuna Jehovha Mwari wako; Jehovha Mwari wako wakakutsaura kuti uve rudzi rwake chairwo pakati pendudzi dzose dziri panyika dzose.
Jehovha haana kukudai, kana kukutsaurai, nokuti makanga makapfuura dzimwe ndudzi nokuwanda; nokuti imwi makanga muri vashoma kundudzi dzose.
Asi nokuti Jehovha unokudai, uye nokuti wakanga achida kusimbisa kupika kwaakapikira madzibaba enyu, nokuda kwaizvozvo Jehovha wakakubudisai neruoko rune simba, akakudzikunurai paimba youranda paruoko rwaFarao, mambo weIjipiti.
Naizvozvo uzive kuti Jehovha Mwari wako, ndiye Mwari, Mwari wakatendeka, anosimbisa sungano yake nenyasha dzake kuna vanomuda, vanochengeta mirairo yake kusvikira kumarudzi ane chiuru chamazana;
anotsiva vanomuvenga mumwe nomumwe, kuti avaparadze; haanganonokeri munhu anomuvenga, asi achamutsiva iye amene.
Naizvozvo unofanira kuchengeta murayiro, nezvaakatema, nezvaakatonga, zvandinokuraira nhasi, kuti uzviite.
Zvino kana muchiteerera izvi zvakatongwa, mukazvichengeta nokuzviita, Jehovha Mwari wako achakusimbisira sungano yake nenyasha dzake sezvaakapikira madzibaba ako;
iye achakuda, nokukuropafadza, nokukuwanza; acharopafadzawo zvibereko zvomuviri wako, nezvibereko zvevhu rako, zviyo zvako, newaini yako, namafuta ako, nezvakaberekwa nemombe dzako, namakwayana amakwai ako, panyika yaakapikira madzibaba ako, kuti achakupa iyo.
Ucharopafadzwa iwe kupfuura dzimwe ndudzi dzose; hapangavi pakati penyu murume kana mukadzi asingabereki, kana pakati pezvipfuwo zvenyu.
Jehovha uchabvisa kwamuri hosha dzose; haangatumiri kwamuri matenda akaipa eIj ipiti aunoziva, asi uchaatuma kuvanhu vose vanokuvenga.
Iwe uchaparadza ndudzi dzose dzichaiswa mumaoko ako naJehovha Mwari wako; usadzinzwira nyasha; usashumira vamwari vavo, nokuti vachava musungo kwauri.
Zvino kana ukati mumoyo mako, Ndudzi idzi dzinotipfuura nokuwanda, ndingadzitorera seiko nyika yadzo?
Haufaniri kuvatya; unofanira kurangarira zvakanaka zvakaitirwa Farao navaIjipiti vose naJehovha Mwari wako;
