Zvanzi naJehovha, Nenzira yaakauya nayo, uchadzokazve nayo; haangapindi muguta rino.
Nokuti ndichadzivira guta rino, ndirirwire nokuda kwangu, uye nokuda kwomuranda wangu Dhavhidhi.
Zvino nousiku uhwo mutumwa waJehovha wakabuda, akauraya vanhu vane zviuru zvine zana namakumi masere nezvishanu pamisasa yavaAsiria; zvino vanhu vakati vachimuka mangwanani, vakawana zvava zvitunha zvose.
Naizvozvo Sanheribhi mambo weAsiria akabva, akaenda, akadzokera kwakare, akandogara Ninivhe.
Zvino wakati achinamata mumba maNisiroki mwari wake, Adhiramereki naSharezeri vakamuuraya nomunondo, ivo vakatizira kunyika yeArarati.
Esarihadhoni akamutevera paushe.
Zvino namazuva iwayo Hezekia akarwara, kusvikira pakufa.
Muporofita Isaya mwanakomana waAmozi akasvika kwaari, akati kwaari, Zvanzi naJehovha, Chiraira nhaka yako, nokuti uchafa, haungararami.
Ipapo akatendeukira kumadziro, akanyengetera kuna Jehovha, akati,
Dorangarirai henyu, Jehovha, kuti ndakafamba pamberi penyu nezvokwadi nomoyo wose, ndikaita zvakanaka pamberi penyu.
Hezekia akachema kwazvo.
Zvino Isaya wakanga achigere kubuda paruvazhe rwapakati, shoko raJehovha rikauya kwaari, richiti,
Dzokazve, undoti kuna Hezekia, mutungamiriri wavanhu vangu, Zvanzi naJehovha Mwari waDhavhidhi baba vako, ndanzwa kunyengetera kwako, ndaona misodzi yako; zvino tarira, ndichakuporesa; nezuva rechitatu uchakwira kuimba yaJehovha.
Ndichawedzera pamazuva ako makore ane gumi namashanu; ndichakurwira iwe neguta rino paruoko rwamambo weAsiria, ndichadzivira guta rino nokuda kwangu, uye nokuda kwaDhavhidhi muranda wangu.
Ipapo Isaya akati, Uyai nebundu ramawonde.
Ivo vakauya naro, vakariisa pamamota, akapora.
Zvino Hezekia akati kuna Isaya, Chiratidzo chichava cheiko kuti Jehovha uchandiporesa, ndikwire kumba kwaJehovha nezuva rechitatu here?
Isaya akati, Ichi chichava chiratidzo chaJehovha kwauri, kuti Jehovha uchaita sezvaakataura.
Unoda kuti mumvuri upfuurire mberi mitaro inegumi, kana udzoke mitaro inegumi here?
Hezekia akapindura, akati, Zvakareruka kuti mumvuri upfuurire mberi mitaro inegumi; kwete, mumvuri ngaudzoke mitaro inegumi.
Ipapo muporofita akadana kuna Jehovha, akadzosera mumvuri shure mitaro inegumi pachiratidzo chenguva chaAhazi.
Zvino nenguva iyo Bherodhaki- bharadhani mwanakomana waBharadhani, mambo weBhabhironi, akatuma mwadhi nechipo kuna Hezekia; nokuti wakanga anzwa kuti Hezekia wairwara.
Hezekia akavanzwa, akavaratidza imba yose yakanga ine zvinokosha zvake, sirivha, nendarama, nezvinonhuwira, namafuta anokosha, neimba yaiva nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, nezvose zvakanga zviri pafuma yake; kwakanga kusisina chinhu mumba make, kana muushe hwake hwose, chavasina kuratidzwa naHezekia.
Zvino muporofita Isaya akasvika kuna mambo Hezekia, akati kwaari, Ko varume ava vakati kudini?
Vasvika kwauri vachibvepiko?
Hezekia akati, Vabva kunyika iri kure, Bhabhironi.
Akati, Vakawonei mumba mako?
Hezekia akapindura, akati, Vakaona zvose zviri mumba mangu, hakune chinhu pakati pefuma yangu chandisina kuvaratidza.
Ipapo Isaya akati kuna Hezekia, Inzwa shoko raJehovha.
Tarira, mazuva achasvika, nenguva iyo zvose zviri mumba mako nezvose zvakaunganidzwa namadzibaba ako kusvikira zuva ranhasi zvichaiswa Bhabhironi; hakuna chinhu chichasiyiwa, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha.
Vamwe vavanakomana vako, vachabva kwauri, vauchabereka, vachatapwa. vachava varanda mumba mamambo weBhabhironi.
Ipapo Hezekia akati kuna Isaya, Shoko raJehovha, ramataura, rakanaka haro.
Akatiwo, Ko handizvo here, kana rugare nezvokwadi zviripo hazvo pamazuva angu?
Zvino mamwe mabasa aHezekia, nesimba rake, nokuita kwake dziva nomugero, nokusvitsa kwake mvura muguta, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku yaMakoronike amadzimambo aJudha?
Hezekia akavata namadzibaba ake, Manase mwanakomana wake akamutevera paushe.
Manase wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore ane gumi namaviri; akabata ushe makore makumi mashanu namashanu paJerusaremu; zita ramai vake raiva Hefizibha.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha, akatevera zvinonyangadza zvavahedheni vakanga vadzingwa naJehovha pamberi pavana vaIsiraeri.
Nokuti wakavakazve matunhu akakwirira, akanga aparadzwa nababa vake Hezekia; akamutsira Bhaari aritari, akaisapo danda rokunamata naro, sezvakaita Ahabhi mambo waIsiraeri; akanamata hondo dzose dzokudenga, akadzishumira.
Akavaka aritari mumba maJehovha, kunyange Jehovha akanga ati, PaJerusaremu ndipo pandichaisa zita rangu.
Akavakira hondo dzose dzokudenga aritari muvazhe mbiri dzeimba yaJehovha.
Akapinza mwanakomana wake mumoto, akatenda mashura, akaita mazango, akagadza masvikiro navauki; akaita zvakaipa zvizhinji pamberi paJehovha, ndokumutsamwisa nazvo.
Akaisa mufananidzo wedanda rokunamata naro raakaveza mumba makanzi naJehovha kuna Dhavhidhi nokuna Soromoni mwanakomana wake, Ndichaisa zita rangu nokusingaperi paimba ino napaJerusaremu, randakazvitsaurira pakati pamarudzi ose aIsiraeri.
Handichazofambisa-fambisa tsoka dzavaIsiraeri kunze kwenyika yandakapa madzibaba avo; kana vachichenjera bedzi kuita zvandakavaraira, nomurayiro wose wavakarairwa naMozisi muranda wangu.
Asi havana kuteerera; Manase akavatsausa vakaita zvakaipa kupfuura zvakaitwa nendudzi dzakaparadzwa naJehovha pamberi pavana vaIsiraeri.
Jehovha akataura navo navaporofita varanda vake, akati,
Manase mambo waJudha zvaakaita zvinonyangadza izvi, akaita zvakaipa kupfuura zvose zvakaitwa navaAmori vakamutangira, akatadzisawo Judha nezvifananidzo zvake.
Naizvozvo zvanzi naJehovha Mwari waIsiraeri, Tarirai, ndichauyisira Jerusaremu naJudha zvakaipa zvikadai, kuti vose vanozvinzwa nzeve dzavo dzichaunga.
Ndichayera Jerusaremu norwozi rwandakayera Samaria narwo, uye norwozi rwandakaruramisa imba yaAhabhi narwo; ndichapisika Jerusaremu somunhu unopisika ndiro, unoipisika akaitsindikira.
Ndicharasha vakasara venhaka yangu, ndivaise mumaoko avavengi vavo; vachapedzwa nokuparadzwa navaven.gi vavo vose;
nokuti vakaita zvakaipa pamberi pangu, vakanditsamwisa, kubva pazuva rokubuda kwamadzibaba avo paIjipiti kusvikira zuva ranhasi.
Manase akateurawo ropa rakawanda risine mhosva, kusvikira azadza Jerusaremu kubva kurutivi rumwe kusvikira kuno rumwe rutivi; zvivi zvake zvaakatadzisa Judha nazvo, achiita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha, zvisingaverengwi.
Zvino mamwe mabasa aManase, nezvose zvaakaita, nezvivi zvake zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku yaMakoronike amadzimambo aJudha?
Manase akavata namadzibaba ake, akavigwa mumunda weimba yake, mumunda waUza; Amoni mwanakomana wake akamutevera paushe.
Amoni mambo waJudha
Amoni wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore makumi maviri namaviri akabata ushe paJerusaremu makore maviri; zita ramai vake rakanga riri Meshuremeti, mukunda waHaruzi weJotibha.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha, sezvakaita Manase baba vake.
Akafamba nenzira yose yakafambwa nababa vake, akashumira zvifananidzo zvakashumirwa nababa vake, akazvinamata;
akasiya Jehovha Mwari wamadzibaba ake, akasafamba nenzira yaJehovha.
Zvino varanda vaAmoni vakamurangana vakamumukira, vakauraya mambo mumba make.
Asi vanhu venyika iyo vakazouraya vose vakarangana vakamukira mambo Amoni; vanhu venyika iyo vakaita mwanakomana wake Josia mambo panzvimbo yake.
Zvino mamwe mabasa aAmoni aakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku yaMakoronike amadzimambo aJudha?
Akavigwa muhwiro hwake mumunda waUza; Josia mwanakomana wake akamutevera paushe.
Josia wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore masere; akabata ushe paJerusaremu makore makumi matatu nerimwe; zita ramai vake rakanga riri Jedhidha mukunda waAdhaya weBhozikati.
Akaita zvakarurama pamberi paJehovha, akafamba nenzira yose yaDhavhidhi baba vake, haana kutsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe.
Zvino negore regumi namasere ramambo Josia, mambo akatuma munyori Shafani mwanakomana waAzaria, mwanakomana waMeshurami, kumba kwaJehovha, akati,
Enda kuna Hirikia mupirisiti mukuru, umuudze averenge mari inoiswa mumba maJehovha, yakaunganidzwa navatariri vomukova kuvanhu;
vaipe mumaoko avabati vebasa, vanotarira temberi yaJehovha; ivo vaipe vabati vebasa vari mumba maJehovha, kuti vagadzirise zvakaputsika paimba;
ivo vavezi, navavaki, navanoronga mabwe, uye vatenge nayo matanda, namabwe akavezwa, kuti vagadzire temberi.
Asi havana kubvunzwa pamusoro pemari yakaiswa mumaoko avo, nokuti vaibata vakatendeka.
Ipapo Hirikia mupirisiti mukuru akati kuna Shafani munyori, Ndawana bhuku yomurayiro mumba maJehovha.
Hirikia akapa Shafani bhuku yomurayiro, iye akairava.
Zvino Shafani munyori akasvika kuna mambo, akadzoka neshoko kuna mambo, akati, Varanda venyu vadurura mari yakawanikwa mumba, vakaipa mumaoko avabati vebasa, vanotarira imba yaJehovha.
Shafani munyori akati kuna mambo, mupirisiti Hirikia wandipa bhuku.
Shafani akariravira mambo.
Zvino mambo wakati achinzwa mashoko ebhuku yomurayiro, akabvarura nguvo dzake.
Mambo akaraira mupirisiti Hirikia, naAhikami mwanakomana waShafani, naAkibhori mwanakomana waMikaya, naShafani munyori, naAsaya muranda wamambo, akati,
Endai mundondibvunzira Jehovha, ini navanhu vavaJudha vose, pamusoro pamashoko ebhuku iyi yakawanikwa; nokuti kutsamwa kwaJehovha kwaakatitsamwira nako kukuru kwazvo, nokuti madzibaba edu havana kuteerera mashoko ebhuku iyi, havana kuita zvose zvatakarairwa.
Naizvozvo mupirisiti Hirikia, naAhikami, naAkibhori, naShafani, naAsaya vakaenda kuna Huridha muporofitakadzi, mukadzi waSharumi mwanakomana waTikiva, mwanakomana waHarahasi, muchengeti wenguvo; (zvino iye mukadzi wakanga agere paJerusaremu kurutivi rutsva rweguta;) vakataurirana naye.
Iye akati kwavari, Zvanzi naJehovha Mwari waIsiraeri, Udzai munhu wakakutumai kwandiri muti,
zvanzi naJehovha, tarirai, ndichauyisa zvakaipa pamusoro penzvimbo iyi, napamusoro pavagerepo, iwo mashoko ose ebhuku yakarahwa namambo weJudha;
nokuti vakandirasha, vakapisira vamwe vamwari zvinonhuwira, vakanditsamwisa namabasa ose amaoko avo, naizvozvo kutsamwa kwangu kuchamukira nzvimbo iyi; hakungadzimwi.
Asi muti kuna mambo waJudha wakakutumai kuzobvunza Jehovha, Zvanzi naJehovha Mwari waIsiraeri, kana ari mashoko awakanzwa,
moyo wako zvawakanga uri munyoro, ukazvininipisa pamberi paJehovha, nguva yawakanzwa zvandakataura pamusoro penzvimbo iyi, napamusoro pavageremo, kuti vachaitwa dongo nechinhu chakatukwa, wakabvarura nguvo dzako, wakachema pamberi pangu; zvino zvanzi naJehovha, Ini ndakunzwawo.
Naizvozvo, tarira, ndichakuisa kuna madzibaba ako, uchavigwa muhwiro hwako norugare, meso ako haangawoni zvakaipa zvose zvandichauyisa pamusoro penzvimbo iyi.
Vakadzoka neshoko kuna mambo.
Zvino mambo akatuma vanhu vakaunganidza vakuru vose veJudha naveJerusaremu.
Mambo akakwira kumba kwaJehovha, anavarume vose vaJudha, navose vakanga vagere Jerusaremu, navapirisiti navaporofita, navanhu vose, vaduku navakuru, akavaravira mashoko ose ebhuku yesungano yakawanikwa mumba maJehovha.
Mambo akamira pambiru, akaita sungano pamberi paJehovha, akazvisunga kutevera Jehovha, nokuchengeta mirairo yake nezvipupuriro, nezvaakatema, nomoyo wake wose nomweya wake wose, kuti asimbise mashoko esungano iyi, akanga akanyorwa mubhuku iyi, vanhu vose vakasimbisa sungano iyo.
Ipapo mambo akaraira mupirisiti mukuru Hirikia, navapirisiti vaimutevera, navatariri vomukova, kuti vabudise patemberi yaJehovha nhumbi dzose dzakanga dzaitirwa Bhaari neAshera nehondo dzose dzokudenga, akadzipisa kunze kweJerusaremu muruwa rwaKidhironi, akaisa madota adzo paBhetieri.
Akaparadza vapirisiti vezvifananidzo, vakanga vagadzwa namadzimambo aJudha kuti vapise zvinonhuwira pamatunhu akakwirira mumaguta aJudha, nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza Jerusaremu, uye vose vaipisa zvinonhuwira kuna Bhaari, nezuva, nomwedzi, nenyeredzi, nehondo dzose dzokudenga.
Akabudisawo Ashera mumba maJehovha, akaiisa kunze kweJerusaremu kurukova rwaKidhironi, akaipisa parukova rwaKidhironi, akaikuya ikaita madota, akakanda madota ayo pamusoro pamarinda avarombo.
Akaputsawo dzimba dzavaSodhomu, dzakanga dziri paimba yaJehovha, pairukira vakadzi machira eAshera.
Akabudisa vapirisiti vose mumaguta aJudha, akashatisa matunhu akakwirira, paipisira vapirisiti zvinonhuwira, kubva paGebha kusvikira paBheeri-shebha; akaputsa matunhu akakwirira pamasuo, aiva pavanopinda napo pasuo raJoshua mubati weguta, aiva kuruboshwe rwomunhu kana opinda nesuo reguta.
Asi vapirisiti vamatunhu akakwirira havazaikwira kuaritari yaJehovha paJerusaremu, asi vaidya zvingwa zvisina kuviriswa vari pakati pehama dzavo.
Akashatisa Tofeti raiva pamupata wavana vaHinomi, kuti kurege kuva nomunhu unopinza mwanakomana wake kana mwanasikana wake mumoto nokuda kwaMoreki.
Akaputsa mabhiza akanga apiwa namadzimambo kuzokudza zuva pavanopinda napo paimba yaJehovha, pakamuri yaNatanimereki mutariri weimba yomukati yakanga iri pabiravira, akapisa ngoro dzezuva.
Akaputsawo aritari dzaiva pamusoro pedenga rekamuri yokumusoro yaAhazi, dzakanga dzavakwa namadzimambo aJudha, nearitari dzakanga dzavakwa naManase muvazhe mbiri dzeimba yaJehovha, akadzikoromora, akakanda guruva radzo murukova Kidhironi.
Mambo akashatisawo matunhu akakwirira aiva pamberi peJerusaremu, aiva kurudyi rwegomo rokuparadza, akanga avakirwa Ashitoreti, mwari unonyangadza wavaZidhoni, naKemoshi, mwari unonyangadza waMoabhu, naMirikomi, mwari unonyangadza wavana vaAmoni, naSoromoni mambo waIsiraeri.
Akaputsanyawo shongwe dzamabwe, akaparadza matanda okunamata nawo, ndokuzadza nzvimbo yazvo namapfupa avanhu.
Uye aritariwo yaiva paBhetieri nedunhu rakakwirira rakavakwa naJerobhoamu mwanakomana waNebhati, iye wakatadzisa Isiraeri, aritari iyo nedunhu iro rakakwirira akazviputsa, akapisa dunhu rakakwirira, akariputsanya rikaita huruva, akapisa danda rokunamata naro.
Zvino Josia wakati achitendeuka, akaona marinda aiva mugomo, akatuma vanhu vakatora mapfupa aiva mumarinda, vakaapisa paaritari iyo, akaishatisa sezvakanga zvataurwa neshoko raJehovha rakaparidzwa nomunhu waMwari, iye wakadeya kuparidza zvinhu izvi.
Zvino akati, Shongwe iyi yandinoona ndeyeiko?
Vanhu veguta vakati kwaari, Ndiro rinda romunhu waMwari, wakadeya kubva kwaJudha, akaparidza zvinhu izvo zvamakaitira aritari yeBhetieri.
Akati, Ngaazorore hake; ngakurege kuva nomunhu unobvisa mapfupa ake.
Naizvozvo vakarega mapfupa ake pamwechete namapfupa omuporofita wakanga abva Samaria.
Uye dzimba dzose dzamatunhu akakwirira dzaiva pamaguta eSamaria, dzakanga dzakavakwa namadzimambo aIsiraeri, vakatsamwisa Jehovha nadzo, idzo dzakabviswa naJosia, akadziitira zvose zvaakaita paBhetieri.
Akauraya vapirisiti vose vamatunhu akakwirira vaivapo, pamusoro pearitari, akapisira pamusoro padzo mapfupa avanhu; akadzokera Jerusaremu.
Zvino mambo akaraira vanhu vose, akati, Itirai Jehovha Mwari wenyu Pasika, sezvakanyorwa mubhuku iyi yesungano.
Zvirokwazvo, havana kumboita Pasika yakadai, kubva pamazuva avatongi vaitonga Isiraeri, kana pamazuva ose amadzimambo aIsiraeri, kana madzimambo aJudha.
Asi negore re gumi namasere ramambo Josia vakaitira Jehovha Pasika iyi paJerusaremu.
Josia akabvisawo masvikiro ose, navaroyi, namaterafimi, nezvifananidzo, nezvose zvinonyangadza, zvakawanikwa munyika yaJudha napaJerusaremu, kuti asimbise mashoko omurayiro, akanga akanyorwa mubhuku yakawanikwa mumba maJehovha naHirikia mupirisiti.
Hakuna mambo wakamutangira wakanga akafanana naye, wakatendeukira kuna Jehovha nomoyo wake wose, nomweya wake wose, nesimba rake rose, achitevera murayiro wose waMozisi; uye hakuna mumwe wakamutevera wakanga akafanana naye.
Kunyange zvakadaro Jehovha haana kushandura kutsamwa kwake kukuru, kwakamutsa hasha dzake kuna Judha, nokuda kwokutsamwisa kwose kwaakatsamwiswa nako naManase.
Jehovha akati, NaJudhawo ndichavabvisa pamberi pangu, sezvandakabvisa Isiraeri; ndicharamba guta iri reJerusaremu, randakazvitsaurira, neimba yandakati pamusoro payo, Zita rangu richagarapo.
Zvino mamwe mabasa aJosia, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku yaMakoronike amadzimambo aJudha?
Pamazuva ake Farao-neko mambo weIjipiti, akandorwa namambo weAsiria kurwizi Yufuratesi, mambo Josia akandorwa naye; asi wakati amuona, Farao-neko akamuuraya paMegidho.
Varanda vake vakamutakura nengoro afa, vakabva naye paMegidho, vakamuisa Jerusaremu, vakamuviga muhwiro hwake.
Zvino vanhu venyika vakatora Jehoahazi mwanakomana waJosia, vakamuzodza, vakamuita mambo panzvimbo yababa vake.
Jehoahazi naJehoyakimu naJehoyakini madzimambo aJudha
Jehoahazi wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore makumi maviri namatatu, akabata ushe paJerusaremu mwedzi mitatu.
Zita ramai vake rakanga riri Hamutari, mukunda waJeremiya weRibhina.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha sezvakaita madzibaba ake pazvose.
Asi Farao-neko wakamusunga paRibhira munyika yeHamati, kuti arege kubata ushe paJerusaremu; akateresa nyika matarenda esirivha ane zana, netarenda rimwe rendarama.
Farao-neko akaita Eriakimu mwanakomana waJosia mambo panzvimbo yaJosia baba vake, akashandura zita rake, rikazova Jehoyakimu; asi wakaenda naJehoahazi, akasvika Ijipiti, ndokufirako.
Jehoyakimu akapa Farao sirivha nendarama, asi wakateresa nyika kuti agone kuripa mari sezvaakarairwa naFarao; akaripisa vanhu venyika sirivha nendarama, mumwe nomumwe sezvaakamutarira, kuti aipe Farao-neko.
Jehoyakimu wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore makumi maviri namashanu; akabata ushe paJerusaremu makore gumi nerimwe.
Zita ramai vake rakanga riri Zebhidha mukunda waPedhaya weRuma.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha sezvakaita madzibaba ake pazvose.
Zvino pamazuva ake Nebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhironi akasvika, Jehoyakimu akaitwa muranda wake makore matatu; ipapo akamuramba akamumukira.
Jehovha akatuma kwaari hondo dzavaKaradhea, nehondo dzavaSiria, nehondo dzavaMoabhu, nehondo dzavana vaAmoni, kuzorwa naye; akadzituma kuzoparadza Judha, sezvakarehwa neshoko raJehovha, raakataura nemiromo yavaranda vake vaporofita.
Zvirokwazvo izvi zvakaitirwa Judha nokuraira kwaJehovha, kuti avabvise pamberi pake, nokuda kwezvivi zvaManase zvose zvaakaita;
uye nokuda kweropa risine mhosva raakateura; nokuti wakazadza Jerusaremu neropa risine mhosva; Jehovha akaramba kuvakanganwira.
Zvino mamwe mabasa aJehoyakimu, nezvose zvaakaita, hazvina kunyorwa here mubhuku yaMakoronike amadzimambo aJudha?
Jehoyakimu akavata namadzibaba ake, mwanakomana wake Jehoyakini akamutevera paushe.
Mambo weIjipiti haana kuzobudazve munyika yake, nokuti mambo weBhabhironi wakanga akunda zvose zvaiva zvamambo weIjipiti, kubva parukova rweIjipiti kusvikira parwizi Yufuratesi.
Jehoyakini wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore gumi namasere, akabata ushe paJerusaremu mwedzi mitatu.
Zita ramai vake rakanga riri Nehushuta mukunda waErinatani weJerusaremu.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha, sezvakaita madzibaba ake pazvose.
Nenguva iyo varanda vaNebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhironi, vakasvika Jerusaremu, vakakomba guta.
Nebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhironi, akasvika paguta, varanda vake vakarikomba.
Zvino Jehoyakini mambo waJudha akabudira kuna mambo weBhabhironi, iye namai vake, navaranda vake, namachinda ake, navatariri vake; mambo weBhabhironi akamubata negore rorusere rokubata kwake ushe.
Akaenda nefuma yose yeimba yaJehovha, nefuma yeimba yamambo, akatema-tema nhumbi dzose dzendarama dzakanga dzaitwa naSoromoni mambo welsiraeri mutemberi yaJehovha, sezvakanga zvataurwa naJehovha.
Akatapa vose veJerusaremu, namachinda ose, nemhare dzose, vatapwa vanezvuru zvine gumi, nemhizha dzose navapfuri vose; hakuna vakasara, asi vanhu varombo venyika.
Akatapawo Jehoyakini, akamuisa Bhabhironi; namai vamambo, navakadzi vamambo, navatariri vake, navakuru venyika, akavatapa paJerusaremu akavaisa Bhabhironi.
Varume vose vaiva nesimba vane zviuru zvinomwe, nemhizha, navapfuri vane gumi ramazana, ava vose vaiva nesimba vaigona kurwa, mambo weBhabhironi wakavatapa, akavaisa Bhabhironi.
Mambo weBhabhironi akaita Matania babamunini vaJehoyakimu, mambo panzvimbo yake, akashandura zita rake, akamutumidza Zedhekia.
Zedhekia mambo wokupedzisira waJudha
Zedhekia wakatanga kubata ushe ava namakore makumi maviri nerimwe; akabata ushe paJerusaremu makore gumi nerimwe.
Zita ramai vake rakanga riri Hamitari mukunda waJeremiya weRibhina.
Akaita zvakaipa pamberi paJehovha sezvakaita Jehoyakini pazvose.
Nokuti izvozvo zvakaitirwa Jerusaremu naJudha nokuda kwokutsamwa kwaJehovha, kusvikira avarashira kure kwaari; Zedhekia akamukira mambo weBhabhironi.
Zvino negore repfumbamwe rokubata kwake ushe, nomwedzi wegumi, nezuva regumi romwedzi, Nebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhironi akasvika, iye nehondo yake yose, kuzorwa neJerusaremu, vakadzika matende avopo, vakarikomba nenhare.
Naizvozvo guta rakakombwa kusvikira pagore regumi nerimwe ramambo Zedhekia.
Zvino negore repfumbamwe romwedzi wechina nzara ikanyanya kwazvo paguta, vanhu venyika iyo vakashaiwa zvokudya.
Vakaputsa rusvingo rweguta, vanhu vose vehondo vakatiza usiku nenzira yesuo, pakati pamadziro maviri aiva pamunda wamambo; (zvino vaKaradhea vakanga vakakomba guta;) mambo akaenda nenzira yerenje.
Asi hondo yavaKaradhea yakatevera mambo, vakamubata pamapani eJeriko, hondo yake yose ikapararira ikabva kwaari.
Zvino vakabata mambo, vakaenda naye kuna mambo weBhabhironi paRibhira, vakamutongerapo.
Vakauraya vana vaZedhekia achizviona, vakatumbura meso aZedhekia, vakamusunga namatare, vakamuisa Bhabhironi.
Zvino nomwedzi wechishanu, nezuva rechinomwe romwedzi, negore regumi namapfumbamwe ramambo Nebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhiron, Nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi, muranda wamambo weBhabhironi akasvika Jerusaremu;
akapisa imba yaJehovha, neimba yamambo; akapisawo dzimba dzose dzeJerusaremu, dzimba dzose huru, nomoto.
Hondo yose yavaKaradhea, yakanga inomukuru wavarindi, ikaputsa masvingo eJerusaremu kunhivi dzose.
Nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi, akatapa vanhu vakanga vasara muguta, navakanga vatiza, vakaenda kuna mambo weBhabhironi, navakanga vasara kuvazhinji.
Asi mukuru wavarindi wakasiya varombo venyika, kuti vave varimi veminda yemizambiringa nemimwe minda.
VaKaradhea vakaputsanya mbiru dzendarira dzaiva mumba maJehovha, nezvingoro, nedziva rendarira, zvaiva mumba maJehovha, vakaenda nendarira yazvo Bhabhironi.
vakatorawo hari nefoshoro nembato dzemwenje, nezvirongo, nenhumbi dzose dzendarira dzavaibata nadzo.
Nezvaenga zvomoto, nembiya, nezvose zvaiva zvendarama nezvose zvaiva zvesirivha, mukuru wavarindi akazvitora.
Nembiru mbiri, nedziva rimwe, nezvindori, zvakanga zvaitirwa imba yaJehovha naSoromoni; kurema kwendarira yenhumbi idzi dzose kwakanga kusingagoni kuyerwa.
Kureba kwembiru imwe kwakasvika makubhiti ane gumi namasere, yaiva nomusoro wendarira pamusoro payo; kureba kwomusoro kwakasvika makubhiti matatu; uye kwakanga kune zvakarukwa, namatamba, zvaipoteredza musoro, zvose zviri zvendarira; mbiru yechipiri yakanga yakafanana neyiyi nezvakarukwawo.
Mukuru wavarindi akatora Saraya mupirisiti mukuru, naZefaniya mupirisiti wechipiri, navarindi vatatu vomukova;
uye paguta akatora mukuru waitarira varume vehondo, navarume vashanu vaisionana namambo, vaakawana muguta; nomunyori, nomukuru wehondo waiunganidza vanhu venyika, navarume vanamakumi matanhatu vavanhu venyika, vaakawana muguta.
Nebhuzaradhani mukuru wavarindi akavatora, akavaisa kuna mambo weBhabhironi paRibhira.
Mambo weBhabhironi akavabaya, akavauraya paRibhira, panyika yeHamati.
Naizvozvo vaJudha vakatapwa panyika yavo.
Kana vari vanhu vakasiyiwa panyika yaJudha, vakasiyiwa naNebhukadhinezari mambo weBhabhironi, wakaita Gedharia mwanakomana waAhikami, mwanakomana waShafani, mubati wavo.
Zvino vakuru vose vehondo, ivo navanhu vavo, vakati vanzwa kuti mambo weBhabhironi wakanga aita Gedharia mubati wavo, vakaenda kuna Gedharia paMizipa, vaiti, Ishimaeri mwanakomana waNetania, naJohanani mwanakomana waKarea, naSeraya mwanakomana waTanhumeti muNetofati, naJaazania mwanakomana womuMaakati, ivo navanhu vavo.
Gedharia akapika kwavari, ivo navanhu vavo, akati kwavari, Regai kutya nokuda kwavaranda vavaKaradhea; garai panyika, mushumire mambo weBhabhironi, mugofara henyu.
Asi nomwedzi wechinomwe Ishimaeri mwanakomana waNetania, mwanakomana waErishama, worudzi rwamambo, wakasvika anavarume vane gumi, akabaya Gedharia, akafa iye pamwechete navaJudha navaKaradhea vaiva naye paMizipa.
Ipapo vanhu vose, vaduku navakuru, navakuru vehondo vakasimuka vakaenda Ijipiti, nokuti vakanga vachitya vaKaradhea.
Zvino negore ramakumi matatu namanomwe rokutapwa kwaJehoyakini mambo waJudha, nomwedzi wegumi nemiviri, nezuva ramakumi maviri namanomwe romwedzi, Evhiri-merodhaki mambo weBhabhironi, negore raakatanga kubata ushe naro, wakasimudza musoro waJehoyakini mambo waJudha, akamubvisa mutorongo;
akataura naye nomoyo munyoro, akakudza chigaro chake choushe kupfuura zvigaro zvoushe zvamadzimambo aiva naye paBhabhironi.
Akashandura nguvo dzake dzokusungwa, akaramba achidya zvokudya pamberi pake mazuva ose oupenyu hwake.
Kana zviri zvokurarama nazvo, waisipiwa zvokurarama nazvo namambo nguva dzose, zuva rimwe nerimwe mugove waro, mazuva ose oupenyu hwake.
Adhamu, naSeti, naEnoshi;
naKenani, naMaharareri, naJaredhi;
naEnoki, naMetusera, naRameki;
naNoa, naShemi, naHamu, naJafeti.
Vanakomana vaJafeti: Gomeri, naMagogi, naMadhai, naJavhani, naTubhari, naMesheki, naTirasi.
Vanakomana vaGomeri: Ashikenazi, naDhifati, naTogarima.
Vanakomana vaJavhani: Erisha, naTarishishi, naKitimi, naRodhanimi.
Vanakomana vaHamu: Kushi, naMiziraimu, naPuti, naKenani.
Vanakomana vaKushi: Shebha, naHavhira, naSabata, naRaama, naSabhiteka.
Vanakomana vaRaama: Shebha, naDhedhani.
Kushi akabereka Nimurodhi; iye akatanga kuva munhu ane simba panyika.
Mizirami akabereka Rudhimi, naAnamimi, naRehabhimi, naNafutuhimi,
naPatirusimi, naKasiruhimi (VaFirisitia vakabva kwaari), naKafitorimi.
Kenani akabereka Zidhoni mwana wake wedangwe, naHeti,
navaJebhusi, navaAmori, navaGirigashi;
navaHivhi, navaAriki, navaSini,
navaArivhadhi, navaZemari, navaHamati.
Vanakomana vaShemi: Erami, naAshuri, naAripakishadhi, naRudhi, naArami, naUzi, -naHuri, naGeteri, naMesheki.
Aripakishadhi akabereka Shera, Shera akabereka Ebheri.
Ebheri akaberekerwa vanakomana vaviri, zita romumwe raiva Peregi, nokuti pamazuva ake nyika yakakamurwa, zita romunununa wake raiva Jokitani.
Jokitani akabereka Arimodhadhi, naSherefi, naHazarimavheti, naJera,
naHadhorami, naUzari, naDhikira,
naEbhari, naAbhimaeri, .naShebha,
naOfiri, naHavhira, naJobhabhu.
Ava vose vaiva vanakomana vaJokitani.
Madzibaba kubva kuna Shemi kusvikira kuna Abhurahamu navana vake
Shemi, naAripakishadhi naShera,
naEbheri, naPeregi, naReu,
naSerugi, naNahori, naTera,
Abhuramu (ndiye Abhurahamu).
Vanakomana vaAbhurahamu: Isaka, nalshimaeri.
Ndiwo marudzi avo: Mwana wedangwe waIshimaeri, Neabhaioti, tevere Kedhari, naAbhidheeri, naMibhisami,
naMishima, naDhuma, naMasa; naHadhadhi, naTema,
naJeturi, naNafishi, naKedhema.
Ndivo vanakomana vaIshimaeri.
Vanakomana vaKetura, murongo waAbhurahamu: Iye wakabereka Zimirani, naJokishani, naMedhani, naMidhiani, naIshibhaki, naShua.
Vanakomana vaJokishani: Shebha, naDhedhani.
Vanakomana vaMidhiani: Efa, naEferi, naHanoki, naAbhidha, naEridha.
Ava vose vaiva vanakomana vaKetura.
Abhurahamu akabereka Isaka.
Vanakomana vaIsaka: Esau, naIsiraeri.
Vanakomana vaEsau: Erifazi, naReueri, naJeushi, naJarami, naKora.
Vanakomana vaErifazi: Temani, naOmari, naZefi, naGatami, naKenazi, naTimina, naAmareki.
Vanakomana vaReueri: Nahati, naZera, naShama, naMiza.
Vanakomana vaSheiri: Rotani, naShobhari, naZibheoni, naAna, naDhishani.
Vanakomana vaRotani: Hori, naHomami; Timina waiva hanzvadzi yaRotani.
Vanakomana vaShobhari: Ariani naManahati, naEbhari, naShefi naOnami.
Vanakomana vaZibheoni: Aia naAna.
Vanakomana vaAna: Dishoni.
Vanakomana vaDhishoni: Hamurani naEshibhani naItirani naKerani.
Vanakomana vaEzeri: Bhirihani naZaavani, naJaakani.
Vanakomana vaDhishani: Uzi naArani.
Zvino ndiwo madzimambo akabata ushe panyika yaEdhomu, valsiraeri vachigere kuva namambo, Bhera mwanakomana waBheori; zita reguta rake raiva Dhinihabha.
Bhera akafa, Jobhabhu mwanakomana waZera weBhozira akamutevera paushe.
Jobhabhu akafa, Hushani wenyika yavaTemani akamutevera paushe.
Hushani akafa, Hadhadhi mwanakomana waBhedhadhi, wakadeya kuuraya Midhiani pamunda waMoabhi, akamutevera paushe; zita reguta rake raiva Avhiti
Hadhadhi akafa, Samira weMasireka akamutevera paushe.
Shamira akafa, Shauri weRehobhoti paRwizi akamutevera paushe.
Shauri akafa, Bhaarihanani mwanakomana waAkibhori akamutevera paushe.
Bhaarihanani akafa, Hadhadhi akamutevera paushe; zita reguta rake raiva Pai; uye zita romukadzi wake raiva Mehetabheri, mukunda waMatiredhi, mukunda waMezahabhi.
Hadhadhi akafa.
Madzishe eEdhomu ndiwo: Ishe Timina, nashe Aria, nashe Jeteti,
nashe Ohoribhama, nashe Era, nashe Pinoni,
nashe Kenazi, nashe Temani, nashe Mibhazari,
nashe Magidhieri, nashe Irami.
Ndiwo madzishe aEdhomu.
Ndivo vanakomana vaIsiraeri: Rubheni, naSimiyoni, naRevhi, naJudha, naIsakari naZebhuruni,
naDhani, naJosefa naBhenjamini, naNafutari, naGadhi, naAsheri.
Vanakomana vaJudha: Eri, naOnani, naShera; vanakomana ava vatatu akavaberekerwa naBhatishua muKenani.
Asi Eri, mwana wedangwe waJudha, akanga ari munhu akaipa pamberi paJehovha, akamuuraya.
Tamari mukadzi womwana wake, akamuberekera Perezi naZera.
Vanakomana vose vaJudha vakanga vari vashanu.
Vanakomana vaPerezi: Hezironi naHamuri.
Vanakomana vaZera: Zimiri, naEtani, naHemani, naKarikori, naDhara; vose vari vashanu.
Vanakomana vaKarimi: Akari, mutambudzi walsiraeri, wakatadza pachinhu chakanga chakayeriswa.
Vanakomana vaEtani: Azara.
Vanakomanawo vaHezironi, vaakaberekerwa: Jerameeri, naRami, naKerubhai.
Rami akabereka Aminadhabhu, Aminadhabhu akabereka
Nashoni, muchinda wavana vaJudha; Nashoni akabereka Sarima, Sarima akabereka Bhoazi;
Bhoazi akabereka Obhedhi, Obhedhi akabereka Jese;
Jese akabereka mwana wake wedangwe Eriabhi, tevere Abhinadhabhu wechipiri, naShimea wechitatu;
naNetaneri wechina, naRadhai weshanu;
naOzemi wetanhatu, naDhavhidhi wechinomwe.
Hanzvadzi dzavo dzaiva Zeruya naAbhigairi.
Vanakomana vaZeruya: Abhishai, naJoabhu, naAsaheri, vatatu.
Abhigairi akabereka Amasa; baba vaAmasa vaiva Jeteri muIshimaeri.
Karebhu mwanakomana waHezironi akaberekerwa vana nomukadzi wake Azubha, uye naJerioti; ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vake: Jesheri, naShobhabhi, naAridhoni.
Azubha akafa, Karebhu akawana Efurata, wakamuberekera Huri.
Huri akabereka Uri, Uri akabereka Bhezari.
Shure kwaizvozvo Hezironi akapinda kumukunda waMakiri baba vaGiriyadhi, waakawana asvika makore ana makumi matanhatu; iye akamuberekera Segubhi.
Segubhi akabereka Jairi, akanga ana maguta ana makumi maviri namatatu panyika yeGiriyadhi.
Geshuri naArami vakatorera vaJairi maguta avo, pamwechete neKenati nemisha yaro, maguta ana makumi matanhatu.
Ava vose vaiva vanakomana vaMakiri baba vaGiriyadhi.
Zvino Hezironi akati afa paKarebhiefirata, Abhija mukadzi waHezironi akamuberekera Ashuri baba vaTekoa.
Vanakomana vaJerameeri, mwanakomana wedangwe waHezironi, vaiva, Rami wedangwe, naBhuna, naOreni, naOzemi, naAhija.
Zvino Jerameeri akanga anomumwe mukadzi, ainzi Atara; iye akanga ari mai vaOnami.
Vanakomana vaRami, wedangwe waJerameeri, vaiva Maazi, naJamini, naEkeri.
Vanakomana vaOnami vaiva Shamai, naJadha.
Vanakomana vaShamai: Nadhabhi naAbhishuri.
Zita romukadzi waAbhishuri raiva Abhihairi; iye akamuberekera Abhani, naMoridhi.
Vanakomana vaNadhabhi: Seredhi, naApaimi; asi Seredhi akafa asina vana.
Vanakomana vaApaimi: Ishi.
Vanakomana vaIshi: Sheshani.
Vanakomana vaSheshani: Arai.
Vanakomana vaJadha, munununa waShamai: Jeteri, naJonatani; Jeteri akafa asina vana.
Vanakomana vaJonatani: Pereti naZaza.
Ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaJerameeri.
Zvino Sheshani akanga asina vanakomana, asi vanasikana.
Sheshani akanga ano muranda, muIjipiti, ainzi Jara.
Sheshani akapa Jara muranda wake mukunda wake ave mukadzi wake; iye akamuberekera Atai.
Atai akabereka Natani, Natani akabereka Zabhadhi;
Zabhadhi akabereka Efirari, Efirari akabereka Obhedhi;
Obhedhi akabereka Jehu, Jehu akabereka Azaria;
Azaria akabereka Herezi, Herezi akabereka Ereasa;
Ereasa akabereka Sisimai, Sisimai akabereka Sharumi;
Sharumi akabereka Jekamia, Jekamia akabereka Erishama.
Vanakomana vaKarebhu munununa waJerameeri, vaiva Mesha dangwe rake, akanga ari baba vaZifi; navanakomana vaMaresha baba vaHebhuroni.
Vanakomana vaHebhuroni: Kora, naTapua, naRekemi, naShema.
Shema akabereka Rahami, baba vaJorikeami; Rekemi akabereka Shamai.
Mwanakomana waShamai akanga ari Maoni; Maoni akanga ari baba vaBhetizuri.
Efa murongo waKarebhu, akabereka Harani, naMoza, naGazezi; Harami akabereka Gazezi.
Vanakomana vaJadha: Regemi, naJotamu, naGeshani, naPereti, naEfa, naShaafi.
Maaka, murongo waKarebhu, akabereka Shebheri naTirihana.
Iye akaberekawo Shaafi baba vaMadhimana, Shevha baba vaMakibhena, nababa vaGibhiya; mukunda waKarebhu akanga ari Akisa.
Ndivo vanakomana vaKarebhu: Mwanakomana waHuri, wedangwe waEfurata: Shobhari baba vaKiriati-jearimi;
Sarima baba vaBheterehemu, Harefi baba vaBhetigadheri.
Shobhari baba vaKiriati-jearimi akanga ana vanakomana: Haroe, nehafu yorudzi rwavaMenuhoti.
Marudzi aKiriati-jearimi: Valtiri, navaPuti, navaShumati, navaMishirai; kwavari ndiko kwakabva vaZorati navaEshitaori.
Vanakomana vaSarima: Bheterehemu, navaNetofati, Atirotibhetijoabhi, nehafu yorudzi rwavaManahati, navaZori.
Uye marudzi avanyori, aigara paJabhezi: VaTirati, vaShimeati, navaSukati.
Ndivo vaKeni vakabva kuna Hamati baba veimba yaRekabhi.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaDhavhidhi, vakamuberekerwa paHebhuroni: Wedangwe Amunoni, mwana waAhinoami muJezireeri; wechipiri Dhanyeri waAbhigairi muKarimeri;
wechitatu Abhusaromu mwanakomana waMaaka, mukunda waTarimai mambo weGeshuri; wechina Adhonia mwanakomana waHagiti;
weshanu Shefatia waAbhitari, wetanhatu Itireami kuna Egira mukadzi wake.
Wakaberekerwa vatanhatu paHebhuroni, akabata ushepo makore manomwe nemwedzi mitanhatu; akabata ushe paJerusaremu makore makumi matatu namatatu.
Ava ndivo vaakaberekerwa paJerusaremu: Shimea, naShobhabhi, naNatani, naSoromoni, ivo vana, vaBhatishua mukunda waAmieri;
naIbhari, naErishama, naErifereti;
naNoga, naNefegi, naJafia;
naErishama, naEriadha, naErifereti, ivo vapfumbamwe.
Ndivo vose vaiva vana vaDhavhidhi, vanakomana vavarongo vasingaverengwi; uye Tamari wakanga ari hanzvadzi yavo.
Mwanakomana waSoromoni akanga ari Rehobhoami, mwanakomana wake Abhia, mwanakomana wake Asa, mwanakomana wake Jehoshafati;
mwanakomana wake Joramu, mwanakomana wake Ahazia, mwanakomana wake Joashi;
mwanakomana wake Amazia, mwanakomana wake Azaria, mwanakomana wake Jotamu;
mwanakomana wake Ahazi, mwanakomana wake Hezekia, mwanakomana wake Manase;
mwanakomana wake Amoni, mwanakomana wake Josia.
Vanakomana vaJosia: Wedangwe Johanani, wechipiri Jehoyakimu, wechitatu Zedhekia, wechina Sharumi.
Vanakomana vaJehoyakimu: Mwanakomana wake Jekonia, mwanakomana wake Zedhekia.
Vanakomana vaJekonia, vakatapwa.
Shearitieri mwanakomana wake,
naMarikirami, naPedhaya, naShenazari, Jekamia, Hoshama, naNedhabhia.
Vanakomana vaPedhaya: Zerubhabheri, naShimei; vanakomana vaZerubhabheri: Meshurami, naHanania; uye Sheromiti akanga ari hanzvadzi yavo;
naHashubha, naOheri, naBherekia, naHasadhia, naJushabhiheshedhi, ivo vashanu.
Vanakomana vaHanania: Peratia, naJeshaya; vanakomana vaRefaya, vanakomana vaArinani, vanakomana vaObhadhiya, vanakomana vaShekania.
Vanakomana vaShekania: Shemaya; navanakomana vaShemaya; Hatushi, naIgari, naBharia, naNearia, naShafati, ivo vatanhatu.
Vanakomana vaNearia: Erioenai, naHizikia, naAzirikami, ivo vatatu.
Vanakomana vaErioenai: Hodhavhia, naEriashibhi, naPeraya, naAkubhi, naJohanani, naDheraya, naAnani, ivo vanomwe.
Vanakomana vaJudha: Perezi, naHezironi, naKarimi, naHuri, naShobhari.
Reaya mwanakomana waShobhari akabereka Jahati, Jahati akabereka Ahumai naRahadhi.
Ndiwo marudzi avaZorati.
Uye ava ndivo vaiva vanakomana vababa vaEtami: Jezireeri, naIshima, naIdhibhashi; uye zita rehanzvadzi yavo rakanga riri Hazereponi;
naPenueri baba vaGedhori, naEzeri baba vaHusha.
Ndivo vana vaHuri, wedangwe waEfurata, baba vaBheterehemu.
Zvino Ashuri baba vaTekoa akanga ana vakadzi vaviri, Hera naNaara.
Naara akamuberekera Ahuzami, naHeferi, naTemeni, naHaahashitari.
Ndivo vaiva vanakomana vaNaara.
Vanakomana vaHera vaiva Zereti, naIzhari, naEtinani.
Hakozi akabereka Anubhi, naZobhebha, nehama dzaAhareri mwanakomana waHarumi.
Jabhezi akakudzwa kukunda vanununa vake, mai vake vakamutumidza zita rinonzi Jabhezi, vachiti, Nokuti ndakamubereka ndichitambudzika.
Jabhezi akadana kuna Mwari waIsiraeri, akati, Haiwa, dai muchindiropafadza henyu, nokukurisa nyika yangu, nokundifambisa noruoko rwenyu, nokundichengeta kune zvakaipa, kuti zvirege kundiwira!
Mwari akamupa zvaakakumbira.
Kerubhi munununa waShuha akabereka Mehiri, iye akanga ari baba vaEshitoni.
Eshitoni akabereka Bhetirafa, naPasea, naTehina baba vaIrinahashi.
Ndivo vana vaReka.
Vanakomana vaKenazi : Otineri, naSeraya; vanakomana vaOtineri: Hatati.
Meonotai akabereka Ofira; Seraya akabereka Joabhu baba vaGeharashimi; nokuti dzaiva mhizha.
Vanakomana vaKarebhu mwanakomana waJefune: Iru, naEra, naNaami; vanakomana vaEra: Kenazi.
Vanakomana vaJehareri: Zifi, naZifa, naTiria, naAsareri.
Vanakomana vaEzira: Jeteri, naMeredhi, naEferi, naJaroni.
Bhitia, mukunda waFarao, akabereka Miriami, naShamai, naIshabha baba vaEshitemoa.
Mukadzi wake muJudha akabereka Jeredhi baba vaGedhori, naHebheri baba vaSoko, naJekutieri baba vaZanoa.
Ndivo vanakomana vaBhitia mukunda waFarao, akanga akawanikwa naMeredhi.
Vanakomana vomukadzi waHodhia, hanzvadzi yaNahamu vakanga vari baba vaKeira muGarimi, naEshitemba muMaakati.
Vanakomana vaShimoni: Amunoni, naRina, naBhenihanani, naTironi.
Vanakomana vaIshi; Zoheti, naBhenizoheti.
Vanakomana vaShera mwanakomana waJudha: Eri baba vaReka, naRaadha baba vaMaresha, nehama yedzimba dzaivo vairuka mucheka wakaisvonaka, veimba yaAshibhiya;
naJokimi, navarume veKozebha, naJoashi, naSarafi, vaibata ushe hwaMoabhi, naJashubhirehemi.
Mashoko awa ndeekare.
Ndivo vaiva vaumbi vehari, uye vaigara paNetaimi neGedhera; ndipo pavaigara namambo kuzobata basa rake.
Vana vaSimiyoni
Vanakomana vaSimiyoni: Nemueri, naJamini, naJaribhi, naZera, naShauri;
mwanakomana wake Sharumi, mwanakomana wake Mibhisami, mwanakomana wake Mishima.
Vanakomana vaMishima: Mwanakomana wake Haumueri, mwanakomana wake Zakuri, mwanakomana wake Shimei.
Zvino Shimei akanga ana vanakomana vatanhatu; asi vanununa vake vakanga vasina vana vazhinji, uye rudzi rwavo rwose haruna kuwanda, savana vaJudha.
Ivo vakagara paBheerishebha, neMoradha, naHazarishuari;
napaBhiriha, napaEzemi, napaToradhi;
napaBhetueri, napaHorima, napaZikiragi;
napaBhetimarikabhoti, napaHazarisusimi napaBhetibhiri, napaShaaraimi.
Ndiwo aiva maguta avo kusvikira Dhavhidhi achibata ushe.
Misha yavo yakanga iri Etami, neAini, neRimoni, neTokeni, neAshani, maguta mashanu;
nemisha yavo yose, yakanga yakakomba maguta iwayo, kusvikira paBhaari.
Ndipo pavaigara, uye mazita amarudzi avo aripo.
NaMeshobhabhi, naJamireki, naJosha mwanakomana waAmazia;
naJoseri, naJehu mwanakomana waJoshibhia, mwanakomana waSeraya, mwanakomana waAsieri;
naErioenai, naJaakobha, naJeshohaya, naAsaya, naAdhieri, naJeshimieri, naBhenaya;
naZiza mwanakomana waShifi, mwanakomana waAroni, mwanakomana waJedheiya, mwanakomana waShimiri, mwanakomana waShemaya;
ava vakarehwa mazita avo, vaiva machinda pamarudzi avo; dzimba dzamadzibaba avo dzikawanda kwazvo.
Vakaenda pavanopinda paGedhori, kusvikira parutivi rwamabvazuva rwomupata, kutsvakira makwai avo mafuro.
Vakawana mafuro akanaka kwazvo, uye nyika yakanga iri mhami, ino rugare nokunyarara; nokuti vaigarapo kare vaiva vana vaHamu.
Ava, vakanyorwa mazita avo, vakasvika pamazuva aHezekia mambo waJudha, vakaputsa matende avo uye vaMeunimi vakavawanapo, vakavaparadza chose, kusvikira nhasi, vakagara panyika yavo; nokuti kwakanga kuna mafuropo amakwai avo.
Vamwe vavo, ivo vanakomana vaSimiyoni, vaiva varume vana mazana mashanu, vakaenda kugomo reSeiri, vakatungamirirwa naPeratia, naNearia, naRefaia, naUzieri, vanakomana valshi.
Vakakunda vakanga vasara vavaAmareki, vakapukunyuka, vakagarapo kusvikira zuva ranhasi.
Vana vaRubheni mwana wedangwe walsiraeri, (nokuti ndiye akanga ari wedangwe; asi zvaakasvibisa nhovo yababa vake, udangwe hwake hwakapiwa vanakomana vaJosefa mwanakomana waIsiraeri; naizvozvo mazita amadzitateguru haaverengwi nohudangwe.
Nokuti Judha ndiye akanga ari mukuru pakati pavana vababa vake, mutungamiriri akabva kwaari; asi udangwe hwakanga huri hwaJosefa;)
Vanakomana vaRubheni mwana wedangwe waIsiraeri: Hanoki, naParu, naHezironi, naKarimi.
Vanakomana vaJoeri: Shemaya mwanakomana wake, Gogi mwanakomana wake, naShimei mwanakomana wake;
Mika mwanakomana wake, naReaya mwanakomana wake, naBhaari mwanakomana wake;
naBheera mwanakomana wake, iye akatapwa naTirigatipirineseri mambo weAsiria; iye akanga ari muchinda wavaRubheni.
Navanununa vake nedzimba dzavo kana mazita amadziteteguru achiverengwa: Mukuru Jeyieri, naZekariya,
naBhera mwanakomana waAzazi, mwanakomana waShema, mwanakomana waJoeri, aigara paAroeri kusvikira paNebho neBhaarimeoni;
kurutivi rwamabvazuva akanga agere kusvikira pakutanga kwerenje kubva kurwizi Yufuratesi; nokuti mombe dzavo dzakanga dzawanda panyika yeGiriyadhi.
Namazuva aSauro vakarwa navaHagari, vakavakunda; vakagara pamatende avo panyika yose yakanga iri kumabvazuva eGiriyadhi.
Vana vaGadhi
Vanakomana vaGadhi vakanga vagere kwakatarisana navo panyika yeBhashani, kusvikira paSareka;
Joeri mukuru, naShafani wechipiri, naJanai, naShafati, paBhashani;
vanununa vavo vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo: Mikaeri, naMeshurami, naShebha, naJorai, naJakani, naZiya, naEbheri, ivo vanomwe.
Ndivo vanakomana vaAbhihairi mwanakomana waHuri, mwanakomana waJaroa, mwanakomana waGiriyadhi, mwanakomana waMikaeri, mwanakomana waJeshishai, mwanakomana waJadho, mwanakomana waBhuzi,
naAhi, mwanakomana waAbhidhieri, mwanakomana waGuni, mukuru wedzimba dzamadzibaba avo.
Ivo vakanga vagere paGiriyadhi paBhashani, nomumisha yaro mikuru, nomuruwa rweSharoni, kusvikira kumiganhu yayo.
Ava vose vaiverengwa namazita amadzitateguru avo pamazuva aJotamu mambo waJudha, napamazuva aJerobhoamu mambo waIsiraeri.
Vanakomana vaRubheni, navaGadhi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, varume voumhare, varume vaigona kushonga nhovo neminondo, nokupfura nouta, vaigona kurwa, vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi manomwe namakumi matanhatu, vaigona kundorwa.
Vakarwa vanaHagari, naJeturi, naNafishi, naHobhabhi.
Vakabatsirwa pakurwa navo, vaHagari vakakundwa navo, navose vaiva navo; nokuti vakadana kuna Jehovha vari pakurwa, akavanzwa; nokuti vakanga vachitenda kwaari.
Vakatapa zvipfuwo zvavo, makamera ane zviuru zvina makumi mashanu, namakwai ane zviuru zvina mazana maviri namakumi mashanu, nembongoro dzine zviuru zviviri, navanhu vane zviuru zvine zana.
Vazhinji vakafa vaurawa, nokuti kurwa kwanga kuri kwaMwari.
Ivo vakagara panzvimbo yavo kusvikira pakutapwa kwavo.
Vana vehafu yorudzi rwaManase
Vanakomana vehafu yorudzi rwaManase vakanga vagere panyika iyo; vakawanda kubva paBhashani kusvikira paBhaariherimoni neSeniri, negomo reHerimoni.
Vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo ndivo: Eferi, nalshi, naErieri, naAshirieri, naJeremiya; naHodhavhia, naJadhieri, varume vaiva nesimba noumhare, vanhu vaiva nembiri, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo.
Asi vakazotadzira Mwari wamadzibaba avo, vakapata vachitevera vamwari vendudzi dzenyika iyo, dzakanga dzaparadzwa naMwari pamberi pavo.
Mwari walsiraeri akamutsa mweya waPuri mambo waAsiria, nomweya waTirigatipirineseri mambo weAsiria; iye akavatapa, ivo vaRubheni, navaGadhi, nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, akavaisa Hara, neHabhori, neHara, nokurwizi Gozani kusvikira nhasi.
Vanakomana vaRevhi: Gerishoni, naKohati, naMerari;
navanakomana vaKohati: Amirami, naIshari, naHebhuroni, naUzieri,
Vanakomana vaAmirami: Aroni, naMozisi, naMiriami.
Vanakomana vaAroni: Nadhabhi, naAbhihu, naEriazari, naltamari.
Eriazari akabereka Pinehasi, Pinehasi akabereka Abhishua,
Abhishua akabereka Bhuki, Bhuki akabereka Uzi,
Uzi akabereka Zerahiya, Zerahiya akabereka Merayoti,
Merayoti akabereka Amaria, Amaria akabereka Ahitubhi,
Ahitubhi akabereka Zadhoki, Zadhoki akabereka Ahimaazi,
Ahimaazi akabereka Azaria, Azaria akabereka Johanani,
Johanani akabereka Azaria, (ndiye waibata basa romupirisiti muimba yakavakwa naSoromoni paJerusaremu;)
Azaria akabereka Amaria, Amaria akabereka Ahitubhi,
Ahitubhi akabereka Zadhoki, Zadhoki akabereka Sharumi,
Sharumi akabereka Hirikia, Hirikia akabereka Azaria,
Azaria akabereka Seraya, Seraya akabereka Jehozadhaki,
Jehozadhaki akatapwa, nguva yakatapa Jehovha Judha neJerusaremu noruoko rwaNebhukadhinezari.
Vanakomana vaRevhi, Gerishomi, naKohati, naMerari.
Mazita avanakomana vaGerishomi ndiwo: Ribhini naShimei.
Vanakomana vaKohati: Amirami, naIshari, naHebhuroni, naUzieri;
navanakomana vaMerari: Mari, naMushi.
Uye ndidzo dzimba dzavaRevhi, nedzimba dzamadzibaba avo.
VaGerishoni: Ribhini mwanakomana wake, naJahati mwanakomana wake, naZima mwanakomana wake,
naJoa mwanakomana wake, naIdho mwanakomana wake, naZera mwanakomana wake, naJeaterai mwanakomana wake.
Vanakomana vaKohati: Aminadhabhu mwanakomana wake, naKora mwanakomana wake, naAsiri mwanakomana wake,
naErikana mwanakomana wake, naAbhiasafit mwanakomana wake, naAsiri mwanakomana wake,
naTahati mwanakomana wake, naUrieri mwanakomana wake, naUzi mwanakomana wake, naShauri mwanakomana wake.
Vanakomana vaErikana: Amasai, naAhimoti.
Vanakomana vaErikana: Zofai mwanakomana wake, naNahati mwanakomana wake,
naEriabhi mwanakomana wake, naErikana mwanakomana wake.
Vanakomana vaSamueri: wedangwe Joeri, nowechipiri Abhija.
Vanakomana vaMerari: Mari, naRibhini mwanakomana wake, naUza mwanakomana wake,
naShimira mwanakomana wake, naHagia mwanakomana wake, naAsaya mwanakomana wake.
Uye ava ndivo vakagadzwa naDhavhidhi kuzofambisa basa rokuimba mumba maJehovha, mushure mokuti areka yawana pokuzorora.
Vaishumira pakuimba pamberi petabhenekari yetende rokusangana, kusvikira Soromoni avaka imba yaJehovha paJerusaremu; vakamira pabasa ravo, sezvavakanga vagoverwa napo.
Ndivo vaimirapo navakomana vavo; kuvanakomana vaKohati: Hemani muimbi, mwanakomana waJoeri, mwanakomana waSamueri;
mwanakomana waErikana, mwanakomana waJehorami, mwanakomana waErieri, mwanakomana waToa;
mwanakomana waZufi, mwanakomana waErikana, mwanakomana waMahati, mwanakomana waAmasai,
mwanakomana waErikana, mwanakomana waJoeri, mwanakomana waAzaria, mwanakomana waZefaniya,
mwanakomana waTahati, mwanakomana waAsiri, mwanakomana waEbhiasafi, mwanakomana waKora;
mwanakomana waIshari, mwanakomana waKohati, mwanakomana waRevhi, mwanakomana waIsiraeri.
Munununa wake Asafi, akanga amire kurudyi rwake, iye Asafi mwanakomana waBherekia, mwanakomana waShimea;
mwanakomana waMikaeri, mwanakomana waBhaaseya, mwanakomana waMarikija;
mwanakomana waItini, mwanakomana waZera, mwanakomana waAdhaya;
mwanakomana waEtani, mwanakomana waZima, mwanakomana waShimeri;
mwanakomana waJahati, mwanakomana waGerishomi, mwanakomana waRevhi.
Kurubhoshwe rwavo, hama dzavo ivo vanakomana vaMerari: Etani mwanakomana waKishi, mwanakomana waAbhidhi, mwanakomana waMaruki;
mwanakomana waHashabhia, mwanakomana waAmazia, mwanakomana waHirikia;
mwanakomana waAmuzi, mwanakomana waBhani, mwanakomana waShemeri;
mwanakomana waMari, mwanakomana waMushi, mwanakomana waMerari, mwanakomana waRevhi.
Hama dzavo ivo vaRevhi ndivo vakagoverwa mabasa ose patabhenekari yeimba yaJehovha.
Asi Aroni navanakomana vake vaibayira paaritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa, napaaritari yezvinonhuwira, vaibata mabasa ose apanzvimbo tsvene-tsvene, nokuyananisira Isiraeri, vachiita zvose zvakarairwa naMozisi muranda waMwari.
Vanakomana vaAroni ndivo: Eriazari mwanakomana wake, naPinehasi mwanakomana wake, naAbhishua mwanakomana wake;
naBhuki mwanakomana wake, naUzi mwanakomana wake, naZerahiya mwanakomana wake;
naMerayoti mwanakomana wake, naAmaria mwanakomana wake, naAhitubhi mwanakomana wake;
naZadhoki mwanakomana wake, naAhimaazi mwanakomana wake.
Kwavaigara, kwavaidzika matende avo panyika yavo, ndiko, vanakomana waAroni, vedzimba dzavaKohati, nokuti ndivo vakatanga kugoverwa,
ivo vakapiwa Hebhuroni panyika yaJudha, namafuro aro akanga akapoteredza;
asi minda yeguta, nemisha yaro, yakapiwa Karebhu mwanakomana waJefune.
Vanakomana vaAroni vakapiwa maguta outiziro, aiti: Hebhuroni, neRibhina namafuro awo, neJatiri, neEshitemoa namafuro awo;
neHireni namafuro aro, neDhebhiri namafuro aro;
neAshani namafuro aro, neBhetishemeshi namafuro aro.
Uye vorudzi rwaBhenjamini: Gebha namafuro aro, neArimeti namafuro aro, neAnatoti namafuro aro.
Maguta avo ose pakati pedzimba dzavo dzose, aiva maguta ane gumi namatatu.
Vamwe vanakomana vaKohati vakapiwa nemijenya maguta ane gumi pakati pehafu yorudzi rwaManase, iyo hafu yaManase.
Vanakomana vaGerishomi nedzimba dzavo, vorudzi rwaIsakari, novorudzi rwaAsheri, novorudzi rwaNafutari, novorudzi rwaManase paBhashani, vakapiwa maguta ane gumi namatatu.
Vanakomana vaMerari nedzimba dzavo vakapiwa nemijenya vorudzi rwaRubheni, novorudzi rwaGadhi, novorudzi rwaZebhuruni, maguta ane gumi namaviri.
Vana vaIsiraeri vakapa vaRevhi maguta namafuro awo.
Vakavapa nemijenya maguta iwayo akarehwa mazita awo vorudzi rwavana vaJudha, novorudzi rwavana vaSimiyoni, novorudzi rwavana vaBhenjamini.
Asi vamwe vedzimba dzavana vaKohati vakanga vana maguta panyika yavo, vorudzi rwaEfuremu.
Vakavapa maguta outiziro, aiti: Shekemu kunyika yamakomo aEfuremu namafuro aro, neGezeri namafuro aro;
neJokimeami namafuro aro, neBhetihoroni namafuro aro,
neAjaroni namafuro aro, neGatirimoni namafuro aro;
vehafu yorudzi rwaManase vakapiwa Aneri namafuro aro, ndizvo zvakapiwa vamwe veimba yavana vaKohati.
Vanakomana vaGerishomi vakapiwa pakati peimba yehafu yorudzi rwaManase, Gorani paBhashani namafuro aro, neAshitaroti namafuro aro;
novorudzi rwaIsakari: Kedheshi namafuro aro, neDhabherati namafuro aro,
neRamoti namafuro aro, neAnemi namafuro aro;
novorudzi rwaAsheri: Mashari namafuro aro, neAbhidhoni namafuro aro;
neHukoki namafuro aro, neRehobhi namafuro aro,
novorudzi rwaNafutari: Kedheshi paGarire namafuro aro, neHamoni namafuro aro, neKiriataimi namafuro aro.
Vamwe vavaRevhi, ivo vanakomana vaMerari, vakapiwa vorudzi rwaZebhuruni: Rimono namafuro aro, neTabhori namafuro aro;
uye mhiri kwaJorodhani paJeriko, kumabvazuva aJorodhani, vorudzi rwaRubheni, vakapiwa Bhezeri riri kurenje namafuro aro, neJaza namafuro aro,
neKedhemoti namafuro aro, neMefati namafuro aro;
novorudzi rwaGadhi: Ramoti paGiriyadhi namafuro aro, neMahanaimu namafuro aro,
neHeshibhoni namafuro aro, neJazeri namafuro aro.
Vanakomana vaIsakari: Tora, naPua, naJashubhi, naShimironi, ivo vana.
Vanakomana vaTora: Uzi, naRefaya, naJerieri, naJamai, naIbhisami, naShemueri, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, idzo dzaTora; vaiva varume vane simba noumhare pakati pamarudzi avo, pamazuva aDhavhidhi vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezviviri namazana matanhatu.
Vanakomana vaUzi; Izirahiya; navanakomana vaIzirahiya: Mikaeri naObhadhiya, naJoeri, naIshia, ivo vashanu; ava vose vakanga vari vakuru.
Kwavari, kumarudzi avo nokudzimba dzamadzibaba avo, kwakanga kuna mapoka ehondo dzokurwa ane zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezvitanhatu; nokuti vakanga vana vakadzi vazhinji navanakomana vazhinji.
Hama dzavo pakati pedzimba dzose dzaIsakari, ivo varume vane simba noumhare, vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi masere nezvinomwe, kana vachiverengwa mazita avo ose.
Vana vaBhenjamini naNafutari
Vanakomana vaBhenjamini: Bhera, naBhekeri, naJedhiyaeri, ivo vatatu.
Vanakomana vaBhera: Ezibhoni, naUzi, naUzieri, naJerimoti, naIri, ivo vashanu.
Ivo vakanga vari vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, varume vane simba noumhare, vakaverengwa mazita avo vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezviviri namakumi matatu navana.
Vanakomana vaBhekeri: Zemira, naJoashi, naEriezeri, naErioenai, naOmiri, naJeremoti, naAbhiia, naAnatoti, naArimeti.
Ivo vose vakanga vari vanakomana vaBhekeri.
Vakaverengwa mazita avo namarudzi avo, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, varume vane simba noumhare, vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri namazana maviri.
Vanakomana vaJedhiyaeri: Bhirihani, navanakomana vaBhirihani; Jehushi, naBhenjamini, naEhudhi, naKenani, naZetani, naTarishishi, naAhishahari.
Ivo vose vakanga vari vanakomana vaJedhiyaeri, vachiverengwa vakuru vedzimba dzamamdzibaba avo, varume vane simba noumhare, vakasvika zviuru zvine gumi nezvinomwe namazana maviri, vakanga vachigona kuenda kuhondo kundorwa.
NaShupimiwo, naHupimi, vanakomana vaIri, naHushimi, vanakomana vaAheri.
Vanakomana vaNafutari: Jazieri, naGuni, naJezeri, naSharumi, vanakomana vaBhiriha.
Vana vaManase
Vanakomana vaManase: Asirieri, waakaberekerwa nomukadzi wake; (murongo wake muArami akabereka Makiri baba vaGiriyadhi;
Makiri akawana mukadzi worudzi rwaHupimi naShupimi, zita rehanzvadzi yake raiva Maaka;) zita rowechipiri rakanga riri Zerofehadhi; Zerofehadhi akanga anavakunda.
Maaka mukadzi waMakiri akabereka mwanakomana, akatumidza zita rake Pereshi; zita romunununa wake raiva Shereshi, vanakomana vake vakanga vari Urami naRakemi.
Vanakomana vaUrami: Bhedhani.
Ndivo vanakomana vaGiriyadhi mwanakomana waMakiri, mwanakomana waManase.
Hanzvadzi yake Hamoreketi akabereka Ishodhi, naAbhiezeri, naMara.
Vanakomana vaShemidha: Ahiani, naShekemu, naRiki naAniami.
Vana vaEfuremu
Vanakomana vaEfuremu: Shutera, naBheredhi mwanakomana wake, naTahati mwanakomana wake, naEreadha mwanakomana wake, naTahati mwanakomana wake,
naZabhadhi mwanakomana wake, naShutera mwanakomana wake, naEzeri, naEreadhi; ivo vakaurawa navanhu veGati vakanga vakaberekerwa panyika iyo, nokuti vakanga vaburukira kwavari kuzotora zvipfuwo zvavo.
Efuremu baba vavo akavachema mazuva mazhinji, hama dzake dzikauya kuzomubata ruoko.
Akapinda kumukadzi wake, iye akava nemimba, akabereka mwanakomana, akamutumidza zita rinonzi Bheriya; nokuti imba yake yakanga ichitambudzika.
Mukunda wake waiva Sheera, iye akavaka Bhetihoroni rezasi nerokumusoro, neUzenisheera.
Mwanakomana waEfuremu aiva Refa, naReshefi, naTera mwanakomana wake, naTahani mwanakomana wake;
naRadhani mwanakomana wake, naErishama mwanakomana wake,
naNuni mwanakomana wake, naJoshua mwanakomana wake.
Nyika yavo nokwavakanga vagere ndiBhetieri nemisha yaro; nokumabvazuva, Naarani, nokumavirira Gezeri nemisha yaro; neShekemu nemisha yaro, kusvikira paAza nemisha yaro;
nokumiganhu yavana vaManase.
Bhetisheani nemisha yaro, neTaanaki nemisha yaro, neMegidho nemisha yaro, neDhori nemisha yaro.
Vana vaJosefa mwanakomana waIsiraeri vakagara mumisha iyi.
Vanakomana vaAsheri
Vanakomana vaAsheri: Imina, naIshivha, naIshivhi, naBheriya, naSera hanzvadzi yavo.
Vanakomana vaBheriya: Hebheri, naMarikieri, waiva baba vaBhirizaiti.
Hebheri akabereka Jafureti, naShomeri, naHotami, naShua hanzvadzi yavo.
Vanakomana Jafureti: Pasaki, naBhimari, naAshivati.
Ndivo vanakomana vaJafureti.
Vanakomana vaShemeri: Ahi, naRoga, naJehubha, naArami.
Vanakomana vaHeremi munununa wake: Zofa, naImina, naShereshi, naAmari.
Vanakomana vaZofa: Shua, naHarineferi, naShuari, naBheri, naImira;
naBheseri, naHodhi, naShama, naShirisha, naItirani, naBheera.
Vanakomana vaJeteri: Jefune, naPisipa, naAra.
Vanakomana vaUra: Ara, naHanieri, naRizia.
Ava vose vaiva vana vaAsheri, vari vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo, varume vakanga vakatsaurwa, vane simba noumhare, vakuru vamachinda.
Vakaverengwa namazita avo, ivo vaigona kurwa, vakasvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezvitanhatu.
Bhenjamini akabereka mwana wake wedangwe Bhera, naAshibheri wechipiri, naAhara wechitatu;
naNoa wechina, naRafa weshanu.
Bhera akabereka vanakomana: Adhari, naGera naAbhihudhi;
naAbhishua, naNaamani, naAhoa;
naGera, naShefufani, naHurami.
Ava ndivo vanakomana vaEhudhi: Ndivo vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba aigara paGebha, vakavatapa, vakaenda navo Manahati;
naNaamani, naAhiya, naGera, iye akavatapa; akabereka Uza naAhihudhi.
Shaharaimi akabereka vanakomana panyika yaMoabhi, adzinga vakadzi vake Hushimi naBhaara.
Akabereka kumukadzi wake Hodheshi: Jobhabhu, naZibhia, naMesha, naMarikami;
naJeuzi, naShakia, naMirima.
Ndivo vanakomana vake, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba.
Hushimi akabereka Abhitubhi naEripaari.
Vanakomana vaEripaari: Ebheri, naMishami, naShemedhi; ndiye wakavaka Ono, naRodhi, nemisha yawo;
naBheira, naShema, ivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba aigara paAjaroni, vakadzinga vakanga vagere paGati;
naAhiyo, naShashaki, naJeremoti;
naZebhedhia, naAradhi, naEdheri;
naMikaeri, naIshipa, naJoha, ivo vanakomana vaBheira;
naZebhedhia, naMeshurami, naHiziki, naHebheri;
naIshimerai, naIziria, naJobhabhu, ivo vanakomana vaEripaari;
naJakimi, naZikiri, naZabhudhi;
naErienai, naZiretai, naErieri;
naAdhaya, naBheraya, naShimirati, ivo vanakomana vaShimei;
naIshipani, naEbheri, naErieri;
naAbhidhoni, naZikiri, naHanani;
naHanania, naErami, naAnatotiya;
naIfudheya, naPenueri, ivo vanakomana vaShashaki;
naShamisherai, neSheharia, naAtaria;
naJareshia, naEria, naZikiri, ivo vanakomana vaJehorami.
Ivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba kumarudzi avo ose, vakuru; ivo vaigara Jerusaremu.
PaGibhiyoni paigara baba vaGibhiyoni, wainzi Jeyieri, zita romukadzi wake rakanga riri Maaka.
Mwanakomana wake wedangwe aiva Abhidhoni, naZuri, naKishi, naBhaari, naNadhabhi;
naGedhori, naAhio, naZekariya.
Mikiroti akabereka Shimea.
Naivo vaigara nehama dzavo Jerusaremu, vakatarisana nehama dzavo.
Neri akabereka Kishi, Kishi akabereka Sauro, Sauro akabereka Jonatani, naMarikishua, naAbhinadhabhu, naEshibhaari.
Mwanakomana waJonatani akanga ari Meribhibhaari; Meribhibhaari akabereka Mika.
Vanakomana vaMika: Pitoni, naMereki, naTarea, naAhazi.
Ahazi akabereka Joadha, Joadha akabereka Arimeti, naAzimavheti, naZimiri; Zimiri akabereka Moza;
Moza akabereka Bhinea; Rafa waiva mwanakomana wake, naEreasa mwanakomana wake, naAzeri mwanakomana wake.
Azeri wakanga ana vanakomana vatanhatu; mazita avo ndiwo: Azirikami, naBhokeru, naIshimaeri, naShearia, naObhadhiya, naHanani.
Ava vose vaiva vanakomana vaAzeri.
Vanakomana vaEsheki munununa wake: Urami mwanakomana wake wedangwe, naJeuzi wechipiri, naErifereti wechitatu.
Vanakomana vaUrami vaiva varume vane simba noumhare, vapfuri vemiseve; vakanga vana vanakomana vazhinji, navanakomana vavanakomana vavo, vakasvika zana namakumi mashanu.
Ivo vose vaiva vanakomana vaBhenjamini.
Naizvozvo vaIsiraeri vose vakaverengwa mazita avo; tarirai, akanyorwa ose mubhuku yamadzimambo alsiraeri.
VaJudha vakazotapwa, vakaiswa Bhabhironi nokuda kwokudarika kwavo.
Zvino, vakatanga kugara panyika yavo napamaguta avo, vakanga vari vaIsiraeri, navapirisiti, navaRevhi, navaNetinimi.
PaJerusaremu ndipo pakanga pagere vana vaJudha, navana vaBhenjamini, navana vaEfuremu, navaManase;
Utai mwanakomana waAmihudhi, mwanakomana waOmiri, mwanakomana waImiri, mwanakomana waBhani, wavana vaPerezi mwanakomana waJudha.
NavaShiro: Asaya mwanakomana wedangwe, navanakomana vake.
Vanakomana vaZera: Jeueri, nehama dzavo, vana mazana matanhatu namakumi mapfumbamwe.
Vanakomana vaBhenjamini: Saru, mwanakomana waMeshirami, mwanakomana waHodhavhia, mwanakomana waHasenua.
Nalbheneya, mwanakomana waJehorami, naEra mwanakomana waUzi, mwanakomana waMikiri, naMeshurami mwanakomana waShefatia, mwanakomana waReueri, mwanakomana waIbhiniya;
nehama dzavo, marudzi avo aisvika mazana mapfumbamwe namakumi mashanu namatanhatu.
Varume ava vose vakanga vari vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba padzimba dzamadzibaba avo.
Vavapirisiti: Jedheiya, naJehoyaribhi, naJakini;
naAzaria, mwanakomana waHirikia, mwanakomana waMeshurami, mwanakomana waZadhoki, mwanakomana waMerayoti, mwanakomana waAhitubhi, mukuru paimba yaMwari,
naAdhaya, mwanakomana waJehorami, mwanakomana waPashuri, mwanakomana waMarikija, naMaasai, mwanakomana waAdhieri, mwanakomana waJazera, mwanakomana waMeshurami, mwanakomana waMeshiremiti, mwanakomana waImeri;
nehama dzavo, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avo vakasvika chiuru chimwe namazana manomwe namakumi matanhatu; varume vane simba kwazvo noumhare pabasa rokushumira paimba yaMwari.
VavaRevhi: Shemaya mwanakomana waHashubhi, mwanakomana waAzirikami, mwanakomana waHashabhia, wavanakomana vaMerari;
naBhakibhakari, naHoreshi, naGarari, naMatania mwanakomma waMika, mwanakomana waZikiri, mwanakomana waAsafi;
naObhadhiya mwanakomana waShemaya, mwanakomana waGarari, mwanakomana waAsa, mwanakomana waErikana, vakanga vagere pamisha yavaNetofati.
Vatariri vamasuo: Sharumi, naAkubhi, naTarimoni, naAhikami, nehama dzavo; Sharumi ndiye akanga ari mukuru;
ndivo vaitarira suo ramambo rokumabvazuva kusvikira zvino; vakanga vari vatariri vamasuo emisasa yavana vaRevhi.
Sharumi mwanakomana waKore, mwanakomana waEbhiasafi, mwanakomana waKora, nehama dzake, ivo veimba yababa vake, vaKora, ndivo vaiva nebasa rokushumira, vakatarira masuo etabhenekari; madzibaba avo aitarira misasa yaJehovha, nokuchengeta mikova.
Pinehasi mwanakomana waEriazari aiva murairi wavo kare, Jehovha akava naye.
Zekariya mwanakomana waMesheremia, akanga ari mutariri womukova wetende rokusangana.
Ava vose, vakatsaurwa kuti vave vatariri vamasuo, vakasvika mazana maviri negumi navaviri.
Ava vose vakaverengwa mazita avo pamisha yavo, vakanga vakagadzwa pabasa ravo rakatarwa naDhavhidhi naSamueri muoni.
Naizvozvo ivo navana vavo vakanga vari vatariri vamasuo eimba yaJehovha, iyo imba yetabhenekari, vachiravana.
Vatariri vakanga vari kumativi mana, kumabvazuva, nokumavirira, nokumusoro, nenyasi.
Hama dzavo pamisha yavo vaifanira kuuya nguva dzose kana mazuva manomwe apera, kuzogara navo.
Nokuti vatariri vana vakuru vemikova, vakanga vari vaRevhi, vaiva pabasa iri rakatarwa, vaitarira makamuri nezvivigiro zvefuma paimba yaMwari.
Vaigarapo vakapoteredza imba yaMwari, nokuti ndivo vakanga vapiwa basa iri, vaiva nebasa rokuizarura mangwanani ose.
Vamwe vavo vaifanira kutarira midziyo yokushumira nayo; nokuti yaipinzwa ichiverengwa, uye yaibudiswa ichiverengwa.
Vamwe vavozve vakanga vakagadzwa kuti vatarire nhumbi nemidziyo yose nenzvimbo tsvene, noupfu hwakatsetseka, newaini, namafuta, nezvinonhuwira, nemiti inonhuwira.
Vamwezve vavanakomana vavapirisiti vaifanira kugadzira zvinonhuwira zvakavenganiswa.
Matitia, mumwe wavaRevhi, mwanakomana wedangwe waSharumi, wavaKora, wakanga akatarirwa basa rezvinhu zvaibikwa mugango.
Navamwe vehama dzavo, vavana vaKora, vaifanira kutarira zvingwa zvokuratidza, kuzvigadzira Sabata rimwe nerimwe.
Uye ndivo vaimbi, vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avaRevhi, vaigara mumakamuri vasingabati zvimwe; nokuti vaibata basa ravo masikati nousiku.
Ivo vaiva vakuru vedzimba dzamadzibaba avaRevhi, vakuru kumarudzi avo; ndivo vaigara Jerusaremu.
Zvino paGibhiyoni pakanga pagere baba vaGibhiyoni, Jeyieri; zita romukadzi wake rakanga riri Maaka.
Mwanakomana wake wedangwe waiva Abhidhoni, tevere Zuri, naKishi, naBhaari, naNeri, naNadhabhi;
naGedhori, naAhio, naZekariya, naMikiroti.
Mikiroti wakabereka Shimeami.
Ivo vaigarawo pamwechete nehama dzavo paJerusaremu, pakatarisana nehama dzavo.
Neri akabereka Kishi, Kishi akabereka Sauro, Sauro akabereka Jonatani, naMarikishua, naAbhinadhabhu, naEshibhaari.
Mwanakomana waJonatani waiva Meribhibhaari.
Meribhibhaari akabereka Mika.
Vanakomana vaMika: Pitoni, naMereki, naTarea, naAhazi.
Ahazi akabereka Jara, Jara akabereka Arimeti naAzimavheti, naZimiri; Zimiri akabereka Moza;
Moza akabereka Bhinea, naRefaya mwanakomana wake, naEreasa mwanakomana wake, naAzeri mwanakomana wake;
Azeri akanga ana vanakomana vatanhatu; mazita avo ndiwo: Azirikami, naBhokeru, naIshimaeri, naShearia, naObhadhiya, naHanani.
Ndivo vanakomana vaAzeri.
Zvino vaFirisitia vakarwa navaIsiraeri, varume vaIsiraeri vakatiza pamberi pavaFirisitia, vakawira pasi vaurawa pagomo reGiribhoa.
VaFirisitia vakateverera Sauro navanakomana vake kwazvo, vaFirisitia vakauraya Jonatani, naAbhinadhabhu, naMarikishua, vanakomana vaSauro.
Sauro akakurirwa kwazvo pakurwa, vapfuri vouta vakamubata; akatambudzika kwazvo nokuda kwavapfuri vouta.
Ipapo Sauro akati kumubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, Vhomora munondo wako, undibaye nawo, kuti ava vasina kudzingiswa varege kusvika vandidadire.
Asi mubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo wakaramba, nokuti akanga achitya kwazvo.
Naizvozvo Sauro akatora munondo wake, akazviwisira pauri.
Zvino mubati wenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo akati achiona kuti Sauro afa, naiye akazviwisirawo pamunondo wake, akafawo.
Naizvozvo Sauro akafa navanakomana vake vatatu; veimba yake yose vakafa pamwechete.
Zvino varume vose valsiraeri, vakanga vagere pamupata uyo, vakati vachiona kuti vatiza, uye kuti Sauro navanakomana vake vafa, ivo vakabva pamaguta avo, vakatiza; vaFirisitia vakasvika vakagaramo.
Zvino fume mangwana vaFirisitia vakati vachiuya kuzosunungura vakanga vaurawa, vakawana Sauro navanakomana vake vatatu vakafa pagomo reGiribhoa.
Vakamusunungura, vakatora musoro wake nenhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo, vakatuma nhume kumativi ose enyika yavaFirisitia, kundozivisa vamwari vavo navanhu vavo shoko iro.
Vakaisa nhumbi dzake dzokurwa nadzo muimba yavamwari vavo, vakasungira musoro wake mumba maDhagoni.
Zvino vanhu vose vaJabheshiGiriyadhi vakati vanzwa zvose zvakanga zvaitirwa Sauro navaFirisitia,
mhare dzose dzikasimuka, vakabvisa chitunha chaSauro nezvitunha zvavanakomana vake vakaenda nazvo Jabheshi, vakaviga mapfupa avo pasi pomuoki paJabheshi, vakazvinyima zvokudya mazuva manomwe.
Naizvozvo Sauro akafa nokuda kwokudarika kwake kwaakaitira Jehovha, uye nokuda kweshoko raJehovha raasina kuchengeta; uye nokuti akatsvaka mano kusvikiro, kubvunza naro,
akasabvunza Jehovha; naizvozvo wakamuuraya, akaisa ushe kuna Dhavhidhi mwanakomana waJese.
Zvino vaIsiraeri vose vakaungana kuna Dhavhidhi paHebhuroni, vakati, Tarirai, isu tiri mapfupa enyu nenyama yenyu.
Kare, kunyange Sauro akanga ari mambo, ndimi maibuda nokupinda naIsiraeri; Jehovha Mwari wenyu akati kwamuri, Iwe uchafudza vanhu vangu valsiraeri, nokuva mutungamiriri
Naizvozvo vakuru vose vaIsiraeri vakaenda kuna mambo paHebhuroni, Dhavhidhi akaita sungano paHebhuroni pamberi paJehovha; ivo vakazodza Dhavhidhi, kuti ave mambo waIsiraeri, sezvakanga zvarehwa naJehovha nomuromo waSamueri.
Dhavhidhi navaIsiraeri vose vakakwira Jerusaremu (ndiro Jebhusi); zvino vaJebhusi, vanhu venyika iyo, vakanga varipo.
Ipapo vanhu vaigara paJebhusi vakati kuna Dhavhidhi, Haungapindi pano.
Asi Dhavhidhi akakunda nhare yeZiyoni; ndiro guta raDhavhidhi.
Ipapo Dhavhidhi akati, Anotanga kubaya vaJebhusi ndiye achava mutungamiriri nomukuru wehondo.
Zvino Joabhu mwanakomana waZeruya akatanga kukwira, akaitwa mutungamiriri wehondo.
Dhavhidhi akagara panhare; naizvozvo vakaritumidza zita rinonzi guta raDhavhidhi.
Akavaka guta kumativi ose, kubva paMiro kusvikira kumativi ose; Joabhu akagadzira zvimwe zveguta.
Dhavhidhi akaramba achikura, nokuti Jehovha wehondo aiva naye.
Machinda aDhavhidhi
Zvino ndivo vakuru vavarume vane simba vaiva naDhavhidhi, vaimusimbisa paushe hwake, pamwechete navaIsiraeri vose, kuti vamugadze ave mambo, sezvakarehwa naJehovha pamusoro palsiraeri.
Ndiko kuwanda kwavarume vane simba vaiva naDhavhidhi: Joshobhiyami mwanakomana wokuHakimoni, mukuru wavana makumi matatu; iye akasimudza pfumo rake akarwa navana mazana matatu, akavauraya nenguva imwe.
Akamutevera akanga ari Eriazari, mwanakomana waDhodho muAhohi, mumwe wavarume vatatu vaiva nesimba.
Iye akanga ana Dhavhidhi paPasidhamini; vaFirisitia vakanga vaunganapo kuzorwa pabindu rakanga rizere nebhari; vanhu vakatiza pamberi pavaFirisitia.
Vakamira pakati pebindu, vakarirwira, vakauraya vaFirisitia, Jehovha akavarwira nokukunda kukuru.
Zvino vatatu vavakuru vavana makumi matatu vakaburukira kudombo kuna Dhavhidhi kubako reAdhuramu; zvino hondo yavaFirisitia yakanga yadzika matende pamupata weRefaimu.
Zvino nenguva iyo Dhavhidhi akanga ari munhare, uye boka ravarwi vavaFirisitia raiva paBheterehemu nenguva iyo.
Dhavhidhi akapanga, akati, Haiwa!
Dai mumwe achindipa mvura yetsime reBheterehemu, riri pasuo, ndinwe!
Ipapo mhare idzo nhatu dzakapasanura napakati pehondo yavaFirisitia, vakandoteka mvura patsime reBheterehemu, riri pasuo, vakaitora, vakauya nayo kuna Dhavhidhi; asi Dhavhidhi wakaramba kuinwa, akaidururira kuna Jehovha,
akati, Mwari wangu ngaandidzivise, ndirege kuita chinhu ichi!
Ndinganwa ropa ravarume ava vakaenda vasingarangariri upenyu hwavo here?
Nokuti vakauya nayo vasingarangariri upenyu hwavo.
Naizvozvo akaramba kuinwa.
Ndizvo zvakaitwa nemhare idzo nhatu.
Abhishai munununa waJoabhu, ndiye akanga ari mukuru wavatatu avo, nokuti akasimudza pfumo rake akarwa navana mazana matatu, akavauraya; akava nomukurumbira pakati pavatatu avo.
Pakati pavatatu ndiye wakanga ane mbiri kukunda vamwe vaviri, akava mukuru wavo; asi haana kuenzana navatatu vokutanga.
Bhenaya mwanakomana waJehoyadha, mwanakomana wemhare weKabhizeeri, akanga aita mabasa makuru, iye akauraya vanakomana vaviri vaArieri waMoabhi, akandourayawo shumba mukati mehunza panguva yechando.
Akaurayawo muIjipiti, murume akanga akakura kwazvo akasvika makubhiti mashanu; muljipiti uyu akanga akabata pfumo muruoko rwake, asi iye akaburukira kwaari akabata tsvimbo, akabvuta pfumo muruoko rwomuIjipiti, akamuuraya nepfumo rake iro.
Zvinhu izvi zvakaitwa naBhenaya mwanakomana waJehoyadha, akanga akakurumbira pakati pemhare idzo nhatu.
Tarirai, iye akanga ane mbiri kukunda vana makumi matatu, asi haana kuenzana navatatu vokutanga.
Dhavhidhi akamuita mutariri wavarindi vake.
Mhare dzehondo dzaiva: Ashaheri munununa waJoabhu, naErihanani mwanakomana waDhodho weBheterehemu;
naShamoti muHarodhi, naHerezi muPeroni;
naIra mwanakomana wIkeshi muTekoite, naAbhiezeri muAnatoti;
naSibekai muHushati, naIrai muAhohi;
naMakarai muNetofati, naHeredhi mwanakomana waBhaana muNetofati;
naItai mwanakomana waRibhai weGibhiya wavana vaBhenjamini, naBhenaya muPiratoni;
naHurai wehova dzeGaashi, naAbhieri muAribhati;
naAzimavheti muBhaharumiti, naEriabha muShaaribhoni;
navanakomana vaHashemi muGizoni, naJonatani mwanakomana waShage muHarari,
naAhiami mwanakomana waSakari muHarari, naErifari mwanakomana waUri;
naHeferi muMekerati, naAhiya muPeroni;
naHezero muKarimeri, naNaarai mwanakomana waEzibha;
naJoeri munununa waNatani, naMibhari mwanakomana waHagiri;
naZereki muAmoni, naNaharai muBheroti, mubati wenhumbi dzokurwa nadzo dzaJoabhu mwanakomana waZeruya;
naIra muItiri, naGarebhi muItiri,
naUriya muHiti, naZabhadhi mwanakomana waArai;
naAdhina mwanakomana waShiza muRubheni, mukuru wavaRubheni, navana makumi matatu naye;
naHanani mwanakomana waMaaka, naJoshafati muMitini;
naUziya muAshiterati, naShama naJeyieri vanakomana vaHotami muAroeri;
naJedhiaeri mwanakomana waShimiri, naJoha munununa wake, muTizi;
naErieri muMahavhi, naJeribhai, naJoshavhia, vanakomana vaErinaami, naItima muMoabhu;
naErieri, naObhedhi, naJaasieri muMezobha.
Ava ndivo vakaenda kuna Dhavhidhi paZikiragi, achakavanda nokuda kwaSauro mwanakomana waKishi; ivo vaiva mhare, vaimubatsira pakurwa.
Vakanga vakabata uta, uye vaigona kuposha mabwe, nemiseve nouta noruoko rworudyi kana rworuboshwewo; dzaiva hama dzaSauro vokwaBhenjamini.
Mukuru akanga ari Ahiezeri, tevere Joashi, vanakomana vaShemaa muGibhiyati; naJezieri, naPereti, vanakomana vaAzimavheti; naBheraka, naJehu muAnatoti;
naIshimaya muGibhiyoni, mhare pakati pavana makumi matatu, wairaira vana makumi matatu; naJeremiya, naJahazieri, naJohanani, naJozabhadhi muGedherati;
naEruzai, naJerimoti, naBheriya, naShemaria, naShefatia muHarufi;
naErikana, naIshiya, naAzareri, naJoezeri, naJoshobhiyami, vaKora;
naJoera, naZebhedhia vanakomana vaJehorami muGedhori.
Vamwe vavaGadhi vakazvitsaurawo, vakaenda kuna Dhavhidhi kunhare kurenje, varume vane simba noumhare, varume vakanga vadzidza kurwa, vakanga vachigona kubata nhovo nepfumo; zviso zvavo zvakanga zvakaita sezveshumba, uye vaimhanya semharapara pamakomo;
Ezeri akanga ari mukuru, wechipiri Obhadhiya, wechitatu Eriabhi;
wechina Misimana, weshanu Jeremiya;
wetanhatu Atai, wechinomwe Erieri;
worusere Johanani, wepfumbamwe Erizabhadhi;
wegumi Jeremiya; wegumi nomumwe Makibhanai.
Ndivo kuvana vaGadhi vaiva vakuru vehondo; muduku kwavari akanga akaenzana navane zana, nomukuru navane chiuru chezana.
Ndivo vakayambuka Jorodhani pamwedzi wokutanga, panguva yarwakafashamira kunhivi dzarwo dzose; vakadzinga vose vakanga vagere pamipata, kumabvazuva nokumavirira.
Navamwe vana vaBhenjamini navaJudha vakaendawo kuna Dhavhidhi munhare.
Dhavhidhi akabuda akasangana navo, akapindura, akati kwavari, Kana mauya kwandiri norugare kuzondibatsira, moyo wangu uchava nemi; asi kana mauya kuzondinyengera, kundiisa kuvadzivisi vangu, kunyange ndisine zvakaipa pamaoko angu, Mwari wamadzibaba edu ngaazvione, akutukei pamusoro pazvo.
Ipapo mweya wakauya pamusuro paAmasai aiva mukuru wavana makumi matatu, akati, Tiri vanhu venyu, Dhavhidhi, tiri kurutivi rwenyu, mwanakomana waJese!
Rugare, rugare ngaruve nemi, rugare ngaruve navabatsiri venyu; nokuti Mwari wenyu anokubatsirai.
Ipapo Dhavhidhi akavagamuchira, akavaita vakuru veboka.
KwaManasewo vakabva vamwe, vakaenda kuna Dhavhidhi, nguva yaakaenda navaFirisitia kundorwa naSauro, asi havana kuvabatsira; nokuti madzishe avaFirisitia akarangana, akamudzosa, achiti, Achatinyengera, achienda kunatenzi wake Sauro, misoro yedu ikava panjodzi.
Zvino wakati achienda Zikiragi, vamwe vaManase vakabva, vakasvika kwaari, vaiti, Adhana, naJozabhadhi, naJedhiaeri, naMikaeri, naJozabhadhi, naErihu, naZiretai, vakanga vari vakuru vechiuru chamazana pakati paManase.
Vakabatsira Dhavhidhi pakurwa neboka ramakororo; nokuti vose vakanga vari varume vane simba noumhare, navakuru pahondo.
Zuva rimwe nerimwe vakasvika kuna Dhavhidhi kuzomubatsira, kusvikira yava hondo huru, sehondo yaMwari.
Ndiko kuwanda kwavakuru vakashongera kurwa, vakaenda kuna Dhavhidhi paHebhuroni, kuzodzosera ushe hwaSauro kwaari, sezvakarehwa naJehovha.
Vana vaJudha, vakanga vakashonga nhovo nepfumo, vaiva nezviuru zvitanhatu namazana masere, vakanga vakashongera kurwa.
Kuvana vaSimiyoni varume vane simba noumhare pakurwa vaiva nezviuru zvinomwe nezana rimwe.
Kuvana vaRevhi vaiva nezviuru zvina namazana matanhatu.
Jehoyadha aiva mutungamiriri weimba yaAroni; vakanga vanaye vaiva nezviuru zvitatu namazana manomwe;
naZadhoki, jaya raiva nesimba noumhare, naveimba yababa vake, vakuru vana makumi maviri navaviri.
Kuvana vaBhenjamini, hama dzaSauro, zviuru zvitatu; nokuti kusvikira panguva iyo vazhinji vavo vakaramba vakanamatira imba yaSauro.
Kuvana vaEfuraimu zviuru zvina makumi maviri namazana masere, varume vane simba noumhare, vakanga vane mbiri padzimba dzamadzibaba avo.
Kuhafu yorudzi rwaManase, zviuru zvine gumi nezvisere, vakanga vakanyorwa mazita avo, vakasvika kuzoita Dhavhidhi mambo.
Kuvana vaIsakari, varume vaiziva nguva zvakanaka, uye kuti vaIsiraeri vanofanira kuitei, vakuru vavo vaiva mazana maviri; hama dzavo dzose dzairairwa navo.
KuvaZebhuruni, avo vaigona kufamba namapoka, nokugona kurongedza hondo, vakabata nhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo, vaiva nezviuru zvina makumi mashanu; vaigona kurwa vasine moyo miviri.
KuvaNafutari vakuru vane chiuru chimwe, uye vamwe vakanga vakabata nhovo nepfumo vaiva navo, zviuru zvina makumi matatu nezvinomwe.
KuvaDhani vaigona kurongedza hondo, zviuru zvina makumi maviri nezvisere namazana matanhatu.
KuvaAsheri, avo vaigona kufamba namapoka, nokugona kurongedza hondo, zviuru zvina makumi mana.
Uye mhiri kwaJorodhani, kuvaRubheni navaGadhi nehafu yorudzi rwaManase, avo vaiva nenhumbi dzose dzokurwa nadzo, zviuru zvina makumi maviri.
Ava vose, varume vehondo, vaigona kurongedza hondo, vakasvika paHebhuroni nemoyo yakarurama kwazvo, kuzoita Dhavhidhi mambo wavaIsiraeri vose; navaIsiraeri vamwe vose vakanga vanomoyo mumwe kuita Dhavhidhi mambo.
Vakagarapo naDhavhidhi mazuva matatu, vakadya nokunwa, nokuti hama dzavo dzakanga dzavagadzirira.
Uye vamwe vakanga vagere pedo navo kusvikira kwalsakari naZebhuruni naNafutari, vakauya nezvokudya zvakatakurwa nembongoro, namakamera, namahesera, nenzombe, zviri zvokudya zvoupfu, namapundu amaonde, anamasumbu amazambiringa akaoma, newaini, namafuta, nenzombe, namakwai mazhinji, nokuti mufaro wakanga uripo pakati palsiraeri.
Zvino Dhavhidhi akarangana navakuru vechiuru chamazana navamazana, navatungamiriri vose,
Dhavhidhi akati kuungano yose yaIsiraeri, Kana imi muchiti zvakanaka, uye kana zvichibva kuna Jehovha Mwari wedu, ngatitume shoko kwose kuhama dzedu dzakasara munyika yose yalsiraeri, nokuvapirisiti navaRevhi vari mumaguta avo anamafuro, kuti vaungane nesu;
tidzoserezve areka yaMwari wedu kwatiri, nokuti hatina kuirangarira pamazuva aSauro.
Ungano yose ikatenda kuzviita; nokuti vanhu vose vakati zvakanaka.
Zvino Dhavhidhi akaunganidza vaIsiraeri vose, kubva paShihori irwo rukova rweIjipiti, kusvikira pavanopinda paHamati, kuti vatore areka yaMwari paKiriatijearimi.
Dhavhidhi akakwira, iye navaIsiraeri vose, vakaenda Bhaara, ndiro Kiriatijearimi raiva raJudha, kuzotorapo areka yaMwari, iye Jehovha agere pamusoro pamakerubhi, pavanonamata Zita rake.
Vakatakura areka yaMwari pangoro itsva, vakaibvisa paimba yaAbhinadhabhu; Uza naAhio vakafambisa ngoro.
Dhavhidhi navaIsiraeri vose vakatamba pamberi paMwari nesimba ravo rose nenziyo, nembira, nemitengerangwa, nengoma, namakandira, nehwamanda.
Zvino vakati vachisvika paburiro raKidhoni, Uza akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti abate areka, nokuti nzombe dzakanga dzogumburwa.
Kutsamwa kwaJehovha kukamukira Uza, akamuuraya, nokuti akatambanudza ruoko rwake kuti abate areka; akafirapo pamberi paMwari.
Ipapo Dhavhidhi akaora moyo nokuti Jehovha akarova Uza; akatumidza nzvimbo iyo zita rinonzi Pereziuza kusvikira zuva ranhasi.
Dhavhidhi akatya Mwari nomusi uyo, akati, Ndingaisa areka yaMwari kumusha kwangu seiko?
Naizvozvo Dhavhidhi haana kuisa areka yaMwari kumusha kwaDhavhidhi, asi akaitsausira kumba kwaObhedhi-Edhomu muGiti.
Areka yaMwari ikagara pamhuri yaObhedhi-Edhomu mumba make mwedzi mitatu; Jehovha akaropafadza imba yaObhedhi-Edhomu nezvose zvaakanga anazvo.
Zvino Hirami mambo weTiro akatuma nhume kuna Dhavhidhi, namatanda emisidhari, navavaki, navavezi, kuti vamuvakire imba.
Dhavhidhi akaona kuti Jehovha akamusimbisa kuti ave mambo waIsiraeri, nokuti ushe hwake hwakanga hwakudzwa kwazvo nokuda kwavanhu vake Isiraeri.
Dhavhidhi akazvitorerazve vamwe vakadzi paJerusaremu, Dhavhidhi akabereka vamwe vanakomana navanasikana.
Zvino ndiwo mazita avana vaakanga anavo paJerusaremu: Shamua, naShobhabhi, naNatani, naSoromoni;
naIbhari, naErishua, naEripereti;
naNoga, naNefegi, naJafia;
naErishama, naBheriyadha, naErifereti.
Zvino vaFirisitia vakati vanzwa kuti Dhavhidhi azodzwa kuti ave mambo wavaIsiraeri vose, vaFirisitia vose vakakwira kundotsvaka Dhavhidhi; Dhavhidhi akazvinzwa, akabuda kuzorwa navo.
Zvino vaFirisitia vakanga vasvika, vakapararira pamupata weRefaimu.
Dhavhidhi akabvunza Jehovha, akati, Ndokwira kundorwa navaFirisitia here?
Muchavaisa mumaoko angu here?
Jehovha akati kuna Dhavhidhi, Kwira, nokuti ndichavaisa mumaoko ako.
Vakasvika paBhaariperazimi, Dhavhidhi akavaparadzapo; Dhavhidhi akati, Mwari akapwanya vavengi vangu noruoko rwangu, sokupwanya kwemvura.
Naizvozvo vakatumidza nzvimbo iyo Bhaariperazimi.
VaFirisitia vakasiya vamwari vavopo, Dhavhidhi akaraira, vakavapisa nomoto.
VaFirisitia vakapararirazve pamupata uyo.
Ipapo Dhavhidhi akabvunza Mwari zve; Mwari akati kwaari, Usandovatevera; tsauka ubve kwavari, ugovavamba pakatarisana nemiti yemibharisami.
Zvino kana uchinzwa kutinhira kwokufamba pamisoro yemiti yemibharisami, ipapo unofanira kundorwa; nokuti Mwari akutungamirira kundoparadza hondo yavaFirisitia.
Dhavhidhi akaita sezvakarairwa naMwari; vakaparadza hondo yavaFirisitia kubva paGibhiyoni kusvikira paGezeri.
Mbiri yaDhavhidhi ikabudira kunyika dzose; Jehovha akavhundusa marudzi ose pamusoro pake.
Dhavhidhi akazvivakira dzimba muguta raDhavhidhi; akagadzirira areka yaMwari nzvimbo, akaidzikira tende.
Zvino Dhavhidhi akati, Hakuna munhu anofanira kutakura areka yaMwari asi vaRevhi; nokuti ndivo vakatsaurwa naJehovha kutakura areka yaMwari, nokumushumira nokusingaperi.
Dhavhidhi akaunganidza vaIsiraeri vose paJerusaremu kuti vaise areka yaJehovha kunzvimbo yayo, yaakanga aigadzirira.
Dhavhidhi akaunganidza vanakomana vaAroni navaRevhi;
pakati pavanakomana vaKohati, Urieri mukuru, nehama dzake dzine zana namakumi maviri;
pakati pavanakomana vaMerari: Asaya mukuru, nehama dzake dzina mazana maviri namakumi maviri;
pakati pavanakomana vaGerishomi: Joeri mukuru, nehama dzake dzine zana namakumi matatu.
Pakati pavanakomana vaErizafani: Shemaya mukuru, nehama dzake dzina mazana maviri;
pakati pavanakomana vaHebhuroni: Erieri mukuru, nehama dzake dzina makumi masere;
pakati pavanakomana vaUzieri.
