Nehundi inotorwa nedutu remhepo?
Imi munoti, Mwari anochengetera vana vake zvakaipa.
Ngaamutsive iye amene, azvizive.
Meso ake amene ngaaone kuparadzwa kwake, Iye ngaanwe kutsamwa kwowaMasimbaose.
Nokuti achava nehanya yeiko neimba yake kana aenda, Kana kuwanda kwemwedzi yake kwatapudzwa.
Ndianiko angadzidzisa Mwari kuziva, Zvaari iye anotonga vari kumusoro?
Mumwe anofa achine simba rake rose, Akafara chose anorugare.
Mazamu ake azere nomukaka, Mwongo wamapfupa ake wakanyorova.
Mumwe anofa ane shungu dzomoyo, Asina kutongoravira zvakanaka.
Vanovata pasi pamwechete paguruva, Honye dzinovafukidza vose.
Tarirai ndinoziva kufunga kwenyu, Namano akaipa amunondifungira.
Nokuti munoti, Imba yomuchinda iripiko?
Tende raigarwa nowakaipa riripiko?
Hamuna kubvunza here vanofamba nenzira?
Hamuzivi zviratidzo zvavo here?
Kuti munhu wakaipa anodarikwa pazuva renjodzi here?
Kuti vanobviswa pazuva rokutsamwa here?
Ndianiko angamuzivisa mufambiro wake pachena?
Ndiani achamutsiva zvaakaita here?
Zvino anotakurirwa kuhwiro, Vanorinda rinda rake.
Mavhinga omupata achamunakira, Vanhu vose vachamutevera, Sezvaakatungamirirwa navasingaverengwi.
Zvino munondinyaradza sei nezvisina maturo, Zvamasarirwa nenhema dzoga pakupindura kwenyu?
Ipapo Erifazi muTemani akapindura, akati,
Ko munhu angabatsira Mwari here?
Zvirokwazvo, munhu, akangwara, anozvibatsira hake amene.
waMasimbaose une hanya nokururama kwako here?
Iye angabatsirwa nazvo kana iwe ukakwanisa nzira dzako here?
Iye anokuraira zvaunomutya here?
Kuti akutonge here?
Zvakaipa zvako hazvizakakura here?
Zvisina kururama zvako hazviperi.
Nokuti wakatora rubatso kuhama yako pasina Wakakusunungura nguvo dzavakanga vasina kufuka.
Hauna kupa vane nyota mvura kuti vanwe, Wakanyima vane nzara zvokudya.
Asi munhu ane simba, nyika ndeyake; Munhu anokudzwa, ndiye akagara mairi.
Akadzinga chirikadzi dzisine chinhu, Maoko enherera akavhuniwa.
Saka iwe wakapotedzwa nemisungo, Unovhunduswa pakarepo nokutya.
Nerima, kuti arege kuona, Uye mvura zhinji inokufukidza.
Ko Mwari haazi kudenga kumusoro-soro here?
Tarira kukwirira kwenyeredzi, dzakakwirira sei!
Iwe unoti, Mwari unoziveiko?
Ungagona kutonga pakati perima guru here?
Makore matema akamufukidza, haagoni kuona; Unofamba pakutenderera kwedenga.
Iwe unoda kuramba uchifamba, nenzira yekare.
Yakatsikwa navanhu vakaipa here?
Ivo vakabvutwa nguva yavo isati yasvika; Nheyo dzavo dzakadururwa sorukova rwemvura.
Ivo vakati kuna Mwari, Ibvai kwatiri; Uye, waMasimbaose angatiiteiko?
Kunyange zvakadaro wakazadza dzimba dzavo nezvakanaka; Asi mano avakaipa ari kure neni.
Vakarurama vanozviona, vakafara; Vasine mhosva vanovaseka, .
Vachiti, Zvirokwazvo vakatimukira vakaparadzwa; Zvakasara zvavo zvakapedzwa nomoto.
Shamwaridzana naye zvino, uve norugare; Ipapo uchaitirwa zvakanaka.
Gamuchira hako murairo womuromo wake, Uchengete mashoko ake mumoyo mako.
Kana ukadzokera kuno waMasimbaose, uchavakwa; Kana ukabvisa zvisakarurama kure namatende ako.
Isa fuma yako paguruva, Nendarama yeOfiri pakati pamabwe ehova;
Ipapo waMasimbaose achava fuma yako, Nesirivha inokosha kwazvo kwauri.
Nokuti ipapo uchafarira waMasimbaose, Uchasimudzira chiso chako kuna Mwari.
Uchanyengetera kwaari, iye achakunzwa; Uye acharipa mhiko dzako.
Uchatemawo chirevo, chikasimbiswa kwauri; Uye chiedza chichavhenekera nzira dzako.
Kana vakakusundira pasi, uchati, Ndichasimudzwa; Iye uchaponesa munhu anozvininipisa.
Iye acharwira nyangwe nomunhu ane mhaka, Zvirokwazvo ucharwirwa iye nokuchena kwamaoko ako.
Ipapo Jobho akapindura, akati,
Kunyange nanhasi ndinonyunyuta ndine shungu; Kurohwa kwangu kwakanyanya kukunda kugomera kwangu.
Haiwa!
Dai ndaiziva kwandingamuwana, Kuti ndisvike ipo pachigaro chake.
Ndairondedzera mhaka yangu pamberi pake, Ndaizadza muromo wangu nenharo.
Ndaiziva mashoko aanopindura nawo, Ndainzwisisa zvaanondiudza.
Angaita nharo neni nesimba rake guru here?
Kwete; asi anganditeerera hake.
Apo akarurama angataurirana naye; Kuti ndisunungurwe nokusingaperi pamutongi wangu.
Tarira, ndinopfuura mberi, asi haapo; Uuye shure, asi handimuoni;
Nokuruoko rworuboshwe, kana achibata, asi handigoni kumuona; Anozvivanza paruoko rworudyi, kuti ndirege kumuona.
Nokuti iye anoziva nzira yandinofamba nayo; Kana akandiidza, ndichabuda ndakaita sendarama.
Rutsoka rwangu rwakaramba ruchitsika paakatsika iye; Ndakarambira panzira yake, handina kutsauka.
Handina kudzoka pamurairo wemiromo yake; Ndakachengeta sefuma mashoko omuromo wake kupfuura mugove wezvokudya zvangu.
Asi iye anorangarira chinhu chimwe, ndianiko angamudzora?
Zvinoda moyo wake, ndizvo zvaanoita.
Nokuti anoita zvandakatemerwa; Nezvinhu zvizhinji zvakadai zviri kwaari.
Saka ndinotambudzika pamberi pake; Kana ndichimufunga ndinomutya.
Nokuti Mwari akatorera moyo wangu simba, waMasimbaose akandivhundusa.
Nokuti handina kuparadzwa nokuda kwerima, Kana nokuda kwerima guru rakafukidza chiso changu.
WaMasimbaose anoregereiko kutara nguva dzokutonga?
Vanomuziva vanoregereiko kuona mazuva ake?
Vanoshandura miganho varipo; Vanopamba mapoka amakwai, vachiafudza.
Vanotinha mbongoro yenherera, Vanotora nzombe yechirikadzi vachiita rubatso.
Vanodzinga varombo panzira; Varombo venyika vanovanda vose.
Tarira, sembizi murenje Vanobudira kumabasa avo, vachishingairira zvokwadi; Renje rinovapa zvokudya zvavana vavo.
Vanocheka zvavanodya kusango; Vanounganidza mazambiringa avakaipa.
Vanovata usiku hwose vasina zvavakafuka, Pachando havana chavangazvifukidza nacho.
Vakanyorova nokupfunha kwemvura yamakomo, Vanombundikira dombo nokushaiwa pokutizira.
Varipo vanobvuta nherera pazamu ramai, Nokutora rubatso rwavarombo;
Naizvozvo vanofamba vasina zvavakafuka, Vanotakura zvisote vane nzara;
Vanosvina mafuta mukati mamasvingo avanhu ava; Vanotsika zvisviniro zvamazambiringa avo, vachifa nenyota.
Vanhu vanogomera mukati meguta rina vanhu vazhinji, Uye mweya yavakakuvadzwa inochema; Kunyange zvakadaro Mwari haane hanya nezvisina kururama.
Ndivo vanovenga chiedza; Havazivi nzira dzacho, Havarambi vachifamba pamakwara acho.
Muurayi anomuka kana kwoedza, anouraya murombo neanoshaiwa; Usiku wakafanana nomubi.
Ziso remhombwewo rinomirira rubvunzavaeni, Achiti, Hakune ziso richandiona; Ndokufukidza chiso chake.
Usiku vanopaza dzimba; Masikati vanozvipfigira; Havazivi chiedza.
Nokuti mangwanani akaita serima guru kwavari vose; Nokuti vanoziva kutyisa kwerima guru.
Iye anofambisa pamusoro pemvura; Mugove wavo wakatukwa panyika; Haachafambi nenzira yeminda yemizambiringa.
Kuoma nokupisa kunopedza mvura yechando; Ndizvo zvinoita Sheori navakatadza.
Chizvaro chichamukanganwa; honye dzichatapirirwa Uye kusarurama kuchavhunwa somuti.
Iye unoparadza hana isingabereki; Haaitiri chirikadzi zvakanaka.
Anobvisa vane simba nesimba rake; Kana iye achisimuka, hakuna munhu anoziva kana achararama.
Mwari anovagarisa vakachengetwa, vachivimba nazvo; Asi meso ake anotarira nzira dzavo.
Vanokudzwa; gare-gare vaenda; Vanodukupiswa, vanobviswa panzira savamwe vose, Vanochekwa semisoro yehura dzezviyo.
Kana zvisina kudaro zvino, ndiani angati ndine nhema, Nokushaisa mashoko angu simba here?
Ipapo Bhiridhadhi muShuhi akapindura, akati,
Umambo nokutyisa zvinaye; Iye unoyananisa pamatunhu ake akakwirira.
Hondo dzake dzingaverengwa here?
Ndianiko asingavhenekerwi nechiedza chake?
Zvino munhu angava akarurama seiko pamberi paMwari?
Nomunhu akazvarwa nomukadzi angava akachena sei?
Tarira, nomwedziwo unoshaiwa kubhinya, Nenyeredzi hadzizakachena kwazvo pamberi pake.
Ndoda munhu, iro gonye! noMwanakomana womunhu, iro gonye!
Ipapo Jobho akapindura, akati, kwaari
Iwe wakabatsira sei asine simba!
Wakaponesa sei ruoko rusine simba!
Wakapa mano sei asina kungwara, Nokududzira kwazvo zivo yazvokwadi!
Wakataurira aniko mashoko awa?
Mweya wakabuda kwauri ndowaaniko?
Vakafa vanodedera Pasi pemvura navagere mukati mayo.
Sheori rakashama pamberi pake, Kuparadza hakune chifukidzo.
Anotatamura rutivi rwokumusoro pasine chiro, Anoturikira nyika pasine chinhu.
Anosungira mvura mumakore ake makobvu; Asi gore haribvaruki nokurema kwayo.
Anofukidza chigaro chake choushe, chirege kuonekwa,
Akatara muganho pamusoro pemvura, Kusvikira pakuparadzana kwechiedza nerima.
Mbiru dzedenga dzinodedera, Nokuvhunduka nokutuka kwake.
Anomutsa gungwa nesimba rake, Nenjere dzake anoparadza Rahabhi.
Denga rinoshongedzwa nomweya wake; Ruoko rwake rwakabaya nyoka inokurumidza.
Tarira, izvi ndiwo mudzivo woga wenzira dzake; Haiwa, tinongonzwa zeve-zeve roga renzwi rake!
Asi kutinhira kwesimba rake ndianiko angakunzwisisa?
Ipapo Jobho akapfuura nokutaura kwake, akati,
NaMwari mupenyu, iye akanditorera kururama kwangu; NowaMasimbaose akatambudza mweya wangu;
(Nokuti upenyu hwangu huchiri mandiri chose, Nomweya waMwari uchiri mumhino dzangu;)
Zvirokwazvo miromo yangu haingatauri zvisakarurama, Uye rurimi rwangu harungarevi zvinonyengera.
Mwari ngaandidzivise ndirege kukururamisirai; Kusvikira parufu rwangu handingarashi kusanyengera kwangu.
Ndinobatisa kururama kwangu, handingakuregi; moyo wangu haungandipi mhaka ndichiri mupenyu.
Muvengi wangu ngaaite sewakaipa.
Uye anondimukira ngaaite seasina kururama.
Nokuti asingadi Mwari ane tariro yeiko, kunyange azviwanira fuma, Kana atorerwa mweya wake naMwari here?
Ko Mwari achanzwa kuchema kwake, Kana achiwirwa nenjodzi here?
Ko iye achafarira waMasimbaose, Nokudana kuna Mwari nguva dzose here?
Ini ndichakudzidzisai zvoruoko rwaMwari; Izvo zvina waMasimbaose handingazvivanzi.
Tarirai imi mose makazviona henyu; Zvino makagova vanhu vasina maturo chose neiko?
Ndiwo mugove unopiwa munhu akaipa naMwari, Nemhaka yavamanikidzi, yavanopiwa nowaMasimbaose.
Kana vana vake vachiwanda, vourawa nomunondo; Vana vake havangaguti zvokudya.
Vana vake, vakasara, vachavigwa vafa, Chirikadzi dzake hadzingachemi.
Kunyange akaunganidza sirivha ikaita seguruva, Nokugadzira zvokufuka zvikaita sevhu;
Angazvigadzira hake iye, asi akarurama ndiye achazvifuka; Asine mhosva ndiye achagovera sirivha.
Anovaka imba yake sechivhundudzi, Sechirindo chinoitwa nomurindi.
Anovata pasi akafuma, asi haapamhidzizve; Anosvinudza meso ake, asi haachipo.
Zvinotyisa zvinomubata semvura zhinji; dutu remhepo rinomubvuta usiku.
Mhepo inobva mabvazuva inomutora ndokuenda hake; Inomutsvaira panzvimbo yake.
Mwari achamuposha, asingamunzwiri tsitsi, Unoidza kutiza paruoko rwake.
Vanhu vacharovana maoko pamusoro pake, Vachamuridzira muridzo abve panzvimbo yake.
Nokuti mugodhi uripo panobva sirivha, Nzvimbo iripo pavanonatsa ndarama.
Mhangura inocherwa pasi, Nendarira inonyauswa pabwe.
Munhu anokunda rima, Anotsvakisisa kusvikira kumativi ose-ose.
Mabwe ari murima guru nomumumvuri worufu.
Anochera mugodhi kure napanogara vanhu; Vanokanganikwa norutsoka rwavanopfuura; Vanorembera kure navanhu, vachizeya uku nokuku.
Kana iri nyika, zvokudya zvinobva mairi; Pasi pazvo pakashandurwa zvinenge nomoto.
Pamabwe ayo ndipo panogara zvibwe zesafiro, Ano upfu hwendarama.
Nzira iyo haizikanwi negondo, Ziso rorukodzi harina kuiona;
Zvikara, zvinozvikudza, hazvina kupfuura napo.
Shumba, ine hasha, haina kupfuura napo.
Iye anotema dombo romusarasara noruoko rwake; Anoshandukura makomo nemidzi yawo.
Anochera mugero pamatombo; Ziso rake rinoona zvinokosha.
Anodzivira nzizi dzemvura dzirege kudonha; Chinhu chakavanzika anochibudisa pachena.
Asi uchenjeri huchawanikwepiko?
Kunzwisisa kunogarepi?
Munhu haazivi mutengo wahwo; Hauwanikwi panyika yavapenyu.
Pakadzika panoti, Hauzi mandiri; Negungwa rinoti, Hauzi mandiri.
Haungatengwi nendarama, Nyangwe nesirivha haingaidzirwi mutengo wawo.
Haungaenzaniswi nendarama yeOfiri, Kana nezvibwe zveonikisi inokosha kana zvesafiro.
Ndarama negirazi hazvingaenzani nahwo; Zvishongo zvendarama yakaisvonaka hazvingatsinhaniswi nahwo.
Korari nemapere hazvingatongorebwi; Zvirokwazvo mutengo wouchenjeri unopfuura matombo akatsvuka.
Topazi yeItiopia haingaenzani nahwo, Haungaenzaniswi nendarama yakaisvonaka.
Zvino huchenjeri unobvepiko?
Kunzwisisa kunogarepi?
Zvahwakavanzirwa meso avapenyu vose, Nokudzitirirwa shiri dzokudenga.
Kuparadza noRufu zvinoti, Takanzwa guhu rahwo panzeve dzedu.
Mwari anonzwisisa nzira yahwo, Ndiye anoziva kwahunobva.
Nokuti anotarira kumigumo yenyika, anoona, zvose pasi pokudenga pose;
Panguva yaanotarira mhepo kurema kwayo; Zvirokwazvo, anoyera mvura nechiyero
Panguva yaakatemera mvura chirevo, Nemheni yomutinhiro nzira yayo.
Panguva iyo akahuona, akahududzira; Akahusimbisa, nokuhunzvera.
Akaudza munhu achiti, Tarira, kutya Ishe, ndihwo uchenjeri.
Kurega zvakaipa ndiko kunzwisisa.
Zvino Jobho akapfuurazve namashoko ake, akati,
Haiwa, dai ndaiita hangu sapamwedzi yakare, Sapamazuva andairindwa naMwari;
Panguva iyo mwenje wake waivhenekera pamusoro wangu, Ndaifamba ndichivhenekerwa parima nechiedza chake;
Sezvandakanga ndakaita pamazuva okusimba kwangu, Panguva iyo hushamwari hwaMwari huchiri patende rangu;
Panguva iyo waMasimbaose achiri neni, Navana vangu vachakandipoteredza;
Panguva iyo pandaitsika paisukwa nomukaka wakafa, Uye dombo raindidururira nzizi dzamafuta!
Panguva yandaibuda kusuo reguta, Panguva yandaigadzira chigaro changu padare,
Majaya akati achindiona aivanda, Navatana vaisimuka vakaramba vamire;
Machinda ainyarara pakutaura kwawo, Aifumbira miromo yawo;
manzwi avakuru ainyarara, Ndimi dzavo dzainamatira mumikanwa yavo.
Nokuti nzeve yakati ichindinzwa, ndokundiropafadza; Ziso rakati richindiona, ndokundipupurira zvakanaka.
Nokuti ndairwira varombo vaichema, Nenhererawo, nowaishaiwa mubatsiri.
Aikarofa aindiropafadza; Ndaiimbisa moyo wechirikadzi nomufaro.
Ini ndaifuka kururama, naiko kwaindifukidza; Kururama kwangu kwaiva senguvo nekorona.
Ndaiva meso amapofu, Netsoka dzavanokamhina.
Ndaiva baba vavaishaiwa; Ndainzvera mhaka yowandakanga ndisingazivi.
Ndaivhuna meno avasina kururama, Nokubvuta chaakanga auraya mumeno ake.
Panguva iyo ndakati, Ndichafira mudendere rangu, Ndichawanza mazuva angu aite sejecha,
Mudzi wangu wakatandavarira kusvikira kumvura, Dova rinovata usiku hwose padavi rangu.
Kukudzwa kwangu kunoramba kuri kutsva, Uta hwangu hunoramba uchivandudzwa muruoko rwangu.
Vanhu vainditeerera nokundimirira, Vainyarara kana ndichivaraira.
Havazaitaurazve kana ini ndareva mashoko angu; Kutaura kwangu kwakadonhera pamusoro pavo.
Vaindimirira somunhu anomirira mvura; Vaishamisa miromo yavo sevanoshamira mvura yokupedzisira.
Ndaivasekerera kana vasingatsungi; Havana kudzima chiedza chechiso changu.
Ndaivasanangurira nzira yavo, ndikagara sashe wavo, Ndaigara samambo pahondo, Somunhu anonyaradza vanochema.
Asi zvino vaduku kwandiri vanondiseka, Ivo vandaishovora kuisa madzibaba avo pambwa dzamapoka angu.
Simba ramaoko avo ringandibatsireiko?
Ivo vakapererwa nesimba kwazvo.
Vaonda nokushaiwa nenzara; Vanotetena ivhu rakaoma murima ramatangwaza nokuparadzwa.
Vanotanha zvinovava pamakwenzi; Midzi yomurara ndizvo zvokudya zvavo.
Vanodzingwa pakati pavanhu; Vanovashoverera sembavha.
Vanofanira kugara pamipata yakasviba, Pamakomba enyika namatombo.
Vanorira pakati pamakwenzi; Vanounganira pasi porukato.
Ndivo vana vamapenzi, zvirokwazvo vana vavanhu vakaipa; Vakadzingwa panyika vachirohwa.
Zvino ndava chiimbo chavo, Ndava shumo yavo.
Vanondisema, vanomira kure neni, Havaregi kupfira mate pachiso changu.
Nokuti iye akasunungura rukungiso rwake akanditambudza; Vakarasha tomu pamberi pangu.
Vasina maturo vanosimuka kurudyi rwangu; Vanosundira makumbo angu, Vanozvigadzirira nzira dzavo kundiparadza.
Vanoparadza nzira yangu, Vanowedzera njodzi yangu, Ivo vanhu vasina mubatsiri.
Vanouya vakafanana navanopinda pakakoromoka pakuru; Vanomhanyira kwandiri pakati pamasvingo akakoromoka.
Zvinotyisa zvandivinga, Vanodzinga kukudzwa kwangu semhepo; Kufara kwangu kwapfuura segore.
Zvino mweya wangu wadururwa mukati mangu; Mazuva enjodzi andibata.
Panguva yousiku mapfupa angu anoururwa mukati mangu, Uye zvinondibaya hazvizorori.
Nesimba rake guru nguvo yangu yachinyikara; Rinondisunga sehuro dzejasi rangu.
Iye akandiwisira mumatope, Ndava seguruva nedota.
Ndinochema kwamuri, asi hamundidaviri; Ndimire, asi munongonditarira.
Mashanduka hamune tsitsi neni; Munonditambudza nesimba roruoko rwenyu.
Munondisimudza nemhepo, munonditasvisa pamusoro payo; Munondinyangarisa mudutu remhepo.
Nokuti ndinoziva kuti muchandiisa kurufu, Nokuimba yakatarirwa vapenyu vose.
Ko munhu, anonyura, haangatambanudzi ruoko here; Pakutambudzika kwake haangaridzi mhere here?
Ko handina kuchema akanga ari panjodzi here?
Mweya wangu wakanga usine shungu pamusoro powaishaiwa here?
Ndakati ndichitarira zvakanaka zvakaipa zvikasvika, Ndakati ndichimirira chiedza, rima ndokusvika.
Ura hwangu hunovira, hauzorori; Mazuva okutambudzika andivinga.
Ndinochema ndisina mushana; Ndinosimuka pakati peungano, ndichichema kubatsirwa.
Ndava hama yamakava, Neshamwari yemhou shiri.
Ganda rangu rasviba, rinokwatuka kwandiri; Mapfupa angu atsva nokupisa.
Naizvozvo mbira dzangu dzashanduka kuchema, Uye nyere yangu rava inzwi ravanochema misodzi.
Ndakaita sungano nameso angu, Zvino ndingatarira musikana seiko?
Nokuti mugove waMwari unobva kumusoro ndoweiko, Nemhaka yowaMasimbaose inobva kudenga ndeyeiko?
Ko haizi njodzi kuna vasina kururama here, Nokuparadzwa kuna vaiti vezvakaipa here?
Ko iye haaoni nzira dzangu, Nokuverenga nhambwe dzangu dzose here?
Kana ndichinge ndafamba nenzira isina maturo, Norutsoka rwangu rwamhanyira zvinonyengera;
(Ngandiidzwe pachiyero chakarurama, Kuti Mwari azive kusanyengera kwangu;)
Kana kutsika kwangu kuchinge kwatsauka panzira, Nomoyo wangu ukatevera meso angu, Kana gwapa richinge ranamatira pamaoko angu;
Ipapo ini ndidzvare hangu, asi mumwe ngaadye; Zvibereko zvomunda wangu ngazvidzurwe.
Kana moyo wangu uchinge wanyengerwa nomukadzi, kana ndavandira pamukova wowandaigara naye;
Ipapo mukadzi wangu ngaakuyire mumwe, Navamwe ngavakotamire pamusoro pake.
Nokuti chinhu icho chivi chakashata, Zvirokwazvo, chinhu chakaipa chinofanira kurohwa navatongi.
Nokuti ndiwo moto unopedza kusvikira pakuparadza, Ungadzura zvibereko zvangu zvose.
Kana ndichinge ndazvidza mhaka yomuranda wangu kana murandakadzi wangu, Panguva yavakaita nharo neni;
Ndichaiteiko kana Mwari akasimuka?
Kana akandivinga, ndingapindurei kwaari?
Akandiita mudumbu ramai haazi iye akamuitawo here?
Ko haazi mumwe akatiumba isu tose mudumbu ramai here?
Kana ndichinge ndanyima varombo zvavakakumbira, Kana kushaisa meso echirikadzi;
Kana ndichinge ndadya chimedu changu ndiri ndoga, Nherera ikasadyawo;
(Kwete, kubva paujaya hwangu yakakurira kwandiri ndikaita sababa vayo, Ndaiva muperekedzi wayo kubva padumbu ramai vangu;)
Kana ndichinge ndaona munhu achiparara nokushaiwa nguvo, Kana anoshaiwa asina chokufuka;
Kana chiuno chake chisina kundivonga, Kana asina kudziyirwa nemvere dzamakwai angu;
Kana ndichinge ndasimudzira nherera ruoko rwangu, Nokuti ndakaona kuti ndichabatsirwa pasuo;
Ipapo fudzi rangu ngaribve pabendekete, Ruoko rwangu ngaruvhunike papfupa.
Nokuti njodzi inobva kuna Mwari yakandityisa, Ndakakoniwa kuita chinhu nokuda kwoumambo hwake.
Kana ndichinge ndavimba nendarama ikava tariro yangu Ndikati kundarama yakaisvonaka, Ndinovimba newe.
Kana ndichinge ndakafara nokuti fuma yangu yakanga yawanda, Uye nokuti ruoko rwangu rwakanga rwawana zvizhinji;
Kana ndichinge ndaona kubwinya kwezuva, Kana mwedzi uchifamba wakachena;
moyo wangu ukanyengerwa pakavanda, Muromo wangu ukatsvoda ruoko rwangu;
Nechinhu ichowo chaiva chaipa chinofanira kurohwa navatongi; Nokuti ndinenge ndaramba Mwari ari kumusoro.
Kana ndichinge ndafarira kuparadzwa kwomuvengi wangu, Kana kuzvikudza panguva yaakavingwa nezvakaipa;
(Zvirokwazvo handina kutendera muromo wangu kutadza, Ndichikumbira nokupanjira kuti afe;)
Kana vanhu vetende rangu vasina kutaura, vachiti, Ndianiko angawana munhu usina kugutiswa nenyama yake?
Mweni haana kuvata vusiku panzira dzomumusha; Asi ndaizarurira mufambi mikova yangu;
dai ndaifukidza kudarika kwangu saAdhama, Ndichivanza zvakaipa zvangu pachipfuva changu;
Zvandaitya vanhu vazhinji, Ndikavhunduswa nokushorwa namapoka avanhu, Ndikanyarara, ndikasabuda pamukova,
Haiwa, dai ndaiva nomunhu anondinzwa!
(Tarirai, ndirwo runyoro rwangu, waMasimbaose ngaandipindure;) dai ndaiva norugwaro rwakanyorwa nomudzivisi wangu!
Zvirokwazvo, ndairutakura pafudzi rangu; Ndairudzika pamusoro wangu sekorona.
Ndaimududzira kuwanda kwenhambwe dzangu; Ndaiswedera kwaari somuchinda.
Kana munda wangu ukadanidzira kwandiri, uchindipa mhosva, Nemihoronga yawo ikachema yose;
Kana ndichinge ndadya zvibereko zvawo ndisina kutenga, Kana ndichinge ndarashisa varidzi vawo upenyu hwavo;
Ipapo hutumbambeva ngahumerepo panzvimbo yezviyo, Nesora panzvimbo yebhari.
Mashoko aJobho apera.
Zvino varume ava vatatu vakarega kupindura Jobho, nokuti akati ndakarurama hangu.
Ipapo Erihu mwanakomana waBharakeri muBhuzi, weimba yaRami, akatsamwa kwazvo; akatsamwira Jobho kwazvo, nokuti akanga azviruramisa kupfuura Mwari.
Akatsamwirawo kwazvo shamwari dzake nhatu, nokuti vakanga vashaiwa mhinduro, kunyange zvakadaro vakanga vapa havo Jobho mhosva.
Zvino Erihu akanga amirira kutaura naJobho, nokuti ivo vaiva vakuru kwaari pazero.
Zvino Erihu akati achiona kuti hapene mhinduro pamiromo yavanhu ava vatatu, iye akatsamwa kwazvo.
Makore mazhinji haauyisi uchenjeri, asi Mweya waMwari
Zvino Erihu mwanakomana waBharakeri muBhuzi wakapindura, akati, Ini ndiri muduku, asi imi mava vakuru kwazvo; Saka ndakazvidzora hangu, ndikatya kukuzivisai kufunga kwangu.
Ndakati, Vana mazuva mazhinji ngavataure havo, Vana makore mazhinji ngavadzidzise vamwe uchenjeri.
Asi mweya uripo pamunhu, Kufuridzira kwowaMasimbaose kunovapa kunzwisisa.
Havazi vakuru vakachenjera, Kana vatana vanonzwisisa kururamisira.
Saka ndakati, Chindinzwai; Neniwo ndichakuzivisai kufunga kwangu.
Tarirai, ndakambomirira mashoko Ndakateerera kuti ndinzwe nharo dzenyu, Nguva yamakatsvaka zvamungataura.
Zvirokwazvo, ndakakucherekedzai, Asi tarirai, hakuna munhu akapwisa Jobho.
Kana akapindura mashoko ake pakati penyu.
Chenjerai, murege kuti, Takawana huchenjeri; Mwari ndiye angamukunda, asi munhu kwete;
Nokuti haana kutaura mashoko ake kwandiri; Neni handingamupinduri iye nokutaura kwenyu.
Vashamiswa, havachapinduri; Havachine shoko ravangataura.
Ko ini ndingamirira, zvavasingatauri ivo, Zvavanoramba vamire, vasina chavangapindura here?
Neniwo ndichapindura padzoro rangu, Neniwo ndichazivisa kufunga kwangu.
Nokuti ndizere namashoko; Mweya, uri mukati mangu, unondimanikidza.
Tarirai, mukati mangu makafanana newaini isina pokubuda napo; Zvakafanana nehombodo itsva dzinokaroparuka.
Ndichataura, kuti ndiremudzwe, Ndichashamisa miromo yangu ndipindure.
Ndirege hangu kutsaura munhu upi noupi; Uye handingatumidzi ani nani mazita anobata kumeso.
Nokuti handizivi kutumidza mazita anobata kumeso; Zvimwe Muiti wangu angakurumidza kundibvisa.
Asi Jobho, chidonzwai henyu kutaura kwangu, Teererai mashoko angu ose.
Tarirai zvino, ndashamisa muromo wangu, Rurimi rwangu rwataura mumuromo wangu,
Mashoko angu achadudzira kururama kwomoyo wangu; Miromo yangu ichataura izvo zvainoziva nezvokwadi.
Mweya waMwari wakandiita, Kufuridzira kwowaMasimbaose kunondipa upenyu.
Kana mukagona, chindipindurai henyu; Gadzirai mashoko enyu pamberi pangu, simukai henyu.
Rairai, ini ndakafanana nemi pamberi paMwari; Neniwo ndakaumbwa nevhu.
Tarirai, kutyisa kwangu hakungakutyisiyi imi, Uye handingakuremedziyi.
Zvirokwazvo, makataura ini ndichizvinzwa, Ndakanzwa inzwi ramashoko enyu, richiti,
Ndakanaka, handina kudarika; Handine mhosva, hapana zvakaipa mukati mangu;
Tarirai, iye unowana mhosva kuti arwe neni, Anonditi muvengi wake.
Anomana makumbo angu mumatanda, Anocherekedza nzira dzangu dzose.
Tarirai, ndichakupindurai, pachinhu ichi hamuna kururama, Nokuti Mwari mukuru kupfuura munhu.
Munorwireiko naye?
Nokuti haazvidaviriri pamashoko ake ose.
Nokuti Mwari anotaura kamwechete, Kana kaviri, asi munhu haane hanya nazvo.
Pakurota, kana pane zvinoonekwa usiku, Kana munhu abatwa nehope kwazvo, Kana avete panhovo;
Ipapo unodziura nzeve dzavanhu, Nokusimbisa kurairwa kwavo,
Kuti adzore munhu pakuvavarira zvakaipa, Nokuvanzira munhu kuzvikudza;
Kuti adzore mweya wake pagomba.
Upenyu hwake hurege kuparadzwa nomunondo.
Unorangwawo achirwadziwa panhovo yake, Nokutambudzika nguva dzose mumapfupa ake;
Naizvozvo hupenyu hwake hunosema zvokudya, Nomoyo wake zvokudya zvinonaka.
Nyama yake inopedzwa, haichaonekwi, Mapfupa ake, akanga asingaonekwi, anobudira kunze.
Zvirokwazvo mweya wake unoswedera kugomba, Nohupenyu hwake kuvaparadzi.
Kana mutumwa akasvika kwaari, Ari mushanduri, mumwe pakati pavane zviuru zvamazana, Kuti aratidze munhu nzira yakarurama;
Mwari akamunzwira tsitsi, akati, Murwirei arege kuburukira kugomba, Ndawana dzikunuro.
Nyama yake ichava itsva kupfuura yomwana; Achadzokera kumazuva ouduku hwake.
Anonyengetera kuna Mwari, iye achimufarira; Naizvozvo anotarira chiso chake nomufaro; Akadzosera munhu kururama kwake.
Uchaimba pamberi pavanhu, achiti, Ndatadza, ndakanganisa zvakarurama, Asi hazvina kundibatsira;
Iye akarwira mweya wangu urege kuburukira kugomba, Hupenyu hwangu huchaona chiedza.
Tarirai, Mwari unoita zvinhu izvi zvose, Kaviri kana katatu nomunhu,
Kuti adzose mweya wake pagomba, Kuti avhenekerwe nechiedza chavapenyu.
Cherekedzai zvakanaka, Jobho, mundinzwei; Nyararai, ini nditaure.
Kana mune shoko rokureva, ndipindur ei, Taurai, nokuti ndinoda kukururamisirai.
Kana musingadi, nditeererei; Nyararai, ini ndikudzidzisei huchenjeri.
Ipapo Erihu akapindura, akati,
Inzwai mashoko angu, imi vanhu vakachenjera; Rerekai nzeve dzenyu kwandiri, imi mune zivo.
Nokuti nzeve ndiyo inoidza mashoko, Sezvinoravira mukanwa zvokudya.
Ngatizvitsanangurire zvakarurama; Ngatizive tose kuti zvakanaka ndezvipi.
Nokuti Jobho akati, Ndakarurama, Asi Mwari akanditorera kururama kwangu;
Kunyange ndakarurama hangu, ndinonzi ndine nhema; Pandakakuvadzwa hapangapori, kunyange ndisina kudarika.
Ndianiko akafanana naJobho, Anonwa kushorwa semvura?
Anofambidzana navanoita zvakaipa, Anofamba navanhu vakashata.
Nokuti iye akati, Munhu haatongobatsirwi, Kana achifarira Mwari.
Saka chindinzwai, imi varume venjere, Mwari haangatongoiti zvisakarurama; waMasimbaose haangatongoiti zvakaipa.
Nokuti acharipira munhu sezvaakabata, Achapa mumwe nomumwe sezvaakafanirwa.
Zvirokwazvo, Mwari haangaiti zvakaipa, waMasimbaose haangakanganisi pakutonga.
Ndianiko akamuita murairi wenyika?
Ndianiko akamupa nyika yose?
Kana akadzosera moyo wake kwaari, Kana akadzosera kwaari mweya wake nokufema kwake;
papo vanhu vose vachaparara pamwechete, Munhu akadzokerazve kuguruva.
Zvino kana mukagona kunzwisisa, inzwai shoko iri, Teererai inzwi ramashoko angu.
Ko munhu, anovenga zvakarurama, angabata ushe here?
Mungapa mhosva munhu akarurama, ane simba here?
Ko zvakanaka kuti kuna mambo, Makashata?
Kana kuvakuru, Muri vakaipa here?
Ndoda kumunhu asingakudzi machinda, Asingatsauri vafumi kupfuura varombo.
Nokuti ivo vose ndiro basa ramaoko ake.
Vanofa kamwe-kamwe pakati pousiku; Vanhu vanozozununguswa ndokuparara havo, Vane simba vanobviswa zvingaitwa noruoko.
Nokuti meso ake anotarira nzira dzomunhu, Unoona kufamba kwake kwose.
Hapana rima kana mumvuri worufu, Pangavanda vanoita zvakaipa.
Nokuti haachafaniri kurangarira munhu, Kuti atongwe pamberi paMwari.
Anoparadza vanhu vane simba asinganzveri, Ndokugadza vamwe panzvimbo yavo.
Saka anocherekedza mabasa avo; Unovaparadza usiku, vakapwanyiwa.
Anovarova sezvinorohwa vanhu vakaipa Vamwe vose vachizviona pachena;
Nokuti vakatsauka pakumutevera, Vakasava nehanya nenzira dzake dzose;
Naizvozvo vakasvitsa kuchema kwavarombo kwaari, Akanzwa kuchema kwavakatambudzwa.
Kana iye akazorodza, ndianiko ungapa mhosva?
Kana akavanza chiso chake, ndianiko angazomuona?
Kana zvichitarirwa rudzi kana munhu mumwe, zvakafanana hazvo;
Kuti munhu asakarurama arege kubata ushe, Kuti kurege kuva nomunhu achateya vanhu.
Nokuti kunomunhu here akati kuna Mwari, Ndarangwa hangu, kunyange ndisina kutadza?
Ndidzidzisei zvandisingaoni; Kana ndichinge ndaita zvakaipa, handingazviitizve?
Ko iye achatsiva sezvaunoda iwe, zvaunozviramba here?
Nokuti ndiwe unofanira kutsanangura, handizini; Saka chitaura zvaunoziva.
Vanhu vane njere vachati kwandiri, Uye vose vakachenjera, vanondinzwa, vachati,
Jobho anotaura zvaasingazivi, Mashoko ake haano uchenjeri.
Dai Jobho aiidzwa kusvikira pakupedzisira, Zvaakapindura savanhu vakaipa.
Nokuti anowedzera kumukira Mwari pazvivi zvake, Anorova namaoko ake pakati pedu, Achiwanza mashoko ake anorwa naMwari.
Zvino Erihu akapindurawo, akati,
Munoti ndiko kururama kwenyu here.
Munoti, kururama kwangu kunopfuura kwaMwari?
Zvamunoti, Muchabatsirweiko nazvo?
Ndichawaneiko, zvingapfuura zvandingawana kana ndatadza hangu?
Ndichakupindurai, Pamwechete neshamwari dzenyu.
Tarirai kudenga-denga, muone; Tarirai makore okudenga akakwirira kupfuura imi.
Kana muchinge matadza, ko mungamuitei iye?
Kana kudarika kwenyu kuchinge kwakawanda, ko mungamuitei?
Kana makarurama, mungamupeiko?
Kana iye uchapiweiko paruoko rwenyu?
Kuipa kwenyu kungatadzira munhu akaita semi, Kururama kwenyu kungabatsira mwanakomana womunhu.
Vanhu vanoridza mhere nokuda kwokumanikidza kwakawanda; Vanoridza mhere kuti varwirwe paruoko rwoane simba.
Asi hapana anoti, Mwari Muiti wangu aripiko?
Iye anotiimbisa usiku;
Iye anotidzidzisa kupfuura shiri dzokudenga?
Anotiita vakachenjera kupfuura shiri dzokudenga?
Ipapo vanochema, asi hapana anopindura, Nokuda kwokuzvikudza kwavanhu vakaipa.
Zvirokwazvo Mwari haanganzwi zvisina maturo, waMasimbaose haangavi nehanya nazvo.
Ndoda kana muchiti, handimuoni; Mhosva iri pamberi pake, chimumirirai henyu!
Asi zvino, zvaasina kutsiva pakutsamwa kwake, Kana kusava nehanya zvikuru nokuzvikudza;
Naizvozvo Jobho woshamisa muromo wake achireva zvisina maturo; Wowanza mashoko asingazivi.
Erihu akapfuurawo, akati,
Nditenderei henyu zvishoma, ndikuratidzei; Nokuti ndichine zvimwe zvandinoda kutaura pamusoro paMwari.
Ndichatora zivo yangu kure, Ndicharatidza kuti Muiti wangu akarurama.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo, mashoko angu haane nhema; Mumwe akakwana pazivo unemi.
Tarirai, Mwari ane simba, asi haashori munhu; Imhare pasimba renjere.
Haachengeti upenyu hwavakaipa; Asi anoruramisira vanotambudzika.
Haaregi kutarira vakarurama nameso ake; Asi anovagarisa pachigaro choushe pamwechete namadzimambo, Anovagarisa nokusingaperi, vachikudzwa.
Asi kana vachinge vasungwa namaketani, Kana kubatwa namabote okutambudzika;
Ipapo unovazivisa mabasa avo, Nokudarika kwavo, kuti vakafamba vachizvikudza.
Unodziurawo nzeve dzavo vanzwe kuraira kwake, Unovaraira kuti vadzoke pazvakaipa zvavo.
Kana vakamunzwa nokumushumira, Vachapedzisa mazuva avo vachifara, Namakore avo vari pane zvinofadza.
Asi kana vakaramba kuteerera, vachapera nomunondo, Vachafa vasina zivo.
Asi vasingadi Mwari pamoyo vanozviunganidzira kutsamwa; Havaridzi mhere kuti vabatsirwe kana achivasunga.
Vanofa vachiri vaduku, Hupenyu hwavo hunopera sohwavasina kururama.
Anorwira anotambudzika pakutambudzika kwake, Unodziura nzeve dzavo pakumanikidzwa kwavo.
Zvirokwazvo, akanga achida kukubvisai panjodzi Kukusvitsai panzvimbo yakafara, pasina kumanikana; Kuti zvinoiswa patafura yenyu zvive zvizere namafuta.
Asi imi muzere nokutonga vakaipa; Kutonga nokururamisira zvinokubatai.
Nokuti chenjerai kuti kutsamwa kurege kukusvitsai pakudadira; ukuru hwedzikunuro hurege kukutsausai.
Ko fuma yenyu ingaringana, kuti murege kutambudzika here, Uye simba renyu rose-rose here?
Musashuva usiku apo ndudzi dzinobviswa panzvimbo yadzo.
Chenjerai, regai kurangarira zvakaipa; Nokuti ndizvo zvamakasanangura kupfuura kutambudzika.
Tarirai, Mwari anoita zvinhu zvikuru nesimba rake; Ndianiko mudzidzisi wakafanana naye?
Ndianiko akamuraira nzira yake?
Kana ndianiko angati, Makaita zvisina kururama here?
Rangarirai, kuti murumbidze basa rake, Rakaimbwa navanhu.
Vanhu vose vakaritarira; Vanhu vanoriona vari kure.
Tarirai, Mwari mukuru; asi isu hatimuzivi; Kuwanda kwamakore ake hakunganzverwi.
Nokuti anokwevera kumusoro madonhedza emvura, Anoshanduka mvura inonaya ichibva pamwando wawo;
Inodururwa namakore Ichidonhera yawanda pamusoro pavanhu.
Ko kuno munhu anganzwisisa kudhadhanurwa kwamakore, Nokutinhira kwetende rake here?
Tarirai, unodhadhanura chiedza chake kunhivi dzake dzose; Unofukidza pasi pegungwa.
Nokuti naizvozvi anotonga ndudzi dzavanhu; Anovapa zvokudya zvizhinji.
Anofukidza maoko ake nemheni; Nokuiraira kuti irove payakaratidzwa.
Mubvumo wayo unomuzivisa, Nemombewo dzinonzwa kuti unouya.
Zvirokwazvo moyo wangu unobvunduswawo pamusoro paizvozvi, Uchibviswa panzvimbo yawo.
Teererai kutinhira kwenzwi rake, Nokuwunga kunobva pamuromo wake.
Anokutuma pasi pedenga rose, pamagumisiro enyika.
Inoteverwa nenzwi rinodzvova, Anotinhira nenzwi roumambo hwake.
Haazvidzivisi kana inzwi rake richinzwika.
Mwari anotinhira nenzwi rake rinoshamisa; Anoita zvinhu zvikuru zvatisingagoni kunzwisisa.
Nokuti anoti kuchando, Chiwira panyika; Saizvozvowo kumvura inopfunha-pfunha, Uyewo kumvura inoturuka nesimba.
Anodzivisa ruoko rwomunhu mumwe nomumwe, Kuti vanhu vose vaakaita vamuzive.
Panguva iyo zvikara zvinondovanda, Zvichirambira mumapako azvo.
Dutu remhepo rinobuda pakamuri rezasi; Nechando kurutivi rwokumusoro.
Mazaya echando anopiwa vanhu nomweya waMwa Uye mvura mhami inogwamba.
Anozadza makore matema nomwando, Anodhadhanura gore rine mheni yake.
Rinotendeudzwa nokufambisa kwake, Kuti zviite zvose zvaanozviraira Panyika inogarwa navanhu;
Anoituma kuti zvimwe ive shamhu, zvimwe ifadze nyika yake, zvimwe iratidze tsitsi yake.
Teererai shoko iri, nhasi Jobho; Chimbomirai murangarire mabasa anoshamisa aMwari.
Ko munoziva marairirwo azvo naMwari here, Nokupenyiswa kwemheni yegore rake here?
Munoziva maturikirwo amakore here, Namabasa anoshamisa aiye akakwana pazivo here?
Munonzwisisa madziyiro enguvo dzenyu, Kana nyika yakagadzikana nemhepo inobva zasi here?
Ko mungagona kudhadhanura denga pamwechete naye, Iro rakasimba sechioni-oni chakaumbwa here?
Tidzidzisei zvatingareva kwaari; Nokuti hatigoni kunyatsoreva nemhaka yerima.
Ko iye anofanira kuudzwa kuti ndinoda kutaura here?
Kana ndianiko munhu anoda kumedzwa?
Zvino vanhu havagoni kutarira chiedza chinopenya kudenga; Asi mhepo ichapfuura, ndokurinatsa.
Kunaka sokwendarama kunobva kurutivi rwokumusoro; Mwari ano humambo hunotyisa kwazvo.
Kana ari waMasimbaose, hatigoni kumunzwisisa; ane simba guru-guru; Haangatambudzi pakutonga nokururama kukuru.
Saka vanhu vanomutya; Haane hanya navane moyo yakachenjera.
Ipapo Jehovha akapindura Jobho, ari pachamupupuri, akati,
Ndianiko uya anodzima zano rangu achiriita rima Namashoko asine zivo here?
Chizvisunga chiuno chako zvino somurume; Nokuti ndichakubvunzisisa, iwe undidudzire.
Iwe wakanga uripiko panguva yandakateya nheyo dzenyika?
Chidudzira, kana une zivo iwe.
Ndianiko akatara kukura kwayo, kana uchizviziva?
Kana ndianiko akaiyera norwonzi?
Ko nheyo dzayo dzakateyiwa pamusoro pei?
Kana ndianiko akateya ibwe rayo rekona?
Panguva yakaimba nyeredzi dzamambakwedza pamawa, Uye vanakomana vose vaMwari vachipururudza nomufaro?
Kana ndianiko wakadzivira gungwa nemikova, Panguva yokudzutuka kwaro, richibuda pachizvaro;
Panguva yandakaita gore nenguva yaro, Uye rima guru uve mucheka wokuriputira nawo;
Panguva.yandakaritarira muganho waro, Ndikariisira mazariro nemikova,
Ndikati, Ungasvikira pano, asi haungapfuvuri; Mafungu ako, anozvikudza, achadzivirirwa pano?
Iwe wakatongoraira mangwanani kubva pakutanga kwamazuva ako here, Ukaratidza mambakwedza nzvimbo yawo here?
Kuti abate migumo yenyika, Vakaipa vazuzwe vabve pairi here?
Zvinoshanduka sevhu kana richitsikwa nechisimbiso, Zvinhu zvose zvichionekwa sapanguvo.
Vakaipa vanodzitirirwa chiedza chavo, Ruoko, runozvikudza, runovhuniwa.
Iwe wakatongopinda pamatsime egungwa here?
Kana wakatongofamba pakadzikadzika pasi here?
Masuo orufu akatongokuzarurirwa here?
Kana wakatongoona masuo omumvuri worufu here?
Wakatongonzwisisa upamhi hwenyika here?
Dudzira, kana uchizviziva zvose.
Nzira iripiko inoenda kunogara chiedza, Kana riri rima, nzvimbo yaro iripiko?
Kuti undozviisa kumiganho yazvo, Uye kuti uzive nzira dzinoenda kumusha wazvo here?
Unenge unoziva hako, nokuti wakanga wakazvarwa panguva iyo!
Mazuva ako anenge akawanda kwazvo!

Jobho anodzoserwa mufaro wake wose
Zvino Jehovha akati ataura mashoko iwayo kuna Jobho, Jehovha akati kuna Erifazi muTemani, Ndakatsamwira kwazvo iwe neshamwari dzako mbiri, nokuti imi hamuna kutaura zvakarurama pamusoro pangu sezvakaita muranda wangu Jobho.
Naizvozvo zvino chitorai nzombe nomwe namakondobwe namanomwe, muende kumuranda wangu Jobho, muzvipisire chipiriso chinopiswa; zvino muranda wangu Jobho achakunyengetererai; nokuti ndichamugamuchira iye, kuti ndirege kukuitirai zvakaenzana nohupenzi hwenyu; nokuti imi hamuna kutaura pamusoro pangu zakarurama, sezvakaita muranda wangu Jobho.
Zvino Erifazi muTemani, naBhiridhadhi muShuhi, naZofari muNaamati, vakandoita sezvakarairwa naJehovha, Jehovha akagamuchira Jobho.
Jehovha akashandura kutapwa kwaJobho nguva yaakanyengeterera shamwari dzake; Jehovha akapa Jobho zvaakanga anazvo pakutanga kaviri.
Ipapo vanununa vake vose, nehanzvadzi dzake dzose, navazikani vake vose vaimuziva kare vakauya kwaari, vakadya zvokudya mumba make; vakamudemba nokumunyaradza pamusoro pezvakaipa zvose zvakanga zvauyiswa naJehovha pamusoro pake; munhu mumwe nomumwe akamupawo chimari, nomumwe nomumwe chindori chendarama.
Saizvozvo Jehovha akaropafadza kupedzisira kwaJobho kupfuura kutanga kwake; akanga ana makwai ane zviuru zvitanhatu, nenzombe dzingasungwa pamajoko dzine chiuru chimwe, namakadzi embongoro ane chiuru chimwe.
Akazovawo navanakomana vanomwe navanasikana vatatu.
Akatumidza wokutanga zita rinonzi Jemima, nowechipiri zita rinonzi Kezia, nowechitatu zita rinonzi Kerenihapuki.
Panyika yose hapana kuwanikwa vakadzi vakanaka pazviso zvavo vakapfuurawo vakunda vaJobho baba vavo vakapawo nhaka pakati pehanzvadzi dzavo.
Shure kwaizvozvo Jobho akazogara makore ane zana namakumi mana, akaona vanakomana vake, navanakomana vavanakomana vake, kusvikira pamarudzi mana.
Zvino Jobho akazofa, akwegura, ava namazuva mazhinji.
Akakomborerwa munhu asingafambi panorangana vakaipa, Asingamiri panzira yavatadzi, Asingagari panogara vadadi.
Asi anofarira murayiro waJehovha; Anofungisisa murayiro wake masikati nousiku.

Naizvozvo vakaipa havangamiri pakutongeswa, Navatadzi paungano yavakarurama.
Nokuti Jehovha anoziva nzira yavakarurama; Asi nzira yavakaipa ichaparadzwa.

Muchavapwanya netsvimbo youtare; Muchavaputsanya sehari yomuumbi.

Vavengi vangu vose vachanyadzwa nokutambudzika zvikuru; Vachadzoka, vachanyadzwa pakarepo.

Kuti arege kubvambura mweya wangu seshumba, aubvamburanye, ndichishaiwa anondirwira.

Kana ndichinge ndakaitira zvakaipa munhu aiva noukama neni; (Izvo, ndakarwira waiva mudzivisi wangu asina mhosva;)

nhovo yangu iri kuna Mwari, Iye anoponesa vane moyo yakarurama.

Ndichafara nokukufarirai zvikuru; Ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi Wokumusoro-soro.
Kana vavengi vangu vachidzokera shure, Vanogumburwa nokupera pamberi penyu.
Nokuti mandiruramisira mhosva yangu; Makagara pachigaro choushe muchitonga nokururama.
Makatuka vahedheni, makaparadza vakaipa, Makadzima zita ravo nokusingaperi-peri.
Vavengi vakapera, vakaparadzwa nokusingaperi; Makaparadza maguta avo, Nechiyeudzo chawo chakaparara.
Asi Jehovha agere ari mambo nokusingaperi; Akagadzira chigaro chake choushe kuti atonge.
Achatonga nyika nokururama, Achatonga vanhu zvakafanira.
Jehovha achava nhare yakasimba kuna vanomanikidzwa, Nhare yakasimba panguva yokutambudzika.
Vanoziva zita renyu vachavimba nemi; Nokuti imi Jehovha hamuna kurasha vanokutsvakai.
Imbirai Jehovha nziyo dzokumurumbidza, iye agere paZiyoni; dudzirai zvaakaita pakati pendudzi dzavanhu.
Nokuti iye, anotsiva ropa, anovarangarira; Haakanganwi kuchema kwavarombo.
Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Jehovha; Tarirai, kumanikidzwa kwangu navanondivenga, Imi munondisimudza pamisuo yorufu;
Kuti ndiparidze kurumbidzwa kwenyu kwose; Pamisuo yomukunda weZiyoni, Ndichafarira kuponesa kwenyu.
Vahedheni vakanyura mugomba ravakachera; Rutsoka rwavo rwakabatwa mumumbure, wavakavanza.
Jehovha wakazvizivisa, akatonga; Akaipa wakateyiwa nebasa ramaoko ake.
Vakaipa vachadzokera kuSheori, Ivo vahedheni vose, vakakanganwa Mwari.
Nokuti anoshaiwa haangakanganikwi nokusingaperi, Nokutarira kwomurombo hakungaperi nokusingaperi.
Simukai Jehovha; munhu ngaarege kukunda; Vahedheni ngavatongwe pamberi penyu.
Chivatyisai, Jehovha; Vahedheni ngavazive kuti vanongova vanhu.
Munomirireiko kure, Jehovha?
Munozvivanzireiko panguva dzokutambudzika?
Pakuzvikudza kwake akaipa anotambudza murombo zvikuru; Ngavabatwe namano avakafunga.
Nokuti wakaipa anozvirumbidza pamusoro pezvinoda moyo wake, Anoruchiva anoramba Jehovha nokumuzvidza.
Nokuzvikudza kwechiso chake, wakaipa anoti, Haangabvunzi.
Ndangariro dzake dzose dzinoti, Hakuna Mwari.
Nzira dzake dzakasimba nguva dzose; Zvamunotonga imi zviri kure kumusoro, haazvioni; Kana vari vadzivisi vake vose, anovashora.
Anoti mumoyo make, Handingazununguswi; Handingavi panhamo kusvikira kumarudzi angu ose.
Muromo wake uzere nokutuka nokunyengera nokumanikidza; Zvakashata nezvakaipa zviri pasi porurimi rwake.
Anogara panzvimbo dzokuvanda dzemisha; Pakavanda ndipo paanouraya asina mhosva; Meso ake anovandira asina wokumubatsira.
Anovandira pakavanda seshumba panzvimbo yayo; Anovanda kuti abate murombo; Anobata murombo, kana achimukakatira mumumbure wake.
Anonyangira, anokotama pasi, Vasina mubatsiri vanowiswa nesimba rake.
Anoti mumoyo make, Mwari akanganwa; Anovanza chiso chake, haangatongozvioni.
Simukai Jehovha; Mwari simudzai ruoko rwenyu; Regai kukanganwa varombo.
Akaipa anozvidzireiko Mwari, Achiti mumoyo wake, Hangabvunzi?
Mazviona henyu; nokuti munoona kutambudzika nokuchema, kuti muzvibate muruoko rwenyu; asinamubatsiri anozviisa kwamuri; Makava mubatsiri wenherera.
Vhunai ruoko rwowakaipa.
Kana ari munhu akashata, nzverai zvakaipa zvake, kusvikira musingazozviwani.
Jehovha ndiye Mambo . nokusingaperi-peri; Vahedheni vakaparadzwa munyika yake.
Jehovha, makanzwa zvinodikanwa navanyoro; Muchasimbisa moyo yavo, mucharerekera nzeve yenyu;
Kuti mutongere nherera neanotambudzwa, Kuti munhu wapanyika arege kuramba achivhundusa.
Ndinovimba naJehovha; Munoreva seiko kumweya wangu, muchiti, Tizira kugomo rako seshiri?
Nokuti, tarira, vakaipa vanohwembura uta, Vanogadzira museve wavo parukungiso, Kuti vafure anomoyo wakarurama parima.
Kana nheyo dzakaparadzwa, Akarurama angaiteiko?
Jehovha uri mutemberi yake tsvene, Iye Jehovha, chigaro chake choushe chiri kudenga; Meso ake anotarira, mafungiro ameso ake anoidza vana vavanhu.
Jehovha anoidza vakarurama; Asi mweya wake unovenga wakaipa neanomanikidza.
Achanisira misungo pamusoro pavakaipa; Moto nesuriferi nemhepo inopisa, ndiwo uchava mukombe wavo wavakagoverwa.
Nokuti Jehovha akarurama; anoda zvakarurama; Vakarurama vachaona chiso chake.
Batsirai, Jehovha; nokuti vanoda Mwari vopera; Nokuti vakatendeka havachipo pakati pavana vavanhu.
Vanotaura mumwe nomumwe zvisina maturo nowokwake; Vanotaura nomuromo unobata kumeso, uye nemoyo miviri.
Jehovha achagura miromo yose inobata kumeso, Norurimi runotaura zvinhu zvikuru;
Ivo vakati, Tichakunda norurimi rwedu; Miromo yedu ndeyedu; ndianiko angava ishe wedu?
Nokuda kwokumanikidzwa kwavarombo, nokugomera kwavanoshaiwa, Ndichamuka zvino nokuda kwaizvozvo, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha; Ndichamuisa pakasimba ipo paanoshuva.
Mashoko aJehovha mashoko akachena; Sesirivha yakaidzwa mubisiro panyika, Yakanatswa kanomwe.
Muchavachengeta, Jehovha, Muchavachengeta parudzi urwu nokusingaperi.
Vakaipa vanofamba pamativi ose, Kana zvakashata zvichikudzwa pakati pavanakomana vavanhu.
Jehovha muchandikanganwa nokusingaperi kusvikira rinhi?
Muchandivanzira chiso chenyu kusvikira rinhiko?
Ndichafunga mano mumweya mangu kusvikira rinhi, Ndine shungu pamoyo pangu zuva rimwe nerimwe?
Muvengi wangu achandikurira kusvikira rinhi?
Rangarirai, mundipindure, Jehovha Mwari wangu; Vhenekerai meso angu, ndirege kuvata hope dzokufa;
Muvengi wangu arege kuti, Ndamukunda; Vadzivisi vangu varege kufara kana ndichizununguka.
Asi ndakavimba nenyasha dzenyu; moyo wangu uchafara nokuponesa kwenyu;
Ndichaimbira Jehovha, Nokuti akandiitira zvakanaka.
Benzi rakati mumoyo maro, Mwari haako.
Vakaora, vakabata mabasa anonyangadza; Hapana anoita zvakanaka.
Jehovha ari kudenga, akatarira pasi kuvana vavanhu, Kuti aone kana akachenjera aripo, Anotsvaka Mwari.
Vakatsauka vose, vakasvibiswa pamwechete; Hapana anoita zvakanaka, kunyange nomumwe.
Ko vaiti vose vezvakaipa havana zivo here?
Ivo vanodya vanhu vangu sezvavanodya chingwa, Vasingadani kuna Jehovha.
Vakanga vachitya zvikuru ipapo; Nokuti Mwari anogara parudzi rwavakarurama.
Munonyadzisa zano romurombo, Asi Jehovha ndiye utiziro hwake.
Dai kuponeswa kwalsiraeri kwaibva paZiyoni!
Kana Jehovha achidzosa vanhu vake pakutapwa, Ipapo Jakobho achafarisisa kwazvo, naIsiraeri achafara.
Jehovha, ndianiko angatsaukira mutende renyu?
Ndianiko angagara pagomo renyu dzvene?
Uyo, anofamba asina mhosva, anoita zvakarurama, Anotaura zvokwadi mumoyo make.
Iye asina makuhwa parurimi rwake, Asingaitiri shamwari yake zvakaipa, Asingatuki waagere naye.
Munhu akashata anozvidzwa naye; Asi anokudza vanotya Jehovha.
Iye anoti kana achinge apika, haangazoshanduri shoko rake, kunyange zvikava zvakaipa kwaari.
Iye asingarevi mhindu pamari yake, Kana kugamuchira chipo pamusoro pausina mhosva.
Munhu anoita zvinhu izvozvi haangatongozununguswi.
Ndichengetei, Mwari, nokuti ndinovimba nemi.
Ndakati kuna Jehovha, Ndimi Ishe wangu; Kunze kwenyu handine chinhu chakanaka.
Kana vari vatsvene, vari panyika, Ndivo vakaisvonaka vandinofarira zvikuru.
Kuchema kuchawanzwa kwavanovigira mumwe mwari zvipo; Zvipiriso zvavo zvinodururwa zveropa handingazvidururi, Namazita avo handingaarevi nemiromo yangu.
Jehovha ndiye mugove wenhaka yangu nowomukombe wangu; Munochengeta mugove wangu.
Rwonzi rwokuyera rwakandiyerera nzvimbo dzakanaka; Zvirokwazvo, nhaka yangu yakaisvonaka.
Ndicharumbidza Jehovha akandipa mano, Zvirokwazvo, itsvo dzangu dzinondidzidzisa panguva dzousiku.
Ndakaisa Jehovha pamberi pangu nguva dzose; Zvaari kurudyi rwangu, handingazununguswi.
Naizvozvo moyo wangu unofara, kukudzwa kwangu kunofarisisa; Nyama yanguvo ichagara yakachengetwa.
Nokuti hamungasiyi mweya wangu muSheori; Hamungatenderi mutsvene wenyu kuti aone kuora.
Mundiratidza nzira youpenyu; Mufaro wakazara uri pamberi pangu; Paruoko rwenyu rworudyi panezvinofadza nokusingaperi.
Inzwai zvakarurama Jehovha, muteerere kuchema kwangu; Rerekerai nzeve dzenyu kumunyengetero wangu, unobva pamiromo isinganyengeri.
Kutongwa kwangu ngakubve pamberi penyu; Meso enyu ngaatarire zvakarurama.
Makaidza moyo wangu; makandishanyira usiku; Makandiidza, mukasawana kufunga kwakaipa mandiri Ndakazvisunga kuti muromo wangu urege kudarika.
Kana ari mabasa avanhu; neshoko remiromo yenyu, Ini ndakanzvenga nzira dzomuparadzi.
Kutsika kwangu kwakarambira panzira dzenyu, Tsoka dzangu hadzina kutedzemuka.
Ini ndakadana kwamuri, nokuti muchandipindura, imi Mwari; Rerekerai nzeve dzenyu kwandiri, munzwe kutaura kwangu.
Ratidzai unyoro hwenyu hunoshamisa, imi, munoponesa vanovimba nemi, Imi munoponesa noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, ava vanovimba nemi Kuna vanovamukira simba.
Ndichengetei semboni yeziso renyu, Ndivanzei pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro enyu,
Kunavakaipa, vanondiparadza, Ivo vavengi vangu vakaipa, vanondikomba.
Vakadzivira moyo yavo;
Vanotaura vachikudza nemiromo yavo.
Vakatikomba zvino pakufamba kwedu; Vanocherekedza nameso avo kuti vatiwisire pasi.
Vakafanana neshumba inokarira kuparadza, somwana weshumba inovandira panzvimbo dzakavanda.
Simukai, Jehovha, Mirai pamberi pake, mumuwisire pasi; Rwirai mweya wangu nomunondo wenyu kuna vakaipa;
Kuvanhu, noruoko rwenyu imi Jehovha, Kuvanhu venyika, vanomugove wavo paupenyu uhwu, Vamunozadza dumbu ravo nefuma yenyu; Vana vana vazhinji, Vanosiyira vacheche vavo zvakasara zvefuma yavo.
Ini ndichaona chiso chenyu pakururama; Ndichaguta nomufananidzo wenyu pakumuka kwangu.
Ndinokudisai, Jehovha, simba rangu.
Jehovha idombo rangu, nenhare yangu, nomurwiri wangu; Mwari wangu, dombo rangu, wandichavimba naye; nhovo yangu, norunyanga rwokuponeswa kwangu, shongwe yangu yakakwirira.
Ndichadana kuna Jehovha, iye anofanirwa nokurumbidzwa; Naizvozvo ndichaponeswa kuna vavengi vangu.
Mabote orufu akandikomba; Uye nzizi dzezvakaipa dzakandivhundusa.
Mabote eSheori akandisunga; Misungo yorufu yakandiwira.
Pakutambudzika kwangu ndakadana kuna Jehovha, Ndikadana kuna Mwari wangu; Akanzwa inzwi rangu ari mutemberi yake; Kuchema kwangu pamberi pake kukasvika munzeve dzake.
Ipapo nyika yakazununguka, ikadedera; Nheyo dzamakomowo dzikadengenyeka, Dzikazununguswa, nokuti akanga akatsamwa.
Utsi hwakakwira huchibva mumhino dzake, Uye moto wakabuda mumuromo make, wakaparadza; Mazimbe akabatidzwa nawo.
Akakotamisa kudenga-dengawo, akaburuka; Nerima guru rakanga riri pasi petsoka dzake.
Akatasva kerubhi, akabhururuka; Zvirokwazvo, akabhururuka pamapapiro emhepo.
Rima akariita nzvimbo yake yokuvanda, tende rake rakamupoteredza; Kusviba kwemvura zhinji, namakore matema okudenga.
Nokupenya kwakanga kuri pamberi pake makore ake matema akapfuura, Nechimvuramabwe namazimbe omoto.
Jehovha akatinhirawo kudenga-denga, Wokumusorosoro akataura nenzwi rake; Chimvuramabwe namazimbe omoto.
Akatuma miseve yake, akavaparadza; Zvirokwazvo, nemheni zhinji, akavavhundusa.
Ipapo migero yemvura zhinji yakaonekwa, Uye nheyo dzenyika dzakafukurwa, Nokutuka kwenyu, Jehovha, Nokufema kwomweya wemhino dzenyu.
Wakatambanudza ruoko rwake ari kumusoro, akanditora, Akandinyukura pamvura zhinji.
Akandirwira pamuvengi wangu ane simba, Nokuna vanondivenga, nokuti vakanga vondikurira.
Vakandivinga nezuva renjodzi yangu, Asi Jehovha akanga ari mutsigiri wangu.
Akandibudisira kunzvimbo yakafarikana, Akandirwira, nokuti akanga achindifarira.
Jehovha akandiitira zvakaenzana nokururama kwangu, Akandipa mubayiro wakaenzana nokuchena kwamaoko angu.
Nokuti ndakachengeta nzira dzaJehovha, Handina kubva kuna Mwari wangu nokunyengera.
Nokuti zvose zvaakatonga zvakanga zviri pamberi pangu, Handina kusundira kure neni zvaakatema.
Ndakanga ndakaruramawo kwaari, Ndakazvichengeta ini pazvakaipa zvangu.
Naizvozvo Jehovha akandiitira zvakaenzana nokururama kwangu, Zvakaenzana nokuchena kwamaoko angu pamberi pake.
Ane ngoni munomuitirawo nengoni, Nomunhu wakarurama kwazvo, munomuitirawo zvakarurama;
Akanaka munomuitirawo zvakanaka, Nowakatsauka, munomuitirawo nehasha.
Nokuti muchaponesa vanhu vanotambudzika; Asi muchaderedza meso avanozvikudza.
Nokuti imi muchatungidza mwenje wangu; Jehovha Mwari wangu achavhenekera rima rangu.
Nokuti nemi ndichavamba hondo, Kana ndina Mwari wangu ndichadarika rusvingo.
Kana ari Mwari, nzira yake yakakwana kwazvo; Shoko raJehovha rakaidzwa; Ndiye nhovo yavose vanovimba naye.
Nokuti ndianiko Mwari, asi iye Jehovha?
Ndianiko dombo, asi iye Mwari wedu?
Iye Mwari, anondisunga chiuno nesimba, Anokwanisa nzira yangu.
Anoita tsoka dzangu dzive setsoka dzenondokadzi, Anondiisa pamatunhu angu akakwirira.
Anodzidzisa maoko angu kurwa; Naizvozvo maoko angu anhwembura uta hwendarira.
Makandipawo nhovo yokuponesa kwenyu; Ruoko rwenyu rworudyi rwakanditsigira, Uye unyoro hwenyu hwakandiita mukuru.
Makandiitira nzvimbo yakafarikana pandingatsika; Uye tsoka dzangu hadzina kutedzemuka.
Ndichateverera vavengi vangu nokuvabata.
Handingadzokizve kusvikira vapedzwa.
Ndichavabaya, vakoniwe kusimuka; Vachawira pasi petsoka dzangu.
Nokuti makandisunga chiuno nesimba rokurwa naro; Makandikundisa vaindimukira.
Makatizisa vavengi vangu, Kuti ndiparadze vanondivenga.
Vakachema, asi kwakanga kusina anoponesa, Kuna Jehovha, asi haana kuvapindura.
Ipapo ndakavapwanya-pwanya seguruva pamberi pemhepo; Ndakavarashira kure samatope enzira dzomumusha.
Makandirwira pakukakavadzana kwavanhu; Makandiita mukuru wendudzi; Vanhu vandakanga ndisingazivi, vachandishumira.
Vachateerera pakarepo kana vachindinzwa, Vatorwa vachanamata kwandiri.
Vatorwa vachatorerwa simba, Vachabuda pavaivanda vachidedera.
Jehovha mupenyu; dombo rangu ngarikudzwe; Mwari wokuponeswa kwangu ngaarumbidzwe.
Ndiye Mwari anonditsivira, Anondikundisa ndudzi dzavanhu.
Iye anondirwira kuvavengi vangu; Zvirokwazvo, munondisimudzira kumusoro kwavanondimukira.
Munondirwira pamunhu anomanikidza.
Naizvozvo ndichakuvongai Jehovha, pakati pendudzi, Ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokukudza.
Anopa mambo wake kuponeswa kukuru; ,Anoitira muzodzwa wake unyoro, Iye Dhavhidhi nomwana wake nokusingaperi.
Kudenga-denga kunoparidzira kubwinya kwaMwari; Uye denga rinoratidza basa ramaoko ake.
Musi mumwe unotaurira mumwe musi, Uye usiku humwe hunopupurira humwe usiku njere.
Hapana kutaura, kana mashoko; inzwi razvo harinzwiki.
Rwonzi rwokuyera rwazvo rwakasvika kunyika yose, Namashoko azvo kumugumo wenyika.
Akagadzirira zuva tende mukati mazvo.
Iro rakafanana nechikomba chinobuda mumba macho, Rinofara semhare kumhanya nenzira yaro.
Kubuda kwaro kunobva pamugumo wedenga, Kupota kwaro kunosvika pakuguma kwarozve; Hakune chinhu chakavanzirwa kupisa kwaro.
Murayiro waJehovha wakakwana, unoponesa mweya; Chipupuriro chaJehovha ndechazvokwadi, chinopa vasina mano njere.
Zvinorairwa naJehovha zvakarurama, zvinofadza moyo; Murau waJehovha wakaisvonaka, unovhenekera meso.
Kutya Jehovha kwakanaka, kunogara nokusingaperi; Zvakatongwa naJehovha ndezvazvokwadi, zvakarurama kwazvo.
Zvinofanira kutsvakwa kukunda ndarama, zvirokwazvo kukunda ndarama zhinji yakaisvonaka; zvinotapirawo kupfuura huchi nomusvi wamazinga ohuchi.
Uyezve, muranda wenyu unonyeverwa nazvo; Pakuzvichengeta panomubayiro mukuru.
Kana kuri kutsauka, ndiani angakuziva?
Ndianiko angaziva zvitadzo?
Ndinatsei imi pazvitadzo zvakavanzika.
Dzoraiwo muranda wenyu pazvivi zvokuzvikudza; Ngazvirege kuva nesimba pamusoro pangu; ipapo ndichava akakwana, Handingavi nemhosva yokudarika kukuru.
Mashoko omuromo wangu nokurangarira kwomoyo wangu ngazvifadze pamberi penyu, Imi Jehovha, dombo rangu, nomudzikunuri wangu.
Jehovha ngaakupindure nomusi wokutambudzika; Zita raMwari waJakobho ngarikuise pakakwirira;
Ngaakutumire rubatsiro runobva panzvimbo tsvene, Akutsigire nesimba rinobva Ziyoni.
Ngaarangarire zvipiriso zvako zvose, Agamuchire zvibayiro zvako zvinopiswa;
Ngaakupe zvinodikanwa nomoyo wako, Ngaaite sezvawakafunga.
Tichafara kwazvo nokukunda kwenyu, Tichasimudza mireza yedu nezita raMwari wedu; Jehovha ngaaite zvose zvawakakumbira.
Zvino ndinoziva kuti Jehovha anoponesa muzodziwa wake; Achamupindura ari kudenga kwake kutsvene Nesimba roruoko rwake rworudyi, rinoponesa.
Vamwe vanovimba nengoro, vamwe namabhiza; Asi isu tichareva zita raJehovha Mwari wedu.
Ivo vakotamiswa, vawira pasi; Asi isu tasimuka, timire zvakanaka.
Ponesai, Jehovha; Mambo ngaatipindure kana tichidana.
Mambo uchafara nesimba renyu, Jehovha; Achafarira kuponesa kwenyu zvikuru sei!
Makamupa zvakadikanwa nomoyo wake, Hamuna kuramba kukumbira kwemiromo yake.
Nokuti munomuchingura nemikomborero yezvakanaka; Munodzika korona yendarama yakaisvonaka pamusoro wake.
Akakumbira upenyu kwamuri, mukamupa ihwo; Namazuva mazhinji nokusingaperi-peri.
Kurumbidzwa kwake kukuru nokuda kwokuponesa kwenyu, Makaisa pamusoro pake kukudzwa noumambo.
Nokuti munomukomborera zvikuru nokusingaperi; Munomufadza nomufaro pamberi penyu.
Nokuti mambo anovimba naJehovha, Nounyoro hwoWokumusorosoro haangazunguswi.
Ruoko rwenyu ruchawana vavengi venyu vose; Ruoko rwenyu rworudyi ruchawana vose vanokuvengai.
Muchavaita sevira romoto nenguva yokutsamwa kwenyu.
Jehovha achavamedza nehasha dzake, Moto uchavaparadza.
Muchaparadza zvibereko zvavo panyika, Navana vavo pakati pavana vavanhu.
Nokuti vakafunga kukuitirai zvakaipa; vakafunga zano rakaipa, asi havagoni kuzviita.
Nokuti muchavafuratidza, Muchagadzira ungiso dzouta hwenyu kuvapfura pazviso zvavo.
Simukai Jehovha, nesimba renyu; Naizvozvo tichaimba nokukudza chikuriri chenyu.
Mwari wangu, Mwari wangu, mandisiyireiko?
Munomirireiko kure pakundibatsira, napamashoko okugomba kwangu?
Mwari wangu, ndinodana masikati, asi hamupinduri; Nousiku, asi handiwani zororo.
Asi imi muri mutsvene, Imi mugere parumbidzo dzaIsiraeri.
Madzibaba edu akavimba nemi; Vakavimba, imi mukavarwira.
Vakachema kwamuri, vakarwirwa; Vakavimba nemi, vakasanyadziswa.
Asi ini ndiri honye, handizi munhu; Ndiri chinhu chinozvidzwa navanhu, chinoshorwa navanhu vose.
Vose, vanondiona vanondiseka; Vanoshamisa muromo, vanodzungudza misoro, vachiti,
Chizviisai kuna Jehovha; iye ngaamurwire; Ngaamurwire, zvaanomufarira iye.
Asi ndimi makandibudisa pachizvaro; Makandivimbisa nemi ndichiri pamazamu amai vangu.
Ndakaiswa kwamuri kubva pachizvaro; Imi muri Mwari wangu kubva padumbu ramai vangu.
Regai kuva kure neni; nokuti njodzi iri pedo; Nokuti hapana angabatsira.
Hondo zhinji dzakandikomba; Hondo dzine simba dzaBhashani dzakandipoteredza.
Dzinondishamisira miromo yadzo, Seshumba inoparadza ichiomba.
Ndakadururwa semvura, Mapfupa angu ose akasvodogoka; moyo wangu wakafanana nenamo; Wakanyauka mukati moura hwangu.

Nokuti ndisina mhosva vakandivanzira mimbure yavo muhunza, Ndisina mhosva vakacherera mweya wangu hunza.

Mweya wangu uchafarira Jehovha Uchafarira kuponesa kwake.
Mapfupa angu ose achati, Jehovha ndianiko akafanana nemi, Imi munorwira murombo panaiye akamukurira nesimba, Iye murombo nomushaiwi panoanomupamba?
Zvapupu zvisina kururama zvinosimuka; Zvinondibvunza zvinhu zvandisingazivi
Zvakanaka zvangu vanozvitsiva nezvakaipa, Vachibira mweya wangu.
Asi kana ndirini, pakurwara kwavo ndakafuka masaga; Ndakatambudza mweya wangu ndichizvinyima zvokudya; Munyengetero wangu ukadzokera kuchipfuva changu.
Ndakaita seyaiva shamwari yangu kana hama yangu; Ndakakotama ndichichema, somunhu anochema mai vake.
Asi pakugumburwa kwangu vakafara, vakaungana pamwechete; Vanhu vakashata kwazvo vakaungana kuzorwa neni, navandakanga ndisingazivi; Vakandibvambura, vasingaregi;
Savadadiri vakaipa pamitambo Vakandirumanyira meno avo.
Jehovha, muchatarira izvozvo kusvikira rinhiko?
Rwirai mweya wangu pakuparadza kwavo, Mudikanwa wangu pashumba.
Ndichakuvongai paungano huru; Ndichakurumbidzai pakati pavanhu vazhinji.
Vanondivenga ndisina mhosva ngavarege kufara pamusoro pangu; Uye vanondivenga ndisina mhosva ngavarege kubwaira neziso.
Nokuti havatauri rugare; Asi vanofungira avo vanyerere panyika mashoko okunyengera.
Zvirokwazvo, vakandishamisira miromo yavo; Vakati, Hekani, hekani!
Meso edu akazviona.
Makazviona, Jehovha; regai kunyarara; Ishe, regai kugara kure neni.
Zvimutsei, mukai mundiruramisire; Mutambe mhaka yangu, Mwari wangu naShe wangu.
Nditongerei, Jehovha Mwari wangu, nokururama kwenyu; Ngavarege kufara pamusoro pangu.
Ngavarege kuti mumoyo mavo, Hekani, ndizvo zvatanga tichida; Ngavarege kuti, Tamumedza.
Ngavanyadziswe, vazvidzwe pamwechete, ivo vanofarira kutambudzika kwangu; Ngavafukidzwe nokunyara nokuzvidzwa, ivo vanozvikudza pamusoro pangu.
Ngavadanidzire nomufaro, vafare, ivo vanoda kururamiswa kwemhaka yangu; Ngavarambe vachiti, Jehovha ngaakudzwe, Iye, anofarira kufara kwomuranda wake.
Ipapo rurimi rwangu ruchataura zvokururama kwenyu, Nezvokurumbidzwa kwenyu zuva rose.
Kudarika kwowakaipa kunoreva mumoyo mangu, kuchiti, Hakuna kutya Mwari pamberi pameso ake.
Nokuti anozvibata kumeso kwake, Achiti zvakaipa zvake hazvingazikanwi zvikavengwa.
Mashoko omuromo wake ndizvo zvakaipa nokunyengera; Akarega kuzova akachenjera nokuita zvakanaka.
Anofunga zvakaipa panhovo dzake; Anofamba nenzira isina kunaka; Haasemi zvakaipa.
Unyoro hwenyu, Jehovha, hwakasvika kudenga-denga; Kutendeka kwenyu kunosvikira kumakore;
Kururama kwenyu kwakafanana namakomo aMwari; Kutonga kwenyu kwakadzika zvikuru; Jehovha, munochengeta vanhu nemhuka.
Unyoro hwenyu, Mwari, hwakanaka-naka sei!
Vana vavanhu vanondovanda pasi pomumvuri wamapapiro enyu.
Vachagutswa kwazvo nezvakakora zveimba yenyu; Muchavanwisa parwizi rwezvinofadza zvenyu;
Nokuti kwamuri ndiko kune tsime roupenyu; Muchiedza chenyu ndimo matinoona chiedza.

Apo ndopakawira pasi vaiti vezvakaipa, Vakawisirwa pasi, havangagoni kumukazve.

Nokuti vachakurumidza kudzurwa souswa, Vachaoma semuriwo mutema.

Farikana kwazvo kuna Jehovha; Iye agokupa zvinodikanwa nomoyo wako.
Isa nzira yako kuna Jehovha; Vimbawo naye, iye achazviita.

Nokuti vanoita zvakaipa vachagurwa; Asi vanorindira Jehovha vachagara nhaka yenyika.

Akaipa anofungira akarurama mano akaipa, Anomurumanira meno ake.
Ishe achamuseka; Nokuti anoona kuti zuva rake rinouya.

Munondo wavo uchapinda pamoyo yavo imene, Uye uta hwavo huchavhuniwa.

Nokuti maoko avakaipa achavhuniwa; Asi Jehovha anotsigira vakarurama.

Havanganyadziswi nenguva yokuipa; Pamisi yenzara vachagutiswa.
Asi vakaipa vachaparara, Uye vavengi vaJehovha vachafanana nokunaka kwamafuro; Vacharova; vacharova soutsi.

Mufambiro womunhu unosimbiswa naJehovha; Unofarikana munzira yake.
Kunyange akawa, haangawiswi chose; Nokuti Jehovha anomutsigira noruoko rwake.

Ndakaona akaipa anesimba guru, Achitandavara somuti munyoro panyika yawo.

Mwari wangu achandichingura netsitsi dzake; Mwari achandionesa kukundwa kwavavengi vangu.
Musavauraya, kuti vanhu vangu varege kukanganwa; Muvaparadzire nesimba renyu, muvawisire pasi, Ishe nhovo yedu.
Nokuda kwechivi chomuromo wavo, namashoko emiromo yavo, Ngavabatwe pakuzvikudza kwavo, Uye nokuda kwokutuka nenhema dzavanotaura.
Vapedzei nehasha, vapedzei, varege kuzovapo; Ngavazive kuti Mwari anobata ushe pakati paJakobho, Kusvikira kumigumo yenyika.
Panguva yamadekwana ngavadzoke, ngavahuhudze sembwa, Ngavapote-pote neguta.
Vachadzungaira vachitsvaka zvokudya, Vachagara usiku hwose kana vasingaguti.
Asi ini ndichaimba ndichireva simba renyu; Zvirokwazvo ndicharumbidza tsitsi dzenyu mangwanani; Nokuti makanga muri nhare yangu yakakwirira, Noutiziro hwangu pazuva rokutambudzika kwangu.
Ndichakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi simba rangu; Nokuti Mwari ndiye nhare yangu yakakwirira, iye Mwari anondinzwira tsitsi.
Mwari, makatirasha, makatiparadza; Makanga makatsamwa; Haiwa, tidzorei.
Makabvundisa nyika; makaitsemura; Gadzirai mitswe yayo; nokuti inozununguka.
Makaratidza vanhu venyu zvinhu zvinorema; Makatinwisa waini inobata.
Makapa vanokutyai mureza, Kuti uratidzwe nokuda kwezvokwadi.
Kuti vadikanwi venyu varwirwe, Tiponesei noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, mutipindure.
Mwari akataura pautsvene hwake, achiti, Ndichafara kwazvo; Ndichaganhura Shekemu, ndichayera mupata weSukoti.
Giriyadhi ndeyangu Manase ndeyangu; Efuremuwo inhawiro yomusoro wangu; Judha ndiyo tsvimbo yangu youshe.
Moabhu ndiwo mudziyo wangu wokushambidzira; Pamusoro peEdhomu ndipo pandichakandira shangu yangu; Iwe Firisitia, pururudza nokuda kwangu.
Ndianiko achandiisa muguta rakasimba?
Ndianiko achandiperekedza ndiende Edhomu?
Hamuna kutirasha here, Mwari?
Hamubudi Mwari, nehondo dzedu.
Tibatsirei pamudzivisi wedu; Nokuti kubatsira kwavanhu hakuna maturo.
Muna Mwari tichaita noumhare; Nokuti ndiye achatsikira vadzivisi vedu pasi.
Inzwai kuchema kwangu, Mwari, Teererai munyengetero wangu.
Ndichadana kwamuri ndiri pamugumo wapasi, kana moyo wangu waziya; Ndiperekedzerei kudombo randisingasvikiri.
Nokuti imi makanga muri utiziro hwangu, Neshongwe yangu yakasimba kwandingatiza muvengi wangu.
Ndichagara patende renyu nokusingaperi; Ndichavanda munyasi mamapapiro enyu.
Nokuti imi Mwari makanzwa mhiko dzangu; Makadzosa nhaka yavanotya zita renyu.
Muchawedzera mazuva ohupenyu hwamambo; Makore ake achaenzana naamarudzi mazhinji.
Achagara pamberi paMwari nokusingaperi; Mumugadzirire unyoro nezvokwadi, kuti zvimuchengete.
Naizvozvo ndichaimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza nokusingaperi, Kuti ndiite mhiko dzangu zuva rimwe nerimwe.
Zvirokwazvo, mweya wangu unongorindira Mwari; Kwaari ndiko kunobva kuponeswa kwangu.
Ndiye oga dombo rangu nomuponesi wangu; Ndiye shongwe yangu yakakwirira; handingazununguswi zvikuru.
Muchavavarira munhu kusvikira rinhiko, Kuti mumuuraye imi mose, Sorusvingo runoda kuwa, noruzhowa runotsveyama?
Vanongorangana kuti vamusundire pasi abve paukuru hwake; Vanofarira nhema; Vanoropafadza nomuromo wavo, asi vanotuka mumoyo mavo.
Mweya wangu, rindira Mwari zvirokwazvo Nokuti ndinomutarira iye.
Ndiye oga dombo rangu noruponeso rwangu; Ndiye shongwe yangu yakakwirira; handingazununguswi.
Kuna Mwari ndiko kunokuponeswa kwangu nokukudzwa kwangu; Dombo resimba rangu noutiziro hwangu zviri kuna Mwari.
Vimbai naye nguva dzose, imi vanhu; Dururai moyo yenyu pamberi pake; Mwari ndiye utiziro hwedu.
Zvirokwazvo vanhu vasingakudzwi mweya chete, uye vanhu vanokudzwa inhema; Pakuyerwa havaremi; Vose pamwechete vakareruka kupfuura mweya.
Regai kuvimba nokumanikidza, Regai kuzvikudza pamusoro pokupambara; Kana fuma ichiwanda, regai kuinamatira nomoyo.
Mwari akataura kamwechete, Ndakazvinzwa kaviri; Kuti simba nderaMwari;
Netsitsiwo ndedzenyu, Ishe; Nokuti munoitira munhu mumwe nomumwe sezvaakabata.
Mwari, imi muri Mwari wangu; ndichakutsvakai mangwanani; Mweya wangu unenyota kwamuri, nyama yangu inokushuvai, Panyika yakaoma, inonzwisa nyota, isina mvura.
Naizvozvo ndakatarira kwamuri panzvimbo tsvene, Kuti ndione simba renyu nokubwinya kwenyu.
Nokuti unyoro hwenyu hunokunda upenyu; Miromo yangu ichakurumbidzai.
Naizvozvo ndichakuvongai ndichiri mupenyu; Ndichasimudza maoko angu nezita renyu.
Mweya wangu uchaguta nezvinenge mwongo namafuta; Muromo wangu uchakurumbidzai nemiromo inofara kwazvo;
Kana ndichikurangarirai panhovo yangu, Ndichikufungai panguva dzousiku.
Nokuti makanga muri mubatsiri wangu, Pamumvuri wamapapiro enyu ndipo pandichafara kwazvo.
Mweya wangu unokunamatirai nesimba rose; Ruoko rwenyu rworudyi runonditsigira.
Asi avo, vanotsvaka kuparadza mweya wangu, Vachapinda munzvimbo dzapasi dzenyika.
Vachaiswa pasimba romunondo; Vachava mugove wamakava.
Asi mambo achafara munaMwari; Mumwe nomumwe anopika naye achafara kwazvo; Nokuti muromo wavanoreva nhema uchadzivirwa.
Inzwai inzwi rangu, Mwari, pakuchema kwangu; Chengetai upenyu hwangu ndirege kutyiswa nomuvengi.
Ndivanzei pakurangana kwakavanda kwavanoita zvakaipa; Pabope ravanobata zvakaipa;
Ivo vakarodza rurimi rwavo somunondo, Vakashumba miseve yavo, iwo mashoko anovava;
Kuti vafure akarurama, vakavanda ivo; Kamwe-kamwe vanomufura, vasingatyi.
Vanotsungirira pazano rakaipa; Vanorangana kuteya misungo pakavanda; Vanoti, Ndianiko angazviona?
Vanofungisa zvakaipa; Vanoti, Tapedza kufungisa zano guru; Kufunga kwomukati kwomumwe nomumwe, nomoyo, zvakadzika.
Asi Mwari achavapfura, Vachakuvadzwa kamwe-kamwe nomuseve.
Naizvozvo vachagumbuswa, ndimi dzavo dzichivapupurira zvakaipa; Vose vanovaona vachadzungudza musoro.
Vanhu vose vachatya; Vachaparidza basa raMwari, Vachicherekedza zvakanaka zvaanoita.
Vakarurama vachafara muna Jehovha, vachavimba naye; Vose vane moyo yakarurama vachafara kwazvo.
Imi Mwari munofanira kurumbidzwa paZiyoni; Imi munofanira kuitirwa mhiko.
Imi vokunzwa munyengetero, Vanhu vose vanofanira kuuya kwamuri.
Mashoko akaipa ondikunda; Kana kuri kudarika kwedu muchakudzima imi.
Akaropafadzwa munhu wamunosanangura, wamunoswededza kwamuri, Kuti agare pavazhe dzenyu; Isu tichagutiswa nounaki hweimba yenyu, Iyo nzvimbo tsvene yetemberi yenyu.
Mukururama kwenyu munotipindura nezvinhu zvinotyisa, Imi Mwari muponesi wedu; Imi chivimbo chamativi ose apasi, Navari kure pagungwa;
Iye, anoteya makomo nesimba rake; Iye, akasungwa chiuno nesimba;
Iye, unonyaradza kutinhira kwamakungwa, iko kutinhira kwamafungo awo, Nokupopota kwavanhu.
Naivo vagere kumigumo vanotya zviratidzo zvenyu; Munofadza mabudiro amangwanani naamadeko.
Munoshanyira pasi, munopadiridza, Munopafumisa kwazvo; Rwizi rwaMwari ruzere nemvura; Munovagadzirira zviyo, kana magadzira pasi saizvozvo.
Munozadza mihoronga yapo kwazvo; Munoenzanisa mipanje yapo; Munopanyorovesa nemvura inopfunha; Munoropafadza zvinomera zvapo.
Munoshongedza mwaka nekorona younaki hwenyu; Makwara enyu anodonha mafuta.
Anodonha pamafuro erenje; Zvikomo zvinozvisunga nomufaro.
Mafuro akafukidzwa namapoka ezvipfuwo; Uye mipatawo yakafukidzwa nezviyo; Zvinopururudza, zvichiimbawo.
Pururudzai kuna Mwari, imi nyika dzose;
Imbirai mukurumbira wezita rake; Rumbidzai kudzo yake.
Itiyi kuna Mwari, Mabasa enyu anotyisa sei!
Vavengi venyu vachazviisa pasi penyu nemhaka youkuru hwesimba renyu.
Pasi pose pachanamata kwamuri, Pachakuimbirai; Vachaimbira zita renyu.
Uyai, muone mabasa aMwari; Anotyisa pane zvaanoitira vana vavanhu.
Akashandura gungwa rikava nyika yakaoma; Vakayambuka rwizi netsoka; Ipapo takafara maari.
Anobata ushe nokusingaperi nesimba rake; Meso ake anocherekedza ndudzi; Vanomumukira ngavarege kuzvikudza.
Vongai Mwari, imi vanhu, inzwi rokumurumbidza ngarinzwike;
Iye anopa mweya upenyu, Asingatenderi tsoka dzedu kuti dzitedzemuke.
Nokuti imi Mwari makatiidza; Makatiidza sezvinoidzwa sirivha.
Makatipinza pamumbure; Makatitakudza mutoro unorema pazviuno zvedu.
Makafambisa vanhu pamusoro pemisoro yedu, Takapinda nomumoto nemvura; Asi makatibudisa kunzvimbo inezvakawanda.
Ndichapinda mumba menyu nezvipiriso zvinopiswa, Ndichakuitirai mhiko dzangu,
Dzakarehwa nemiromo yangu, Dzakataurwa nomuromo wangu pakutambudzika kwangu.
Ndichakubayirai zvipiriso zvinopiswa zvezvakakora, Nezvinonhuwira zvamakondohwe; Ndichabayira nzombe pamwechete nembudzi.
Uyai munzwe, imi mose munotya Mwari, Ndichakududzirai zvaakaitira mweya wangu.
Ndakachema kwaari nomuromo wangu, Akarumbidzwa zvikuru norurimi rwangu.
Kana ndikarangarira zvakaipa mumoyo mangu, Ishe haangandinzwi;
Asi zvirokwazvo Mwari akanzwa; Akateerera inzwi rokunyengetera kwangu.
Mwari ngaavongwe, Iye asina kuramba munyengetero wangu, kana kubvisa tsitsi yake kwandiri.
Mwari ngaatinzwire tsitsi, atiropafadze, Ngaativhenekere nechiso chake;
Kuti nzira yenyu izikanwe pasi, Nokuponesa kwenyu pakati pendudzi dzose.
Vanhu ngavakuvongei, Mwari; Vanhu vose ngavakuvongei.
Ndudzi ngadzifare, ngadziimbe nomufaro; Nokuti muchatonga vanhu nokururama, Muchafambisa ndudzi pasi.
Vanhu ngavakuvongei Mwari; Vanhu vose ngavakuvongei.
Pasi pakabereka zvibereko zvapo; Mwari, iye Mwari wedu, achatiropafadza.
Mwari achatiropafadza; Nemigumo yose yapasi ichamutya.
Mwari ngaasimuke, vavengi vake ngavaparadzirwe; Vanomuvenga ngavatize pamberi pake.
Muvadzinge, sokudzingwa kwoutsi; Sokunyauka kwenamo pamoto, Saizvozvo vakaipa ngavapere pamberi paMwari.
Asi vakarurama ngavafare; ngavafare kwazvo pamberi paMwari; Ngavafare nokufara kukuru.
Imbirai Mwari, imbirai zita rake nziyo dzokurumbidza; Mumugadzirire mugwagwa wakanaka, iye anofamba nengoro napamarenje; Zita rake ndiJehovha; farai kwazvo pamberi pake.
Baba venherera, nomutongi wemhosva dzechirikadzi, Ndiye Mwari paugaro hwake hutsvene.
Vakanga vari voga, Mwari anovagarisa pamhuri; Anobudisira vasungwa kumufaro; Asi vanomumukira vanogara panyika yakaoma.
Mwari, panguva yamakatungamirira vanhu venyu, Panguva yokufamba kwenyu murenje;
Pasi pakabvunda, Kudenga-denga kwakadonha pamberi paMwari; Nairo Sinai rakabvunda pamberi paMwari, iye Mwari waIsiraeri.
Imi Mwari makanisa mvura zhinji, Makasimbisa nhaka yenyu panguva yokuneta kwayo.
Ungano yenyu yakagaramo; Imi Mwari makagadzirira varombo zvakanaka zvenyu.
Ishe akataura shoko, Vakadzi vakaparidza shoko vaiva
Madzimambo ehondo anotiza, Mukadzi akasara kumusha ndiye anogovera zvakapambwa.
Kana imi movata pasi pakati pamatanga amakwai, Zvakafanana namapapiro enjiva akafukidzwa nesirivha, Neminhenga yakafukidzwa nendarama tsvuku.
Panguva iyo waMasimbaose yaakaparadza madzimambomo, Zvakafanana nokuwa kwechando paZarimoni.
Gomo reBhashani igomo raMwari; Gomo reBhashani igomo refu-refu.
Imi makomo marefu, munogodorerei Iro gomo rakadikanwa naMwari kuti agare mariri?
Jehovha achagara mariri nokusingaperi.
Ngoro dzaMwari dzinosvika zviuru zvina makumi maviri, zviuru zvezviuru zvamazana; Ishe ari pakati padzo, sezvaakaita paSinai, panzvimbo tsvene.
Makakwira kumusoro, mukatapa vatapwa venyu; Makagamuchira zvipo pakati pavanhu Zvirokwazvo pakati pavakakumukiraiwo, kuti Jehovha Mwari agare navo.
Ishe ngaavongwe, iye anotakura mitoro yedu zuva rimwe nerimwe, Iye Mwari muponesi wedu.
Mwari ndiye Mwari anotirwira; Jehovha Ishe ndiye ane nzira dzokubuda murufu.
Asi Mwari achatema misoro yavavengi vake, Paganda romusoro rine vhudzi romunhu anorambira pakutadza kwake.
Ishe akati, Ndichavadzosa paBhashani, Ndichavadzosazve pagungwa rakadzika;
Kuti unyike rutsoka rwako muropa, Kuti ndimi dzembwa dzako dzive nomugove wadzo pavavengi vako.
Vakaona mafambiro enyu, Mwari, Mafambiro aMwari wangu, Mambo wangu, achipinda panzvimbo tsvene.
Vaimbi vakatungamira, varidzi vemitengeranwa vakatevera, Pakati pavasikana vakanga vachiridza makandira.
Rumbidzai Mwari paungano, Iye Ishe, iyemi vetsime raIsiraeri.
Bhenjamini muduku, mubati wavo, aripo, Namachinda aJudha navazhinji vavo, Namachinda aZebhuruni, namachinda aNafutari.
Mwari wako akaraira simba rake; Simbisai, Mwari, izvo zvamakatiitira.
Nokuda kwetemberi yenyu paJerusaremu Madzimambo achakuvigirai zvipo.
Tukai chikara chetsanga, Hando zhinji, nemhuru dzendudzi dzavanhu, Vazviwisire pasi petsoka nemari yesirivha; Muparadzire vanhu vanofarira kurwa.
Machinda achabuda Ijipiti; Itiopia ichakurumidza kutambanudza maoko ayo kuna Mwari.
Imbirai Mwari, imi ushe hwapasi; Imbirai Ishe nziyo dzokurumbidza.
Iye anotasva padenga rokudenga-denga, iro rakare nakare; Inzwai, anobudisa inzwi rake, inzwi rine simba.
Ipai Mwari simba; Ukuru hwake huri pamusoro paIsiraeri, Simba rake riri mumakore.
Imi Mwari munotyisa panzvimbo dzenyu tsvene; Mwari waIsiraeri ndiye anopa vanhu vake simba noushe.
Mwari ngaavongwe.
Ndiponesei, Mwari, Nokuti mvura zhinji yasvikira pamweya wangu.
Ndinonyura munhope yakadzika, pokumira Ndakasvika pamvura zhinji yakadzika, pandinofukidzwa nenzizi.
Ndaneta nokuchema kwangu; huro dzangu dzaoma; Meso angu anovava nokurindira Mwari wangu.
Vanondivenga ndisina mhosva vazhinji kupfuura vhudzi romusoro wangu; Avo vanoda kundiparadza vane simba, kunyange vachindivenga ndisina mhosva; Ndakafanira kudzosera zvandinenge ndisina kutora.
Mwari munoziva upenzi hwangu; Mhosva dzangu hadzina kukuvanzirwai.
Ishe Mwari wehondo, vanokurindirai ngavarege kunyadziswa nokuda kwangu; Mwari waIsiraeri, vanokutsvakai ngavarege kuzvidzwa nokuda kwangu.
Nokuti ndakatenda kushorwa nokuda kwenyu; Kunyadza kwakafukidza chiso changu.
Ndakava mutorwa kuhama dzangu, Nomubvakure kuvana vamai vangu.
Nokuti kushingairira imba yenyu kwakandipedza; Nokushora, kwavanokushorai kwakawira pamusoro pangu.
Panguva yokuchema kwangu nokutambudza mweya wangu ndichizvinyima, Ndakashorwa nokuda kwazvo.
Panguva yandakafuka masaga ndikaaita nguvo dzangu, Ndakava shumo pakati pavo.
Vanogara pasuo vanondireva; Ndiri chiimbo chavakabatwa nedoro.
Asi kana ndirini, munyengetero wangu uri kwamuri, Ishe, panguva yakafanira; Mwari, netsitsi dzenyu zhinji Ndipindurei nokuponesa kwenyu kwakatendeka.
Ndirwirei munhope, ndirege kunyura; Ndirwirwe kuna vanondivenga, napamvura zhinji yakadzika.
Boporodzi remvura rirege kundikunda, Mvura yakadzika irege kundimedza; Gomba rirege kuzarira muromo waro pamusoro pangu.
Ndipindurei, Jehovha; nokuti unyoro hwenyu hwakanaka; Ringirai kwandiri nokuda kwetsitsi dzenyu zhinji.
Regai kuvanzira muranda wenyu chiso chenyu; Nokuti ndiri pakutambudzika; kurumidzai kundipindura.
Swederai kumweya wangu, muudzikunure; Ndidzikunurei nokuda kwavavengi vangu.
Munoziva kushorwa kwangu, nokunyadzwa kwangu nokuzvidzwa kwangu Vadzivisi vangu vose vari mberi kwangu.
Kushora kwakaputsa moyo wangu; ndaremerwa kwazvo; Ndakatsvaka vangandinzwira nyasha, asi kwakanga kusino munhu; Ndakatsvaka vavaraidzi, asi handina kuwana nomumwe.
Vakandipa nduru zvive zvokudya zvangu; Pakunzwa nyota kwangu vakandinwisa vhiniga.
Tafura yavo ngaive musungo pamberi pavo; Neriva, kana vakagarika havo.
Meso avo ngaapofumadzwe, varege kuona, Zviuno zvavo ngazvirambe zvichiguda-guda.
Dururai kutsamwa kwenyu pamusoro pavo, Hasha dzenyu dzinopfuta, ngadzivabate.
Ugaro hwavo ngahuparadzwe; Ngakurege kuva nomunhu anogara pamatende avo.
Nokuti vanotambudza uyo wamakarova; Vanotaura zvokurwadziwa kwavaya vamakakuvadza.
Wedzerai zvakaipa pazvakaipa zvavo; Ngavarege kupinda pakururama kwenyu.
Ngavadzimwe parugwaro rwoupenyu, Varege kunyorwa pamwechete navakarurama.
Asi ini ndiri murombo, ndinorwadziwa; Kuponesa kwenyu, Mwari, ngakundiise pakakwirira.
Ndicharumbidza zita raMwari norwiyo, Ndichamukudza nokuvonga.
Izvo zvichafadza Jehovha kupfuura nzombe, Kana hando ine nyanga namahwanda.
Vanyoro vakazviona vakafara; Imi munotsvaka Mwari, moyo yenyu ngairarame.
Nokuti Jehovha anonzwa vashaiwi, Haashori vasungwa vake.
Kudenga napasi ngazvimurumbidze, Makungwa, nezvose zvinopfakanyikamo.
Nokuti Mwari achaponesa Ziyoni, nokuvaka maguta aJudha, Vachagaramo, ive nhaka yavo.
Ichava nhaka yavana vavaranda vake; Vanoda zita rake vachagaramo.
Kurumidzai, Mwari, kundirwira; Kurumidzai kundibatsira, Jehovha.
Ngavanyadziswe, ngavazvidzwe Ivo vanotsvaka mweya wangu; Ngavadzoserwe shure, vashovorwe Ivo vanofarira kundikuvadza.
Ngavadzoserwe shure nokuda kwenyadzi dzavo Ivo vanoti, Hekani, hekani!
Waro!
Vose vanokutsvakai ngavafarise vave nomufaro mamuri; Vanoda kuponesa kwenyu ngavarambe vachiti, Mwari ngaakudzwe!
Asi ini ndiri murombo nomushaiwi; Kurumidzai muuye kwandiri, Mwari; Imi muri mubatsiri wangu nomurwiri wangu; Regai kunonoka, Jehovha.
Jehovha, ndinovimba nemi; Ngandirege kutongonyadziswa.
Ndirwirei mukururama kwenyu, ndisunungurei; Rerekerai nzeve yenyu kwandiri, mundiponese.
Ivai dombo rangu mandingagara, kwandingaramba ndichienda; Makaraira kuti ndiponeswe; Nokuti ndimi dombo rangu nenhare yangu.
Ndisunungurei, Mwari wangu, paruoko rwowakaipa, Paruoko rwousina kururama nomunhu anomanikidza.
Nokuti imi, Ishe Jehovha, muri tariro yangu; Ndimi wandinovimba naye kubva pauduku hwangu.
Ndakatsigirwa nemi kubva pachizvaro; Ndimi makandibudisa padumbu ramai vangu; Ndichakurumbidzai.
Ndiri chishamiso kuna vazhinji; Asi imi muri utiziro hwangu hwakasimba.
Muromo wangu uchazadzwa nerumbidzo yenyu, Nekudzo yenyu zuva rose.
Regai kundirasha panguva yokukwegura kwangu; Musandisiya kana ndapera simba.
Nokuti vavengi vangu vanondireva; Vanogarira mweya wangu, vanorangana,
Vachiti, Mwari amusiya; Teverai, mumubate; nokuti hakuna ungamurwira.
Mwari, regai kuva kure neni; Mwari wangu, kurumidzai kundibatsira.
Avo vanodzivisa mweya wangu ngavanyadziswe vapere; Vanotsvaka kundikuvadza ngavafukidzwe nokushorwa nokuzvidzwa.
Asi ini ndicharamba ndichitarira, Ndicharamba ndichiwedzera kukurumbidzai.
Muromo wangu uchareva kururama kwenyu, Nokuponesa kwenyu zuva rose:, Nokuti handizivi kuwanda kwazvo.
Ndichauya namabasa ane simba raShe aJehovha; Ndichaparidza kururama kwenyu, iko kwenyu kwoga.
Mwari, makandidzidzisa kubva paujaya hwangu; Kusvikira zvino ndadudzira mabasa enyu anoshamisa.

Tidzosereizve, Mwari; Penyesai chiso chenyu, isu tiponeswe.
Jehovha, Mwari wehondo, Muchatsamwira munyengetero wavanhu venyu kusvikira rinhiko?
Makavadyisa zvokudya zvemisodzi, Nokuvanwisa misodzi yakawanda kwazvo.
Makatiita chinhu chinoitirwa nharo navatigere navo; Vavengi vedu vanotiseka pakati pavo.
Tidzosereizve, Mwari wehondo; Penyesai chiso chenyu, isu
Makandotora muzambiringa paIjipiti; Makadzinga vahedheni, mukausima.
Makaugadzirira, Ukabata kwazvo, ukazadza nyika.
Makomo akafukidzwa nomumvuri wawo, Nemisidhari yaMwari namatavi awo.
Wakatandisa matavi awo kusvikira pagungwa, Namashizha awo kusvikira kuRwizi.
Makaputsireiko mhanda dzawo, Kuti vose vanopfuura nenzira vautanhe?
Nguruve yomudondo inouparadza, Mhuka dzesango dzinoudya.
Dodzokai henyu, Mwari wehondo, Tarirai muri kudenga, muone, muve nehanya nomuzambiringa uyu.
Muchengete chakasimwa noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, Nomwanakomana, wamakazvirerera.
