Tidzosereizve, Jehovha Mwari wehondo; Penyesai chiso chenyu, isu tiponeswe.
Imbirai Mwari kwazvo, iye simba redu; Pururudzai kuna Mwari waJakobho.
Vambai rwiyo, muridze ngoma, Nembira dzinonakidza nomutengeranwa.
Ridzai hwamanda pakugara kwomwedzi, Napakuchena kwomwedzi, pamutambo wedu wakatarwa.
Nokuti ndizvo zvakatemerwa Zvakarairwa naMwari waJakobho.
Wakazvitema muna Josefa kuti chive chipupuriro, Panguva yaakandorwa nenyika yeIj ipiti; Pandakanzwa rurimi rwandakanga ndisingazivi.
Ndakabvisa mutoro pafudzi rake; Maoko ake akaregedza dengu.
Iwe wakadana pakutambudzika, ndikakurwira; Ndakakupindura ndiri panovanda kutinhira; Ndakakuidza pamvura zhinji yeMeribha.
Inzwai vanhu vangu, ndikupupurirei; Haiwa Isiraeri, dai waida hako kunditeerera!
Ngakurege kuvapo pakati penyu mwari wokumwe; Musanamata kunomumwe mwari wavatorwa.
Ndini Jehovha Mwari wako, Akakubudisa panyika yeIjipiti; Shamisa muromo wako kwazvo, ndigouzadza.
Asi vanhu vangu havana kuteerera inzwi rangu; Isiraeri wakandiramba chose.
Saka ndakavaregera paukukutu hwemoyo yavo, Kuti vafambe namano avo.
Haiwa, dai vanhu vangu vainditeerera havo, Dai Isiraeri aifamba nenzira dzangu!
Ndingadai ndakakurumidza kukunda vavengi vavo, Nokurova vadzivisi vavo noruoko rwangu.
Vanovenga Jehovha vaizviisa pasi pake; Asi nguva yavo yaivapo nokusingaperi.
Angadai aivadyisawo zviyo zvakaisvonaka; Ndaikugutsa nohuchi hunobva padombo.
Mwari anomira paungano yaMwari; Anotonga pakati pavamwari.
Muchatonga zvisina kururama kusvikira rinhiko, Muchisanangura vanhu vakaipa?
Tongerai mhaka dzavarombo nenherera; Ruramisirai vanotambudzika navanoshaiwa chose.
Sunungurai varombo navashaiwi Varwirei paruoko rwowakaipa.
Havazivi, havanzwisisi; Vanofamba-famba murima; Nheyo dzose dzapasi dzinozununguka.
Ndakati, Muri vamwari, Mose muri vanakomana voWokumusorosoro.
Kunyange zvakadaro muchafa savanhu, Muchafa somumwe wamachinda.
Simukai Mwari, mutongere pasi; Nokuti ndudzi dzose dzichava nhaka yenyu.
Haiwa Jehovha, regai kuramba munyerere; Regai kuramba musingatauri, musanyarara Mwari.
Nokuti tarirai, vavengi venyu vanoita bope; Vanokuvengai vakasimudza misoro yavo.
Vanofunga mano kuti vanyengere vanhu venyu, Vanorangana pamusoro pavakavanzwa nemi.
Vakati, Uyai, tivaparadze, varege kuzova rudzi; Kuti zita raIsiraeri rirege kuzorangarirwa.
Nokuti vakarangana nomoyo mumwe; Vanoita sungano kuzorwa nemi.
Matende aEdhomu navaIshimaeri, Moabhu navaHagari;
Gebhari, naAmoni, naAmareki; Firisitia pamwechete navagere Tire;
Asiriawo wakasangana navo; Vakabatsira vana vaRoti.

Ivo vakaparadzwa paEndori; Vakava mupfudze wapasi.

Ivo vakati, Ngatizvitorere Ugaro hwaMwari huve hwedu.
Mwari wangu, muvaite seguruva rinondeyeswa nemhepo; Samakoto anodzingwa nemhepo.
Somoto unopisa dondo, Somurazvo womoto unopisa makomo;
Muvateverere saizvozvo nedutu renyu remhepo, Muvavhunduse nechamupupuri chenyu.
Fukidzai zviso zvavo nokunyadziswa; Kuti vatsvake zita renyu, Jehovha.
Ngavanyadziswe, vavhunduswe nokusingaperi; Zvirokwazvo, ngavanyadziswe vafe;
Vazive kuti imi moga, imi munezita rinonzi Jehovha, Ndimi Wokumusorosoro kumusoro kwapasi pose.
Ugaro hwenyu hunodikanwa sei, Imi Jehovha wehondo!
Mweya wangu unoshuva, zvirokwazvo unopanga vazhe dzaJehovha; moyo wangu nenyama yangu zvinodana kuna Mwari mupenyu.
Zvirokwazvo, shiri yakazviwanira imba, Nyenganyenga yakazviwanira dendere, painoisa vana vayo, Ipo paaritari dzenyu, Jehovha wehondo, Mambo wangu, naMwari wangu.
Vakaropafadzwa vanogara mumba menyu; Vachagara vachikurumbidzai.
Akaropafadzwa munhu ane simba rake mamuri; Anemigwagwa inoenda Ziyoni mumoyo make.
Kana vachipfuura nomumupata wakaoma, vanouita nzvimbo inamatsime; Zvirokwazvo, mvura yomunhuruka inoufukidza nemikomborero.
Vanowedzera simba pasimba ravo, Mumwe nomumwe wavo anosvika pamberi paMwari paZiyoni.
Haiwa, Jehovha wehondo, inzwa munyengetero wangu; teererai nenzeve, Mwari waJakobho.
Tarirai, Mwari, nhovo yedu, Muone chiso chomuzodzwa wenyu.
Nokuti zuva rimwe pavazhe dzenyu rinokunda mamwe ane chiuru pakunaka.

Nokuti Jehovha Mwari izuva nenhovo; Jehovha achapa nyasha nokukudzwa; Hapana chinhu chakanaka chaanganyima vanofamba nokururama.
Jehovha wehondo, Akaropafadzwa munhu anovimba nemi.

Makakanganwira kutadza kwavanhu venyu, Makafukidza zvivi zvavo zvose.
Makabvisa kutsamwa kwenyu kwose; Makazvidzora pahasha dzenyu dzakanyanya.
Tidzosei, Mwari muponesi wedu, Gumisai hasha dzenyu kwatiri.
Ko mucharamba makatitsamwira nokusingaperi?
Muchasvitsa kutsamwa kwenyu kumarudzi namarudzi here?
Imi hamungatiraramisizve here, Kuti vanhu venyu vafare nemi?
Tiratidzei ngoni dzenyu, Jehovha, Mutipe ruponeso rwenyu.
Ndichanzwa zvichataura Mwari Jehovha; Nokuti achataura rugare kuvanhu vake nokuvatsvene vake; Asi ngavarege kudzokerazve kuupenzi.
Zvirokwazvo kuponesa kwake kuri pedo navanomutya; Kuti kubwinya kugare munyika yedu.
Ngoni nezvokwadi zvakasangana; Kururama norugare zvakatsvodana.
Zvokwadi zvinomera pasi; Kururama kwakatarira pasi kuri kudenga.

Kururama kuchamutungamirira; Kuchagadzirira tsoka dzake nzira.
Rerekai nzeve dzenyu, Jehovha, ndipindurei; Nokuti ndiri murombo nomushaiwi.
Chengetai mweya wangu; nokuti ndiri mudikanwi wenyu; Haiwa Mwari wangu, ponesai muranda wenyu anovimba nemi.
Ndinzwirei ngoni, Ishe; Nokuti ndinodana kwamuri zuva rose.
Fadzai mweya womuranda wenyu; Nokuti ndinosimudzira mweya wangu kwamuri Ishe wangu.
Nokuti imi, Ishe makanaka, munofarira kukanganwira, Mune ngoni zhinji kuna vose vanodana kwamuri.

Nokuti imi muri mukuru, munoita Ndimi Mwari woga.

Nokuti ngoni dzenyu ihuru kwandiri; Makarwira mweya wangu pagomba rakadzika-dzika.

Nheyo dzake dziri pamakomo matsvene.

Jehovha, Mwari muponesi wangu, Ndakachema masikati nousiku pamberi penyu;

Nokuti mweya wangu uzere namatambudziko, Upenyu hwangu hwoswedera kuSheori.
Ndinoverengwa pamwechete navanoburukira kugomba; Ndakafanana nomunhu anoshaiwa mubatsiri;
Ndakarashirwa pakati pavakafa, Savakaurawa vavete mubwiro, Vamusati mucharangarira; Vakagurwa paruoko rwenyu.
Makandiisa mugomba rakadzika-dzika, Panzvimbo dzine rima, makadzika kwazvo.
Hasha dzenyu dzinorema kwazvo pamusoro pangu, Makanditambudza namafungu enyu ose.
Makaisa vazikani vangu kure neni; Makandiita chinhu chinonyangadza kwavari; Ndakapfigirwa, handigoni kubuda.

Munovanzireiko chiso chenyu kwandiri?

Ndichamisa vana vako nokusingaperi, Nokuvaka chigaro chako choushe kusvikira kumarudzi namarudzi.

Nokuti ndianiko mudenga rose angaenzaniswa naJehovha?

Haiwa, Jehovha, Mwari wehondo, Ndianiko ane simba, akafanana nemi, Jehovha?
Kutendeka kwenyu kunokukomberedzai.
Ndimi munobata kuzvikudza kwegungwa; Kana mafungu aro achisimuka, ndimi munoanyaradza.
Makaputsanya Rahabhi, somunhu akaurawa; Makaparadzira vavengi venyu noruoko rwenyu rune simba.
Kudenga-denga ndokwenyu, napasi ndopenyuwo; Nyika nezvose zvayo, ndimi makazviteya.
Kumusoro nenyasi, ndimi makazvisika; Tabhori neHerimoni anofara nezita renyu.
Munoruoko rune simba; Chanza chenyu chine simba, ruoko rwenyu rworudyi rwakasimudzwa.

Chanza changu chichasimbiswa naye; Ruoko rwanguvo ruchamusimbisa.
Muvengi haangamumanikidzi; Mwanakomana wezvakaipa haangamutambudzi.

Ndichamuitawo dangwe rangu, Mukuru wamadzimambo apasi.
Ndichamuchengetera ngoni dzangu nokusingaperi, Sungano yangu icharamba yakasimba kwaari.
Vana vake ndichavagarisawo nokusingaperi, Chigaro chake choushe chichafanana namazuva okudenga.
Kana vana vake vakasiya murayiro wangu, Vakasafamba nezvandakatonga;
Kana vakazvidza zvandakatema, Vakasachengeta mirau yangu;
Ipapo ndichavaranga neshamhu pamusoro pokudarika kwavo, Uye nokurova pamusoro pokuipa kwavo.
Asi handingamutoreri unyoro hwangu chose, Kana kutendera kutendeka kwangu kuitiswa nhema.
Sungano yangu handingaizvidzi, Kana kushandura chinhu chakabuda pamuromo wangu.
Ndakapika kamwe chete neutsvene hwangu; Handingarevi nhema kuna Dhavhidhi;
Vana vake vachavapo nokusingaperi, Chigaro chake choushe chichafanana nezuva pamberi pangu.
Chichasimbiswa nokusingaperi somwedzi, Sechapupu chakatendeka chiri kudenga.
Asi imi makarasha nokuramba, Makatsamwira muzodzwa wenyu.
Makasema sungano yomuranda wenyu; Makazvidza korona yake mukaikandira pasi.

Kutsamwa kwenyu kuchapisa somoto kusvikira rinhiko?

Ishe, unyoro hwenyu hwakare huripiko, Hwamakapika kuna Dhavhidhi nokutendeka kwenyu here?

Ameni, zvirokwazvo, Ameni.

Mangwanani hunotumbuka, hunomera; Madekwana hunodzurwa, ndokusvava.
Nokuti tinopedzwa nokutsamwa kwenyu, Tinotambudzika nehasha dzenyu.
Makaisa zvakaipa zvedu pamberi penyu, Zvivi zvedu zvakavanzika pachiedza chechiso chenyu.

Nokuti gare-gare aenda, nesu tabhururuka taenda.
Ndianiko anoziva simba rokutsamwa kwenyu, Nehasha dzenyu, kuti mutyiwe zvakafanira here?
Tidzidzisei kunatsoverenga mazuva edu, Kuti tizviwanire moyo wakachenjera.
Dzokai Jehovha; kusvikira rinhiko?
Muzvidembe pamusoro pavaranda venyu.
Tigutsei mangwanani nengoni dzenyu; Kuti tifarise, tive nomufaro mazuva edu ose.
Tifadzei zvinoenzana namazuva amakatitambudza, Namakore atakaona zvakaipa.
Zvamakaita ngazvionekwe navaranda venyu, Nokubwinya kwenyu pamusoro pavana vavo.

Kana hosha inofamba murima, Kana kuparadza kunouraya masikati.

Nokuti imi Jehovha, muri utiziro hwangu!
Iwe wakaita Wokumusorosoro ugaro hwako.
Hapana chakaipa chingakuwira, Uye hapana hosha ichaswedera patende rako.
Nokuti iye acharaira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako, Kuti vakuchengete panzira dzako dzose.
Vachakusimudza pamaoko avo, Kuti urege kugumbusa rutsoka rwako pabwe.
Uchatsika pamusoro peshumba nechiva; Mwana weshumba nenyoka uchazvitsikirira pasi.
Zvaakandida, ndichamurwira; Ndichamuisa pakakwirira, nokuti wakaziva zita rangu.

Ndichamugutsa noupenyu hurefu, Nokumuratidza ruponeso rwangu.
Zvakanaka kuvonga Jehovha, Nokuimbira zita renyu nziyo dzokurumbidza, imi Wokumusorosoro;
Kuparidza unyoro hwenyu mangwanani, Nokutendeka kwenyu usiku hwose,

Hareruya
Vongai Jehovha, mudane zita rake; Zivisai zvaakaita pakati pendudzi dzavanhu.
Muimbirei, mumuimbire nziyo dzokukudza; Rondedzerai mabasa ake ose anoshamisa.
Zvirumbidzei muzita rake dzvene; moyo yavanotsvaka Jehovha ngaifare kwazvo.
Tsvakai Jehovha nesimba rake; Tsvakai chiso chake nguva dzose.
Rangarirai mabasa ake anoshamisa, aakaita; Zvishamiso zvake, nezvaakatonga nomuromo wake;
Imi vana vaAbhurahamu, muranda wake, Imi vanakomana vaJakobho, vasanangurwa vake.
Ndiye Jehovha Mwari wedu; Zvaakatonga zviri pasi pose.
Wakarangarira sungano yake nokusingaperi, Iro shoko raakaraira kumarudzi ane chiuru;
Iyo sungano yaakaita naAbhurahamu, Nemhiko yake kuna Isaka.
Akazvisimbisira Jakobho, kuti uve mutemo, Kuna Isiraeri kuti ive sungano isingaperi;
Achiti, Ndichakupa iwe nyika yeKanani, Uve mugove wenhaka yenyu;
Panguva yavakanga vachiri varume vashoma pakuverengwa, Zvirokwazvo, vashoma kwazvo, navatorwa mairi;
Vakafamba-famba vachibva kuno rumwe rudzi vachienda kuno rumwe, Nokubva kunoumwe ushe vachienda kuna vamwe vanhu.
Haana kutendera munhu kuvaitira zvakaipa; Zvirokwazvo, wakatuka madzimambo nokuda kwavo;
Achiti, Musagunzva vazodzwa vangu, Navaporofita vangu musavaitira chakaipa.
Akadana nzara kuti iuye panyika; Akavhuna mudonzvo wose wechingwa.
Akatuma murume pamberi pavo; Josefa akatengeswa akava muranda;
Vakakuvadza tsoka dzake nezvisungo zvesimbi, Akasungwa namaketani amatare;
Kusvikira panguva yakaitika shoko rake; Shoko raJehovha rakamuidza.
Mambo akatuma nhume akamusunungura; Mubati wendudzi dzavanhu, akamuregedza.
Akamuita ishe weimba yake, Nomubati wefuma yake yose;
Kuti araire machinda ake nokuda kwake, Nokudzidzisa vakuru vake huchenjeri.
Isiraeri akasvikawo Ijipiti, NaJakobho wakagara ari mutorwa panyika yaHamu.
Akawanza vanhu vake kwazvo, Akavapa simba rakapfuura ravadzivisi vavo.
Wakashandura moyo yavo kuti vavenge vanhu vake, Kuti vanyengere varanda vake.
Akatuma Mozisi muranda wake, NaAroni waakanga asanangura.
Ivo vakaratidza zviratidzo zvake pakati pavo, Nezvishamiso panyika yaHamu.
Akatuma rima, akaisvibisa; Vakasamukira mashoko ake.
Akashandura mvura yavo yose, ikaita ropa, Akauraya hove dzavo.
Nyika yavo yakazara namatatya, Mudzimba dzamadzimambo avo.
Akataura, mapupira enhunzi akasvika, Nenda panyika yavo yose.
Akavapa chimvuramabwe panzvimbo yemvura, Uye moto wakapfuta munyika yavo.
Wakarovawo mizambiringa yavo nemionde yavo; Akavhuna-vhunawo miti yenyika yavo
Akataura, mhashu dzikasvika, Namagwatakwata asingagoni kuverengwa.
Zvikapedza miriwo yose munyika yavo, Nokupedza zvibereko zvevhu ravo.
Akarovawo matangwe ose munyika yavo, Ivo vokutanga vesimba ravo rose.
Akavabudisa vane sirivha nendarama; Kwakanga kusina nomumwe pakati pamarudzi avo wakashaiwa simba.
Nyika yeIjipiti yakafara pakubva kwavo, Nokuti vakanga vabatwa nokutya nokuda kwavo.
Wakatatamura gore rikava chifukidzo; Nomoto kuzovhenekera usiku.
Vakakumbira, akauyisa zvihuta, Akavagutisa nechingwa chakabva kudenga.
Akazarura dombo, mvura zhinji ikadzutuka; Ikayerera pakanga pakaoma sorwizi.
Nokuti akarangarira shoko rake dzvene, NaAbhurahamu muranda wake.
Akabudisa vanhu vake nomufaro, Navasanangurwa vake vachiimba.
Akavapa nyika dzavahedheni; Vakazvitorera zvakanga zvabatwa nendudzi dzavanhu;
Kuti vachengete zvaakatema, Nokuteerera mirairo yake.
Hareruya.
Hareruya.
Vongai Jehovha, nokuti akanaka; Nokuti ngoni dzake dzinogara nokusingaperi.
Ndianiko angareva zvinhu zvine simba zvakaitwa naJehovha, Kana kududzira kurumbidza kwake kwose?
Vakaropafadzwa vanochengeta kururama, Naiye anoita zvakarurama nguva dzose.
Ndirangarirei Jehovha, nounyoro hwamunahwo kuvanhu venyu; Ndishanyirei noruponeso rwenyu.
Kuti ndione kukomborerwa kwavasanangurwa venyu, Kuti ndifare kwazvo nomufaro wavanhu venyu, Kuti ndirumbidze pamwechete nenhaka yenyu.
Takatadza pamwechete namadzibaba edu, Takaita pamwechete namadzibaba edu, Takaita zvisina kururama, takaita zvakaipa.
Madzibaba edu haana kunzwisisa zvishamiso zvenyu paIjipiti; Haana kurangarira ngoni dzenyu zhinji; Asi vakakumukirai pagungwa, ipo paGungwa Dzvuku.
Kunyange zvakadaro akavaponesa nokuda kwezita rake, Kuti azivise simba rake guru.
Akarairawo Gungwa Dzvuku, rikapwa, Akavafambisa pakadzika sapanenge pabani.
Akavaponesa paruoko rwowaivavenga.
Akavadzikunura paruoko rwomuvengi.
Mvura zhinji yakafukidza vadzivisi vavo; Kwakanga kusina nomumwe wavo akasara.
Ipapo vakatenda mashoko ake; Vakaimba vachimurumbidza.
Vakachimbidzika kukanganwa mabasa ake; Havana kurindira zano rake.
Asi vakachiva kwazvo-kwazvo murenje, Vakaidza Mwari mugwenga.
Akavapa chavakakumbira; Asi akatuma kuonda mumweya yavo.
Vakagodora Mozisi pamisasa, NaAroni, mutsvene waJehovha.
Pasi pakashama pakamedza Dhatani, Pakafukidza boka raAbhirami.
Moto ukapfuta pakati peboka ravo; Murazvo ukapisa vakaipa.
Vakaita mhuru paHorebhi, Vakanamata mufananidzo wakaumbwa.
Vakatsinhana saizvozvo kubwinya kwavo Nomufananidzo wemombe, inochera bundo.
Vakakanganwa Mwari muponesi wavo, Wakaita zvinhu zvikuru paIjipiti;
Mabasa anoshamisa munyika yaHamu, Nezvinhu zvinotyisa paGungwa Dzvuku.
Saka akati, Ndinoda kuvaparadza; Dai Mozisi musanangurwa wake asina kumira pamberi pake ipo pakaputsika, Kuti adzore kutsamwa kwake, arege kuvaparadza.
Zvirokwazvo, vakazvidza nyika inofadza, Havana kutenda shoko rake;
Asi vakanyunyuta mumatende avo, Vakasateerera inzwi raJehovha.
Saka wakavasimudzira ruoko rwake.
Kuti avaparadze murenje;
Uye kuti aparadze vana vavo pakati pavahedheni.
Avaparadzire panyika dzose.
Vakazvibatanidzawo naBhaaripeori, Vakadya zvakabayirwa vakafa.
Naizvozvo vakamutsamwisa nezvavakaita; Denda ndokupinda pakati pavo.
Ipapo Pinehasi akasimuka, akaita zvakarurama; Denda ndokuguma.
Izvozvo zvikanzi kwaari kururama, Kusvikira kumarudzi namarudzi nokusingaperi.
Vakamutsamwisawo pamvura zhinji yeMeribha, Naizvozvo Mozisi akaoneswa nhamo nokuda kwavo;
Nokuti vakamukira mweya wake, Iye akataura nehasha nemiromo yake.
Havana kuparadza ndudzi dzavanhu, Sezvavakanga varairwa naJehovha,
Asi vakavengana navahedheni, Vakadzidza mabasa avo;
Vakashumira zvifananidzo zvavo; Izvo zvikava musungo kwavari.
Zvirokwazvo, vakabayira mweya yakaipa vanakomana vavo navanasikana vavo,
Vakateura ropa risina mhosva, iro ravanakomana vavo navanasikana vavo, Vakavabayira zvifananidzo zveKanani; Nyika ikasvibiswa neropa.
Vakasvibiswa saizvozvo namabasa avo, Vakapata pane zvavakaita.
Saka kutsamwa kwaJehovha kwakamukira vanhu vake, Akasema nhaka yake.
Akavaisa muruoko rwavahedheni; Vakavavenga ndivo vaivabata.
Vavengi vavo vakavamanikidzawo, Vakaiswa pasi poruoko rwavo.
Akavarwira kazhinji, Asi vakamumukira pakurangana kwavo, Vakanyudzwa muzvakaipa zvavo.
Kunyange zvakadaro akatarira kutambudzika kwavo, Panguva yaakanzwa kuchema kwavo;
Akarangarira sungano yake nokuda kwavo, Akazvidemba nokuda kwokuwanda kwengoni dzake.
Akavanzwisawo tsitsi Navose vakanga vavatapa.
Tiponesei, Jehovha Mwari wedu, Tiunganidzei, tibve pakati pavahedheni, Kuti tivonge zita renyu dzvene, Tifarisise pakukurumbidzai.
Jehovha Mwari waIsiraeri ngaakudzwe, Kubva pakusingaperi kusvikira pakusingaperi.
Vanhu vose ngavati, Ameni.

vakafa nenzara nenyota,Mweya yavo ikaziya mukati mavo.

Wakavafambisawo nenzira yakarurama, Kuti vasvike kuguta rokugara.
Haiwa, dai vanhu vachirumbidza Jehovha nokuda kwokunaka kwake, Uye nokuda kwamabasa ake, anoshamisa, aakaitira vanakomana vavanhu!
Nokuti anogutisa mweya, une nyota, Uye mweya, une nzara, anouzadza nezvakanaka.
Ndivo, vakanga vagere murima nomumvuri worufu, Vakanga vakasungwa mukutambudzika namatare,

Saka wakaninipisa moyo yavo nokutambura; Vakawira pasi, kukasava nomunhu anobatsira.
Ipapo vakachema kuna Jehovha panhamo yavo, Akavaponesa pamatambudziko avo.
Akavabudisa parima nomumvuri worufu, Akadamburanya zvisungo zvavo.
Haiwa, dai vanhu vachirumbidza Jehovha nokuda kwokunaka kwake, Uye nokuda kwamabasa ake, anoshamisa, aakaitira vanakomana vavanhu!
Nokuti wakavhuna masuo endarira, Nokuguranya mazariro amatare.
Mapenzi anotambudzika nokuda kwokudarika kwavo, Uye nokuda kwazvakaipa zvavo.
Mweya wavo unosema zvokudya zvose; Vanoswedera pedo namasuo orufu.
Zvino vochema kuna Jehovha panhamo yavo, Iye anovaponesa pamatambudziko avo.
Anotuma shoko rake, ndokuvaporesa, Nokuvarwira pakuparadzwa kwavo.
Haiwa, dai vanhu vachirumbidza Jehovha nokuda kwokunaka kwake, Uye nokuda kwamabasa ake anoshamisa, aakaitira vanakomana vavanhu!
Ngavabayire zvibayiro zvokuvonga, Nokududzira mabasa ake nokuimba.
Avo, vanoburukira kugungwa muzvikepe, Vanoshambadzira kumvura zhinji;
Ndivo vanoona mabasa aJehovha, Nezvishamiso zvake pakadzika.
Nokuti anoraira, ndokumutsa dutu guru, Rinomutsa mafungu aro.
Vanosimudzirwa kudenga; ndokuburukirazve pakadzika; Mweya wavo unonyauka nokuda kwenhamo.
Vanondeya-ndeya nokudzengedzeka somunhu akabatwa.
Vapera mano.

Haiwa, dai vanhu vachirumbidza Jehovha nokuda kwokunaka kwake Uye nokuda kwamabasa ake anoshamisa aakaitira vanakomana vavanhu!.
Ngavamukudzisewo paungano yavanhu, Vamurumbidze pamakurukota avakuru.
Anoshandura nzizi dzikaita renje, Namatsime emvura aite nyika yakaoma;
Nyika, inobereka zvakanaka, ive sango rebare, Nokuda kwezvakaipa zvavanogara mairi.
Anoshandura renje riite dziva remvura, Nenyika yakaoma iite matsime emvura.
Ndipapo paanogarisa vane nzara, Kuti vamutse guta rokugaramo;
Vadzvare minda, vasime minda yemizambiringa, Vawane zvibereko zvizhinji.
Akavaropafadzawo, vakawanda kwazvo; Akasatendera zvipfuwo zvavo kutapudzwa.
Zvino vakatapudzika nokuva vashoma.
Nemhaka yokumanikidzwa, nenhamo, nokuzvidya moyo.
Anodurura kuzvidza pamusoro pamachinda, Achivadzungaidza murenje musina nzira.
Kunyange zvakadaro, anogadza mushaiwi kumusoro kusina dambudziko, Achimumutsira mhuri samapoka amakwai.
Akarurama achazviona, akafara; Uye zvakaipa zvose zvichadzivirwa muromo wazvo.
Ani naani akachenjera achacherekedza zvinhu izvozvi, Vachafunga unyoro hwaJehovha.
Mwari Mubatsiri wedu
moyo wangu wakasimba, Mwari; Ndichaimba, zvirokwazvo, ndichaimba nziyo dzokurumbidza, nomweya wangu wose.
Muka iwe mutengeranwa nembira; Ini ndimene ndichamuka mangwanani.
Ndichakuvongai Jehovha, pakati pendudzi dzavanhu; Ndichakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza pakati pavahedheni.
Nokuti ngoni dzenyu ihuru kumusoro kwokudenga-denga, Uye zvokwadi yenyu inosvikira kudenga rose.
Imi mukudzwe Mwari, kumusoro kwokudenga-denga; Kurumbidzwa kwenyu ngakuve kumusoro kwapasi pose.
Kuti vadikanwi venyu varwirwe, Tiponesei noruoko rwenyu rworudyi, mutipindure.
Mwari akataura pautsvene hwake, achiti, Ndichafara kwazvo; Ndichaganhura Shekemu, ndichayera mupata weSukoti.
Giriyadhi ndeyangu naManase ndeyangu; Efuremuwo inhaviro yomusoro wangu; Judha ndiyo tsvimbo yangu youshe.
Moabhu ndiwo mudziyo wangu wokushambidzira; Pamusoro peEdhomu ndipo pandichakandira shangu yangu; Ndichapururudza nokuda kwaFirisitia.
Ndianiko achandiisa muguta rakakombwa namasvingo?
Ndianiko achandiperekedza ndiende Edhomu?
Hamuna kutirasha here, Mwari?
Hamubudi Mwari, nehondo dzedu.
Tibatsirei pamudzivisi wedu; Nokuti kubatsira kwavanhu hakuna maturo.
MunaMwari tichaita noumhare; Nokuti ndiye achatsika vadzivisi vedu pasi.
Regai kunyarara, Mwari wokurumbidza kwangu;
Nokuti vakandishamisira muromo wowakaipa, uye muromo unonyengedzera; Vakandireva norurimi rune nhema.
Vakandikombawo namashoko embengo, Vakarwa neni pasina mhosva.
Pakuvada kwangu vava vadzivisi vangu; Asi ini ndinonyengetera hangu.
Vakanditsivira zvakaipa pane zvakanaka, zvandakavaitira, Nembengo pakuvada kwangu.
Isai munhu akaipa ave ishe wake; Mudzivisi ngaamire paruoko rwake rworudyi.
Kana achitongwa, ngaapiwe mhosva; Munyengetero wake ngaushandurwe zvivi.
Mazuva ake ngaave mashoma; Mumwe ngaatore basa rake.
Vana vake ngavave nherera, Uye mukadzi wake ngaave chirikadzi.
Vana vake ngavave vadzungairi, navapemhi; Ngavatsvake zvokudya kure namatongo avo.
Waakadyira chikwerete ngaatore zvose zvaanazvo; Vatorwa ngavapambe zvose zvaakabatira.
Ngakushaikwe munhu anomunzwira ngoni; Ngakushaikwe munhu anetsitsi nenherera dzake.
Vana vake ngavarove; Zita ravo ngaridzimwe parudzi runotevera.
Zvakaipa zvamadzibaba ake ngazvirangarirwe naJehovha; Zvivi zvamai vake ngazvirege kudzimwa.
Ngazvirambe zviri pamberi paJehovha nguva dzose, Kuti aparadze kurangarirwa kwavo pasi.
Nemhaka yokuti haana kurangarira kunzwira ngoni, Asi wakatambudza murombo nomushaiwi, Neanomoyo wakaputsika, kuti avauraye.
Zvirokwazvo, kutuka ndizvo zvaakada, zvikauyawo kwaari; Kukomborera haana kukufarira kukagara kure naye.
Akazvifukidzawo nokutuka, zvikaita senguvo yake, Zvikapinda mukati make semvura, Samafuta mumapfupa ake.
Ngazvive kwaari sechisimiro chaanofukidza nacho, Segwarada raakazvisunga naro nguva dzose.
Uyu ndiwo mubayiro wavadzivisi vangu, unobva kuna Jehovha, Nowavanotaurira mweya wangu zvakaipa.
Asi imi Jehovha Ishe, ndiitirei zvakanaka nokuda kwezita renyu; Ngoni dzenyu zvadzakanaka, ndirwirei.
Nokuti ndiri murombo nomushaiwi, Nomoyo wangu wakakuvadzwa mukati mangu.
Ndaenda somumvuri wareba; Ndapepereswa semhashu.
Mabvi angu haachine simba nokuzvinyima zvokudya; Nyama yangu yaonda nokushaiwa mafuta.
Ndavawo chinhu chinozvidzwa navo; Kana vachindiona vanodzungudza misoro yavo.
Ndibatsirei, Jehovha, Mwari wangu; Ndiponesei nengoni dzenyu.
Kuti vazive kuti ndirwo ruoko rwenyu; Kuti imwi Jehovha, ndimwi makazviita.
Ngavatuke havo, asi imi ropafadzai; Kana vachisimuka, vachanyadziswa, asi muranda wenyu achafara kwazvo.
Vadzivisi vangu ngavafukidzwe nokunyadziswa, Ngavazvifukidze nokunyara kwavo sejasi.
Ndichavonga Jehovha kwazvo nomuromo wangu; Zvirokwazvo, ndichamurumbidza pakati pavazhinji.
Nokuti iye achamira kuruoko rworudyi rwomushaiwi, Kuti amuponese panavanotonga mweya wake.

Kurumidzai kupindura, Jehovha; mweya wangu waziya; Regai kundivanzira chiso chenyu; Ndigosava savanoburukira kugomba.
Ndinzwisei unyoro hwenyu mangwanani; Nokuti ndinovimba nemi; Ndizivisei nzira yandinofanira kufamba nayo; Nokuti ndinosimudzira mweya wangu kwamuri.
Ndirwirei Jehovha, panavavengi vangu; Ndinovanda nemi.
Ndidzidzisei kuita kuda kwenyu; nokuti ndimi Mwari wangu; Mweya wenyu, wakanaka ngaundifambise munyika yakati chechetere,
Ndiponesei Jehovha, nokuda kwezita renyu; Budisai mweya wangu pakumanikidzwa nokururama kwenyu.
Pedzai vavengi vangu nounyoro hwenyu, Muparadze vose vanomanikidza mweya wangu; Nokuti ndiri muranda wenyu.
Ngaarumbidzwe Jehovha, dombo rangu, Anodzidzisa maoko angu kurwa, Neminwe yangu kufura;
Unyoro hwangu, nenhare yangu, Shongwe yangu yakakwirira, nomurwiri wangu; nhovo yangu, uye iye wandinovimba naye; Anoisa vanhu vangu pasi pangu.
Jehovha, munhu chinyiko, zvamune hanya naye?
Kana Mwanakomana womunhu, zvamunomurangarira?
Munhu akafanana nomweya; Mazuva ake anenge mumvuri unopfuura.
Kotamisa kudenga-denga kwenyu Jehovha, muburuke; Gunzvai makomo, apfungaire hutsi.
Penyesai mheni, muvaparadze; Furai miseve yenyu, muvavhunduse.
Tambanudzai ruoko rwenyu muri kumusoro; Ndisunungurei, mundirwire pamvura zhinji, Naparuoko rwavatorwa;
Avo vanotaura zvisina maturo nomuromo wavo, Uye ruoko rwavo rworudyi ndirwo ruoko rworudyi rwenhema.
Mwari ndichakuimbirai rwiyo rutsva; Ndichakuimbirai nziyo dzokurumbidza nomutengeranwa une ungiso dzine gumi.
Ndimi munopa madzimambo kuponeswa, Munorwira Dhavhidhi muranda wenyu pamunondo unokuvadza.
Ndisunungurei, mundirwire paruoko rwavatorwa, Vanotaura zvisina maturo nomuromo wavo, Uye ruoko rwavo rworudyi ndirwo ruoko rworudyi rwenhema.
Vanakomana vedu vachava semiti yakakura kwazvo pautsva hwayo; Uye vanasikana vedu samabwe ekona akavezwa sezvinovezerwa imba yamambo;
Matura edu achazara nezviyo zvamarudzi ose; Namakwai edu achabereka zviuru negumi rezviuru kumafuro edu.
Nzombe dzedu dzichatakudzwa zvizhinji; Hatingaputsirwi madziro, kana kubuda kundorwa, Hakungavi nemhere inoridzwa panzira dzomumusha medu;
Vanomufaro vanhu avo, vanoitirwa saizvozvo; Vanomufaro vanhu avo, Mwari wavo ari Jehovha.
Ndichakukudzai kwazvo, Mwari wangu, imi Mambo; Ndicharumbidza zita renyu nokusingaperi-peri.
Ndichakurumbidzai zuva rimwe nerimwe; Ndichakudza zita renyu nokusingaperi-peri.
Jehovha mukuru, anofanira kurumbidzwa kwazvo; Ukuru hwake haunganzverwi.
Rudzi rumwe rucharumbidza mabasa enyu kuno rumwe, Vachadudzira zvamakaita zvine simba.
Ndichafungisisa kubwinya kwoumambo hwenyu hunokudzwa, Namabasa enyu anoshamisa.
Vanhu vachataura vachireva simba ramabasa enyu anotyisa; Neni ndichadudzira ukuru hwenyu.
Vachareva vachiyeudzira kunaka kwenyu kukuru, Nokuimbira kururama kwenyu.
Jehovha anenyasha, azere netsitsi, Haachimbidziki kutsamwa, anengoni zhinji.
Jehovha anomoyo wakanaka kuna vose; Ngoni dzake dziri pamabasa ake ose.
Mabasa enyu ose achakuvongai Jehovha; Navatsvene venyu vachakurumbidzai.
Vachataura vachireva kubwinya kwoushe hwenyu, Nokuparidza simba renyu;
Kuti vazivise vanakomana vavanhu mabasa ake anesimba, Nokubwinya kwoumambo hwoushe hwake.
Ushe hwenyu ndihwo ushe husingaperi, Noumambo hwenyu huchagara nokusingaperi.
Jehovha anotsigira vose vanowa, Anosimudza vose vakakotamiswa pasi.
Meso avose anotarira kwamuri; Munovapa zvokudya zvavo panguva yakafanira.
Munotadzanura ruoko rwenyu, Ndokugutisa zvipenyu zvose.
Jehovha akarurama panzira dzake dzose, Anenyasha pazvose zvaanoita.
Jehovha ari pedo navose vanodana kwaari, Vose vanodana kwaari nezvokwadi.
Achaitira vanomutya sezvavanoda; Achanzwawo kudanidzira kwavo; ndokuvaponesa.
Jehovha anochengeta vose vanomuda Asi vakaipa achavaparadza vose.
Muromo wangu uchataura kurumbidzwa kwaJehovha, Vanhu vose ngavarumbidze zita rake dzvene nokusingaperi-peri.
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehovha, iwe mweya wangu!
Ndicharumbidza Jehovha ndichiri mupenyu; Ndichaimbira Mwari wangu nziyo dzokurumbidza, ini ndichiripo.
Regai kuvimba namachinda, Kana noMwanakomana womunhu, asingagoni kubatsira.
Mweya wake unobuda, iye ndokudzokera pasi pake; Nezuva iro mano ake anopera.
Anomufaro munhu uyo kana Mwari waJakobho ari mubatsiri wake, Anotarira kuna Jehovha Mwari wake.
Iye, akaita kudenga napasi, Negungwa, nezvose zviri mukati mazvo; Iye, anoramba akatendeka nokusingaperi;
Anoruramisira vanomanikidzwa; Anopa vane nzara zvokudya; Jehovha anosunungura vasungwa;
Jehovha anosvinudza meso amapofu; Jehovha anosimudza vakakotamiswa pasi; Jehovha anoda vakarurama;
Jehovha anochengeta vatorwa; Jehovha anotsigira nherera nechirikadzi; Asi nzira yavakaipa anoipesanisa.
Jehovha achabata ushe nokusingaperi, Mwari wako, iwe Ziyoni, kusvikira kumarudzi namarudzi.
Hareruya!
Hareruya.
Nokuti zvakanaka kuti Mwari wedu aimbirwe nziyo dzokurumbidza; Zvinofadza, uye kurumbidza kwakafanira.
Jehovha anovaka Jerusaremu; Anounganidza vakadzingwa vaIsiraeri.
Anoporesa vane moyo yakaputsika, Anosunga mavanga avo.
Anotara kuwanda kwenyeredzi; Anodzipa dzose mazita adzo.
Ishe wedu mukuru, anesimba guru; Njere dzake hadziperi.
Jehovha anobatsira vanyoro;
Imbirai Jehovha muchimuvonga, Imbirai Mwari wedu nziyo dzokurumbidza nembira;
Iye anofukidza denga namakore, Anogadzirira pasi mvura, Anomeresa uswa pamakomo.
Anopa zvipfuwo zvokudya zvazvo, Navana vamakunguvo, anochema.
Haafadzwi nesimba rebhiza; Haafariri makumbo omurume.
Jehovha anofara navanomutya, Navanotarira ngoni dzake.
Rumbidza Jehovha, iwe Jerusaremu; Rumbidza Mwari wako, iwe Ziyoni.
Nokuti wakasimbisa mazariro amasuo ako; Akaropafadza vana vako mukati mako.
Anoisa rugare panyika yako; Anokugutisa nezviyo zvakaisvonaka.
Anotuma mirairo yake panyika; Shoko rake rinomhanya kwazvo.
Anopa vanhu chando samakushe amakwai, Anoparadzira chando samadota.
Anokanda chimvuramabwe chake sezvimedu; Ndianiko angamira pachando chake?
Anotuma shoko rake, ndokuzvinyausa; Anovhuvhutisa mhepo yake mvura ndokuyerera.
Anozivisa Jakobho shoko rake, Nalsiraeri mitemo yake nezvaakatonga.
Haana kutongoitira rumwe rudzi saizvozvo; Kana zviri zvaakatonga, havana kuzviziva.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehovha, imi muri kudenga; Murumbidzei panzvimbo dzokumusoro.
Murumbidzei imi vatumwa vake vose; Murumbidzei imi hondo dzake dzose.
Murumbidzei imi zuva Murumbidzei imi nyeredzi dzose dzinovhenekera.
Murumbidzei imi kudenga kwokudenga-denga, Newe mvura zhinji, iri kumusoro kwokudenga-denga.
Ngazvirumbidze zita raJehovha; Nokuti iye akaraira, zvikasikwa.
Akazvisimbisawo nokusingaperi-peri; Akatema chirevo chisingafaniri kudarikwa.
Rumbidzai Jehovha imi vapasi, Imi zvikara zvegungwa, nezviri makadzika;
Moto nechimvuramabwe, chando noutsi; Dutu guru, rinoita zvaakareva;
Makomo nezvikomo zvose; Miti inobereka nemisidhari yose;
Mhuka, nezvipfuwo zvose; Zvinokambaira neshiri dzinobhururuka;
Madzimambo apasi nendudzi dzose dzavanhu; Machinda navatongi vose vapasi;
Majaya nemhandara; Vatana navana;
Ngavarumbidze zita raJehovha; Nokuti zita rake roga rakakurumbira; Umambo hwake huri kumusoro kwapasi nokudenga.
Akasimudza runyanga rwavanhu vake, Kuti arumbidzwe navatsvene vake vose; Naivo vana vaIsiraeri, ivo vanhu vari pedo naye.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Imbirai Jehovha rwiyo rutsva, Nokurumbidzwa kwake paungano yavatsvene.
Isiraeri ngaafarire kwazvo musiki wake; Vana veZiyoni ngavave nomufaro naMambo wavo.
Ngavarumbidze zita rake vachimutambira; Ngavamuimbire nziyo dzokurumbidza nengoma nembira.
Nokuti Jehovha anofarira vanhu vake; Achashongedza vanyoro noruponeso;
Vatsvene ngavafare kwazvo nokukudziwa; Ngavaimbe nomufaro panhovo dzavo.
Kurumbidza kukuru kwaMwari ngakuve pahuro dzavo, Nomunondo unocheka kwose paruoko rwavo;
Kuti vatsive vahedheni; Varange ndudzi dzavanhu;
Kuti vasunge madzimambo avo neketani, Navakuru vavo nezvisungo zvamatare.
Kuti vavaitire zvavakatongerwa zvakanyorwa; Vatsvene vake vose vachakudzwa naizvozvi.
Hareruya!
Hareruya!
Rumbidzai Jehovha panzvimbo yake tsvene; Murumbidzei mudenga rakaitwa nesimba rake,
Murumbidzei nokuda kwezvaakaita nesimba rake; Murumbidzei zvakafanira ukuru-kuru hwake.
Murumbidzei nemitengeranwa nembira.
Murumbidzei nengoma nokutamba; Murumbidzei nohudimbwa nenyere.
Murumbidzei namakandira anorira kwazvo; Murumbidzei namakandira anorira zvakanaka.
Zvinhu zvose zvinofema, ngazvirumbidze Jehovha.
Hareruya!
Zvirevo zvaSoromoni, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, mambo waIsiraeri.
Kuti vanhu vazive uchenjeri nokurairirwa; Nokunzwisisa mashoko enjere;
Varairirwe nzira yokungwara, Neyokururama, nokururamisa, nokutendeka;
Vasina mano vapiwe kungwara, Jaya ripiwe zivo nokuchenjera;
Kuti wakachenjera anzwe, awedzere kudzidza; Nomunhu wenjere awane mano akanaka.
Vanzwisise chirevo nomufananidzo, Mashoko avakachenjera nezvirahwe zvavo.
Munhu ngaanzvenge vatadzi vanonyengedzera
Kutya Jehovha ndiko kuvamba kwezivo; Mapenzi anoshora uchenjeri nokurairirwa.
Mwanakomana wangu, inzwa kurairira kwababa vako; Usarasha kudzidzisa kwamai vako.
Nokuti zvichava chishongo chakanaka pamusoro wako, Nengetani pamutsipa pako.
Mwanakomana wangu, kana vatadzi vachikugombedzera, Usatenda iwe.
Kana vachiti, Hendei tose, Ngatirindire ropa; Ngativandire vasina mhosva kunyange pasina mhaka.
Ngativamedze vari vapenyu seSheori, Vari vakukutu saivo vanoburukira kugomba.
Tichawana fuma yamarudzi mazhinji; Tichazadza dzimba dzedu nezvatakapamba;
Iwe uchava mumwe wedu; Tose tichava nechikwama chimwechete.
Mwanakomana wangu, usafamba navo nenzira yavo; Dzora rutsoka rwako panzira yavo;
Nokuti tsoka dzavo dzinovangira zvakaipa; Vanokurumidza kudurura ropa.
Nokuti mumbure unodzikirwa pasina Shiri dzamarudzi ose dzichizviona.
Vanhu ava vanogarira ropa ravo vamene; Vanozvivandira hupenyu hwavo.
Ndizvo zvakaitawo nzira dzavose vanokarira fuma; Zvinotorera mwene wazvo upenyu hwake.
Uchenjeri hunodana vasina njere
Uchenjeri unodanidzira panzira dzomumusha; hunonzwisa inzwi rahwo panzvimbo dzakafara;
hunodana panzvimbo panoungana vazhinji; Pavanopinda pamasuo, Paguta, ndipo pahunotaura mashoko ahwo, huchiti,
Nhai imi vasina mano, muchada kusava namano kusvikira rinhiko?
Nemi vaseki kufarira kuseka kwenyu, Namapenzi kuvenga zivo?
Dzokai kana muchinzwa kuraira kwangu, Tarirai ndichadurura mweya wangu pamusoro penyu; Ndichakuzivisai mashoko angu.
Zvandakadana, imi mukaramba; Ndikatambanudza ruoko rwangu, kukasava nomunhu akarangarira;
Asi makazvidza mano angu ose, Mukaramba chose kuraira kwangu,
Naizvozvo neniwo ndichaseka kana mava munhamo yenyu; Ndichakudadirai, kana kutya kwenyu kuchisvika.
Kana kutya kwenyu kuchisvika sedutu guru, Nenhamo yenyu ichisvika sechamupupuri; Kana kutambudzika nokudumbirwa zvichikuwirai.
Nenguva iyo uchadana kwandiri, asi handingapinduri; Vachanditsvaka zvikuru, asi havangandiwani.
Zvavakavenga zivo, Vakasazvitsaurira kutya Jehovha,
Vakaramba mano angu ose, Vakashora kuraira kwangu kwose,
Naizvozvo vachadya zvibereko zvenzira yavo; Vachagutswa namano avo.
Nokuti kudzokera shure kwavasina mano kuchavauraya, Kusava nehanya kwamapenzi kuchavaparadza.
Asi ani naani anonditeerera achagara zvakasimba, Achagadzikana, asingatyi zvakaipa.
Mwanakomana wangu, kana ukagamuchira mashoko angu, Nokuchengeta mirairo yangu kwauri;
Kuti urerekere nzeve yako iteerere uchenjeri, Nokurwadza moyo wako, kuti unzwisise;
Kana ukachemera kunzwisisa, Ukadanidzira nenzwi rako kuti uwane njere;
Zvirokwazvo kana ukahutsvaka sesirivha, Ukahutsvakisisa sefuma yakavanzwa;
Ipapo uchanzwisisa kutya Jehovha, Nokuwana zivo yaMwari.
Nokuti Jehovha ndiye anopa uchenjeri; Mumuromo make munobuda zivo nenjere,
Unovigira vakarurama uchenjeri chaihwo; Ndiye nhovo yavanofamba muzvokwadi;
Nokuti anorinda makwara okururamisa, Nokuchengeta nzira yavatsvene vake.
Ipapo uchanzwisisa kururama nokururamisa, Nokutendeka, idzo nzira dzose dzakanaka.
Nokuti uchenjeri huchapinda mumoyo mako, Zivo ichafadza mweya wako;
Kungwara kuchakurindira, Njere dzichakuchengeta;
Zvikurwire panzira yezvakaipa, Napavanhu vanotaura zvisakarurama;
Vanorasha makwara okururama, Kuti vafambe nenzira dzerima;
Vanofarira kuita zvakaipa, Vanofadzwa nokunyengera kwezvakaipa.
Vane nzira dzakaminama, Vanotsauka pamakwara avo;
Kuti zvikurwire kumukadzi wokumwe, Kumukadzi mutorwa, anobata kumeso namashoko ake.
Iye, anorasha shamwari yohumhandara hwake, Achikanganwa sungano yaMwari wake.
Nokuti imba yake inonyura kurufu, Nenzira dzake kuvakafa;
Hakuna anopinda kwaari anozodzokazve; Havasviki panzira dzoupenyu;
Kuti ufambe nenzira yavakanaka, Uchengete makwara avakarurama.
Nokuti vakarurama vachagara panyika, Vakakwana vachafambirapo.
Asi vakaipa vachaparadzwa panyika; Vanoita nokunyengedzera vachadzurwapo.
Mwanakomana wangu, usakanganwa kudzidzisa kwangu; Asi moyo wako ngauchengete mirairo yangu;
Nokuti zvichakuwedzera mazuva mazhinji, Namakore ohupenyu, norugare.
Rudo nezvokwadi ngazvirege kukusiya; Uzvisungire pamutsipa wako; Uzvinyore pahwendefa romoyo wako;
Nokudaro uchawana nyasha nenjere dzakanaka Pamberi paMwari navanhu.
Vimba naJehovha nomoyo wako wose, Urege kusendama panjere dzako.
Umutende panzira dzako dzose, Agoruramisa makwara ako ose.
Usazviti ndakachenjera; Itya Jehovha, ubve pane zvakaipa;
Zvichava mushonga womuviri wako, Nomwongo wamapfupa ako.
Kudza Jehovha nezvaunazvo, Uye nezvitsva zvazvose zvawakawana;
Ipapo matura ako achazadzwa nezvakawanda, Makate ako achapfachuka newaini itsva.
Mwanakomana wangu, usazvidza kuranga kwaJehovha; Usaneta nokuraira kwake.
Nokuti Jehovha anoraira mudikanwa wake; Sezvinoita baba mwanakomana wavo wavanofarira.
Mufaro womunhu, awana uchenjeri
Munhu, awana uchenjeri, anomufaro, Naiye munhu, anowana njere.
Nokuti kuhuwana ihwo kunopfuura kuwana sirivha; Nokufuma nahwo kunopfuura kufuma nendarama.
Hunokosha kupfuura korari; Hakune fuma yako ingaenzaniswa nahwo.
Mazuva mazhinji ohupenyu ari muruoko rwahwo rworudyi; Muruoko rwahwo rworuboshwe mune fuma nokukudzwa.
Nzira dzahwo inzira dzezvinofadza; Makwara ahwo ose ndoorugare.
Ndiwo muti woupenyu kuna vanohunamatira; Mumwe nomumwe anohubata anomufaro.
Jehovha akateya pasi nouchenjeri; Wakasimbisa kudenga-denga nenjere.
Mvura iri makadzika yakadzutuka nezivo yake; Denga rose rakadonha dova.
Mwanakomana wangu, ngazvirege kubva pameso ako; Chengeta uchenjeri chaihwo nokungwara.
Ipapo zvichava upenyu hwomweya Noukomba pamutsipa wako.
Ipapo uchafamba nenzira yako wakasimba; Rutsoka rwako harungagumburwi.
Kana uchivata pasi haungatyi; Uye kana wavata pasi hope dzako dzichava dzakanaka.
Usatya hako chivhunduso chinokuwira kamwe-kamwe, Kunyange kuparadzwa kwavakaipa, kana kuchisvika;
Nokuti Jehovha achava chivimbo chako; Achachengeta rutsoka rwako, kuti rurege kubatwa.
Munhu ngaave nomoyo murefu nokutendeka
Munhu, akafanirwa, usaramba kumuitira zvakanaka Kana ruoko rwako ruchinge rune simba kuzviita.
Usati kunowokwako, Enda, ugodzokazve, Mangwana ndichakupa; Kana uchinge unazvopo.
Usafunga kuitira wokwako zvakaipa, Zvaanogara hake newe achikutenda.
Usarwa nomunhu pasina mhosva, Kana asina kukuitira zvakaipa.
Usagodora munhu anomanikidza; Usatevera kunyange nomumwe wemitovo yake.
Nokuti mutsauki inyangadzi kuna Jehovha; Asi ano hukama navakarurama.
Kutukwa naJehovha kuri mumba mowakaipa; Asi unoropafadza ugaro hwavakarurama.
Kana vari vadadi, anovadadira, Asi vanozvininipisa anovaitira nyasha.
Vakachenjera vachagara nhaka yokukudzwa; Asi mapenzi anozviwanira kunyadziswa.
Itya Jehovha, ubve pane zvakaipa;
Imi vanakomana, inzwai kurairira kwababa venyu; Teererai, muzive njere.
Nokuti ndinokupai dzidziso yakanaka; Regai kurasha murayiro wangu.
Nokuti ini ndakanga ndiri mwanakomana kuna baba vangu, Mwana oga akadikanwa kwazvo, namai vangu;
Ivo baba vakandidzidzisa, vakati kwandiri, moyo wako ngaunyatsobata mashoko angu; Chengeta mirairo yangu, urarame.
Zviwanire uchenjeri, zviwanire njere; Regai kukanganwa kana kutsauka pamashoko omuromo wangu;
Usahurasha, hugokuchengeta; Uhude, hugokurinda.
Uchenjeri chinhu chikuru kune zvose; saka uzviwanire uchenjeri; Uzviwanire njere nezvose zvaunazvo.
Uhukudze, hugokukwiridza iwe; Huchakuvigira kukudzwa, kana uchihumbundikira.
Huchapa musoro wako chishongo chakanaka; Huchakuisira korona inobwinya.
Chinzwa iwe mwanakomana wangu, ugamuchire zvandinoreva; Makore oupenyu hwako agova mazhinji.
Ndakakudzidzisa panzira youchenjeri; Ndakakufambisa pamakwara akarurama.
Kana uchifamba, tsoka dzako hadzingapinganidzwi; Kana uchimhanya, haungagumburwi.
Natsa kubata kurairirwa; usakuregedza; Ukuchengete, nokuti ndihwo hupenyu hwako.
Usapinda pagwara ravakaipa, Usafamba nenzira yavakashata.
Uinzvenge, usapinda pairi; Tsauka pairi, upfuure hako.
Nokuti havavati, kana vasingaiti zvakashata; Vanotorerwa hope dzavo, kana vasingagumbusi vamwe.
Nokuti vanodya zvokudya zvezvakaipa, Nokunwa waini yokumanikidza.
Asi gwara ravakarurama rakaita sechiedza chamambakwedza, Chinoramba chichiwedzera kubwinya kusvikira pamasikati makuru.
Nzira yavakaipa yakaita serima; Havazivi chingavagumbusa.
Mwanakomana wangu, teerera mashoko angu; Rerekera nzeve yako kune zvandinoreva.
Urambe uchitarira, Uachengete mukati momoyo wako.
Nokuti ndihwo hupenyu kuna vanoawana, Noukukutu hwemuviri wavo vose.
Chengeta moyo wako kupfuura zvose zvinofanira kurindwa; Nokuti mukati mawo ndimo mune zvitubu zvoupenyu.
Bvisa kwauri nhema dzomuromo, Kutsauka kwemiromo ngakuve kure newe.
Meso ako ngaarurame pakutarira; Mafungiro ameso ako ngaatarire mberi kwako.
Gadzirira tsoka dzako gwara; Nzira dzako dzose dzive dzakasimba.
Usatsaukira kurudyi kana kuruboshwe; Rutsoka rwako urubvise pane zvakaipa.
Mwanakomana wangu, teerera uchenjeri hwangu; Rerekera nzeve yako inzwe njere dzangu;
Kuti ugare wakabata kungwara, Nemiromo yako ichengete zivo.
Nokuti miromo yomukadzi wokumwe inodonha huchi; Muromo wake unotedza kupfuura mafuta;
Asi pakupedzisira unovava segavakava; Unopinza somunondo une nhivi mbiri dzinocheka.
Tsoka dzake dzinoburukira kurufu; Nhambwe dzake dzinovavarira kuhwiro;
Gwara roupenyu, rakati chechetere, haariwani, Nzira dzake dzinotsauka, iye asingazvizivi.
Saka imi, vanakomana vangu, nditeererei; Regai kutsauka pamashoko omuromo wangu.
Nzira yako ngaive kure naye, Usaswedera pamukova weimba yake.
Kuti urege kupa vamwe kunaka kwohujaya hwako, Namakore ako kuno anomoyo mukukutu;
Kuti vatorwa varege kugutswa nefuma yako, Nezvibereko zvokutambura kwako zviende kumba kwomweni.
Iwe ugochema pakupedzisira kwako, Kana nyama yako nomuviri wako zvaparadzwa,
Uchiti, Ndakavengereiko kurairirwa, moyo wangu wakashorerei kurairwa?
Ndakaregereiko kuteerera inzwi ravadzidzisi vangu, Nokusarerekera nzeve yangu kuna vaindiraira?
Ndakanga ndapinda pane zvakaipa zvose, Pakati pechaunga neungano.
Inwa mvura padziva rako chairo, Nemvura inoyerera patsime rako chairo.
Ko matsime ako anofanira kuparadzirwa here, Nzizi dzemvura dziyerere munzira dzomumusha here?
Ngazvive zvako woga, Zvisava zvavatorwa pamwechete newe.
Tsime rako ngariropafadzwe; Ufarire mukadzi wohujaya hwako.
Sehadzi yenondo yakanaka, nehadzi yengururu inofadza; Mazamu ake ngaakufadze nguva dzose; Ugare uchigutiswa norudo rwake.
Nokuti iwe, mwanakomana wangu, uchagutsirweiko nomukadzi wokumwe, Uchambundikireiko chipfuva chomweni?
Nokuti nzira dzomunhu dziri pamberi paJehovha; Ndiye anoyera makwara ake ose.
Zvivi zvake zvichabata muiti wazvo, Achabatwa namabote ezvivi zvake.
Achafa nokushaiwa kurairirwa; Achatsauka noukuru hwoupenzi hwake.
Mwanakomana wangu, kana uchinge wakazviitira wokwako rubatso, Wazvisunga nokuda kwomutorwa noruoko rwako,
Wazviteya namashoko omuromo wako, Wabatwa namashoko omuromo wako,
Zvino ita kudai, mwanakomana wangu, uzvirwire, Zvawabatwa noruoko rwowokwako, Enda, undozvininipisa, ukumbire zvikuru kunowokwako.
Usatendera meso ako hope, Kana mafungiro ameso ako kutsumwaira;
Uzvirwire semhara paruoko rwomuvhimi, Seshiri paruoko rwomuteyi.
Simbe inotukwa
Enda kumujuru, iwe simbe; Cherekedza nzira dzawo ugova wakachenjera!
Kunyange iwo usina mutongi, Kana mutariri kana mubati,
Unogadzira zvokudya zvawo muzhizha, Nokuunganidza zvokudya zvawo mukukohwa.
Iwe simbe, uchavata pasi kusvikira rinhiko?
Uchamuka rinhiko pahope dzako?
Kumbovata zvishomanene, kumbotsumwaira zvishomanene, Kumbofungatira maoko zvishomanene, ndizorore;
Saizvozvo urombo hwako huchasvika segororo, Nokushaiwa kwako somunhu wakashonga nhumbi dzokurwa.
Zvinovengwa naMwari
Munhu asina maturo, munhu anoita zvakaipa, Ndiye anofamba nomuromo une nhema;
Anobwaira nameso ake, anotendekera netsoka dzake, Anodudzira neminwe yake;
Ane zvisakarurama pamoyo pake, Anosifungira vamwe zvakaipa, Anokusha kupesana.
Saka njodzi yake ichamuwira kamwe-kamwe; Achavhuniwa pakarepo, kusina chingamubatsira.
Zvinhu zvitanhatu zviriko zvinovengwa naJehovha; Zvirokwazvo, tingati kune zvinomwe, zvinomunyangadza, zvinoti:
Meso ounozvikudza, rurimi runoreva nhema, Maoko anodurura ropa risina mhaka;
moyo unofunga mano akaipa, Tsoka dzinokurumidza kuvangira zvakashata;
Chapupu chinonyengera chinoreva nhema, Uye anokusha kupesana pakati pehama.
Kushata kwoupombwe
Mwanakomana wangu, chengeta murayiro wababa vako; Usarasha kudzidzisa kwamai vako.
Uzvisungire nguva dzose pamoyo wako; Uzvishonge pamutsipa wako.
Kana uchifamba, zvichakutungamirira; Kana uchivata pasi, zvichakurinda; Kana womuka, zvichataurirana newe.
Nokuti murayiro ndiwo mwenje; murau ndicho chiedza; Kuraira kwokurairirwa inzira youpenyu;
Kuti uchengetwe pamukadzi wakaipa, Pakubata kumeso kworurimi rwomutorwa.
Usachiva kunaka kwake mumoyo mako; Arege kukubata namafungiro ameso ake.
Nokuti nokuda kwechifeve munhu angasvikira pakudya chimedu bedzi chechingwa; Mukadzi womumwe munhu anovhima upenyu hunokosha.
Ko munhu ungaisa moto muchipfuva chake, nguvo dzake dzikasatsva here?
Kana munhu angatsika mazimbe anopisa, Tsoka dzake dzikasapiswa here?
Ndizvo zvakaita munhu anopinda kumukadzi wowokwake; Ani naani anomunyangata iye mukadzi haangaregwi kurohwa.
Vanhu havangazvidzi mubi kana achiba Kuti agute kana achinge ane nzara.
Asi kana akabatwa anofanira kudzosera zvava zvinomwe; Anofanira kuripa nefuma yose yeimba yake.
Anoita upombwe nomukadzi, anoshaiwa njere; Anoda kuparadza upenyu hwake ndiye anoita izvozvo.
Uchangozviwanira mavanga nokusakudzwa; Kunyadziswa kwake hakungatongopusikwi.
Nokuti godo rinomutsa hasha dzomurume; Haanganzwiri tsitsi pazuva rokutsiva.
Haangavi nehanya nomuripo; Haangatendi, kunyange ukamuvigira zvipo zvizhinji.
Mwanakomana wangu, chengeta mashoko angu, Viga mirairo yangu kwauri.
Chengeta mirairo yangu, urarame; Nomurau wangu semboni yeziso rako.
Uzvisungire pamweya wako; Uzvinyore pahwendefa romoyo wako.
Uti kuuchenjeri, Ndiwe hanzvadzi yangu; Utumidze njere shamwari yako;
Kuti zvikuchengete pamukadzi wokumwe, Pamutorwa anobata kumeso namashoko ake.
Nokuti ndakatarira pahwindo reimba yangu, Pahutanda hwehwindo rangu;
Ndikatarira pakati pavasina mano, Ndikaona pakati pamajaya.
Rimwe jaya rakashaiwa njere;
Richipfuura nenzira yomumusha pedo nekona yeimba yomukadzi
Nenguva yorubvunzavaeni, nenguva yamadeko ezuva, Pakati pousiku kwasviba.
Zvino tarira, mukadzi akasangana naye, Akanga akafuka sechifeve, anokunyengedzera pamoyo.
Anopupira, achiita sezvaanoda; Tsoka dzake hadzigari mumba make;
Imwe nguva ari munzira dzomumusha, imwe nguva pamatare; Anorindira pamakona ose.
Zvino iye akamubata, akamutsvoda; Akataura naye nechiso chisina kunyara, akati kwaari,
Ndaifanira kuuya nezvibayiro zvezvipiriso zvokuyananisa, Nhasi ndaripa mhiko dzangu.
Saka ndabuda kuzokuchingamidza, Nditsvake chiso chako zvikuru, zvino ndakuwana.
Ndakawarira machira anohukomba pamubhedha wangu, Nemicheka ina mavara inobva Ijipiti.
Ndakasasa zvinonhuwira pamubhedha wangu, Mura, negavakava, nekinamoni.
Uya tigute nokudana kusvikira mangwanani; Ngatizvifadze nokudana kukuru.
Nokuti murume haapo pamusha; Akafamba rwendo rukuru;
Akaenda nehombodo ine mari; Achadzoka pajenaguru.
Nokutaura kwake kuzhinji kwakanaka anomutsausa, Anomugombedzera nokubata kumeso kwemiromo yake.
Anomutevera pakarepo, Senzombe inoenda kwainondobayiwa, Kana sebenzi rakasungwa rinoenda kundorangwa;
Kusvikira museve wabaya chiropa chake; Seshiri inokurumidzira kurugombe, Asingazivi kuti zvinovinga upenyu hwake.
Zvino vanakomana vangu, nditeererei, Inzwai mashoko omuromo wangu.
moyo wako ngaurege kutsaukira kunzira dzake; Usafamba-famba mumakwara ake.
Nokuti akawisira pasi vazhinji vakakuvadzwa; Zvirokwazvo, vakaurawa naye vazhinji kwazvo.
Imba yake inzira dzinoenda Sheori, Dzinoburukira kudzimba dzorufu.
Ko Uchenjeri hahudanidziri here?
Nenjere hadzibudisi manzwi adzo here?
Pamusoro pemitunhu panzira, Pamharadzano dzenzira, ndipo pahumire;
Parutivi rwamasuo, panopindwa paguta, Pavanopinda pamikova, ndipo pahunodanidzira; huchiti,
Ndinodanidzira kwamuri, imi varume, Inzwi rangu rinodana vanakomana vavanhu.
nzwisisai uchenjeri, imi vasina mano; Imi mapenzi, ivai nomoyo une njere.
Inzwai, nokuti ndichataura zvinhu zvakaisvonaka; Nokuti miromo yangu ichashamira zvinhu zvakarurama.
Nokuti muromo wangu unobudisa zvokwadi; Chinhu chakaipa chinonyangadza pamiromo yangu.
Mashoko ose omuromo wangu akarurama; Hakuna chinhu chakakombama kana chisakarurama maari;
Zvose zviri pachena kuno anenjere; Zvakarurama kuna ivo vakawana zivo.
Gamuchirai kuraira kwangu, murege kugamuchira sirivha; Nezivo, kupfuura ndarama yakasarurwa.
Nokuti uchenjeri hwakanaka kupfuura korari; Zvose zvinodikanwa nomunhu hazvingaenzaniswi nahwo.
Ini uchenjeri ndakaita kungwara imba yangu, Ndinowana zivo namano akarurama.
Kutya Jehovha ndiko kuvenga zvakaipa; Kuzvikudza namanyawi nenzira yakaipa, Nomuromo unonyengedzera, ndinozvivenga.
Ndine zano rakanaka nokubata kwakakwana; Ndini kuchenjera; ndine simba.
Madzimambo anobata ushe neni, Vabati vanotonga vanhu neni.
Madzishe anofambisa ushe neni, Navakuru, ivo vatongi vose vapasi.
Ndinoda vanondida; Vanonditsvaka nomoyo wose vachandiwana.
fuma nokukudzwa zvineni, Zvinokosha zvakaisvonaka nokururama.
Zvibereko zvangu zvakanaka kupfuura ndarama, kunyange ndarama yakaisvonaka; Zvandinowana zvinopfuura sirivha yakasarurwa.
Ndinofamba nenzira yokururama, Mukati mamakwara okururamisa;
Kuti ndigarise nhaka vanondida, Ndizadze zvivigiro zvefuma yavo.
Jehovha akandiumba pakuvamba kwenzira yake, Kutangira mabasa ake akare.
Ini ndakamiswa kubva pakusingaperi, kubva pakutanga, Pasi pasati pasikwa.
Makungwa asati avapo, ini ndakaberekwa; Pasina matsime ane mvura zhinji.
Makomo asati anyudzwa, Zvikomo zvisipo, ini ndakaberekwa;
Iye asati aumba pasi namapani, Kana guruva rokutanga renyika.
Panguva yaakagadzira kudenga-denga, ndakanga ndiripo; Pakuisa kwake denderedzwa pamusoro pamakungwa;
Panguva yaakasimbisa denga rose kumusoro, Pakusimba kwamatsime amakungwa;
Panguva yaakaitira gungwa miganho yaro, Kuti mvura irege kudarika murayiro wake, Pakutara kwake nheyo dzapasi;
Nenguva iyo ndaiva naye, ndiri mhizha; Ndaimufadza zuva rimwe nerimwe, Ndichitamba pamberi pake nguva dzose,
Ndichitamba panyika yake, Ndichifadzwa navanakomana vavanhu.
Saka zvino vanakomana vangu, nditeererei; Nokuti vanochengeta nzira dzangu vakaropafadzwa.
Inzwai kurairira muve vakachenjera, Regai kukuramba.
Munhu, anondinzwa, akaropafadzwa, Anorinda zuva rimwe nerimwe pamasuo angu, Anomira pazvivivo zvemikova yangu.
Nokuti andiwana, awana hupenyu, Achapiwa nyasha naJehovha.
Asi anondishaiwa, anotadzira mweya wake;
Uchenjeri hwakavaka imba yahwo; Hwakaveza mbiru dzahwo nomwe;
Hwakabaya zvipfuwo zvahwo; Hwakavhenganisa waini yahwo; Hwakagadzirawo tafura yahwo.
Hwakatuma varandakadzi vahwo; hunodanidzira pamitunhu yeguta, huchiti,
Asina mano ngaatsaukire muno; Asina njere, hunoti kwaari,
Uyai mudye chingwa changu, Munwe waini yandakavhenganisa.
Regai kusasvinuka murarame; Mufambe nenzira yenjere.
Munhu, anoraira mudadiri anozvitsvakira kunyadziswa; Anotuka munhu wakaipa achasvibiswa.
Usaraira mudadiri, kuti arege kukuvenga; Raira munhu wakachenjera, iye achakuda.
Ipa wakachenjera dzidzo, ipapo iye achawedzerwa huchenjeri; Dzidzisa wakarurama, ipapo iye achawedzerwa zivo.
Kuvamba kwouchenjeri ndiko kutya Iehovha., Kuziva Mutsvene ndidzo njere.
Nokuti neni mazuva ako achaitwa mazhinji, Makore oupenyu hwako achawedzerwa.
Kana wakachenjera, iwe, wakazvichenjerera hako; Kana uri mudadiri, iwe woga uchava nemhosva yazvo.
Mukadzi benzi anopupira; Haana mano, haazivi chinhu.
Anogara pamukova weimba yake, Pachigaro pamitunhu yeguta.
Kuti adanidzire kuna vanopfuura napo, Ivo vanorurama nenzira dzavo, achiti,
Ani naani asina mano, ngaatsaukire muno; Asine njere, mukadzi anoti kwaari,
Mvura yabiwa inozipa, Chingwa chinodyiwa pakavanda chinonaka.
Asi haazivi kuti vanopindamo vanofa; Kuti vakakokerwa naye vari mukati-kati meSheori.
Zvirevo zvaSoromoni.
Mwanakomana, akachenjera, anofadza baba; Asi mwanakomana benzi anoshuwisa mai vake.
fuma yakawanikwa nezvakaipa haibatsiri chinhu; Asi kururama kunorwira parufu.
Jehovha haangatenderi mweya wowakarurama kuti unzwe nzara; Asi kupanga kwavakaipa unokusundira kure.
Anobata noruoko rusine hanya, achava murombo; Asi ruoko rweasina usimbe runofumisa.
Anounganidza muzhezha, ndiye mwanakomana wakachenjera; Asi anovata hope mukukohwa, mwanakomana anonyadzisa.
Mikomborero iri pamusoro wowakarurama; Asi muromo wowakaipa unovanza kumanikidza.
Kuyeukwa kwowakarurama kunovigira kuropafadzwa, Asi zita rowakaipa richaora.
Ane moyo wakachenjera, achagamuchira mirairo; Asi ane miromo youpenzi achawisirwa pasi.
Anofamba zvakarurama, anofamba zvakasimba; Asi anominamisa nzira dzake, achazikanwa.
Anochonya neziso rake, anouyisa madambudzo; Asi ane miromo youpenzi, achawisirwa pasi.
Muromo wowakarurama itsime roupenyu; Asi muromo wowakaipa unovanza kumanikidza.
Mbengo dzinomutsa kukakavara; Asi rudo runofukidza kudarika kwose.
Pamiromo yeane njere panowanikwa uchenjeri; Asi shamhu yakafanira musana woanoshaiwa njere.
Vakachenjera vanozvichengetera zivo; Asi muromo webenzi uri pedo nokuparadzwa.
fuma yomufumi ndiro guta rake rakasimba; Zvinoparadza varombo ndihwo urombo hwavo.
Zvaakabatira zvinoisa wakarurama kuupenyu; Zvakawanikwa nowakaipa zvinoisa kuzvivi.
Anoteerera kurairirwa, ari panzira youpenyu; Asi anoramba kurairwa, anotsausa vamwe.
Anovanza kuvenga, ane miromo yenhema; Ana makuhwa, ibenzi.
Kudarika hakungakoni pamunhu anamashoko mazhinji; Asi anodzora miromo yake, ano huchenjeri.
Rurimi rwowakarurama rwakafanana nesirivha yakasarurwa; moyo wowakaipa haubatsiri chinhu.
Miromo yowakarurama inosimbisa vazhinji; Asi mapenzi anofa nokushaiwa zivo.
Kuropafadza kwaJehovha ndiko kunofumisa; Kutambura pabasa hakuwedzeri chinhu.
Benzi rinoti kuita zvakaipa kutamba; Ndizvo zvinoitawo uchenjeri kuno ane njere.
Zvinotyiwa nowakaipa, ndizvo zvichamuwira; Asi wakarurama achapiwa zvaanoda.
Kana chamupupuri chapfuura, wakaipa haachipo; Asi wakarurama ane nheyo dzisingaperi.
Sezvinoita vhininga pameno, noutsi pameso, Ndizvo zvakaita simbe kuna vanomutuma.
Kutya Jehovha kunowedzera mazuva; Asi makore owakaipa achatapudzwa.
Tariro yavakarurama mufaro; Asi kutarira kwavakaipa kuchaparadzwa.
Nzira yaJehovha inhare kunowakarurama; Asi ndiko kuparadzwa kuna vanoita zvakaipa.
Wakarurama haangatongozununguswi nokusingaperi; Asi vakaipa havangarambi vagere panyika.
Muromo wowakarurama unobudisa uchenjeri; Asi rurimi rune nhema ruchabviswa.
Miromo yowakarurama inoziva zvinofadza; Asi muromo wowakaipa unotaura zvine nhema.
Chiyero chinonyengedzera chi nonyangadza kuna Jehovha; Asi kurema kwakakwana kunomufadza.
Kana kuzvikudza kuchisvika, kunyadziswa kwasvikawo; Asi uchenjeri huri kuna vanozvininipisa.
Kusanyengedzera kwavakarurama kuchavatungamirira; Asi kusarurama kwavanonyengedzera kuchavaparadza.
fuma haibatsiri chinhu nezuva rokutsamwa; Asi kururama kunorwira parufu.
Kururama kwowakakwana kucharuramisa nzira yake; Asi wakaipa uchawiswa nezvakaipa zvake.
Kururama kwavakarurama kuchavarwira; Asi vanonyengedzera vachabatwa nezvakashata zvavo.
Kana munhu wakaipa achifa, zvaanotarira zvichaparadzwa; Tariro yavakashata inoparadzwa.
Wakarurama anorwirwa pakutambudzika; Wakaipa anopinda pachigaro chake.
Wakashata anoparadza wokwake nomuromo wake; Asi wakarurama acharwirwa nezivo.
Kana vakarurama vachipfuurira mberi zvakanaka, guta rinofara kwazvo; Kana vakaipa vachiparadzwa, kunopururudzwa.
Nokuropafadzwa kwavakarurama guta rinokudzwa; Asi rinoputswa nemiromo yavakaipa.
Anoninipisa wokwake anoshaiwa uchenjeri; Asi munhu ane njere anoramba anyerere.
Anofamba ana makuhwa, anobudisa zvakavanda; Asi ano moyo wakatendeka, anofukidza mhaka.
Kana vanhu vasingatungamirirwi nouchenjeri, vanoderera; Asi pavarairiri vazhinji ndipo panoruponeso.
Wakazviita rubatso pamusoro pomutorwa, achaona nhamo nokuda kwazvo; Asi anovenga kuzviita rubatso, ndiye wakasimba.
Mukadzi muuya anokudzwa; Vakasimba vanochengeta fuma dzavo.
Munhu ane ngoni, anoitira mweya wake zvakanaka; Asi asina tsitsi anotambudza nyama yake.
Wakaipa anopiwa mubayiro wokunyengedzera; Asi anokusha kururama achawana mubayiro wazvokwadi.
Kururama kwazvokwadi kunoisa kuupenyu; Asi anotevera zvakaipa, anovinga rufu rwake.
Vane moyo yakatsauka vanonyangadza Jehovha; Asi vanofamba nenzira yakarurama vanomufadza.
Zvirokwazvo, wakaipa haangakoni kurohwa; Asi vana vavakarurama vacharwirwa.
Sezvakaita chindori chendarama mumhino dzenguruve, Ndizvo zvakaita mukadzi wakanaka kumeso asina kungwara.
Zvinodikanwa navakarurama zvakanaka bedzi; Asi vakaipa vanomirirwa nokutsamwa.
Mumwe ariko anoparadzira, achiwedzerwa; Uye ariko anonyima zvaakafanira kupa, asi zvinongomushaisa.
Chipavhurire achakodzwa; Uye anodiridza achadiridzwawo.
Unonyima zviyo, vanhu vachamutuka; Asi mikomborero ichava pamusoro woanozvitengesa.
Anoshingairira zvinhu zvakanaka, anotsvaka zvinofadza; Asi anotsvaka zvakashata, achasvikirwawo nazvo.
Anovimba nefuma yake, achawa; Asi vakarurama vachanaka seshizha nyoro.
Anotambudza imba yake, achagara nhaka yemhepo; Benzi richava muranda woanomoyo wakachenjera.
Zvibereko zvowakarurama muti womupenyu; Unobata mweya yavanhu ndiye wakachenjera.
Tarirai, wakarurama achapiwa mubayiro panyika; Ndoda wakaipa nomutadzi!
Anoda kurairirwa, anoda zivo; Asi anovenga kurairwa ibenzi.
Munhu akanaka achawana nyasha kuna Jehovha, Asi achapa mhosva munhu ana mano akaipa.
Munhu haangasimbiswi nezvakaipa; Asi mudzi wowakarurama haungazununguswi.
Mukadzi anoita zvakanaka, ikorona yomurume wake; Asi anonyadzisa, wakaita sezvakaora pamapfupa ake.
Mifungo yowakarurama yakarurama; Asi mano avakaipa anonyengedzera.
Mashoko avakaipa ndookuvandira ropa; Asi muromo wavakarurama uchavarwira.
Vanhu vakaipa vanotsindikirwa, havachipo; Asi imba yavakarurama icharamba imire.
Munhu acharumbidzwa zvakaenzana nouchenjeri hwake; Asi ane moyo akatsauka, achazvidzwa.
Munhu anoninipiswa, ane muranda hake, Anopfuura anozvikudza, asina zvokudya.
Akarurama ane hanya noupenyu hwechipfuwo chake; Asi tsitsi dzowakaipa ihasha.
Anorima munda wake, achava nezvokudya zvizhinji; Asi anotevera zvisina maturo, anoshaiwa njere.
Akaipa anopanga zvaangapamba kuna vakashata; Asi mudzi wavakaipa unobereka zvibereko.
Pakudarika kwemiromo panomusungo wavakaipa; Asi akarurama achabuda panhamo
Munhu achagutiswa nezvakanaka zvinobva pazvibereko zvomuromo wake; Uye munhu achadzoserwa zvaakaita namaoko ake.
Nzira yebenzi yakanaka pakuona kwake; Asi akachenjera anoteerera kana achirairwa.
Kutsamwa kwebenzi kunozikanwa pakarepo; Asi akachenjera anovanza kunyadziswa kwake
munhu anoreva zvokwadi anoparidza zvakarurama; Asi chapupu chenhema chinoparidza kunyengedzera.

Kurairwa pachena kunopfuura Rudo rwakavanzwa.
Mavanga anotemwa neshamwari angatendwa, Asi kutsoda kwomuvengi kunonyengedza.
Mweya wakaguta unotsika pasi musvi wouchi; Asi mweya une nzara unoti zvose zvinozipa kunyange zvichivava.
Seshiri inoburuka ichienda kure nedendere rayo, Ndizvo zvakaita munhu anofamba-famba kure napaanogara.
Mafuta nezvinonhuwira zvinofadza moyo; Ndizvo zvinoitawo kunaka kwoushamwari hwomunhu kunobva pakuyanana kwemweya.
Usasiya shamwari yako neshamwari yababa vako; Usaenda kumba kwomunununa wako nezuva renhamo yako; Wokwako, ari pedo, anopfuura munununa uri kure,
Mwanakomana wangu, iva wakachenjera, ufadze moyo wangu; Kuti ndigone kupindura anondishora.
Munhu akangwara anoona zvakaipa, ndokuvanda; Asi vasina mano vanopfuura havo, ndokuwira munjodzi.
Munhu anozviita rubatso kumutorwa, umutorere nguvo yake; Umuite rubatso iye akazviita rubatso kumukadzi wokumwe.
Anoropafadza shamwari yake nenzwi guru, achifumira mangwanani, Achanzi wakatukwa pamusoro pazvo.
Kudonha kusingaperi pazuva remvura zhinji Nomukadzi anokakavara, zvakafanana.
Anoda kumudzivisa, anodzidzisa mhepo; Ruoko rwake rworudyi rwakabata mafuta.
Simbi inorodza simbi; Saizvozvo munhu anorodza chiso cheshamwari yake.
Ani naani anochengeta muonde, achadya zvibereko zvawo; Anochengeta tenzi wake, achakudzwa.
Chiso sezvachinotarisana nechiso mumvura, Saizvozvo moyo womunhu unotarisana nomunhu.
Sheori neAbhadhoni hazvitongoguti; Nameso omunhu haaguti.
Hari yokunyausa ndeyesirivha, nevira nderendarama; Saizvozvo munhu anozikanwa nezvaanofarira.
Kunyange ukatswa benzi muduri nomutsi pakati pezviyo zvinotsiwa, Hupenzi hwaro hahungabvi kwariri.
Shingaira uzive kuti makwai ako akadini; Uchengete zvakanaka mapoka ako.
Nokuti fuma haigari nokusingaperi; Ko korona inogara kusvikira kumarudzi ose here?
Uswa hunoenda bumhudza ndokubuda, Nemiriwo yamakomo inovunganidzwa.
Makwayana anokuvigira zvokufuka zvako, Uye mbudzi ndiwo mutengo weminda.
Mukaka wembudzi ucharingana zvokudya zvako, nezvokudya zveimba yako, Nokuraramisa varandasikana vako.
Akaipa anotiza kusina anodzingana naye; Asi vakarurama vanotsunga moyo seshumba.
Nemhaka yokudarika kwenyika, machinda ayo anowanda; Asi nomumwe, ane njere nezivo, icharamba iripo.
Munhu anoshaiwa amene, anomanikidza varombo, Akafanana nemvura inokukura, isingasiyi zvokudya.
Vanosiya murayiro, vanorumbidza vakaipa; Asi vanochengeta murayiro, vanoita nharo navo.
Vanhu vakashata havanzwisisi zvakarurama; Asi vanotsvaka Jehovha vanonzwisisa zvose.
Murombo, anofamba muzvokwadi yake, Anopfuura asakarurama anofamba nenzira mbiri, kunyange akafuma.
Anochengeta murayiro, mwanakomana akachenjera; Asi anofambidzana navanhu vana madyo, vanonyadzisa baba vake.
Anowedzera fuma yake nemhindu kana nokuwedzera kusakarurama, Anounganidzira mumwe achava netsitsi navarombo.
Anoramba kunzwa murayiro nenzeve yake, Kunyange nomunyengetero wake anonyangadza.
Ani naani anorashisa vakarurama vafambe nenzira yakaipa, Achawira amene mugomba rake; Asi vakarurama vachagara nhaka yezvakanaka.
Mupfuri anoti ndakachenjera; Asi murombo, ane njere, anomuferefeta.
Kana vakarurama vachikunda, mufaro mukuru uriko; Asi kana vakaipa vosimba, vanhu vovanda.
Anofukidza kudarika kwake, haangavi nomufaro; Asi anozvireurura, achizvirasha, achawana nyasha.
Munhu anogara achitya, anomufaro; Asi anoomesa moyo wake, achawira munjodzi.
Seshumba inoomba, nebere rinopota-pota, Ndizvo zvakaita mubati akaipa anobata vanhu varombo.
Muchinda, anoshaiwa njere, anomanikidza vanhuwo zvikuru; Asi anovenga kuchiva, achawedzera mazuva ake.
Munhu, anoremedzwa neropa romumwe munhu, Achatizira kugomba; ngaarege kudziviswa nomunhu.
Ani naani anofamba zvakarurama, acharwirwa; Asi anofamba nenzira dzisakarurama, achawa pakarepo.
Anorima munda wake, achava nezvokudya zvizhinji; Asi unovangira zvisina maturo, uchava nourombo kwazvo.
Munhu akatendeka achava namaropafadzo mazhinji; Asi anoda kufuma nokukurumidza, haangakoni kurohwa.
Kutsaura vanhu hakuna kunaka; Nokuti munhu angadarika nokuda kwechimedu chechingwa.
Munhu ano ruchiva, anovangira fuma, Asingazivi kuti achawirwa nokushaiwa.
Anorairira munhu achazowana nyasha pashure, Kupfuura iye anobata kumeso norurimi rwake.
Anobira baba vake kana amai vake, achiti, Hakuzi kudarika, Uyu ishamwari yoanoparadza.
Ano mweya wokuchiva anomutsa kukakavara; Asi anovimba naJehovha, achasimbiswa.
Anotenda moyo wake, ibenzi; Asi anofamba nouchenjeri, acharwirwa.
Anopa varombo, haangazoshaiwi; Asi anotsinzina meso ake, achatukwa kazhinji.
Kana vakaipa vosimba, vanhu vovanda; Asi kana voparara, vakarurama vowanda.
Munhu akarairwa kazhinji, achiomesa mutsipa wake, Achaparadzwa pakarepo, kusina chingamubatsira.
Kana vakarurama vowanda, vanhu vanofara; Asi kana munhu wakaipa achibata ushe, vanhu vanogomera.
Ani naani anoda uchenjeri, anofadza baba vake; Asi anoshamwaridzana nezvifeve, anorasha fuma yake.
Mambo anosimbisa nyika yake nokururamisa; Asi munhu wemitero, anoiparadza.
Munhu anobata wokwake kumeso, Anodzikira tsoka dzake mumbure.
Pakudarika kwomunhu akashata pano musungo; Asi wakarurama achaimba nokufara kwazvo.
Akarurama anoziva kururamisira mhaka dzavarombo; Asi akaipa haanzwisisi zivo.
Vadadi vanopisira guta; Asi vakachenjera vanodzora kutsamwa.
Kana munhu akarurama ane mhaka nebenzi, Iye achatsamwa nokuseka, asi hakungavi nezororo.
Vanhu veropa vanovenga akarurama; Asi vakarurama vanotsvaka kuraramisa mweya wake.
Benzi rinobudisa hasha dzaro dzose; Asi munhu akachenjera anodzidzora nokudzinyaradza.
Kana mubati achiteerera nhema, Varanda vake vose vachava vakaipa.
Murombo nomunhu anomanikidza vanosangana pamwechete; Jehovha anovhenekera meso avose.
Mambo anoruramisira varombo nokutendeka, Chigaro chake chichasimbiswa nokusingaperi.
Shamhu nokuraira zvinouyisa huchenjeri; Asi mwana wangoregwa hake anonyadzisa mai vake.
Kana vakaipa vowanda, kudarika kunowandawo; Asi vakarurama vachaona kuwa kwavo.
Rairira mwanakomana wako, agokuzorodza; Zvirokwazvo achafadza mweya wako.
Kana Jehovha asingazviratidzi, vanhu vanoramba kudzorwa; Asi anochengeta murayiro, anomufaro.
Muranda angaramba kurairirwa namashoko bedzi; Nokuti, kunzwisisa anonzwisisa hake, asi haane hanya nazvo.
Unoona munhu unokurumidza kutsamwa?
Benzi riri nani kuna iye.
Kana munhu achirera muranda wake zvakanaka kubva pahuduku hwake, Pakupedzisira achada kuva mwanakomana.
Munhu wakatsamwa anomutsa kukakavara; Munhu ane hasha anokudarika kuzhinji.
Kuzvikudza kwomunhu kuchamudukupisa; Asi ano mweya unozvininipisa, achakudzwa.
Ani naani anoshamwaridzana nembavha, anovenga mweya wake; Anonzwa kupikwa, asi haareururi chinhu.
Kutya munhu kunouyisa musungo; Asi ani naani anovimba naJehovha, achachengetwa.
Vazhinji vanotsvaka nyasha yomubati; Asi kururamisirwa kwomunhu kunobva kuna Jehovha.
Munhu asakarurama anonyangadza akarurama; Uye akarurama panzira dzake anonyangadza akaipa.

Ndiani akakwira kudenga, akaburukazve?
Ndiani akasungira mvura munguvo yake?
Ndiani akasungira migumo yose yenyika?

Usawedzera pamashoko ake, Kuti arege kukupa mhosva, uwanikwe une nhema.
Zvinhu zviviri ndakakumbira kwamuri; Musandirambira izvo, ndisati ndafa.

Ndirege kuti kana ndaguta, ndikurambei, ndichiti, Jehovha ndianiko?
Kana zvimwe ndive murombo, ndibe, Ndimhure zita raMwari wangu.

Zvinhu zvitatu zviriko zvisingatongoguti, Zvina zvisingatongoti, Zvaringana!
Sheori; nechizvaro chisingabereki; Pasi pasingaguti mvura; Nomoto, usingati, Zvaringana!
Ziso rinoseka baba, Rinoshora kuteerera mai, Makunguvo omupata acharinongora, Vana vegondo vacharidya.
Zvinhu zvitatu zviriko zvinondishamisa, Zvirokwazvo zvina, zvandisingazivi, zvinoti:
Kufamba kwegondo mudenga; Kufamba kwenyoka paruware; Kufamba kwechikepe pakati pegungwa; Nokufamba kwomurume nomusikana.
Ndizvo zvakaita kufamba kwomukadzi woupombwe; Anodya, ndokupisika muromo wake, Achiti, Handina kuita chinhu chakaipa.
Nyika inodedera nokuda kwezvinhu zvitatu; Uye nokuda kwezvina zvaisingadi kuona;
Nokuda kwomuranda kana achizova mambo; Nokuda kwebenzi, kana raguta zvokudya;
Nokuda kwomukadzi arambwa, kana azowanikwa; Uye mushandiri, kana azova mugari wenhaka yatenzi wake.
Zvinhu zvina zviriko panyika zviduku hazvo, Asi zvakachenjera kwazvo, zvinoti:
Majuru, rudzi rusine simba harwo; Kunyange zvakadaro anounganidza zvokudya zvawo muzhizha;
Mbira, rudzi rusine simba harwo, Kunyange zvakadaro dzinoita imba yadzo mumatombo;
Mhashu hadzina mambo , Kunyange zvakadaro dzinofamba zvakanaka dzichiita mapoka;
Chipfira ungachibata namaoko ako, Kunyange zvakadaro chiri mudzimba dzamadzimambo.
Zvinhu zvitatu zviriko zvinokufamba kunokudzwa, Zvirokwazvo zvina zvinokufamba kunokudzwa, zvinoti:
Shumba, mhare pakati pemhuka dzose, Isingatizi mhuka ipi neipi;

Ndianiko angawana mukadzi anozviita zvakanaka?

moyo womurume wake unomutenda, Naiye haangashaiwi fuma.

Anotsvaka mvere noruchinda, Achibata namaoko ake nomufaro.
Akafanana nezvikepe zvavatengesi; Anondotora zvokudya zvake kure.
Anomuka huchiri usiku, Nokupa mhuri yake zvokudya, Navashandiri vake basa ravo.
Anorangarira munda, ndokuutenga; Anosima munda wemizambiringa nezvaakawana namaoko ake.
Anozvisunga chiuno nesimba, Nokusimbisa maoko ake.
Anoona kuti kushambadzira kwake kwabatsira; Mwenje wake haudzimi vusiku.
Anotambanudzira ruoko rwake kune chokurukisa; Maoko ake anobata chinorukwa.
Anotambanudzira murombo ruoko rwake; Anotandavadzira anoshaiwa maoko ake.
Haatyi chando pamusoro peimba yake, Nokuti mhuri yake yose yakafuka nguvo tsvuku.
Anozviitira mitsamhiro inoukomba; nguvo yake mucheka wakaisvonaka nomutsvuku.
Murume wake anozikanwa pamasuo eguta, Kana agere pakati pavakuru venyika.
Anoita zvokufuka zvomucheka achizvitengesa, Anovigira vatengesi zvisungo zvezviuno.
Simba nokukudzwa ndizvo zvokufuka zvake; Anoseka kana achifunga nguva inouya.
Anoshamisa muromo wake nouchenjeri; Rurimi rwake runodzidzisa nounyoro.
Anotarira zvakanaka kufamba kwemhuri yake, Asi iwe unovakunda vose.Asingadyi zvokudya zvousimbe.

Vakunda vazhinji vakaita zvakanaka,asi iwe unovakunda vose.
