Jesu unorumbidza chipo chechirikadzi.
(Ruka 21.
1-4.)
Zvino wakanga agere akatarisana nechivigiro chemari, akatarira vanhu vazhinji vachiisa mari muchivigiro; vafumi vazhinji vakanga vachiisa zvizhinji.
Kukasvika chirikadzi, waiva murombo, akaisa tumari tuviri tuduku tunoita fadini.
Akadanira vadzidzi vake kwaari, akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Chirikadzi iyi, iri murombo yakaisa zvizhinji kunavo vose vakaisa muchivigiro;
nokuti avo vose vakaisa vachitora pazvizhinji zvavo; asi iye wakaisa achitora pakushaiwa kwake, zvose zvaakanga anazvo, zvose zvaaifanira kurarama nazvo.
Wakati achibuda mutembere, mumwe wavadzidzi vake akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tarirai mabwe, kunaka!
Nedzimba kunaka!
Jesu akati kwaari: Unovona dzimba idzi huru?
Hakungaregwi ibwe pamusoro pebwe, risingazowisirwi pasi.
Zvino wakati agere pagomo reMiorivhi, pakatarisana netembere, Petro, naJakobho, naJohane, naAndrea vakamubvunza vari voga, vachiti:
Tivudzei kuti izvozvi zvichagova riniko?
Nechiratidzo chichava chipiko, kana izvozvi zvose zvoda kuitwa?
Zvino Jesu akatanga kuvavudza, akati: Chenjerai kuti murege kutsauswa nomunhu.
Vazhinji vachavuya nezita rangu, vachiti: Ndini Kristu, vachitsausa vazhinji.
Kana muchinzwa zvokurwa, neguhu rokurwa, musavhunduka; izvozvo zvinofanira kumboitika; asi kuguma kuchigere kusvika.
Nokuti rudzi ruchamukira rudzi, vushe hwuchamukira vushe; kudengenyika kwenyika kuchavapo kunedzimwe nzvimbo; nenzara dzichavapo, ndiko kutanga kwenhamo
Zvichenjerei imi, nokuti vachakuisai kumakurukota, vuye mucharobwa mumasinagoge, muchaiswa pamberi pavabati namadzimambo nokuda kwangu, chichave chapupu kwavari.
NeEvhangeri inofanira kutanga kumboparidzirwa marudzi ose.
Kana vachienda nemi kukutongwa, vachikuisai kumakurukota, musambofunganya zvamuchataura, asi taurai chamunenge mapiwa nenguva iyo.
Nokuti hamuzimi munotaura, asi ndiMweya Mutsvene.
Mukoma uchaisa munununa kurufu, nababa mwana wavo; navana vachamukira vabereki vavo nokuvavurayisa.
Muchavengwa navose nokuda kwezita rangu; asi unotsunga kusvikira pakuguma uchaponeswa.
Zvino kana muchivona nyangadzi yokuparadza imire pasina kufanira kumira (unorava ngaacherekedze), vari muJudhea ngavatizire kumakomo;
uri pamusoro pedenga reimba ngaarege kuburuka, kana kupinda kuzotora chinhu mumba make.
Nouri mumunda ngaarege kudzokera shure kuzotora nguvo yake.
Vachava nenhamo vanemimba navanomwisa namazuva iwayo!
Nyengeterai kuti kutiza kwenyu kurege kuva pachando.
Nokuti namazuva iwayo kuchavapo kutambudzika, kusatikwambovapo kwakadaro, kubva pakutanga kwokusikwa kwakasikwa naMwari, kusvikira zvino, vuye hakuchazovipo.
Dai Ishe asaitapudza mazuva iwayo, hakunenyama yairarama; asi nokuda kwavakasanangurwa,vaakasanangura wakatapudza mazuva iwayo.
Zvino kana munhu achiti kwamuri: Tarirai Kristu uri pano, tarirai uri papo, regai kutenda.
Nokuti vana Kristu venhema vachamuka, navaporofita venhema, vachaita zviratidzo nezvinoshamisa, kuti vatsause vakasanangurwa, kana zvichibvira.
Asi chenjerai imi; tarirai, ndagara ndakuvudzai zvose!
Asi namazuva iwayo, shure kwokutambudzika ikoko, zuva richasviba, nomwedzi hauchazobwinyi,
nenyeredzi dzichawa kudenga, namasimba ari kudenga achazununguswa.
Ipapo vachavona Mwanakomana womunhu achivuya mumakore nesimba guru nokubwinya.
Ipapo uchatuma vatumwa, akavunganidza vakasangangurwa vake kunobva mhepo ina, kubva kurutivi rumwe rwenyika kusvikira kunorumwe rutivi rwokudenga.
Dzidzai pamuvonde mufananidzo wawo; kana davi rawo rava nyoro, mashizha achitunga, munoziva kuti zhezha rava pedo.
Saizvozvo imi vo, kana movona izvozvo zvichiitwa, zivai kuti vava pedo pamukova.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Rudzi urwu harungatongopfuvuri, kusvikira izvozvo zvose zvaitika.
Denga nenyika zvichapfuvura, asi mashoko angu haangatongopfuvuri.
Asi kana riri zuva iro nenguva iyo, hakuna unozviziva, kunyange vatumwa vokudenga, kunyange Mwanakomana asi Baba.
Chenjerai, murinde, nokunyengetera; nokuti hamuzivi kuti nguva ichasvika rini.
Zvakaita somunhu wakaenda kuneimwe nyika, akasiya imba yake, akapa varanda vake simba, mumwe nomumwe basa rake, akaraira murindi womukova kuti arindire.
Naizvozvo rindai, nokuti hamuzivi musi mwene weimba waanovuya nawo, kana madeko, kana pakati povusiku, kana pakurira kwehuku, kana mangwanani;
kuti arege kuvuya kamwekamwe, akakuwanai muvete.
Zvandinokuvudzai imi, ndinovudza vose, ndichiti: Rindai!
Zvino mazuva maviri akanga asara pakusvika kwepaseka nomutambo wezvingwa zvisinembiriso.
VaPirisita vakuru navanyori vakanga vachitsvaka mutovo wavangamubata nawo namano, kuti vamuvuraye.
Nokuti vakati: Zvirege kuitwa pamutambo, kuti kurege kuva nebope pakati pavanhu.
Jesu unozodzwa nomukadzi paBetania.
(Mat.
26.
6-13; Joh.
12.
1-8.)
Zvino wakati paBetania, mumba maSimoni wamaperembudzi, avapakudya, mumwe mukadzi akavuya anechinu chearbastera chaive nechi zoro cenardo chakanakisa chine mutengo mukuru; akaputsa chinu cearbstera, akachidurura pamusoro wake.
Asi vamwe vakanga varipo vakatsamwa pamoyo yavo, vakati: Kuparadza ikoko kwechizoro kwakaitirweiko?
Nokuti chizoro ichi chingadai chatengeswa namadhenari anopfuvura mazana matatu,* akapiwa varombo Vakatsamwira mukadzi.
Asi Jesu wakati: Muregei.
Munomutambudzireiko?
Wakandiitira basa rakanaka.
Nokuti varombo munavo nguva dzose, nguva ipi neipi yamunoda, mungavaitira zvakanaka; asi ini hamuneni nguva.
Dzose.
Wakaita paakagona napo; wakagara azodzera muviri wangu kuvigwa.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kwose kunozoparidzirwa Evhangeri panyika dzose, zvakaitwa naye zvicharebwa vo, vamurangarire nazvo.
Judhasi Iskarioti unotsvaka kutengesa Jesu.
(Mat.
26.
14-16; Ruka 22.
3-6.)
Judhasi Iskarioti, mumwe wavanegumi navaviri, wakaenda kuvaPirisita vakuru, kuti amuise kwavari.
Ivo vakati vachizvinzwa, vakafara, vakamupikira kuti vachamupa mari.
Ipapo akatsvaka mutovo waangamuisa kwavari nawo panguva yakafanira.
Paseka Nechirairo.
(Mat.
26.
17-30; Ruka 22.
7-23.)
Nezuva rokutanga rezvingwa zvisinembiriso, musi wavaibayira paseka nawo, vadzidzi vakati kwaari: Munoda kuti tikugadzirirepiko pamungadya paseka?
Akatuma vadzidzi vake vaviri, akati kwavari: Endai muguta, ipapo muchasangana nomunhu akatakura chirongo chemvura; mumutevere iye.
Paanenge achipinda, muti kumwene weimba: Zvanzi nomudzidzisi: Imba yangu yavaeni iripiko, mandingadyira paseka navadzidzi vangu?
ipapo iye amene uchakutaridzai imba huru yokumusoro, yakarongedzwa, yakagadzirwa; mutigadzirirepo.
Vadzidzi vake vakabuda, vakasvika muguta, vakandowana sezvavakanga vavudzwa naye; vakagadzira paseka.
Ava madekwana, akavuya navanegumi navaviri.
Zvino vakati vagere pakudya, Jesu akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Mumwe wenyu uchandipandukira, iye unodya neni.
Ipapo vakatanga kuva neshungu, mumwe nomumwe akati kwaari: Ndini here?
Akati kwavari: Ndomumwe wavanegumi navaviri, unoisa ruvoko neni mundiro.
Nokuti Mwanakomana womunhu unoenda hake, sezvakanyorwa pamusoro pake; asi unenhamo munhu uyo, Mwanakomana womunhu waanopandukirwa naye, kwaiva nani kumunhu uyu kana asina kuberekwa.
Zvino vakati vachidya, Jesu akatora chingwa, akachiropafadza, akachimedura, ndokuvapa, achiti: Torai, ichi ndiwo muviri wangu.
Akatora mukombe, akavonga, akavapa, vakanwa vose pauri.
Akati kwavari: Ichi iropa rangu nesungano itsva, rinodururirwa vazhinji.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Handichazonwi zve zvibereko zvomuzambiringa, kusvikira zuva iro randichazonwa naro, zvava zvitsva, muvushe bwaMwari.
Zvino vakati vaimba rwiyo, vakabuda, vakaenda kugomo reMiorivhi.
Jesu unovudza Petro kuti uchamuramba.
(Mat.
26.
31-35; Ruka 22.
31-34; Joh.
13.
36-38.)
Zvino Jesu wakati kwavari: Imi mose muchagumburwa kwandiri, nokuti kwakanyorwa, kuchinzi: Ndicharova mufudzi, namakwai achaparadzwa.
Asi kana ndamutswa,ndichakutunga mirirai Garirea.
Zvino Petro akati kwaari: Kunyange vose vakagumburwa, ini kwete.
Jesu akatikwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, kuti nhasi, vusiku bwuno, jongwe risati rarira kaviri, uchandiramba katatu.
Asi iye wakareva nokusimbisa, achiti: Kunyange ndikafanira kufa nemi, handingatongokurambiyi ini.
Navose vakadaro vo Jesu muGetsemani (Mat.
26.
36-46; Ruka 22.
39-46.)
Zvino vakasvika panzvimbo inonzi Getsemani, akati kuvadzidzi vake: Garai pano, ini ndichindonyengetera.
Akatora Petro naJakobho naJohane, akatanga kuvhunduka kwazvo nokudumbirwa.
Akati kwavari: Mweya wangu uneshungu kwazvo, kusvikira pakufa; garai pano murinde.
Akapfuvura mberi zvishoma, akawira pasi, akanyengetera kuti kana zvichibvira, nguva ipfuvure kwaari.
Akati: Aba, Baba, zvose zvinobvira kwamuri, bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri, asi kuda kwangu ngakurege kuitwa,asi kuda kwenyu..
Zvino akasvika, akavawana vavata; akati kunaPetro: Simoni, uvete here?
Wakanga usingagoni kurinda nguva imwe chete here?
Rindai, munyengetere, kuti murege kupinda mukuidzwa; mweya unoda hawo, asi nyama hainesimba.
Akaenda zve, akanyengetera achireva mashoko iwayo.
Akaenda zve, akavawana vavata, nokuti meso avo akanga abatwa nehope kwazvo; vakasaziva zvavangamupindura.
Akaenda zve rwechitatu, akati kwavari: Chivatai henyu, muzorore; Mwanakomana womunhu woiswa mumavoko avatadzi.
Simukai, tiende; tarirai, wondiisa kwavari vava pedo.
Kusungwa kwaJesu.
(Mat.
26.
47-56; Ruka 22.
47-53; Joh.
18.1-11.)
Pakarepo, achataura, Judhasi, mumwe wavanegumi navaviri, akasvika, anavanhu vazhinji vakabata minondo netsvimbo, vachibva kuvaPirisita vakuru navanyori navakuru.
Zvino iye, wakamupandukira, wakanga avapa chiratidzo, achiti: Uyo wandinosveta ndiye, mumubate muende naye makamusunga zvakabata.
Zvino wakati asvika, pakarepo akaswedera kwaari, akati: Rabhi!
Akamusveta zvikuru.
Ipapo vakaisa mavoko kwaari, vakamubata.
Zvino mumwe wavakanga vamirepo, wakavhomora munondo wake, akatema muranda womuPirisita mukuru, akagura nzeve yake.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akati kwavari: Mabuda kuzondibata neminondo netsvimbo, sendiri gororo here?
Ndakanga ndinemi mazuva ose, ndichikudzidzisai mutembere, mukarega kundibata, asi izvi zvaitwa, kuti Magwaro aitike.
Ipapo vakamusiya vose, vakatiza.
Zvino rimwe jaya rakamutevera, rakapfeka mucheka bedzi pamuviri, vakaribata;
asi rakasiya mucheka, rikatiza risinenguvo, Jesu pamberi pomuPirisita mukuru navakuru.
(Mat.
26.
57-68; Ruka 22.
63-71; Joh.
18.12-24.)
Zvino vakaisa Jesu kumuPirisita mukuru; vaPirisita vakuru vose navakuru navanyori vakavunganira kwaari.
Petro wakanga amutevera ari kure kusvikira paruvazhe rwomuPirisita mukuru; akanga agere navatariri, achidziya moto.
Zvino vaPirisita vakuru namakurukota ose vakatsvaka chapupu pamusoro paJesu kuti vamuvuraye, asi vakashaiwa
Nokuti vazhinji vaimupupurira nhema, asi kupupura kwavo kwakapesana.
Vamwe vakasimuka, vakamupupurira nhema, vachiti:
Takamunzwa isu achiti: Ndichaputsa tembere iyi; yakavakwa namavoko, ndikavaka imwe namazuva matatu, isina kuvakwa namavoko.
Asi kupupura kwavo kwakapesana.
Zvino muPirisita mukuru akasimuka pakati pavo, akabvunza Jesu, achiti: Haupinduri chinhu here?
Chinyi ichi chavanokupomedzera?
Asi iye wakaramba anyerere, asingapinduri chinhu.
MuPirisita mukuru akamubvunza zve, akati kwaari: Ndiwe Kristu, Mwanakomana wounokudzwa here?
Jesu akati: Ndini.
Nemi muchavona Mwanakomana womunhu agere kurudyi rwesimba, achivuya namakore okudenga.
Ipapo muPirisita mukuru akabvarura nguvo dzake, akati: Tichatsvakireiko zvapupu?
Manzwa kumhura kwake Mwari; munofungeiko?
Ipapo vose vakamutongera kuti unofanira kufa.
Vamwe vakatanga kumupfira mate, vakafukidza meso ake, vakamurova netsiva, vachiti kwaari: Profita; navatariri vakamurova namavoko.
Kuramba kwaPetro.
(Mat.
26.
69-75; Ruka 22.
54-62; Joh.
18.
16-18, 25-27.)
Zvino Petro achiri panze paruvazhe, mumwe wavashandiri vomuPirisita mukuru akasvika,
akavona Petro achidziya moto, akamutarira, akati: Newevo wakanga unaJesu weNazareta!
Asi iye wakaramba, achiti: Handizivi kana kunzwisisa zvaunoreva; akabuda panze kuruvazhe rwapamberi, jongwe rikarira.
Zvino mushandiri akamuvona, akatanga zve kureva kunavakanga varipo, achiti: Uyu ndomumwe wavo!
Asi iye wakaramba zve.
Nguva duku yakati yapfuvura, vakanga vamirepo vakati zve kuna Petro: Zvirokwazvo, uri mumwe wavo, nokuti newe vo uri muGarirea nokuti rurimi rwako runotenderana nazvo.
Ipapo akatanga kutuka nokupika, achiti: Handimuzivi munhu uyu wamunoreva.
Pakarepo jongwe rikarira rwechipiri; ipapo Petro akarangarira shoko rakanga rarebwa kwaari naJesu rokuti: Jongwe risati rarira kaviri, uchandiramba katatu.
Zvino wakati achifunga izvozvo, akachema.
Pakarepo mangwanani vaPirisita vakuru vakarangana navakuru navanyori namakurukota ose, vakasunga Jesu, vakaenda naye, vakamuisa kunaPirato.
Pirato akamubvunza, akati: Ndiwe Mambo wavaJudha here?
Akapindura, akati kwaari: Ndizvo zvamataura.
VaPirisita vakuru vakaramba vachimupomera zvizhinji asi haana kuvapindura chinhu.
Pirato akamubvunza zve akati: Haupinduri chinhu here?
Chinzwa, vanokupomera, zvizhinji seiko!
Asi Jesu haana kuzopindura chinhu, Pirato akashamiswa nazvo.
Zvino pamutambo waisivasunungurira musungwa mumwe, wavanenge vaikumbira.
Zvino kwakanga kunomumwe wainzi Barabhasi, wakanga asungwa pamwe chete navamwe vakanga vamutsa bope, vakavuraya vanhu pabope irero.
Vanhu vazhinji vakakwira, vakatanga kukumbira kunaPirato kuti avaitire saizvozvo.
Pirato akavapindura, akati: Munoda kuti ndikusunungurirei Mambo wavaJudha here?
Nokuti wakanga achiziva kuti vaPirisita vakuru vakanga vamuisa kwaari negodo.
Zvino vaPirisita vakuru vakakurudzira vanhu vazhinji, kuti vakumbire kuti zvirinani avasunungurire Barabhasi.
Pirato akapindura zve, akati kwavari: Ndichagoiteiko naiye, wamunoti ndiye Mambo wa vaJudha?
Vakadanidzira zve, vachiti: Murovere pamuchinjikwa!
Pirato akati kwavari: Wakagotadzeiko?
Vakanyanyisa kudanidzira vachiti: Murovere pamuchinjikwa!
Zvino Pirato, nokuti wakanga achida kufadza vanhu vazhinji, akavasunungurira Bharabhasi, asi Jesu wakamurovesa, akamuisa kwavari kuti aroverwe pamuchinjikwa.
Jesu unodadirwa navarwi.
(Mat.
27.
27-31; Joh.
19.
2, 3.)
Zvino varwi vakamuisa mukati moruvazhe, imo muimba yomubati, vakavunganidza hondo yose;
vakamupfekedza nguvo tsvuku, vakaruka korona yeminzwa, vakamudzika iyo.
Vakatanga kumukwazisa, vachiti: Kwaziwai, Mambo wavaJudha!
Vakamurova musoro norutsanga, vakamupfira mate, vakafugama namabvi, vakamunamata.
Vakati vamuseka, vakamubvisa nguvo tsvuku, ndokumupfekedza nguvo dzake, vakaenda naye kundomurovera pamuchinjikwa.
Jesu unoroverwa pamuchinjikwa.
(Mat.
27.
32-56; Ruka 23.
26-49; Joh.
19.
17-37.)
Zvino vakamanikidza mumwe, wakanga achipfuvura achibva kuruwa, wainzi Simoni weKurini, baba vaArekesndro naRufo, kuti atakure muchnjikwa wake.
Vakamuisa kunzvimbo inonzi Gorogota, ndokuti nzvimbo yedehenya, kana zvichishandurwa.
Vakamupa waini, yakavhenganiswa nemura, asi iye wakazviramba.
Vakati vamurovera pamuchinjikwa,, vakagovana nguvo dzake, vachikanda mijenya pamusoro padzo, kuti mumwe nomumwe apiwe chake.
Yakanga iri nguva yechitatu, vakamurovera pamuchinjikwa.
Norugwaro rwemhosva yake rwakanga rwakanyorwa pamsoro pake, ruchiti: MAMBO WAVAJUDHA.
Vakarovera pamuchinjikwa pamwe chete naye makororo maviri, mumwe kurudyi rwake, mumwe kuruboshwe. [
Rugwaro rukaitika, runoti: Wakarabwa pamwe chete navadariki vomurairo.]
Navaipfuvura vakamutuka, vachidzungudza misoro yavo, vachiti: Iwe, wokuputsa tembere, nokuivaka zve namazuva matatu,
chizviponesa iwe, uburuke pamuchinjikwa!
Saizvozvo vaPirisita vakuru navanyori vakamuseka pakati pavo,vachiti: Wakaponesa vamwe, zvino haagoni kuzviponesa.
Kristu, Mambo wavaIsraeri, ngaaburuke zvino pamuchinjikwa, kuti tivone titende.
Navakanga varoverwa pamwe chete naye vakamuzvidza.
Zvino yakatiyava nguva yechitanhatu, rima rikavapo panyika yose kusvikira panguva yepfumbamwe.
Nenguva yepfumbamwe Jesu akadana nenzwi guru, achiti: Eroi, Eroi, rama Sabaktani!
Ndokuti, kana zvichishandurwa: Mwari wangu, Mwari wangu, mandisiyireiko?
Vamwe vakanga vamirepo vakati vachizvinzwa, vakati: Chinzwai, unodana Eria.
Ipapo mumwe wakamhanya, akazadza chipanje nevhinega, akachiisa parutsanga, ndokumunwisa, achiti: Regai timboona kana Eria achizovuya kumuburusa.
Ipapo Jesu akadana nenzwi guru, akabudisa mweya wake.
Chidziro chetembere chikabvaruka napakati, kubva kumsoro kusvikira pasi.
Zvino mukuru wezana wakanga amirepo akatarisana naye, wakati achivona mutovo wokufa kwake, akati: Zvirokwazvo, munhu uyu wakanga ari Mwanakomana waMwari.
Navakadzi vakanga varipo, vakatarira vari kure; pakati pavo kwakanga kuna Maria Magdarene, naMaria mai vaJakobho muduku naJose, naSarome;
ndivo vaimutevera achi muGarirea vachimushandira, navamwe vakadzi vazhinji vakanga vakwira Jerusarema naye.
Kuvigwa kwaJesu.
(Mat.
27-57-66; Ruka 23.
50-56; Joh.
19.
38-42.)
Zvino ava madeko, zvarakanga riri zuva rokugadzirira, ndokuti rinotangira sabata,
Josefa weArimatea, mumwe wamakurukota, munhu wakakudzwa iye amene wakanga achigarira vo vushe bwaMwari wakavuya akapinda nokutsunga kunaPirato, akakumbira mutumbu waJesu.
Pirato akashamiswa achinzwa kuti wakanga atofa; akadana mukuru wezana, akamubvunza kana akanguva afa.
Zvino wakati azvinzwa kumukuru wezana, akapa Josefa mutumbu.
Iye wakatenga mucheka, akamuburusa, akamuputira nomucheka, ndokumuviga mubwiro bwakanga bwakacherwa pabwe, ndokukungurusira ibwe pamuromo wobwiro.
Maria Magdarene, naMaria mai vaJose, vakavona paakavigwa.
Sabata yakati yapfuvura, Maria Magdarene, naMaria mai vaJakobho, naSarome, vakatenga zvinonhuwira, kuti vaende kuzomuzodza.
Mangwanani nomusi wokutanga wevhiki, vakaenda, kubwiro, zuva robuda.
Vakataurirana, vachiti: Ndianiko uchatikungurusira ibwe pamukova wobwiro?
Zvino vakati vachitarira, vakavona kuti ibwe rakanga ratokunguruswa, nokuti raiva guru-guru.
Vakapinda mubwiro, vakavona jaya, rakanga rigere kurudyi, rakapfeka nguvo chena yakareba, vakavhunduka.
Rikati kwavari: Musavhunduka, munotsvaka Jesu weNazareta, wakanga aroverwa pamuchinjikwa; wamuka, haapo pano; tarirai pavakanga vamuisa.
Asi endai, mundovudza vadzidzi vake naPetro, kuti unokutungamirirai Garirea, muchandomuvonako, sezvaakakuvudzai.
Vakabuda, nokukurumidza vakatiza vachibva pabwiro, nokuti vakanga vabatwa nokudedera nokushamiswa; vakasavudza munhu chinhu, nokuti vakanga vachitya.
Zvino wakati amuka mangwanani nomusi wokutanga wevhiki, akazviratidza pakutanga kunaMaria Magdarene, waakanga abudisa mweya yakaipa minomwe kwaari.
Iye akaenda kundovudza avo vaiva naye,vakanga vachichema nokurira.
Ivo vakati vachinzwa kuti uri mupenyu, vuye kuti wakavonekwa naye, vakasatenda.
Shure kwaizvozvo wakazviratidza nomuwe mutovo kunavaviri vavo, vakanga vachifamba muruwa.
Naivo vo vakaenda, vakandovudza vamwe; naivo vakasavatenda vo.
Pashure wakazviratidza kunavanegumi nomumwe, vagere pakudya; akavapa mhaka pamusoro pokusatenda kwavo novukukutu hwemoyo yavo, nokuti havana kutenda vaya vakanga vamuvona amuka.
Akati kwavari: Endai munyika yose muparidzire zvisikwa zvose Evhangeri.
Unotenda, akabhabhatidzwa, uchaponeswa; asi usingatendi uchatongwa.
Zviratidzo izvi zvichava navanotenda: Vachabudisa mweya yakaipa nezita rangu, vachitaura nendimi itsva;
vachabata nyoka; kunyange vakanwa chinhu chinovuraya, hachingavarwadzi; vachaisa mavoko pamusoro pavarwere, vakapora.
Kukwira kwaJesu.
(Ruka 24.
50-53; Mab.
1.
9-11.)
Zvino Ishe Jesu wakati ataura navo, akagamuchirwa kudenga, akagara kuruvoko rworudyi rwaMwari.
Ivo vakaenda, vakaparidza kwose-kwose, Ishe achibata navo, achisimbisa shoko nezvitidzo zvaiva navo.
Amen.
Vazhinji zvavakaidza kurondedzera mashoko ezvinhu izvo zvakaitika pakati pedu,
sezvavakatipa ivo vakazviona nameso avo kubva pakutanga, navaiva vanyai veshoko,
neni vo, ndakati ndanyatso-feya zvose kubva pakutanga, ndakati zvakanaka kuti ndikunyorerei vo nokutevedzanisa, imi Teofiro, makakurumbira;
kuti muzive kuti mashoko amakadzidziswa ndeezvokwadi.
Zakaria unoziviswa kuberekwa kwaJohane Mubhabhatidzi.
Namazuva aHerodhe, mambo weJudhea, mumwe muPirisita waivapo, wainzi Zakaria, wegovero raAbhiya; mukadzi wake waiva wavanasikana vaAroni, zita rake rainzi Erisabete.
Vakanga vakarurama vose, vari vaviri, pamberi paMwari, vachifamba nemirairo nezvakarurama zvose zvaShe, vasina, chavangapomerwa.
Vakanga vasinomwana, nokuti Erisabete wakanga asingabereki, vuye vakanga vachembera vose vari vaviri.
Zvino, wakati achibate-basa rovuPirisita pamberi paMwari, padzoro regovero rake,
akagoverwa netsika dzovuPirisita, kuti apinde mutembere yaShe, kuzopisa zvinonhuhwira.
Vanhu vazhinji vose vakanga vachinyengetera kunze nenguva yokupisa zvinonhuwira.
Ipapo mutumwa waShe wakavonekwa naye, amire kurudyi rwearitari yezvinonhuwira.
Zakaria akamanikidzwa achimuvona; kutya kukamuwira.
Mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Zakaria, nokuti kukumbira kwako kwanzwikwa, mukadzi wako Erisabete uchakuberekera mwanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Johane.
Iwe uchava nomufaro nokufarisisa, navazhinji vachafarira kuberekwa kwake.
Nokuti iye uchava mukuru pamberi paShe; haangatongomwi waini nezvinobata; uchazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene kubva padumbu ramai vake.
Uchadzorera vazhinji vavana vaIsraeri kunaShe, Mwari wavo.
Uchafamba pamberi pake noMweya nesimba raEria, kuti adzorere moyo yamadzibaba kuvana navasingateereri kuvuchenjeri bwakarurama agadzirire Ishe, vanhu vakamugadzirirwa kwazvo,
Zakaria akati kumutumwa: Izvozvi ndichazviziva seiko?
Nokuti ini ndava mutana, nomukadzi wangu wachembera.
Mutumwa akapindura, akati kwaari: Ndini Gabrieri, ndinomira pamberi paMwari; ndatumwa kuti nditaure newe, ndikuparidzire mashoko awa akanaka.
Tarira, uchanyarara, usingagoni kutaura, kusvikira zuva rinoitwa zvinhu izvi, nokuti hauna kutenda mashoko angu, achaitika nenguva yawo.
Vanhu vakanga vakamirira Zakaria vakashamiswa nokunonoka kwake mutembere.
Zvino wakati achibuda, akasagona kutaura navo; vakaziva kuti wakanga avona chiratidzo mutembere; iye akaramba achininira namavoko, akaramba ari mbeveve.
Zvino mazuva okushumira kwake akati apera, akaenda kumba kwake.
Mazuva iwayo akati apfuvura, Erisabete mukadzi wake akatora mimba, akazvivanza mwedzi mishanu, achiti:
Ndizvo zvandakaitirwa naShe namazuva aakanditarira, kuti abvise kunyadzwa kwangu pakati pavanhu.
Maria anoziviswa kuti uchabereka Jesu.
Nomwedzi wechitanhatu mutumwa Gabrieri wakatumwa naMwari kuguta reGarirea, rinonzi Nazareta,
kumhandara, yakanga yanyengwa nomurume, wainzi Josefa, weimba yaDhavidhi; zita remhandara rainzi Maria.
Mutumwa akapinda kwaari, akati: Kwaziwa, iwe unodikanwa,Ishe unewe wakaropafadzwa pakati pavakadzi.
Iye wakati achimuvona akatambudzika nokutaura kwake, akafunga mumoyo make kuti kukwazisa kwakadai kunorevei.
Ipapo mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria, nokuti wanzwirwa nyasha naMwari.
Tarira, uchava nemimba, uchazvara mwanakomana, ugomutumidza zita rinonzi Jesu.
Iye uchava mukuru, uchanzi Mwanakomana woWokumusorosoro; Ishe Mwari uchamupa chigaro chovushe chababa vake Dhavidhi.
Uchabata imba yaJakobho nokusingaperi, novushe bwake habungavi nomugumo.
Ipapo Maria akati kumutumwa: Izvozvi zvingava seiko, zvandisingazivi murume?
Mutumwa akapindura, akati kwaari: Mweya Mutsvene uchavuya pamusoro pako, nesimba roWokumusorosoro richakufukidza; saka icho chitsvene chichaberekwa chichanzi: Mwanakomana waMwari.
Vuye tarira, Erisabete, hama yako, naiye wavanemimbavo yomwanakomana pakuchembera kwake; mwedzi uno wava wechitanhatu kunaiye wainzi haabereki.
Nokuti kuna Mwari hakuna chinhu chinokona.
Ipapo Maria akati: Tarirai, ndiri mushandiri waShe; ndiitirwe hangu sezvamataura, Mutumwa akabva kwaari.
Maria unondoshanyira Erisabete.
Namazuva iwayo Maria akasimuka, akakurumidza kuenda kunyika yamakomo, kuguta reJudhea;
akapinda mumba maZakaria, akakwazisa Erisabete.
Zvino Erisabete wakati achinzwa kukwazisa kwaMaria, mwana akakwakuka mudumbu rake; ipapo Erisabete akazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene,
akadana nenzwi guru, akati: Wakaropafadzwa iwe pakati pavakadzi, nechibereko chedumbu rako chakaropafadzwa!
Zvaita seiko kwandiri, kuti ndamutswa namai vaShe wangu?
Nokuti, tarira, inzwi rokukwazisa kwako rakati richisvika munzeve dzangu, mwana akakwakuka nomufaro mudumbu rangu.
Wakaropafadzwa iye mukadzi wakatenda, nokuti zvakataurwa naShe kwaari zvichaitika.
Maria akati: Moyo wangu unokudza Ishe,
Mweya wangu wakafara naMwari, Muponesi wangu;
Zvaakavona vurombo bwomushandiri wake; Nokuti, tarira, kubva zvino marudzi ose achati, ndakaropafadzwa;
Nokuti uyo unamasimba wakandiitira zvinhu zvikuru; Zita rake idzvene.
Ngoni dzake dziri kumarudzi namarudzi Avanhu vanomutya.
Wakaratidza simba rake noruvoko rwake; Wakaparadza vaizvikudza mundangariro dzemoyo yavo;
Wakabvisa madzimambo pazvigaro zvavo zvovushe, Akasimudza vakaninipiswa;
Vanenzara wakavagutsa nezvakanaka, Akadzosera vafumi vasina;
Wakabatsira Israeri, muranda wake, Kuti arangarire ngoni dzake,
(Sezvaakareva kumadzibaba edu), KunaAbhurahamu nokurudzi rwake nokusingaperi.
Maria akagara naye mwedzi inenge semitatu, akadzokera kumusha kwake.
Kuberekwa kwaJohane Mubhabhatidzi.
Zvino nguva yaErisabete yokuzvara kwake yakasvika; akabereka mwanakomana.
Zvino vakavakidzana navo nehama dzake vakati vanzwa kuti Ishe wakanga amuitira ngoni huru, vakafara naye.
Zvino nezuva rorusere vakavuya kuzodzingisa mwana, vakada kumutumidza zita rababa vake, Zakaria.
Ipapo mai vakapindura, vakati: Kwete, uchatumidzwa Johane.
Vakati kwaari: Hakunomunhu kuhama dzenyu wakatumidzwa zita iro.
Vakabvunza baba vake, vachidudzira namavoko, kuti anzi aniko.
Vakakumbira ibwe rokunyora pariri, vakanyora vachiti: Johane, ndiro zita rake.
Vakashamiswa vose.
Kamwe-kamwe muromo wake ukashamiswa, norurimi rwake rukasununguka, akataura, akarumbidza Mwari.
Kutya kukawira vose vakanga vagere navo; namashoko iwayo ose akanzwika kunyika yose yamakomo eJudhea.
Vose vakanzwa, vakaachengeta mumoyo mavo, vachiti: Uchazova mwana wakadiniko?
Nokuti ruvoko rwaShe rwakava naye.**
Baba vake, Zakaria, vakazadzwa noMweya Mutsvene, vakaporofita, vachiti:
Ishe, Mwari wavaIsraeri, ngaakudzwe; Nokuti wakamutsa vanhu vake, nokuvadzikinura,
Akatisimudzira runyanga rwokuponeswa.
Mumba momuranda wake, Dhavidhi;
(Sezvaakataura nomuromo wavaporofita vake vatsvene, vakanga varipo kubva pakuvamba kwenyika),
Kutiponesa pavavengi vedu, napamavoko avose vanotivenga;
Kunzwira madzibaba edu ngoni, Nokurangarira sungano yake tsvene;
Kupika kwaakapika nako kunababa vedu Abhurahamu.
Kutipa simba isu, tasunungurwa mumavoko avavengi vedu.
Kuti timushumire tisingatyi,
Novutsvene nokururama pamberi pake mazuva edu ose.
Iwe, Mwana, uchanzi muporofita woWokumusoro-soro, Nokuti iwe uchatungamira pamberi paShe, kumugadzirira nzira dzake;
Kuzivisa vanhu vake nzira yokuponeswa nayo, Vachikanganwirwa zvivi zvavo.
Nomoyo munyoro waMwari wedu, Uchatishanyira namambakwedza okudenga,
Kuvhenekera vagere murima nomumvuri worufu; Nokururamisa tsoka dzedu munzira yorugare.
Mwana akakura, akasimba mumweya, akagara mumarenje, kusvikira zuva rokuratidzwa kwake kuvaIsraeri.
Zvino namazuva iwayo chirevo chakaitwa naKesari Augusto, kuti nyika yose inyorwe mazita.
Uku ndokwaiva kunyorwa kwokutanga, kwakaitwa Kuriniosi ari mubati weSiria.
Vanhu vose vakaenda kundonyorwa, mumwe nomumwe kuguta rake.
NaJosefa vo wakabva Garirea, muguta reNazareta, akaenda Judhea, kuguta raDhavhidhi, rinonzi Bhetirehemu, nokuti waiva weimba yaDhavhidhi, noworudzi rwake;
kuti anyorwe naMaria, wakanga anyengwa naye, ava nemimba.
Zvino vakati varipo, mazuva okuzvara kwake akasvika;
akazvara dangwe rake mwanakomana, akamuputira nemicheka, akamuvanzarika muchidyiro chezvipfuwo, nokuti vakashaiwa nzvimbo muimba yavaeni.
Vafudzi veBhetirehemu.
Zvino kwakanga kunavafudzi munyika iyo, vaigara kuvuragu vachirinda mapoka avo vusiku.
Mutumwa waShe akamira navo, nokubwinya kwaShe kukavakomba, vakatya nokutya kukuru.
Ipapo mutumwa akati kwavari: Musatya, nokuti tarira, ndinokuparidzirai mashoko omufaro mukuru, uchava wavanhu vose;
nokuti nhasi mazvarirwa muguta raDhavhidhi Muponesi, ndiye Kristu Ishe.
Ichi ndicho chiratidzo kwamuri; Muchandowana rushiye, rwakaputirwa nemicheka, ruvete muchidyiro chezvipfuwo.
Ipapo kamwe-kamwe kukavapo pamwe chete nomutumwa, vazhinji vehondo yokudenga, vachirumbidza Mwari, vachiti:
Mwari ngaakudzwe kumusoro-soro, rugare ruve panyika, nomoyo muchena kuvanhu.
Zvino vatumwa vakati vabva kwavari, vaenda kudenga, vafudzi vakataurirana, vachiti: Ngatiende hedu Bhetirehemu, tindovona chinhu ichi chakaitwa, chatakaziviswa naShe.
Ipapo vakakurumidza kuenda, vakawana Maria naJosefa, norushiye ruvete muchidyiro chezvipfuwo.
Vakati vavona, vakazivisa kwose shoko ravakanga vavudzwa romwana uyo.
Vose vakanzwa vakashamiswa nezvavakavudzwa navafudzi.
Asi Maria wakachengeta mashoko iwayo ose, achiafungisisa mumoyo make.
Zvino vafudzi vakadzokera kwakare, vachikudza nokurumbidza Mwari pamusoro pezvose zvavakanzwa nezvavakavona, sezvavakanga vavudzwa.
Jesu unoiswa mutembere, Simeoni naAna.
Mazuva masere akati apfuvura, musi wokudzingiswa wasvika, vakatumidza zita rake Jesu, iro raakanga atumidzwa nomutumwa, asati agamuchirwa mudumbu ramai.
Zvino mazuva okuzvinatsa kwavo nomurairo waMosesi akati apera, vakaenda naye Jerusarema, kuti vamuise pamberi paShe;
(sezvazvakanyorwa pamurairo waShe, zvichinzi: Mwanarume mumwe nomumwe unotanga kuzarura chizvaro, uchanzi mutsvene waShe),
vuye kubayira chibayiro; sezvazvakarebwa pamurairo waShe, zvinoti, njiva mbiri, kana hangaiwa mbiri duku.
Zvino, kwakanga kunomunhu, paJerusarema, wainzi Simeoni; waiva munhu wakarurama waida Mwari waimirira kunyaradzwa kwavaIsraeri.. noMweya Mutsvene wakanga anaye.
Iye wakanga aratidzwa noMweya Mutsvene, kuti haangavoni rufu, asati avona Kristu waShe.
Iye wakavuya mutembere noMweya; zvino vabereki vakati vachivuya nomwana Jesu, kuti vaite naye nomutovo womurairo,
akamubata mumavoko ake akarumbidza Mwari, achiti:
Zvino, Tenzi, muranda wenyu ngaaende hake norugare sezvamakareva;
Nokuti meso angu avona ruponeso rwenyu,
rwamakagadzirira pamberi pavanhu vose
Chiedza chokuvhenekera vahedheni, nokurumbidzwa kwavanhu venyu vaIsraeri.
Josefa Baba vake namai vake vakashamiswa nezvakarebwa pamusoro pake.
Ipapo Simeoni akavaropafadza, akati kunaMaria, mai vake: Tarira, mwana uyu wakaisirwa kuwa nokumuka kwavazhinji pakati pavaIsraeri.
Chichava chiratidzo chicharambwa;
vuye munondo uchabaya mweya wako vo; kuti ndangariro dzemoyo mizhinji dzizikanwe.
Zvino kwakanga kunaAna vo, muporofitakadzi, mukunda waFanueri, worudzi rwaAsheri; (iye wakanga achembera kwazvo, wakanga anomurume makore manomwe kubvira pavumhandara bwake.
wakanga ari chirikadzi yaiva namakore makumi masere namana), wakanga asingabvi mutembere, achishumira Mwari nokuzvinyima zvokudya nokukumbira vusiku namasikati:
Naiye wakati achisvika nenguva iyo, akatenda Mwari, akataura pamusoro pake kunavose vakanga vachitarira kusunungurwa kweJerusarema.
Zvino vakati vapedza zvose zvomurairo waShe, vakadzokera Garirea, kuguta ravo Nazareta.
Mwana akakura, akava nesimba, mumweya akazara nenjere; nenyasha dzaMwari dzikava pamusoro pake.
Jesu pakati pavadzidzisi vakuru.
Zvino vabereki vake vaisienda Jerusarema makore ose kumutambo wepaseka.
Zvino iye wakati ava namakore anegumi namaviri, vakaenda Jerusarema netsika yomutambo.
Vakati vapedza mazuva, pakudzoka kwavo mwana Jesu akasara Jerusarema, Josefa namai vake vasingazvizivi.
Asi zvavaiti zvimwe uri kunavamwe vakanga vari panzira navo, vakafamba zuva rimwe, vakazomutsvaka kuhama dzavo nokuvazikani vavo.
Vakati vamushaiwa, vakadzokera Jerusarema vachimutsvaka.
Mazuva matatu; akati apfuvura, vakamuwana ari mutembere, agere pakati pavadzidzisi achivaterera nokuvabvunza.
Vose vakanga vachimunzwa, vakashamiswa nokuziva kwake vuye nokupindura kwake.
Zvino vakati vamuvona, vakakatyamara; mai vake vakati kwaari: Mwana, waitireiko zvakadai?
Tarira, baba vako neni takutsvaka tichichema.
Akati kwavari: Makanga muchinditsvakireiko?
Makanga musingazivi kuti ndinofanira kuva pazvinhu zvaBaba vangu here?
Vakasanzwisisa shoko raakavavudza.
Ipapo akaburuka navo, akasvika Nazareta, akavaterera.
Mai vake vakachengeta mashoko iwayo ose mumoyo mavo.
Jesu akaramba achienda mberi pakuchenjera napakukura, napakufadza Mwari navanhu.
Negore regumi namashanu rokubata kwaTiberio Kesari, Pontio Pirato ari mubati weJudhea, Herodhe ari mubati weGarirea, Firipo munununa wake, ari mubati weIturea neTrakoniti, Risanio ari mubati weAbirene,
Anasi naKayafasi vari vaPirisita vakuru, shoko raMwari rakavuya kunaJohane, mwanakomana waZakaria, murenje.
Iye akaenda munyika yose yakapoteredza yaJoridani, akaparidza rubhabhatidzo rwokutendevuka nekanganwiro yezvivi;
sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku yamashoko aIsaya muporofita, zvichinzi: Inzwi rounodana murenje, Gadzirai nzira yaShe, Ruramisai migwagwa yake.
Mipata yose ichafusirwa, Makomo ose nezvikomo zvose zvichaderedzwa; Zvakakombama zvicharuramiswa, Pasakaenzana pachaitiwa nzira dzakaenzaniswa;
Nyama yose ichavona ruponeso rwaMwari.
Naizvozvo wakati kuvazhinji vaivuya kuzobhabhatidzwa naye: Imi vana venyoka, ndianiko wakakunyeverai kuti mutize kutsamwa kunovuya?
Naizvozvo berekai zvibereko zvakafanira kutendevuka; musatanga kureva mumoyo menyu, muchiti: Abhurahamu ndibaba vedu; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Mwari ungamutsira Abhurahamu vana pamabwe awa.
Zvino sanhu ratoiswa pamudzi wemiti; naizvozvo muti mumwe nomumwe usingabereki zvibereko zvakanaka, unotemwa, ukakandirwa mumoto.
Vanhu vazhinji vakamubvunza, vachiti: Zvino todiniko?
Akapindura akati,kwavari: Une nguvo mbiri ngaagovane nousina; nounezvokudya ngaaite saizvozvo.
Navateresi vakavuya vo kuzobhabhatidzwa, vakati: mudzidzisi, todiniko?
Akati kwavari: Musareva mari kupfuvura pamakarairwa napo.
Navarwi vo vakamubvunza, vachiti: Nesu vo todiniko?
Akati kwavari: Musatorera munhu chinhu nesimba, kana kupomera munhu nhema; mutende nomubairo wenyu.
Zvino vanhu vakati vachatarira, vose vachirangarira mumoyo mavo pamusoro paJohane, kuti zvimwe ndiKristu,
Johane akapindura, akati kunavose: Ini ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura, asi uyu unovuya, unesimba kupfuvureni, wandisina kufanira kusunungura rukanda rweshangu dzake; iye uchakubhabhatidzai noMweya Mutsvene nemoto.
Rusero rwake ruri muruvoko rwake; uchanatsa buriro rake kwazvo; uchavunganidzira zviyo mudura rake; asi hundi uchaipisa nomoto usingadzimwi.
Akaparidzira vanhu Evhangeri, achivaraira namamwe mashoko mazhinji;
asi Herodhe mubati, wakati arairwa naye pamusoro paHerodhiasi, mukadzi womunununa wake, nezvakaipa zvose zvaakanga aita iye Herodhe,
wakawedzera pamusoro pezvose chinhu ichi, kuti wakapfigira Johane mutorongo.
Kubhabhatidzwa kwaJesu.
(Mat.3.
13-17; Mar.
1.
9-11; Joh.
1.
31-34.)
Vanhu vose vakati vabhabhatidzwa, naiye Jesu abhabhatidzwa vo, achinyengetera, denga rikazarurwa.
Mweya Mutsvene akaburukira pamusoro pake nomufananidzo wakaita sowenjiva, inzwi rikabva kudenga, richiti: Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, unodikanwa; ndinokufarira.
Rudzi rwaJesu Kristu.
(Mat.
1.
1-17.)
Zvino iye Jesu wakanga anamakore anenge makumi matatu, nguva yaakatanga kudzidzisa, ari, pakufunga kwavanhu, mwanakomana waJosefa, mwanakomana waHeri,
mwanakomana waMatati, mwanakomana waRevhi, mwanakomana waMerki, mwanakomana waJanasi, mwanakomana waJosefa,
mwanakomana waMatatiasi, mwanakomana waAmosi, mwanakomana waNaumi, mwanakomana waEsri, mwanakomana waNagai,
mwanakomana waMaati, mwanakomana waMatatiasi, mwanakomana waSemeion, mwanakomana waJoseki, mwanakomana waJoda,
mwanakomana waJoanani, mwanakomana waResa, mwanakomana waZorobhabheri, mwanakomana waSaratieri, mwanakomana waNerai,
mwanakomana waMerki, mwanakomana waAdi, mwanakomana waKosamu,mwanakomana waEmadamu, mwanakomana waEri,
mwanakomana waJesu, mwanakomana waEriazeri, mwanakomana waJorimu, mwanakomana waMatati, mwanakomana waRevhi,
mwanakomana waSimeoni, mwanakomana waJudha, mwanakomana waJosefa, mwanakomana waJonamu, mwanakomana waEriakimu,
mwanakomana waMerea, mwanakomana waMena, mwanakomana waMatata, mwanakomana waNatatamu, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi,
mwanakomana waJese, mwanakomana waJobedhi, mwanakomana waBoosi, mwanakomana waSara, mwanakomana waNasoni,
mwanakomana waaAmininabi, mwanakomana waAdamini, mwanakomana waArni, mwanakomana waEsromi, mwana waFarisi, mwanakomana waJudha,
mwanakomana waJakobho, mwanakomana waIsaka, mwanakomana waAbhurahamu, mwanakomana waTara, mwanakomana waNahori,
mwanakomana waSeruki, mwanakomana waRagau, mwanakomana waFareki, mwanakomana waEberi, mwanakomana waSarah,
Mwanakomana waKainami, mwamakomana waArfakasadi, mwanakomana waSemu, mwanakomana waNoa, mwanakomana waRameki,
mwanakomana waMatusara, mwanakomana waEnock, mwanakomana waJareti, mwanakomana waMarereeri, mwanakomana waKainami,
mwanakomana waEnosi, mwanakomana waSeti, mwanakomana waAdhama, mwanakomana waMwari.
Zvino Jesu azere noMweya Mutsvene, wakadzoka zve achibva paJorodhani, akatungamirirwa noMweya murenje.
achiidzwa naDhiabhorosi mazuva anamakumi mana.
Wakanga asingadyi chinhu namazuva iwayo; zvino akati apera, akaziya.
Zvino Dhiabhorosi akati kwaari: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, vudza ibwe iri kuti rive chingwa.
Jesu akamupindura, akati; Kwakanyorwa kuti munhu; haangararami nechingwa bedzi asi neshoko raMwari rose.
Zvino Satani akamutora akamukwidza pagomo refu akamuratidza vushe hwose hwenyika nenguva duku
Dhiabhorosi akati kwaari: Ndichakupa simba iri rose nokubwinya kwazvo, nokuti ndakabwupiwa ini, kuti ndihwupe wandinoda.
Zvino, iwe kana ukandinamata, zvose zvichava zvako.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: ibva shure kwangu Satani.
Kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: Namata Ishe, Mwari wako, umushumire iye oga.
Akaenda naye Jerusarema, akamuisa pachiruvu chetembere, akati kwaari: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, uzviwisire pasi pano;
Nokuti kwakanyorwa, kuchinzi; Ucharaira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako, kuti vakuchengete;
Pamavoko avo vachakusimudza, kuti urege kugumbusa rutsoka rwako pabwe.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Kwakanzi: Usaidza Ishe, Mwari wako.
Dhiabhorosi akati apedza kuidza kwose, akamusiya kusvikira imwe nguva.
Vanhu vanoramba Jesu paNazareta.
Zvino Jesu wakadzokera Garirea nesimba roMweya; mukurumbira wake ukanzwika nenyika yose yakapoteredza.
Waidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achikudzwa navanhu vose.
Akasvika paNazareta, paakanga arerwa, akapinda musinagoge nomusi wesabata sezvaaisiita, akasimuka kuti arave.
Akapiwa bhuku romuporofita Isaya; zvino wakati aipetenura, akawana pakanyorwa panoti:
Mweya waShe uri pamusoro pangu, Nokuti wakandizodza, kuti ndiparidzire varombo Evhangeri; Wakandituma kuti ndizivise vakatapwa kusunungurwa kwavo; Namapofu kuti avone zve; Ndiregedze vakatsikirirwa;
Nokuzivisa gore raShe rakanaka.
Akapeta bhuku, akaidzosera kumutariri, akagara pasi; meso avose vaiva musinagoge akamutarisisa.
Zvino akatanga kuvavudza, achiti: Nhasi rugwaro urwu rwazadziswa munzeve dzenyu.
Vose vakamupupurira zvakanaka, vakashamiswa namashoko akanaka akabuda mumuromo make, vakati: Ko uyu haazi mwanakomana waJosefa here?
Akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo muchataura shumo iyi kwandiri, chiremba uzviporese, zvose izvo zvatakanzwa zvakaitwa paKapenaume, uzviite vo nomuno munyika yako.
Akati: Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Hakunomuporofita unogamuchirwa munyika yake.
Ndinokuvudzai shoko iri razvokwadi: Kwakanga kunechirikadzi zhinji pakati pavaIsraeri pamazuva aEria, panguva yakazarirwa denga makore matatu nemwedzi mitanhatu, nzara huru ikavapo panyika yose;
asi Eria haana kutumwa kunomumwe wavo, asi wakatumwa Sarepta bedzi, munyika yeSidoni, kumukadzi waiva chirikadzi.
Kwakanga kunavaiva namaperembudzi vazhinji pakati pavaIsraeri pamazuva omuporofita Erisha; hakunomumwe wavo vakanatswa, asi Naamani bedzi, muSiria.
Ipapo vose vakanga vari musinagoge, vakatsamwa zvikuru, vachinzwa izvozvo.,
vakasimuka, vakamudzingira kunze kweguta, vakaenda naye kumawere egomo, pakanga pakavakwa guta ravo, kuti vamuwisire pasi.
Asi iye wakapinda napakati pavo, akaenda.
Jesu unoporesa munhu waiva nemweya wakaipa paKapernaume.

Iye akairaira akasaitendera kutaura nokuti yakanga ichiziva kuti ndiKristu
Zvino kwakati kwaedza, akabuda, akaenda kurenje, vazhinji vakamutsvaka, vakasvika kwaari,, vakaidza kumudzivisa, kuti arege kubva kwavari:,
Asi wakati kwavari: Ndinofanira kuparidzira mamwe maguta vo Evhangeri yovushe bwaMwari; nokuti ndizvo zvandakatumirwa.

akavona magwa maviri ari pagungwa, asi vabati vehove vakanga vabuda maari, vachisuka vutava hwavo.

Zvino akagara, akadzidzisa vanhu vazhinji, ari mugwa.
Wakati apedza kutaura akati kunaSimoni pinda kwakadzika mukande vutava bwenyu kuti mubate.
Simoni akapindura, akati: Tenzi, takatambura vusiku bwose, tisingabati chinhu, asi zvamadaro imi, ndichakanda vutava.
Vakati vaita izvozvo, vakakomba hove zhinji; vutava hwavo hwukabvaruka.
Vakaninira shamwari dzavo munerimwe igwa, kuti vavuye kuzovabatsira.
Vakavuya, vakazadza magwa ose ari maviri, akanga onyura.
Zvino, Simoni Petro wakati achizvivona, akazviwisira pasi pamabvi aJesu, akati: Ishe, ibvai kwandiri, nokuti ndiri mutadzi.
Nokuti wakanga ashamiswa iye, navose vaakanga anavo nokuwanda kwehove dzavakanga vabata.

ipapo akatambanudza ruvoko, akamubata, achiti: Ndinoda, chinatswa!

Akataura navo nomufananidzo, akati: Hakunomunhu uchabvarura chiremo panguvo itsva, akachiisa panguvo yakasakara; nokuti uchabvarura nguvo itsva, vuye chiremo chenguvo itsva hachinganzwani neyakasakara.
Hakunomunhu uchadira waini itsva muhombodo tsaru; nokuti waini itsva ichaparusa hombodo, ikatevuka, nehombodo dzikafa vo;
asi waini itsva inofanira kudirwa muhombodo itsva zvose zvichengeteke.

kuti wakapinda mumba maMwari, akatora zvingwa zvokuratidza, akazvidya, akapa vo vakanga vanaye, izvo zvakanga zvisinakutenderwa kudyiwa, asi navaPirisita voga?

1-8.)
Zvino wakatarisisa vadzidzi vake, akati: Makaropafadzwa imi varombo, nokuti vushe hwaMwari ndobwenyu.
Makaropafadzwa imi munenzara zvino, nokuti muchagutiswa.
Makaropafadzwa imi munochema zvino, nokuti muchaseka.
Makaropafadzwa, kana vanhu vachikuvengai, vachikudzingai, vachikuzvidzai, vachirasha zita renyu sechinhu chakashata, nokuda kwomwanakomana womunhu.
Farai nezuva iro, mupembere, nokuti tarirai, mubairo wenyu kudenga mukuru; nokuti madzibaba avo akaitira vaporofita zvakadaro.
Asi munenhamo imi vafumi, nokuti mapiwa kunyaradzwa kwenyu.
Munenhamo imi makaguta zvino, nokuti muchava nenzara.
Munenhamo imi munoseka zvino, nokuti muchachema nokurira.
Munenhamo imwi kana vanhu vose vachitaura zvakanaka pamusoro penyu, nokuti madzibaba avo akaitira vaporofita venhema zvakadaro.
Asi ndinoti kwamuri imi munonzwa; Idai vavengi venyu; muitire zvakanaka vanokuvengai.
Ropafadzai vanokutukai, munyengeterere vanokumhurai.
Unokurova padama, umurinzire rimwe vo; unokutorera nguvo yokunze, usamurambidza nenguvo yomukati vo.
Mumwe nomumwe unokumbira kwauri, umupe; nounokutorera zvako, usazvikumbira zve kwaari.
Sezvamunoda kuti vanhu vakuitirei, muvaitire vo saizvozvo.
Kana muchingoda vo vanokudai, munokuvongwa kwakadiniko?
Nokuti navatadzi vo vanoda vanovada.
Kana muchingoitira zvakanaka avo vanokuitirai zvakanaka, munokuvongwa kwakadiniko?
Nokuti navatadzi vanodaro vo.
Kana muchingopa ivo chikwereti, vamunoti muchadzoserwa zve navo, munokuvongwa kwakadiniko?
Nokuti navatadzi vanopa vo vatadzi chikwerete, kuti vapiwe zve zvakaenzana nazvo.
Asi idai vavengi venyu, muvaitire, zvakanaka.
Mupe chikwerete musingavori moyo; mubairo wenyu uchava mukuru, mugova vanakomana voWokumusoro-soro; nokuti iye unomoyo munyoro kunavasingavongi navakaipa.
Ivai netsitsi, sababa venyu vanetsitsi vo.
Musatonga, nemi hamungazotongwi; musapa mhaka, nemi hamungazopiwi mhaka; sunungurai, nemi muchasunungurwa vo.
Ipai, nemi muchapiwa; vachakupai pamavoko enyu chiyero chakanaka, chakatsikirirwa, chakazunguzirwa, chakaita mupfunga; nokuti nechiyero chamunoyera nacho, muchayerwa vo nacho.
Wakavavudza vo mufananidzo, akati: Bofu ringatungamirira rimwe bofu here?
Haangawiri mugomba ose ari maviri here?
Mudzidzi haapfuvuri mudzidzisi wake.
Asi mumwe nomumwe, kana akwaniswa, uchava somudzidzisi wake.
Unotarireiko rubanzu ruri muziso rehama yako,izvo, danda riri muziso rako haurivoni?
Kana ungareva seiko kuhama yako, uchiti: Hama, rega ndibvise rubanzu ruri muziso rako, usingavoni danda riri muziso rako?
Iwe munyengeri, tanga ubvise danda muziso rako, ipapo uchavonesesa kubvisa rubanzu ruri muziso rehama yako.
Nokuti hakunomuti wakanaka unobereka zvibereko zvakaipa; kana muti wakaipa unobereka zvibereko zvakanaka.
nokuti muti umwe nomumwe unozikanwa nezvibereko zvawo.
Nokuti vanhu havatanhi mavonde paminzwa, kana mazambiringa haatanwi parukato.

Mufananidzo weimba yakavakwa paruware.
(Mat 7.

Munondiidzireiko Ishe!
Ishe!
Musingaiti zvandinoreva?
Mumwe nomumwe unovuya kwandiri, akanzwa mashoko angu, akaaita, ndichakuratidzai waakafanana naye.
Wakafanana nomunhu wakavaka imba, akachera, akadzikisa, akaiteya paruware; mvura zhinji ikavuya, mvura ikarova imba iyo, ikasagona kuizunungusa, nokuti yakanga yakateyiwa paruware.
Asi unonzwa, asingaiti, wakafanana nomunhu wakavaka imba pavhu, isinenheyo; mvura yakati ichiirova, ikawa pakarepo, kuputsika kweimba iyo kukava kukuru.
Zvino wakati apedzisa mashoko ake ose, vanhu vachinzwa, akapinda Kapernaume.
Muranda womumwe mukuru wezana waidikamwa naye, wakanga achirwara, achitandadza.
Zvino wakati anzwa zvaJesu, akatuma vakuru vavaJudha kwaari achikumbira kuti avuye kuzoporesa muranda wake.
Ivo vakati vachisvika kunaJesu, vakakumbira zvikuru kwaari, vachiti: Iye wakafanira kuti, mumuitire izvozvo;
nokuti unoda rudzi rwedu, ndiye wakativakira sinagoge redu.
Jesu akaenda navo,.
Zvino ava pedo neimba, mukuru wezana akatuma shamwari dzake, kuzoti kwaari: Ishe, musazvitambudza; nokuti handina kufanirwa kuti mupinde mumba mangu;
naizvozvo ndakati handifaniri kuvuya kwamuri; asi taurai henyu shoko, muranda wangu uchapora.
Nokuti neni vo ndiri munhu wakaiswa pasi pavamwe, ndinavarwi pasi pangu; kana ndikati kunomumwe: Endai!
Unoenda; kunomumwe: Vuyai!
Unovuya; nokumuranda wangu: Ita chichi, unoita.
Jesu wakati achinzwa izvozvo, akashamiswa naye, akatendevuka, akati kuvazhinji vakanga vachimutevera: Ndinoti kwamuri: Handina kumbovona kutenda kwakadai, kunyange napakati pavaIsraeri.
Vakanga vatumwa vachidzokera kumba vakandowana muranda wakanga achirwara akapora.
Jesu unomutsa mwanakomana wechirikadzi paNaini.
Zvino nezuva rinotevera, wakaenda kuguta rainzi Naini; vadzidzi vake navanhu vazhinji-zhinji vakaenda naye.
Zvino, wakati achiswedera pedo nesuvo reguta, akavona vanhu vakanga vakatakura wakafa, mwanakomana mumwe woga wamai vake, yaiva chirikadzi; navanhu vazhinji veguta vakanga vanaye.
Zvino Ishe wakati achimuvona, akamunzwira tsitsi, akati kwaari: Usachema.
Ipapo akaswedera, akabata bwanyanza; vakanga vachitakura vakamira.
Akati: Jaya, ndinoti kwauri: Muka.
Iye wakanga afa akagara, akatanga kutaura; akamupa mai vake.

Shoko iri pamusoro pake rikanzvika muJudhea rose nenyika yose yakapoteredza.
Johane mubhabhatidzi: unotuma vadzidzi kubvunza Jesu.
(Mat.
11.
2-19.)
Vadzidzi vaJohane vakamuvudza izvozvo zvose.
Johane akadana vadzidzi vake vaviri, akavatuma kunaJesu neshoko rokuti: Ko ndimi iye wakanga achinzi unovuya here, kana tichakatarira mumwe?
Zvino varume vachisvika kwaari, vakati: Johane Mubhabhatidzi wakatitumira kwamuri neshoko rokuti: Ko ndimi iye wakanga achinzi unovuya here? kana tichakatarira mumwe?
Nenguva iyo akaporesa vazhinji hosha dzavo, novurwere, nemweya yakaipa; namapofu mazhinji wakaasvunudza.
Jesu akapindura, akati kwavari: Endai, mundovudza Johane zvamakavona nezvamakanzwa; zvokuti, mapofu anovona, vanokamhina vanofamba, vanamaperembudzi vanonatsva, vematsi vanonzwa, vakafa vanomutsva, navarombo vanoparidzirwa Evhangeri.
Wakaropfadzwa usingagumbuswi neni.
Nhume dzaJohane dzakati dzabva, akatanga kuvudza vanhu vazhinji pamusoro paJohane, achiti: Makanga mabuda kundovoneiko kurenje?
Rutsanga runozununguswa nemhepo here?
Asi makanga mabuda kundovoneiko?
Munhu wakapfeka nguvo nyoro here?
Tarirai, vanenguvo dzinobwinya, navanogara zvinonaka, vari mudzimba dzamadzimambo.
Asi makanga mabuda kundovoneiko?
Muporofita here?
Hongu, ndinoti kwamuri; Unopfuvura zvikuru muporofita.
Uyu ndiye wakanyorwa pamusoro pake, zvichinzi: Tarira, ndinotuma munyai wangu pamberi pako, Uchakugadzirira nzira yako pamberi pako.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Kuna vakaberekwa navakadzi, hakunomukuru kuna Johane Mubhabhatidzi: asi muduku muvushe bwaMwari mukuru kwaari.
Zvino vanhu vose navateresi vakati vachizvinzwa: vakati Mwari wakarurama, zvavakanga vabhabhatidzwa norubhaptidzo rwaJohane.
Asi vaFarise navadudziri vomurairo vakaramba kufunga kwaMwari pamusoro pavo, vakasabhabhatidzwa naye.
Naizvozvo vanhu vorudzi urwu ndichavafananidza neiko?
Vakafanana navana vagere padare vanodanidzira vachiti, takakuridzirai nyere mukasatamba, takakuririrai mukasachema.
Nokuti Johane Mubhabhatidzi wakavuya, asingadyi chingwa, asingamwi waini, zvino moti: Unomweya wakaipa.
Mwanakomana womunhu wakavuya achidya, achimwa, zvino moti tarirai munhu unokara, nomunwi neshamwri yavateresi navatadzi.
Asi vuchenjeri bwunoruramiswa navana vabwo vose.
Mukadzi mutadzi unozodza makumbo aJesu.
Zvino mumwe wavaFarise wakakumbira kuti adye naye.
Akapinda mumba momuFarise uyo, akagara pakudya.
Zvino tarira, muguta iro makanga munomukadzi waiva mutadzi; iye wakati anzwa kuti ugere pakudya mumba momuFarise, akavuya nechinu charbastera chaiva nechizoro.
akamira patsoka dzake mashure make, achingochema, akatanga kunyorovesa tsoka dzake nemisodzi, akadzipisika nevhudzi romusoro wake, ndokusveta tsoka dzake ndokudzizodza nechizoro.
Zvino muFarise wakanga amudana, wakati achizviona, akareva mumoyo make, achiti; Munhu uyu, dai aiva muporofita, ungadai aiziva mukadzi uyu unomubata kuti ndiani, vuye kuti wakadini, nokuti mutadzi.
Ipapo Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Simoni ndine shoko newe, Akati: Revai henyu, Mudzidzisi.
Jesu akati: Vanhu vaviri vakanga vanechikwerete kumunhu mumwe; mumwe wakanga anechikwerete chamadhenari anamazana mashanu,* mumwe chamakumi mashanu.+
Vakati vashaiwa chokuripa nacho, akangovakangamwira vose vari vaviri.
Zvino ndoupiko kwavari uchanyanya kumuda?
Simoni akapindura, akati: Handiti ndiye wakakanganwirwa zvizhinji here?
Akati kwaari: Wareva kwazvo.
Zvino akatendevukira kumukadzi, akati kunaSimoni: Unovona mukadzi, uyu here?
Ndakapinda mumba mako, ukasandipa mvura yetsoka dzangu; asi uyu wakanyorevesa tsoka dzangu nemisodzi yake, akadzipisika nevudzi rake.
Hauna kundisveta, asi uyu chinguri chandapinda, haana kurega kusveta tsoka dzangu.
Hauna kundizodza musoro wangu namafuta, asi uyu wakazodza tsoka dzangu nechizoro.
Naizvozvo, ndinoti kwauri: Zvivi zvake, zviya zvizhinji, wazvikangamwirwa, nokuti wakada zvikuru; asi unokangamwirwa zvishoma, unoda zvishoma.
Zvino akati kwaari: Wakangamwirwa zvivi zvako.
Vakanga vagere naye pakudya vakatanga kureva mumoyo yavo, vachiti: Uyu ndianiko unokangamwira zvivi vo?
Akati kumukadzi: Kutenda kwako kwakuraramisa; enda hako norugare.
Zvino shure kwaizvozvo, wakapota nokumaguta nemisha, achiparidza nokureva zveEvhangeri yovushe bwaMwari, vanegumi naviri vanaye.
Navamwe vakadzi vakanga vaporeswa pamweya yakaipa napamarwere, vaiti, Maria unonzi Magdarene, iye wakanga abuda mweya yakaipa minomwe kwaari,
naJohane, mukadzi waKuza, mutariri waHerodhe, naSusana, navamwe vazhinji, vaimushumira nezvavo.
Mufananidzo womukushi (Mat.
13.
1-23; Mar.

1-25.)
Zvino vanhu vazhinji-zhinji vakati vavungana, navakanga vabva kumaguta ose vasvika kwaari, akataura nomufananidzo.
Akati:
Mukushi wakabuda kundokusha mbeu dzake; wakati achikusha dzimwe dzakawira panzira, dzikatsikwa, shiri dzokudenga dzikadzidya.
Dzimwe dzakawira paruware; dzikamera, dzikawoma, nokushaiwa mwando.
Dzimwe dzakawira pakati peminzwa; minzwa ikakura pamwe chete nadzo, ikadzivhunga.
Dzimwe dzakawira muvhu rakanaka, dzikamera, dzikabereka zvibereko zvinezana.
Akati ataura izvozvo, akadanidzira, achiti: Unenzeve dzokunzwa, ngaanzwe.
Zvino vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza, kuti mufananidzo uyo wairevei.
Akati: Imi makapiwa kuziva zvakavanzika zvovushe bwaMwari; asi vamwe vanozvipiwa nemifananidzo, kuti vachivona, varege kuvona; vachinzwa, varege kunzwisisa.
Zvino mufananidzo ndiwo; Mbeu ishoko raMwari.
Avo vapanzira ndivo vakanzwa; zvino Dhiabhorosi unovuya, akabvisa shoko pamoyo yavo, kuti varege kutenda, vakaponeswa.
Avo vaparuware ndivo vanoti kana vanzwa shoko, vanorigamuchira nomufaro; havanomudzi, vanongotenda nguva duku; nenguva yokuidzwa vanotsauka.
Dzakawira pakati peminzwa ndivo vakanzwa; zvino vanoenda, vakavhungiwa nokufunganya nefuma, nezvinofadza zvovupenyu hwuno, vakasasvitsa zvibereko.
Asi dzomuvhu rakanaka, ndivo vakanzwa shoko mumoyo wakarurama nowakanaka, vanorichengeta, vachibereka zvibereko nokutsungirira.
Mufananidzo womwenje.
(Mat.
5.
15; 16; Mar.
4.
21-23; Ruka 11.
33-36.)
Hakunomunhu, unoti kana atungidza mwenje, unozoufukidzira nomudziyo, kana kuuisa pasi pomubedha; asi unouisa pachigadziko, kuti vanopinda vavone chiedza.
Nokuti hakuna chakavanzika, chisingazovoneswi,hakuna chakavigwa chisingazozikanwi nokubuda pachena.
Naizvozvo, chenjerai mutovo wamunonzwa nawo; nokuti unazvo, uchapiwa; usina, uchatorerwa naichecho chaanoita sounacho.
Vukama naJesu.

Akapindura, akati kwavari: Mai vangu navanununa vangu ndivo vanonzwa shoko raMwari vachiriita.

Zvino nerimwe ramazuva iwayo wakapinda mugwa navadzidzi vake akati kwavari: Ngatiyambukire mhiri kwegungwa.
Vakaenda.
Zvino vakati vachienda, iye akavata; dutu guru remhepo rikavuya pagungwa; vakatanga kuzarirwa nemvura, vakava munjodzi.
Vakavuya kwaari, vakamumutsa, vachiti: Tenzi!
Tenzi!
Toparara!
Ipapo akamuka, akaraira mhepo namafungu emvura; zvikaguma, kukadzikama.
Zvino akati kwavari: Kutenda kwenyu kuripiko?
Vakatya nokushamiswa, vakataurirana, vachiti: Ndianiko uyu, zvaanoraira kunyange nemhepo nemvura, zvichimuterera?
Jesu unobudisa mweya yakaipa.Panyika yavaGerasa.

Zvino vakasvika kunyika yavaGerasa, yakatarisana neGarirea.
Wakati achibuda mugwa panyika, mumwe murume weguta akasongana naye, wakanga anemweya yakaipa; nguva huru wakanga asina kupfeka nguvo, asingagari mumba, asi mumarinda.
Zvino iye wakati achivona Jesu, akadanidzira, ndokuzviwisira pamberi pake, akati nenzwi guru: ndinemhaka yeiko nemi Jesu, Mwanakomana woWokumusoro?
Ndinokumbira kwamuri kuti musanditambudza.
Nokuti wakaraira mweya wetsvina kuti ubude kumunhu.
Nokuti kazhinji wakamubata akachengetwa akasungwa nezvisungo namaketani; akadambura zvisungo, akadzingirwa kumarenje nomweya wakaipa.
Jesu akamubvunza, achiti: Zita rako ndianiko?
Akati.
Regioni.
Nokuti mweya yakaipa mizhinji yakanga yapinda maari.
Ikakumbira zvikuru kwaari, kuti arege kuiraira kuti iende kwakadzika-dzika.
Zvino kwakanga kuripo boka guru renguruve zhinji, raifura mugomo; ikakumbira zvikuru kwaari, kuti aitendere kupinda madziri; akaitendera.
Mweya yakaipa ikabuda kumunhu, ikapinda munguruve; ipapo boka rakamhanyira kumawere kugungwa, dzikabitirirwa.
Vaidzifudza vakati vavona zvaitwa, vakatiza, vakandovudza izvozvo muguta naparuwa.
Vakabuda kundovona zvaitwa; vakasvika kunaJesu, vakandowana munhu, makanga mabuda mweya yakaipa maari, agere patsoka dzaJesu, akapfeka, ari munhu kwaye; vakatya.
Vakanga vazvivona vakavavudza mutovo waakaporeswa nawo, iye waiva nemweya yakaipa.
Vanhu vose venyika yakapoteredza yavaGerasa vakakumbira kwaari kuti abve kwavari, nokuti vakanga vabatwa nokutya kukuru.
Akapinda mugwa, akadzoka.
Asi munhu uyo, makanga mabuda mweya yakaipa maari, wakakumbira kwaari kuti agare naye.
Asi Jesu wakamudzosa, achiti:
Dzokera kumba kwako, undotaura zvinhu zvikuru zvawaitirwa naMwari.
Akaenda, akandoparidza muguta rose zvinhu zvikuru zvaakaitirwa naJesu.
Jesu unoporesa mukadzi waibuda ropa, vuye unomutsa mukunda waJairosi.

18-26; Mar.

Zvino Jesu wakati achidzoka, vazhinji vakamugamuchira; nokuti vose vakanga vakamumirira.
Ipapo mumwe murume, wainzi Jairosi, wakanga ari mukuru wesinagoge, wakavuya akazviwisira patsoka dzaJesu, akakumbira zvikuru kwaari kuti apinde mumba make.
Nokuti wakanga anomukunda mumwe chete, waiva namakore anenge gumi namaviri, wakanga otandadza.
Zvino wakati achienda, vanhu vazhinji vakamumanikidza.
Ipapo mumwe mukadzi, waiva nokurwara kwokubuda ropa makore anegumi namaviri, wakanga apedzera kuna vana chiremba zvose zvaairarama nazvo, asingabetserwi kunyange neimwe yadzo.
akavuya mashure make, akabata mupendero wenguvo yake, pakarepo kubuda kwake kweropa kukaguma.
Jesu akati: Ndianiko wandibata?
Zvino vose vakati vachiramba, Petro navaiva naye vakati, Tenzi, vanhu vazhinji vanokumanikidzai nokukutsikirirai zvino moti ndiani wandibata.
Asi Jesu wakati: Mumwe wandibata, nokuti ndanzwa kuti simba rabuda kwandiri.
Zvino mukadzi wakati achivona kuti haana kuvanzika, akavuya, achidedera, akazviwisira pasi pamberi pake, akamuvudza pamberi pavose kuti wakanga amubata nemhaka yei, vuye kuti wakaporeswa pakarepo.
Akati kwaari: Mukunda, usatya kutenda kwako kwakuporesa, enda hako norugare.
Wakati achataura, mumwe akasvika, achibva kumba kwemukuru wesinagoge, akati kwaari: Mukunda wenyu wafa; regai henyu kutambudza Mudzidzisi.
Zvino Jesu wakati achizvinzwa, akapindura, akati: Usatya, tenda bedzi, iye uchaponeswa.
Zvino wakati asvika kumba, akasatendera munhu kupinda naye, asi Petro, naJohane, naJakobho, nababa vomusikana, namai.
Vose vakanga vachichema, vachimuririra.
Iye akati: Musachema, haana kufa, asi uvete.
Vakamuseka, vachiziva kuti wafa.
Zvino wakavabudisira panze vose akabata ruvoko rwake, akadana, achiti: Musikana, muka!
Ipapo mweya wake wakadzoka, akamuka pakarepo.
Akaraira kuti apiwe zvokudya.
Vabereki vake vakashamiswa, asi wakavaraira kuti varege kuvudza munhu zvakaitwa.
Zvino wakavunganidza vanegumi navaviri, akavapa simba nechikuriri pamusoro pemweya yakaipa yose, nokuporesa kurwara.
Akavatuma kuparidza vushe bwaMwari nokuporesa vanorwara.
Akati kwavari: Musatongotora zvomunzira, kana mudonzvo, kana hombodo, kana chingwa, kana mari; musava nenguvo mbiri.
Imba ipi neipi yamunopinda mairi, garaimo, kusvika muchibvapo.
Vuye vose vasingakugamuchirii, kana mobva paguta iro, muzuze guruva riri patsoka dzenyu, chive chapupu kwavari.
Ipapo vakabva, vakapota nemisha, vakaparidza Evhangeri, nokuporesa panzvimbo dzose.
Herodhe unokanganiswa pamusoro paJohane Mubhabhatidzi.
Zvino Herodhe, mubati, wakanzwa zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa; akakanganiswa, nokuti vamwe vakanga vachiti, Johane wakamuka kuvakafa;
vamwe kuti Eria wavonekwa; navamwe zve, kuti mumwe wavaporofita vekare wamuka.
Herodhe akati: Johane ndakamugura musoro; zvino ndianiko uyu, wandinonzwa zvinhu zvakadai pamusoro pake Akatsvaka kumuvona.

Akati kuvadzidzi vake: Vagarisei pasi vaite mapoka, anavanhu vanenge makumi mashanu.
Vakaita kudaro, vakavagarisa vose.
Ipapo akatora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, akatarira kudenga, akavonga, akazvimedura, ndokupa vadzidzi kuti vaise pamberi pavanhu vazhinji.
Vakadya, vakaguta vose; vakavunganidza zvimedu zvavakanga vasarirwa nazvo, matengu anegumi namaviri.

Nokuti aninani unoda kuponesa vupenyu hwake, ucharashikirwa nabwo; asi unorashikirwa novupenyu bwakwe nokuda kwangu, uchabwuponesa.

, akati kwavari: Aninani unogamuchira mwana uyu muzita rangu,unondigamuchira ini,ani nani unondigamuchira ini unogamuchira wakandituma;uyu uri muduku kwamuri mose, uchava mukuru.

Iye akati: Nditenderei henyu ndimbondoviga baba vangu.

Mumwe zve akati: Ndichakuteverai Ishe, asi mukanditendera henyu ndimbondowonekana navari mumba mangu.
Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Hakunomunhu ungati kana aisa ruvoko rwake pabadza, akacheukira shure, ungafanirwa novushe bwaMwari.
Shure kwaizvozvo Ishe wakagadza zve vamwe vanamakumi manomwe, akavatuma vaviri vaviri pamberi pake mumaguta ose, vuye kwose kwaakanga achida kuenda.

Kana munhu worugare anenge aripo, rugare rwenyu ruchazorora pamusoro pake; kana kusina, ruchadzokera kwamuri.

Paguta ripi neripi, pamunopinda, kana vakakugamuchirai, idyai zvamunopakurirwa.
Poresai varwere varimo, muchiti kwavari: Vushe bwaMwari bwaswedera kwamuri.
Asi guta ripi neripi pamunopinda, kana vasingakugamuchiriyi, budirai munzira dzavo, muti:
Kunyange neguruva reguta renyu rakanamatira tsoka dzedu, tinorikuhumurira kwamuri; asi muzive chinhu ichi kuti vushe bwaMwari bwaswedera.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Sodhoma richarerukirwa nezuva iro kupfuvura guta iro.

Zvino wakanga achibudisa mweya wakaipa, waiva mbeveve; mweya wakaipa ukati wabva, mbeveve ikataura, vanhu vazhinji vakashamiswa.

Asi vamwe vakamuidza, vakakumbira chiratidzo kwaari chinobva kudenga.
Zvino iye wakati achiziva kufunga kwavo, akati kwavari; Vushe bwumwe nobwumwe bwunozvipesanisa, bwunoparadzwa; neimba inozvipesanisa inowa.
NaSatani, kana achizvipesanisa, vushe bwake bwungamira seiko, zvamunoti, ndinobudisa mweya yakaipa naBeerzeburi?

Naizvozvo ivo vachava vatongi venyu.
Asi kana ndichibudisa mweya yakaipa nomumwe waMwari, ipapo vushe bwaMwari bwasvika kwamuri.
Kana munhu unesimba, wakashonga nhumbi dzokurwa, achirinda imba yake, nhumbi dzake dzinochengeteka.

Usineni, unopesana neni, nousingavunganidzi neni, unoparadza.

Kana wasvika, unoiwana yatsvairwa, yanatswa.

Asi iye akati: Hongo, zvikuru vakaropafadzwa vanonzwa shoko raMwari, vachirichengeta.

Nokuti Jona sezvaakanga ari chiratidzo kunavaNinivhi, ndizvo zvichaita vo Mwanakomana womunhu kurudzi urwu.
Mambokadzi weZasi uchasimuka pakutonga navarume vorudzi urwu, akavapa mhosva, nokuti wakabva pamigumo yenyika, kuzonzwa kuchenjera kwaSoromoni; tarirai, mukuru kunaSoromoni uri pano.

Hakunomunhu unoti kana atungidza mwenje, ungauisa pakavanda, kana pasi pedengu, asi pachigadziko, kuti vanopinda vavone chiedza.
Mwenje womuviri iziso rako; kana ziso rako rakanaka, muviri wako wose uchavhenekerwa; asi kana ziso rako rakaipa, muviri wako wose uchava nerima.
Naizvozvo chenjera kuti chiedza chiri mukati mako chirege kuva rima.
Zvino kana muviri wako wose wakavhenekerwa, pasinarutivi runerima, uchavhenekerwa wose, somwenje unokuvhenekera nokupenya kwawo.
Jesu unotuka vaFarise navadudziri vomurairo.

13-35.)
Wakati achataura, mumwe muFarise akakumbira kwaari kuti asvusvure naye; akapinda, akagara pakudya.
Zvino muFarise akashamiswa, achivona kuti haana kumboshamba asati asvusvura.
Ishe akati kwaari: Zvino imi vaFarise, munosuka kunze kwomukombe nendiro, asi mukati menyu muzere nokukara nokuipa.
Imi mapenzi!
Ko uyo wakaita zviri kunze, haazi iye wakaita zviri mukati vo here.
Asi zviri nani mupe zvipo pazvinhu zvamunazvo; ipapo tarirai zvose zvichava zvakanaka kwamuri.
Asi munenhamo, imi vaFarise, nokuti munopa chegumi cheminte neruyi nemirivo yose, muchirega kururamisira mhaka norudo kunaMwari; maifanira kuzviita izvi, nokusarega kuita izvozvo.
Munenhamo, imi vaFaraise, nokuti munoda zvigaro zvapamberi mumasinagoge, nokukwaziswa padare.
Munenhamo, imi, nokuti makaita samarinda asingavonekwi; vanhu vanofamba pamusoro pawo, vasingazivi.
Zvino mumwe wavadudziri vomurairo wakapindura, akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, kana muchitaura izvozvo, munotituka nesu vo.
Iye akati: Munenhamo nemi vo, vadudziri vomurairo; nokuti munotakudza vanhu mitoro inorema, inotambudza kutakura, asi imi mumene hamubati mitoro iyo kunyange nomumwe wenyu mumwe.
Munenhamo, imi, nokuti munovaka marinda avaporofita vakavurawa namadzibaba enyu.
Naizvozvo muri zvapupu, kana muchitenderana namabasa amadzibaba enyu; nokuti ivo vakavavuraya, nemi munovaka marinda avo.
Saka nokuchenjera kwaMwari vo akati: Ndichatumira kwavari vaporofita navapositora, vachavuraya vamwe vavo, nokuvatambudza;
kuti mhosva yeropa ravaporofita vose, rakatevurwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika, itsvakwe parudzi urwu;
kubva paropa raAberi, kusvikira paropa raZakaria, wakavurawa pakati pearitari neImba yaMwari;hongo, ndinoti kwamuri mhosva ichatsvakwa parudzi urwu.
Munenhamo, imi vadudziri vomurairo; nokuti makabvisa kiyi yokuziva; hamuna kupinda mumene, vuye makadzivisa avo vakanga vachida kupinda.
Wakati achibvapo vanyori navaFarise vakatanga kumumanikidza kwazvo, nokumubvunzisisa pamusoro pezvimwe zvizhinji,
vachimurindira, kuti vamubate pashoko rinobuda mumuromo make.
Zvino vanhu vanezvuru zvizhinji vakati vavunganira pamwe chete kusvikira votsikirirana, akavamba kutaura kuvadzidzi vake pakutanga, achiti: Chenjerai mbiriso yavaFarise, ndiko kunyengera.
Hakunechinhu chakafukidzwa, chisingazozarurwi; kana chakavanzika, chisingazozikanwi.
Saka zvose zvamakataura murima, zvichanzwika muchiedza; nezvamakataura munzeve mudzimba dzomukati, zvichaparidzwa pamusoro pedzimba.
Ndinoti kwamuri, hama dzangu; Musatya vanovuraya muviri, vasingazogoni kuita chimwe chinhu shure kwaizvozvo.
Asi ndichakuratidzai wamunofanira kutya; mumutyei iye, unoti kana avuraya, unesimba vo rokukandira muGehena.
Hongu, ndinoti kwamuri: Mumutye iye.
Ko shiri duku shanu hadzitengeswi nepeni here?
Hakuna imwe yadzo inokanganikwa pamberi paMwari.
Asi nevhudzi romusoro wenyu rakaverengwa rose.
Musatya, munopfuvura shiri duku zhinji.
Ndinoti kwamuri: Mumwe nomumwe unondipupura pamberi pavanhu, Mwanakomana womunhu uchamupupura vo pamberi pavatumwa vaMwari.
Asi unondiramba pamberi pavanhu, ucharambwa vo pamberi pavatumwa vaMwari.
Mumwe nomumwe unoreva shoko rakaipa pamusoro poMwanakomana womunhu, uchakangamwirwa, asi unomhura Mweya Mutsvene haangakangamwirwi.
Kana vachikuisai pamberi pamasinagoge navatongi navakuru, musafunganya kuti muchapindura sei, kana inyiko, kana muchataurei.
Nokuti Mweya Mutsvene uchakudzidzisai nenguva iyo zvamunofanira kutaura.
Mufananidzo womufumi benzi.
Zvino mumwe pakati pavazhinji wakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, vudzai muninina wangu kuti agovane nhaka neni.
Iye akati kwaari: Iwe munhu, ndianiko wakandiita mutongi kana mugoveri pakati penyu?
Akati kwavari: Chenjerai, muzvichengete pakuchiva kwose, nokuti vupenyu bwomunhu habwuzi pazvinhu zvakawanda zvaanazvo.
Akavataurira mufananidzo, akati: Nyika yomumwe mufumi yakanga yabereka kwazvo;
akafunga mumoyo make, akati: Ndichaita seiko?
Nokuti handina pandingavunganidzira zvibereko zvangu.
Akati; Ndichaita kudai: Ndichaputsa matura angu, ndikavaka makuru; ndichavunganidzirapo zviyo zvangu, nezvose zvangu zvakanaka,
ndigoti kumweya wangu: Mweya, unezvakawanda zvakanaka, zvakavigirwa makore mazhinji; zorora, udye, umwe, ufare.
Asi Mwari akati kwaari: Iwe benzi, mweya wako uchadikamwa kubva kwauri, novusiku; ubwu vachakutorera mweya wako; izvo zvawagadzira, zvichagova zvani?
Ndizvo zvakaita munhu unozvivunganidzira fuma, asingafumi kunaMwari.
