Asi pakati pavamwe kwakanga kusinomunhu wakatsunga kuzviisa kwavari; asi vanhu vaivakudza
Vatendi vazhinji kwazvo, varume navakadzi, vairamba vachiwedzerwa kunaShe.
Nokudaro vakatakurira varwere munzira dzomumusha, vakavaradzika pamibhedha napanhovo, kuti kana Petro achiswederapo, kunyange nomumvuri wake bedzi udzikatire mumwe wavo.
Navazhinji vamaguta akapoteredza Jerusarema vakavungana, vachivuya navarwere, navaitambudzika nemweya yetsvina, vakaporeswa.
Vaapostora vanobudiswa mutorongo.
Zvino muPirisita mukuru akasimuka, navose vaiva naye (vaiva vedzidziso yavaSadhuse), vanegodo kwazvo;
vakabata vaapostora vakavaisa mutorongo maipinzwa vanhu vose.
Asi mutumwa waShe wakazarura mikova yetorongo vusiku, akavabudisa, akati:
Endai, mumire mutembere muchitaura kuvanhu mashoko ose ovupenyu ubwu.
Vakati vachizvinzwa, vakapinda mutembere mangwanani, vakadzidzisa.
Zvino muPirisita mukuru navaiva naye, vakasvika, vakakokera makurukota nevungano yose yavakuru vavana vaIsraeri; vakatumira vanhu kutorongo kuzovuya navo.
Asi varanda vakati vachisvikapo, vakawana vasimo mutorongo; vakadzoka, vakavavudza izvozvo, vachiti:
Torongo takaiwana yakazarirwa zvakasimba kwazvo, navarindi vamire panze; asi takati tichizarura, tikasawana munhu mukati.
Zvino MuPirisita nomukuru wetembere, navaPirisita vakuru vakati vachinzwa mashoko iwayo, vakakanganiswa pamusoro pazvo, vasingazivi kuti zvinozodini.
ipapo mumwe munhu akasvika, akavavudza, achiti: Tarirai, varume vamakaisa mutorongo, vava mutembere, vamire vachidzidzisa vanhu.
Zvino mutungamiriri wavarwi, navatariri, vakaenda, vakavuya navo, vasingaiti nesimba, nokuti vakanga vachitya vanhu kuti vangatakwa namabwe.
Vakati vasvika navo, vakavaisa kumakurukota.
MuPirisita mukuru akavabvunza
achiti: Ko hatina kukurairai zvikuru kuti murege kudzidzisa nezita iri here?, zvino tarirai, mazadza Jerusarema nokudzidzisa kwenyu; muchida kuti ropa romunhu uyu rivuye pamsoro pedu.
Zvino Petro navaapostora vakapindura vakati: Tinofanira kuterera Mwari kupfuvura vanhu.
Mwari wamadzibaba edu wakamutsa Jesu iye wamakavuraya muchimuturika pamuti,
Mwari wakamusimudza iye noruvoko rwake rworudyi, ave Mutungamiriri noMusununguri, kuti ape vaIsraeri kutendevuka nekanganwiro yezvivi.
Isu tiri zvapupu zvamashoko iwayo; noMweya Mutsvene vo, wavakapiwa naMwari ivo vanomuterera.
Zvino ivo vakati vachizvinzwa, vakafa neshungu, vakada kuvavuraya.
Ipapo mumwe muFarise, wainzi Gamarieri, mudzidzisi womurairo, waikudzwa navanhu vose, akasimuka pamakurukota, akaraira kuti vaapostora vabudiswe chinguva chiduku;
akati kwavari: Varume vaIsraeri, chenjerai zvamunoda kuitira vanhu ava.
Nokuti kare kwakambomuka Tudasi, achiti, ndiri munhu mukuru, vanhu vanenge mazana mana vakamutevera; iye akavurawa, navose vaimuterera vakaparadzirwa, nokuparadzwa.
Shure kwomunhu uyu Judhasi weGarirea akamuka, pamazuva okuverengwa, akatsausa vanhu kuti vamutevere; iye akaparara, navose vakamuterera, vakaparadzirwa.
Zvino ndinoti kwamuri: Musabata vanhu ava, muvarege, nokuti kana kufunga uku nebasa iri zviri zvavanhu, zvichaparadzwa.
Asi kana zviri zvaMwari, hamungagoni kuzviparadza; kuti zvimwe mungadai muchirwa naMwari vo.
Vakamunzwa; ipapo vakati vadana vaapostora, vakavarova, vakavaraira kuti varege kutaura nezita raJesu; vakavaregedza.
Ipapo vakabuda pamakurukota, vachifara, zvavakanzi vakafanirwa kunyadziswa nokuda kwezita rake.
Havana kurega kudzidzisa, nokuparidza mazuva ose zvaKristu Jesu, mutembere kana kudzimba dzavo.
Zvino namazuva iwayo, vadzidzi vachiwanda, vaJudha, vaitaura chiGiriki, vakanyunyutira vaHebheru, nokuti chirikadzi dzavo dzaidarikwa pakugoverwa kwomusi mumwe nomumwe.
Zvino vanegumi navaviri vakadana vadzidzi vazhinji, vakati: Hakuzakafanira kuti isu tirege shoko raMwari, tishumire pamatafura.
Zvino hama dzangu, sanangurai pakati penyu varume vanomwe, vanopupurirwa zvakanaka, vazere noMweya Mutsvene novuchenjeri, vatingaisa pabasa iri.
Asi isu tichatsungirira pakunyengetera napabasa reshoko.
Shoko iri rikafadza vazhinji vose, vakasanangura Stefano, murume wakanga azere nokutenda noMweya Mutsvene, naFiripo, naProkoro, Nikanori, naTimoni, naPamenasi, naNikorasi, muproserite weAntiokia.
Vakavaisa pamberi pavaapostora; vakanyengetera, vakaisa mavoko pamusoro pavo.
Shoko raMwari rikakura, vadzidzi vakawanda zvikuru paJerusarema; navaPirisita vazhinji vakagamuchira kutenda.
Stefano unovurawa
Zvino Stefano, azere nenyasha nesimba, akaita zvinoshamisa nezviratidzo zvikuru pakati pavanhu.
Ipapo vamwe vavo, vaiva vesinagoge rainzi ravasununguki, navaKureni, navaAreksandira, naveKirikia, neveAsia, vakasimuka vakaita nharo naStefano.
Asi vakanga vasingagoni kukunda kuchenjera kwake, noMweya waitaura naye.
Ipapo vakamutsa varume, vaiti: Takamunzwa achitaura mashoko anomhura Mosesi naMwari.
Vakakurudzira vanhu, navakuru, vakamuisa kumakurukota.
vakaisapo zvapupu zvenhema, zvaiti: Munhu uyu haaregi kutaura mashoko anomhura imba iyi tsvene nomurairo.
Nokuti takamunzwa achiti: Uyu Jesu weNazareta uchaparadza nzvimbo iyi nokushandura tsika dzatakapiwa naMosesi.
Zvino vose vakanga vagere pamakurukota, vakamutarisisa, vakavona chiso chake chakaita sechiso chomutumwa.
MuPirisita mukuru akati: Zvinhu izvi ndizvo nhai?
Iye akati: Varume, hama, namadzibaba, inzwai: Mwari wokubwinya wakazviratidza kunababa vedu Abhurahamu, vachiri Mesopotamia, vasati vagara Harani,
akati kwavari: Ibva munyika yako, nokuhama dzako, uende kunyika yandinozokuratidza.
Ipapo akabuda munyika yavaKadhia, akagara Harani.
Zvino baba vake vakati vafa, Mwari akamutamisira ipapo kunyika ino yamugere zvino.
Asi haana kumupa nhaka imomo, kunyange paangatsika norutsoka rwake, asi wakamupikira kuti uchamupa iyo, ive yake neyavana vake vaizomutevera, asati atongova nomwana.
Mwari akataura, achiti, vana vake vachava vatorwa kunyika yavamwe; vachavaita varanda, nokuvavonesa nhamo makore anamazana mana.
Rudzi rwavachava varanda varwo, ndicharutongesa, ndizvo zvinoreva Mwari; shure kwaizvozvo vachabuda, vachandishumira panzvimbo iyi.
Akamupa sungano yedzingiso, Zvino Abhurahamu akabereka Isaka, akamudzingisa nezuva rorusere, Isaka akabereka Jakobho; naJakobho akabereka mateteguru anegumi namaviri.
Mateteguru zvaakanga achigodora Josefa, vakamutengesa, akaiswa Ijipiti; Mwari akava naye.
Akamurwira panhamo dzake dzose, akamubatsira kuti adikanwe naFarao, mambo weIjipiti, ave nokuchenjera pamberi pake; iye akamuita mutariri weIjipiti noweimba yake yose.
Zvino nzara ikasvika paIjipiti yose neKanani, nenhamo huru; madzibaba edu akashaiwa zvokudya.
Zvino Jakobho, wakati anzwa kuti Ijipiti kunezviyo, pakutanga akatuma madzibaba edu.
Parwendo rwechipiri Josefa akazikanwa navakuru vake; rudzi rwaJosefa rukavonekwa naFarao.
Zvino Josefa akavatuma kundodana Jakobho, baba vake, nehama dzake dzose, vanhu vaiva namakumi manomwe navashanu.
Jakobho akaburukira Ijipiti; akazofa, iye namadzibaba edu;
vakaiswa Shekemi, vakavigwa pabwiro bwakanga bwatengwa naAbhurahamu nomutengo wesirvheri kuvanakomana vaEmori paShekemi.
Zvino nguva yechipikirwa chakanga chapikirwa Abhurahamu naMwari, yakati ichiswedera, vanhu vakawanda, vakaita vazhinji muIjipiti;
kusvikira mumwe mambo akamuka muIjipiti, wakanga asina kuziva Josefa.
Iye akabata rudzi rwedu namano, akatambudza madzibaba edu, akavaraira kuti varashe vacheche vavo, kuti varege kuraramiswa.
Nenguva iyo Mosesi akaberekwa, wakanga akaisvonaka kwazvo; akarerwa mwedzi mitatu mumba mababa vake;
zvino wakati arashwa, mukunda waFarao akamunonga, akamurera kuti ave mwanakomana wake.
Mosesi akadzidziswa vuchenjeri bwose bwavaIjipiti; akava nesimba pamashoko napamabasa ake.
Zvino wakati asvika makore anamakumi mana, moyo wake ukada kushanyira hama dzake, vana vaIsraeri.
Akavona mumwe achiitirwa zvisakarurama, ndokumurwira, akavuraya muIjipiti, achitsiva wakanga achitambudzwa.
Akati, zvimwe hama dzake dzichanzwisisa kuti Mwari wakanga achida kuvaponesa noruvoko rwake; asi havana kunzwisisa.
Fume mangwana akavashanyira akavawana vachikakavadzana, akaidza kuvayananisa, achiti: Varume, muri hama, munoitirana zvisakarurama neiko?
Zvino iye wakanga achiitira wokwake zvisakarurama akamusundira kure, achiti: Ndianiko wakakuita mubati nomutongi wedu?
Unoda kundivuraya, sezvawakavuraya muIjipiti zuro kanhi?
Mosesi akatiza achinzwa shoko iri, akandova mutorwa kunyika yeMidiani, kwaakandobereka vanakomana vaviri.
Zvino makore makumi mana akati apera, mutumwa waShe akavonekwa naye murenje regomo reSinai, mumurazvo womoto mugwenzi.
Mosesi akati achizvivona, akashamiswa nezvaakavona; zvino akati achiswedera kuzocherekedza, inzwi raShe rikanzwika, richiti:
Ndini Mwari wamadzibaba ako, Mwari waAbhurahamu, nowaIsaka, nowaJakobho, ipapo Mosesi akadedera akatya kucherekedza.
Zvino Ishe akati kwaari: Bvisa shangu patsoka dzako, nokuti nzvimbo yaumire pairi itsvene.
Ndakavona hangu kwazvo kutambudzika kwavanhu vangu vari muIjipiti, ndakanzwa kugomera kwavo, ndaburuka kuzovarwira; zvino vuya ndikutume Ijipiti.
Uyu Mosesi wavakaramba,vachiti: Ndiani wakakuita mubati nomutongi?
Ndiye wakatumwa naMwari, nomutumwa wakavonekwa naye mugwenzi, kuti ave mubati nomudzikinuri.
Iye akavabudisa, akaita zvinoshamisa nezviratidzo munyika yeIjipiti, nepaGungwa Dzvuku, nomurenje, makore anamakumi mana.
Ndiyeye Mosesi wakati kuvana vaIsraeri: Ishe Mwari wenyu uchakumutsirai Muporofita pakati pehama dzenyu, wakafanana neni uyu ndiye wamuchanzwa.
Ndiyeye wakanga ari kuvungano murenje, anomutumwa wakataura naye mugomo reSinai, anamadzibaba edu vo, wakagamuchira mashoko mapenyu kuzotipa.
Ndiye, wavakanga vasingadi kumutevera ivo madzibaba edu; vakamuramba, vakadzokera Ijipiti nemoyo yavo.
Vakati kunaAroni: Tiitire vamwari, vangatitungamirira; nokuti kana ari Mosesi uyu, wakatibudisa munyika yeIjipiti, hatizivi zvakaitika kwaari.
Zvino vakaita mhuru namazuva iwayo, vakavuya nechibayiro kuchifananidzo chavo, vakafarira mabasa amavoko avo.
Zvino Mwari akavafuratira, akavarega kuti vashumire hondo yokudenga, sezvakanyorwa mubhuku ravaporofita, zvichinzi: Ko makandivigira zvipfuwo zvakabayiwa nezvibayiro Makore makumi mana murenje, imi, imba yavaIsraeri here?
Makatakura tabernakeri yaMoroki, Nenyeredzi yamwari wenyu Remfani, Zvifananidzo zvamakaita kuti muzvinamate; Ndichakutamisai mberi kweBhabhironi.
Madzibaba edu aiva netabernakeri yovuchapupu murenje, yakanga yakavakwa sezvaakaraira iye, wakataura naMosesi achiti aite nomufananidzo waakavona.
Yakati yagamuchirwa namadzibaba edu, vakapinda nayo naJoshua munyika yavahedheni,vakadzingwa naMwari pamberi pamadzibaba edu, kusvikira pamazuva aDhavhidhi.
iye akanzwirwa nyasha pamberi paMwari, akakumbira kuvakira Mwari waJakobho pokugara.
Soromoni akamuvakira imba.
Asi Wokumusoro haagari mudzimba dzakavakwa namavoko, sezvakarebwa nomuporofita, achiti:
Denga ndicho chigaro changu chovushe.
Nenyika chitsiko chetsoka dzangu; Muchandivakira imba yakadiniko?
Ndizvo zvinoreva Ishe; Kana nzvimbo yandingazorora pairi ndeipi?
Ko ruvoko rwangu haruna kuita izvozvi zvose here?
Imi vemitsipa mikukutu, musinakudzingiswa pamoyo nenzeve, munogara muchidzivisa Mweya Mutsvene; samadzibaba enyu, nemi vo.
Ndoupiko pakati pavaporofita, usinakutambudzwa namadzibaba enyu?
Vakavuraya avo vaiparidza kuvuya kwoWakarurama, iye wamakapandukira nokumuvuraya zvino.
Iyemi, makapiwa murairo sezvawakarairwa navatumwa, mukasauchengeta.
Zvino vakati vachinzwa izvozvo, vakafa neshungu kwazvo, vakamugeda-gedera meno.
Asi iye azere noMweya Mutsvene, akatarisisa kudenga, akavona kubwinya kwaMwari, naJesu amire kuruvoko rwurudyi rwaMwari,
akati: Tarirai, ndinovona denga rakazarurwa, noMwanakomana womunhu amire kuruvoko rworudyi rwaMwari.
Zvino vakadanidzira nenzwi guru, vakadzivira nzeve dzavo, vakamhanyira kwaari vose pamwe chete;
vakamubudisira kunze kweguta, ndokumutaka namabwe; zvapupu zvikaisa nguvo dzazvo patsoka dzejaya, rainzi Sauro.
Vakataka Stefano, achidana achiti: Ishe Jesu, gamuchirai mweya wangu.
Akafugama, akadanidzira nenzwi guru, achiti: Ishe, musavapa mhosva yechivi ichi, Akati areva izvozvo, akavata rufu.
Sauro wakanga achitenda kuvurawa kwake.
Zvino nenguva iyo kereke yapaJerusarema yakatambudzwa zvikuru, vakaparadzirwa vose kunyika yeJudhea neSamaria, vakasara vaapostra bedzi.
Varume vakarurama vakaviga Stefano, vakamuchema zvikuru.
Zvino Sauro akaparadza kereke, achipinda mudzimba dzose, achikakata varume navakadzi, nokuvaisa mutorongo.
Firipo unoparidza paSamaria.
Zvino avo vakaparadzirwa, vakapotenyika, vachiparidza shoko.
NaFiripo wakaburukira kuguta reSamaria, akavaparidzira Kristu.
Vanhu vazhinji vakaterera nomoyo mumwe zvairebwa naFiripo, vachinzwa nokuvona zviratidzo zvaakanga achiita.
Nokuti mweya yetsvina yakabuda kuvazhinji vaiva nayo, ichidanidzira nenzwi guru; navazhinji vakanga vakafa mitezo navaikamhina vakaporeswa.
Mufaro mukuru ukavapo paguta iro.
Simoni Nanga.
Zvino kwakanga kunomumwe murume, wainzi Simoni, waiva nanga kare paguta iro, waishamisa vanhu veSamaria, achizviita munhu mukuru.
Vose, vaduku navakuru, vakamuterera, vachiti: Uyu munhu isimba guru raMwari,
Vakamuterera, nokuti wakanga avashamisa novunanga bwake nguva huru.
Zvino vakati vatenda Firipo, wakaparidza mashoko ovushe bwaMwari nezita raJesu Kristu, vakabhabhatidzwa varume navakadzi.
Naiye Simoni akatenda vo, ndokubhabhatidzwa vo, akagara naFiripo; akashamiswa, achivona zviratidzo namabasa esimba makuru, akanga achiitwa.
Zvino vaapostora vaiva paJerusarema, vakati vanzwa kuti vaSamaria vakanga vagamuchira shoko raMwari, vakatuma Petro naJohane kwavari.
Ivo vakaburukirako, vakavanyengeterera kuti vapiwe Mweya Mutsvene;
nokuti wakanga asina kuburukira pamusoro pomumwe wavo; vakanga vangobhabhatidzwa muzita raShe Jesu bedzi.
Ipapo vakaisa mavoko avo pamusoro pavo, vakagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene.
Zvino Simoni wakati achivona kuti Mweya Mutsvene wapiwa nokuiswa kwamavoko avapostora, akavuya kwavari nemari,
achiti: Ndipei neni vo simba iri, kuti wandinenge ndichiisa mavoko pamusoro pake, apiwe Mweya Mutsvene.
Zvino Petro akati kwaari: Sirvheri yako ngaiparadzwe pamwechete newe, nokuti wakafunga kutenga chipo chaMwari nemari.
Hauna mugove, kana chikamu, pachinhu ichi, nokuti moyo wako hauna kururama pamberi paMwari.
Naizvozvo tendevuka pakuipa kwako, ukumbire kunaShe, kuti zvimwe ukanganwirwe murangariro womwoyo wako.
Nokuti ndinovona kuti wapinda munduru inovava, napakusungwa kusakarurama.
Simoni akapindura, akati: Mundikumbirire zvikuru imi kunaShe, kuti ndirege kuwirwa nechimwe chaizvozvo zvamareva.
Zvino vakati vapupura kwazvo nokutaura shoko raShe, vakadzokera zve Jerusarema, vachiparidza Evhangeri mumisha mizhinji yavaSamaria.
Firipo nomuranda waKandase.
Zvino mutumwa waShe akataura naFiripo, akati: Simuka, uende Zasi kunzira inobva Jerusarema ichiburukira Gaza; iyo nyika irenje.
Akasimuka, akaenda; zvino kwakanga kunomurume weEtiopia, muranda mukuru kwazvo waKandase, mambokadzi weEtiopia, waichengeta fuma yake yose, wakanga avuya Jerusarema kuzonamata;
wakanga achidzoka, agere mungoro yake achirava muporofita Isaya.
Mweya akati kunaFiripo: Swedera, urambire pangoro iyo.
Firipo akamhanyirako, akamunzwa achirava muporofita Isaya, akati: Unonzwisisa zvaunorava here?
Iye akati: Ndingagona seiko, kana mumwe asingandidudziri?
Akakumbira zvikuru kunaFiripo kuti akwire, agare naye.
Zvino paakanga achirava paRugwaro paiti: Wakaiswa pakubayiwa segwai; Segwaiana rinyerere pamberi pomuvevuri waro, Saizvozvo haana kushamisa muromo wake;
Pakuzvidzwa kwake kutongwa kwake kwakabviswa; Ndianiko ucharondedzera rudzi rwake?
Nokuti vupenyu bwake bwunobviswa panyika.
Muranda akapindura Firipo, akati: Ndinokumbira kwauri, undivudze kuti muporofita unoreva aniko achidaro?
Unozvireva iye amene, kana mumwe?
Ipapo Firipo akashamisa muromo wake; akatanga parugwaro urwu, akamuparidzira Jesu.
Zvino vakati vachifamba munzira akati: Heyi mvura; chinyiko chingadzivisa ndirege kubhabhatidzwa?
[Firipo akati: Kana uchitenda nomoyo wako wose, zvingaitwa.
Akapindura, akati: Ndinotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari.]
Akaraira kuti ngoro imire; vakaburukira vose mumvura, iye Firipo nomuranda; akamubhabhatidza.
Zvino vakati vachibuda mumvura, Mweya waShe ukabvisa Firipo; muranda akasazomuvona zve; nokuti wakafamba rwendo rwake, achifara.
Asi Firipo wakawanika paAzoto, akapota nyika achiparidza Evhangeri pamaguta ose, kusvikira paKesaria.
Asi Sauro achingorangarira kutyisa nokuvuraya vadzidzi vaShe, wakaenda kumuPirisita mukuru,,
akakumbira kwaari magwaro okuenda nawo Dhamaseko kumasinagoge, kuti kana awana vamwe vaiva veNzira iyo, varume kana vakadzi, avuye navo Jerusarema vakasungwa.
Zvino wakati ari parwendo, oswedera pedo neDhamaseko, kamwe-kamwe chiedza chakabva kudenga chikamupenyera pamativi ose,
akawira pasi, akanzwa inzwi richiti kwaari: Sauro, Sauro, unonditambudzireiko?
Iye akati: Ndimi aniko, Ishe?
Akati: Ndini Jesu waunotambudza; [zvinokuremera kupfura zvibayiso.
Iye achidedera nokutya, akati: Ishe, munoda kuti ndiiteiko?
Ishe akati kwaari:] Simuka, uende muguta, uchandovudzwa zvaunofanira kuita.
Varume vaiva parwendo naye, vakamira vanyerere, vachinzwa inzwi, asi vasingavoni munhu.
Zvino Sauro akasimuka pasi; asi achisvunudza meso ake, haana kuvona chinhu; vakamubata ruvoko, vakaenda naye Dhamaseko.
Akaita mazuva matatu, asingavoni, asingadyi, asinganwi chinhu.
Zvino paDhamaseko pakanga panomumwe mudzidzi, wainzi Ananiasi; Ishe akati kwaari nezvaakaratidzwa: Ananiasi!
Iye akati: Ndiri pano Ishe!
Ishe akati kwaari: Simuka, uende munzira yomuguta inonzi Yakarurama, ubvunze mumba maJudhasi, munhu unonzi Sauro weTarso; nokuti tarira, unonyengetera;
naiye wakavona murume, unonzi Ananiasi achipinda, achiisa mavoko ake pamusoro pake, kuti avone zve.
Zvino Ananiasi akapindura, akati: Ishe, ndakanzwa navanhu vazhinji zvomunhu uyu, kuti wakaitira vatsvene venyu paJerusarema zvakaipa zvizhinji;
napano unesimba raakapiwa navaPirisita vakuru, kuti asunge vose vanonamata nezita renyu.
Asi Ishe, akati kwaari: Enda, nokuti iye mudziyo wakasanangurwa neni, kuti aende nezita rangu kuvahedheni, namadzimambo, nokuvana vaIsraeri;
nokuti ndichamuratidza zvose, zvaachafanira kutamburira nokuda kwezita rangu.
Ipapo Ananiasi akaenda akapinda mumba, akaisa mavoko ake pamusoro pake, akati: Sauro, hama, Ishe Jesu, wakazviratidza kwauri munzira yawakavuya nayo, wakandituma, kuti uvone zve, uzadzwe noMweya Mutsvene.
Pakarepo pameso ake pakabva zvinhu zvinenge mafunhurwa, akavona zve; akasimuka, ndokusimbiswa.
Akagara navadzidzi paDhamaseko mamwe mazuva.
Pakarepo akaparidza Kristu mumasinagoge, kuti ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari.
Vose vakazvinzwa vakashamiswa, vakati: Ko uyu haazi iye waiparadza vaidana kuzita iri paJerusarema here, akavuyira izvozvo pano, kuti aende navo vakasungwa kuvaPirisita vakuru?
Asi Sauro wakaramba achisimbiswa, akakunda vaJudha vakanga vagere Dhamaseko, achiratidza kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu.
Sauro unodzingwa paDhamasko neJerusarema.
Zvino mazuva mazhinji akati apera, vaJudha vakarangana kuti vamuvuraye.
Asi kurangana kwavo kwakazikanwa naSauro.
Vakarinda vo masuvo masikati novusiku, kuti vamuvuraye.
Zvino vadzidzi vake vakamutora vusiku, vakamuburusa naparusvingo, vamuisa mudengu.
Zvino wakati asvika Jerusarema, akaidza kufambidzana navadzidzi; asi ivo vakamutya vose vasingatendi kuti wava mudzidzi.
Zvino Bharnabhasi akamutora, akaenda naye kuvaapostora, ndokuvarondedzera kuti wakavona Ishe munzira, vuye kuti wakataura naye, vuye kuti wakaparidza nezita raJesu paDhamaseko asingatyi.
Akagara navo paJerusarema, achifambidzana navo,
akaparidza nezita raShe asingatyi.
Akataura nokuita nharo navaJudha vaitaura chiGiriki; asi ivo vakaidza kumuvuraya.
Zvino hama dzakati dzichizviziva, dzikamuburusira Kesaria, ndokumutumira Tarso.
Zvino kereke yakanga inorugare paJudhea rose neGarirea, neSamaria, ikasimbiswa; ikawedzerwa, ichifamba ichitya Ishe, ichinyaradzwa noMweya Mutsvene.
Kuporeswa kwaEneasi.
Zvino Petro wakati achipota nyika kwose, akaburukira vo kuvatsvene vakanga vagere Ridha,
Akawanapo mumwe munhu, wainzi Eneasi, wakanga avete panhovo makore masere, akafa mitezo.
Petro akati kwaari: Eneasi, Jesu Kristu unokuporesa; simuka,, uwarure nhovo dzako!
Akasimuka pakarepo.
Zvino vose vakanga vagere Ridha neSaroni vakamuvona, vakatendevukira kunaShe.
Kumutswa kwaTabhita parufu.
Zvino paJopa pakanga panomukadzi waiva mudzidzi, wainzi Tabhita, ndokuti Dorkasi, kana zvichishandurwa.
Iye wakashingaira zvikuru pamabasa akanaka nezvipo.
Zvino namazuva iwayo iye akarwara, ndokufa.
Vakati vamushambidza, vakamuisa muimba yokumusoro,
Zvino Ridha zvawakanga uri pedo neJopa, vadzidzi vakati vanzwa kuti Petro uripo, vakatumira kwaari vanhu vaviri, kuti vandokumbira zvikuru kwaari, vachiti: Usanonoka hako kuvuya kwatiri.
Ipapo Petro akasimuka, akaenda navo.
Wakati asvika, vakamuisa kuimba yokumusoro chirikadzi dzose dzikamira naye dzichichema, vakamuratidza zvokupfeka nenguvo, dzavakanga vaitirwa naDorkasi, achiri navo.
Zvino Petro akavabudisira panze vose, akafugama, akanyengetera, ndokutendevukira kumutumbu, akati: Tabhita, muka!
Akasvunura meso ake; zvino wakati achivona Petro, akagara.
Akamubata noruvoko rwake, akamusimudza; akadana vatsvene nechirikadzi, akamuisa pamberi pavo ari mupenyu.
Zvikazikanwa navose paJopa; vazhinji vakatenda kunaShe.
Ipapo akagara mazuva mazhinji paJopa, kunomumwe Simoni, musuki wamatebwe.
Zvino kwakanga kunomumwe murume paKesaria, wainzi Kornerio, mukuru wezana wehondo yainzi yeItaria,
Munhu, wainamata nowaitya Mwari, iye neveimba yake yose, waipa vanhu zvipo zvizhinji, nokunyengetera kunaMwari misi yose.
Zvino nenguva inenge yepfumbamwe yezuva akavona kwazvo, nezvaakaratidzwa, mutumwa waMwari achipinda kwaari, achiti kwaari: Kornerio!
Iye akamutarisisa, akatya, akati; Chinyiko Ishe?
Akati kwaari: Minyengetero yako nezvipo zvako zvakwira pamberi paMwari, zvarangarirwa.
Zvino tuma varume Jopa kundodana Simoni, unotumidzwa Petro.
Unogara nomumwe unonzi Simoni, musuki wamatebwe, imba yake iri pagungwa iye uchakuvudza zvaunofanira kuita.
Zvino mutumwa, wakataura naye, wakati abva, akadana varanda vake vaviri nomurwi wakarurama pakati pavaisimushumira,
akavavudza zvose, ndokuvatumira Jopa.
Zvino fume mangwana vachiri parwendo, vava pedo neguta, Petro akakwira pamusoro peimba kundonyengetera nenguva inenge yechitanhatu.
Akaziya kwazvo, akada kudya; zvino vakati vachagadzira akabatwa nomweya;
akavona denga razarurwa, nechimwe chinhu chichiburuka somucheka mukuru unoburusirwa pasi wakasungwa miromo mina.
Maiva nemhuka dzose dzinamakumbo mana nezvinokambaira zvenyika, neshiri dzedenga.
Inzwi rikavuya kwaari, richiti: Simuka Petro, baya, udye.
Asi Petro akati: Kwete, Ishe, nokuti handina kutongodya chinhu chisakanaka, chinetsvina.
ipapo inzwi rikavuya zve kwaari rwechipiri, richiti: Chakanatswa naMwari, usati, chinetsvina iwe.
Izvozvo zvakaitwa katatu, chinhu chikakwidzwa pakarepo kudenga.
Zvino Petro wakati achakanganiswa mumoyo make kuti chiratidzo chaakanga avona chairevei, tarira varume vakanga vatumwa naKornerio, vamira pasuvo vachibvunza imba yaSimoni;
vakadana, vakabvunza kana Simoni, unonzi Petro, agerepo.
Zvino Petro, achafunga chiratidzo, Mweya akati kwaari: Tarira, varume vatatu vanokutsvaka.
Zvino simuka, uburuke, uende navo, usinganyunyuti, nokuti ndini ndava tuma.
Ipapo Petro akaburukira kuvarume avo, akati kwavari: Tarirai, ndini wamunotsvaka; shoko ramavuyira ndereiko?
Vakati: Kornerio, mukuru wezana, murume wakarurama, unotya Mwari, unorumbidzwa norudzi rwose rwavaJudha, wakarairwa naMwari nomutumwa mutsvene, kuti anzwe mashoko kwamuri.
Ipapo akavadana mumba, akati vagarepo.
Fume mangwana akasimuka, akaenda navo; nedzimwe hama dzapaJopa dzikamuperekedza.
Fume zve mangwana akapinda Kesaria, Zvino Kornerio wakanga akavamirira, akakokera hama dzake neshamwari dzake dzaidikanwa.
Zvino Petro wakati achipinda, Kornerio akamuchingamidza, akawira pasi petsoka dzake, akamunamata.
Asi Petro wakamusimudza, akati: Simuka, neni ndiri munhu vo.
Zvino wakati achataura naye, akapinda, akawana vazhinji vakavungana,
akati kwavari: Imi munoziva kuti hazvina kufanira kuti muJudha afambidzane nomunhu worumwe rudzi, kana kuvuya kwaari: Asi Mwari wakandiratidza, kuti ndirege kuti munhu haana kunaka, kana kuti unetsvina;
naizvozvo ndavuya, ndisingarambi, zvandadanwa; zvino ndinobvunza kuti mandidanireiko.
Kornerio akati: Ava mazuva mana kusvikira nguva ino, ini ndakanga ndichinyengetera mumba mangu nenguva yepfumbamwe, ipapo ndikavona murume amire pamberi pangu, anenguvo dzinopenya.
akati: Kornerio, kunyengetera kwako kwanzwika, nezvipo zvako zvarangarirwa naMwari.
Naizvozvo chitumira vanhu Jopa, udane Simoni, unonzi Petro; unogara mumba maSimoni musuki wamatebwe, pagungwa iye kana auya uchataura newe.
Naizvozvo ndakakurumidza kutuma kwamuri; zvino maita zvakanaka, zvamavuya.
Zvino isu tose tiri pano pamberi paMwari, kuti tinzwe zvamarairwa naShe.
Ipapo Petro akashamisa muromo wake, akati: Zvirokwazvo, ndinovona kuti Mwari haazi mutsauri wavanhu;
asi parudzi rupi norupi, munhu, unomutya, achiita zvakarurama, unogamuchirwa naye.
Ndiro shoko raakatuma kuvana vaIsraeri achiparidza mashoko akanaka orugare naJesu Kristu (ndiye Ishe wavose),
Imi munoziva shoko iro rakaparidzwa paJudhea rose, rakatanga paGarirea, shure kwokubhabhatidzwa kwakaparidzwa naJohane;
raJesu weNazareta, kuti Mwari wakamuzodza noMweya Mutsvene nesimba; iye waipotenyika, achiita zvakanaka, achiporesa vose vakamanikidzwa naDhiabhorosi; nokuti Mwari waiva naye.
Nesu tiri zvapupu zvazvose, zvaakaita munyika yavaJudha nomuJerusarema; ndiye wavakavuraya, vachimuturika pamuti.
Ndiye wakamutswa naMwari nezuva retatu, akamupa simba kuti avonekwe pachena;
akasavonekwa navanhu vose, asi nezvapupu zvakagara zvatsaurwa naMwari, iyesu taidya nokunwa naye, amuka kuvakafa.
Akatiraira kuti tiparidzire vanhu, nokupupura kwazvo kuti ndiye wakagadzwa naMwari kuti ave Mutongi wavapenyu navakafa.
Vaporofita vose vanomupupurira kuti nezita rake mumwe nomumwe unotenda kwaari uchapiwa kanganwiro yezvivi.
Petro wakati achataura mashoko awa, Mweya Mutsvene akaburuka pamsoro pavose, vakanzwa shoko.
Zvino vatendi vokudzingisa, vakanga vavuya naPetro, vakashamiswa, nokuti chipo choMweya Mutsvene chakanga chadururwa pamusoro pavahedheni vo;
nokuti vakavanzwa vachitaura nedzimwe ndimi, vachirumbidza Mwari.
Ipapo Petro akapindura akati:
Kunomunhu here ungadzivisa mvura, kuti ava, vakapiwa Mweya Mutsvene sesu, varege kubhabhatidzwa?
Zvino akaraira kuti vabhabhatidzwe muzita raJesu Kristu.
Ipapo vakakumbira kwaari, kuti ambogara mamwe mazuva.
Zvino vaapostora nehama, vaiva paJudhea, vakanzwa kuti vahedheni vakagamuchira vo shoko raMwari
Zvino Petro wakati akwira Jerusarema,vatendi vokudzingisa vakaita nharo naye,
vachiti: Wakapinda iwe kuvarume vasina kudzingiswa, ukadya navo.
Zvino Petro akatanga kuvarondedzera zvose, zvichitevedzana, achiti:
Ndakanga ndiri muguta reJopa, ndichinyengetera; ndikabatwa nomweya, ndikavona chiratidzo; chimwe chinhu chakaburuka, chinenge mucheka mukuru unoburuswa kudenga wakasungwa miromo mina, chikasvika kwandiri;
ndakati ndachitarisisa, nokucherekedza, ndikavona mhuka dzenyika dzinamakumbo mana nezvikara, nezvinokambaira, neshiri dzedenga,
ndikanzwa vo inzwi richiti kwandiri: Simuka Petro, baya, udye.
Asi ini ndikati: Kwete Ishe, nokuti mumuromo mangu hamuna kumbopinda chinhu chisakanaka, chinetsvina.
Asi inzwi rakapindura rwechipiri, richibva kudenga, richiti: Icho chakanatswa naMwari, iwe usati, hachinakunaka.
Izvozvi zvakaitwa katatu, zvose zvikakwidzwa zve kudenga.
Ipapo tarira pakarepo varume vatatu vamire pamberi peimba matakanga tiri vakanga vatumirwa kwandiri vachibva Kesaria.
Ipapo ndikakokerwa noMweya, kuti ndienda navo, ndisinganyunyuti.
Nehama idzi nhanhatu vo dzakandiperekedza, tikapinda mumba momurume uyu.
Iye akativudza vo kuti wakavona mutumwa amire mumba make, achiti: Tumira Jopa, udane Simoni, unonzi Petro;
iye uchakuvudza mashoko auchaponeswa nawo, iwe nemhuri yako yose.
Zvino ndakati ndichatanga kutaura, Mweya Mutsvene akaburuka pamusoro pavo, sapamusoro pedu vo pakutanga.
Ini ndikarangarira shoko raShe, rokuti: Johane wakabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imi muchabhabhatidzwa noMweya Mutsvene.
Zvino kana Mwari akavapa chipo icho chaakatipa isu, pakutenda kwedu kunaShe Jesu Kristu, ini ndaigova ani, waigona kudzivisa Mwari?
Zvino vakati vanzwa izvozvo, vakanyarara, vakakudza Mwari vachiti: Zvirokwazvo, Mwari wakapa vahedheni vo kutendevuka kwovupenyu.
Bharnabasi naSauro vanoparidza paAntiokia.
Zvino avo vakaparadzirwa nokutambudzika kwakamuka pamusoro paStefano, vakaenda kusvikira paFenikia neKupro, neAntiokia, vasingatauri shoko kumunhu, asi kunavaJudha bedzi.
Zvino pakati pavo paiva navamwe varume veKupro neKurini ivo vakati vasvika Antiokia, vakataura kuvaGiriki vo, vachiparidza Ishe Jesu.
Ruvoko rwaShe rukava navo, vazhinji vakatenda, vakatendevukira kunaShe.
Mashoko avo akanzwika nekereke paJerusarema, vakatuma Bharnabhasi kuti aende Antiokia.
Iye wakati asvika, avona nyasha dzaMwari, akafara; akaraira vose kuti vanamatire Ishe nomoyo wakasimba;
nokuti waiva murume wakanaka, uzere noMweya Mutsvene nokutenda; vazhinji-zhinji vakawedzerwa kunaShe.
Iye akaenda Tarso achindotsvaka Sauro.
Zvino wakati amuwana, akavuya naye Antiokia.
Ipapo vakavungana nekereke gore rose, vakadzidzisa vanhu vazhinji-zhinji; paAntiokia vadzidzi vakatanga kunzi Vakristu.
Namazuva iwayo vaporofita vakaburuka vachibva Jerusarema, vakaenda Antiokia.
Mumwe wavo wainzi Agabo, akasimuka, ndokuvazivisa noMweya kuti nzara huru ichavapo panyika yose; iyo ikasvika panguva yaKraudio.
Ipapo vadzidzi vakatenderana, kuti mumwe nomumwe paaigona napo atume zvingabatsira hama dzigere Judhea.
Vakaita kudaro, vakazvitumira naBharnabhasi naSauro kuvakuru.
Zvino nenguva inenge iyeyo mambo Herodhe akatambanudza mavoko ake kuti atambudze vamwe vekereke;
akavuraya Jakobho, mukuru waJohane, nomunondo.
Zvino wakati achivona kuti zvafadza vaJudha, ndokupfuvura akabata Petro vo.
Aiva mazuva ezvingwa zvisinembiriso.
Zvino wakati amubata, akamusunga mutorongo, akamuisa kumapoka mana, rimwe nerimwe rinavarwi vana, kuti vamurinde, achiti amuise pamberi pavanhu, kana paseka yapfuvura.
Naizvozvo Petro akachengetwa mutorongo,; asi wakanga achinyengetererwa zvikuru nekereke kunaMwari.
Zvino Herodhe wakati oda kumubudisa, vusiku ibwobwo Petro wakanga avete pakati pavarwi vaviri, akasungwa namaketani maviri; navarindi vakanga vachirinda torongo pamberi pomukova.
Ipapo, tarira, mutumwa waShe wakamirapo, chiedza chikapenya mumba; akarova Petro parutivi, ndokumumutsa, achiti: Muka, ukurumidze.
Ipapo maketani akawa pamavoko ake.
Mutumwa akati kwaari: Zvisunge chivuno, usungire shangu dzako.
Akaita saizvozvo.
Akati kwaari: Fuka nguvo yako, unditevere.
Akabuda, akamutevera, asingazivi kuti zvirokwazvo zvinoitwa nomutumwa; asi wakati ndinovona chiratidzo.
Zvino vakati vapfuvura murindi wokutanga nowechipiri, vakasvika pasuvo ramatare, pavaipinda napo paguta; rikangovazarukira roga; vakabuda, vakapfuvura neimwe nzira, mutumwa ndokubva kwaari pakarepo.
Petro wakati apengenuka, akati: Zvino ndinoziva zvirokwazvo kuti Ishe wakatuma mutumwa wake, akandirwira paruvoko rwaHerodhe napazvose zvakanga zvichifungwa navanhu vavaJudha.
Zvino wakati arangarira izvozvo, akaenda kumba kwaMaria, mai vaJohane, wainzi Marko; vazhinji vakanga vakavunganapo, vachinyengetera.
Zvino wakati agogodza pagonhi resuvo, musikana wainzi Rodha akavuya kuzoterera.
Iye akati achinzwa inzwi raPetro, akasazarura suvo nomufaro, asi wakamhanyira mukati akavavudza kuti Petro umire pasuvo.
Ivo vakati kwaari: Unopenga.
Asi iye wakasimbisa achiti ndizvozvo.
Ivo vakati: Mutumwa wake.
Asi Petro wakaramba achigogodza; vakazozarura, vakamuvona, vakashamiswa.
Zvino iye akavaninira noruvoko kuti vanyarare, akavarondedzera mutovo waakabudiswa nawo naShe patorongo.
Akati: Vudzai Jakobho nehama zvinhu izvozvi; ndokubva akaenda kumwe.
Zvino kwakati kwaedza, bope guru rikavapo pakati pavarwi, vachiti Petro waitiwa sei?
Herodhe wakati amutsvaka, akamushaiwa, ndokubvunzisisa varindi, akaraira kuti vavurawe.
Zvino akaburuka Judhea, akaenda Kesaria, akandogarako.
Zvino akatsamwira zvikuru vanhu veTire neSidhoni; ivo ndokuvuya kwaari vose pamwe chete, vakaita vushamwari naBrasto, mutariri weimba yamambo, vakakumbira rugare, nokuti nyika yavo yaipiwa zvokudya nenyika yamambo.
Ipapo nezuva rakanga ratarwa, Herodhe akafuka nguvo dzovumambo, akagara pachigaro chake chovushe, akataura kwavari.
Ipapo vanhu vakadanidzira vachiti: Inzwi raMwari, harizi romunhu.
Pakarepo mutumwa waShe ukamurova, nokuti wakanga asinakukudza Mwari; akadyiwa nehonye, akafa.
Asi shoko raMwari rakakura rikawanda.
Zvino Bharnabhasi naSauro vakati vapedzisa basa ravo, vakadzokera Jerusarema, vakaenda naJohane, wainzi Marko.
Zvino pakereke yapaAntiokia paiva navaporofita navadzidzisi, vaiti: Bharnabhasi naSimeoni, wainzi Nigeri, naRukio weKurini, naManaeni wakanga arerwa pamwe chete naHerodhe mubati, naSauro.
Vakati vachishumira Ishe, nokuzvinyima zvokudya, Mweya Mutsvene akati: Nditsaurirei Barnabhasi naSauro kubata basa randakavadanira.
Ipapo vakazvinyima zvokudya, vakanyengetera, vakaisa mavoko pamusoro pavo, ndokuvaendisa.
Vanodziviswa naErimasi paPafosi.
Naizvozvo vakati vatumwa noMweya Mutsvene, vakaburukira Serukia; vakabvapo vakaenda Kupro nechikepe.
Vachisvika paSarami, vakaparidza shoko raMwari mumasinagoge avaJudha.
Vakanga vanaJohane vo, waiva mubatsiri wavo.
Vakati vagura chiwi chose kusvikira paPafosi, vakawana imwe nanga, waiva muporofita wenhema, muJudha, zita rake rainzi Bari-Jesu.
Waigara pamubati wenyika, wainzi Sergio Pauro, munhu wakachenjera.
Iye ndokudana Bharnabhasi naSauro, achitsvaka kunzwa shoko raMwari.
Asi nanga iyo Erimasi (nokuti ndiro zita rake, kana richishandurwa), akavadzivisa, achitsvaka kutsausa mubati pakutenda.
Asi Sauro (ndiye Pauro vo), azere noMweya Mutsvene, akamutarisisa, akati:
Iwe, uzere nokunyengera kwose namano akaipa ose, mwanakomana waDhiabhorosi, muvengi wokururama kwose, hauregi here kutsausa nzira dzakarurama dzaShe?
Zvino, tarira, ruvoko rwaShe ruri pamusoro pako; uchava bofu, uchaita nguva usingavoni zuva.
Pakarepo mhute nerima zvikamuwira; akapota-pota, achitsvaka vangamusesedza noruvoko.
Zvino mubati wakati achivona zvaitika, akatenda, akashamiswa nedzidziso yaShe.
Pauro unoparidza paAntiokia paPisidia.
Zvino Pauro navaiva naye, vakabva Pafosi, ndokusvika Perga muPamfiria; Johane akabva kwavari, ndokudzokera Jerusarema.
Asi ivo vakabva Perga, vakasvika Antiokia paPisidia; vakapinda musinagoge nezuva resabata, ndokugara pasi.
Zvino murairo navaporofita zvakati zvarabwa, vabati vesinagoge vakatuma shoko kwavari, vachiti: Varume, hama, kana muneshoko rokuvaraidza vanhu, taurai henyu.
Ipapo Pauro akasimuka, akavaninira noruvoko, akati: Varume vaIsraeri, nemi munotya Mwari, tererai:
Mwari wavanhu ava vaIsraeri wakasanangura madzibaba edu, akakudza vanhu ava, vachiri vatorwa munyika yeIjipiti; akavabudisa mairi noruvoko runesimba,
akava nomoyo murefu namafambire avo murenje makore anenge makumi mana,
akaparadza marudzi manomwe munyika yeKanani, akavagovera nyika yavo nemijenya, ive nhaka yavo makore anenge mazana mana namakumi mashanu.
Shure kwaizvozvo akavapa vatongi kusvikira kumuporofita Samueri.
Pashure vakakumbira mambo; Mwari akavapa Sauro, mwanakaomana waKisi, murume worudzi rwaBenjamini, makore makumi mana.
Akamubvisa akamutsa Dhavhidhi, kuti ave mambo wavo, waakapupura achiti: Ndawana Dhavhidhi, mwanakomana waJese murume womoyo wangu, uchaita kuda kwangu kwose.
Parudzi rwaiyeyo, Mwari akamutsira vaIsraeri Muponesi Jesu, se zvaakanga avapikira;
iye asati asvika, Johane akamboparidzira vanhu vaIsraeri rubhabhatidzo rwokutendevuka.
Zvino Johane wakati opedzisa basa rake, akati: Munoti, ndini aniko?
Handizi iye.
Asi tarirai, shure kwangu mumwe unovuya, wandisakafanira kuti ndisunungure shangu dzetsoka dzake.
Varume, hama, vana vorudzi rwaAbhurahamu, navari pakati penyu vanotya Mwari, shoko roruponeso urwu rakatitumirwa isu.
Nokuti vaigara Jerusarema navabati vavo, zvavakanga vasingamuzivi iye, kana manzwi avaporofita, anorabwa sabata rimwe nerimwe vakaazadzisa pakumupa mhaka kwavo.
Kunyange vasina kuwana mhosva yorufu kwaari, vakakumbira kunaPirato kuti avurawe.
Zvino vakati vapedza zvose zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake, vakamuturura pamuti, vakamuviga mubwiro.
Asi Mwari wakamumutsa kuvakafa.
Akavonekwa mazuva mazhinji navakanga vakwira naye Jerusarema, vachibva Garirea, avo vari zvapupu zvake zvino kuvanhu.
zvino tinokuparidzirai mashoko emufaro kuti chipikirwa chakaitwa kumadzibaba edu.
Kuti Mwari wakachizadzisa kwatiri isu vana vavo pakuti wakasimudzazve Jesu sezvazvakanyorwa mupisarema rechipiri ndiwe mwanakomana wangu nhasi ndakubereka.
Zvino zvaanoti wakamumutsa kuvakafa kuti asazodzokerazve kukuvora wakareva kudai ndichakupai mikomborera mitsvene inotendwa yaDhavhidhi.
Nokuti unoreva panerimwe Pisarema, achiti: Hamungaisi Mutsvene wenyu kuti avone kuvora.
Nokuti Dhavhidhi wakati aita kuda kwaMwari parudzi rwake, akavata rufu, akavigwa kunamadzibaba ake, akavona kuvora.
Asi uyu, wakamutswa naMwari haana kuvora.
Naizvozvo varume, hama, muzive imi, kuti kanganwiro yezvivi noyuyu inokuparidzirwai imi.
Noyuyu, mumwe nomumwe unotenda, unoruramiswa pazvose, zvamakanga musingagoni kururamiswa pazviri nomurairo waMosesi.
Naizvozvo chenjerai, kuti murege kuwirwa nezvakarebwa navaporofita, zvinoti:
Tarirai, imi vazvidzi, mushamiswe, muparare; Nokuti ndinobata basa pamazuva enyu, Basa ramucharamba kutongotenda, kana muchizvivudzwa nomunhu.
Zvino vakati vachibuda musinagoge, vakakumbira zvikuru kuti vaparidzirwe zve mashoko iwayo nesabata rinotevera.
Zvino vesinagoge vakati vapararira, vaJudha vazhinji navaproserite vainamata Mwari, vakatevera Pauro naBharnabhasi; ivo vakataurirana navo, vakavaraira kuti varambire panyasha dzaMwari.
Nesabata rakatevera guta rinenge rose.
Rakavungana kuzonzwa shoko raMwari.
Zvino vaJudha vakati vachivona vanhu vazhinji, vakazara negodo, vakaramba zvakarebwa naPauro, vachimhura Mwari.
Ipapo Pauro, naBharnabhasi vakataura vasingatyi, vakati: Zvakanga zvakafanira kuti shoko raMwari ritange kutaurirwa imi, asi zvamariramba, muchiti, hamufanirwi novupenyu bwusingaperi, tarirai, zvino toenda kuvahedheni.
Nokuti Ishe wakatiraira saizvozvo, achiti: Ndakakuisa kuti uve chiedza chavahedheni, Kuti uve ruponeso kusvikira kumugumo wenyika.
Zvino vahedheni vakati vachinzwa izvozvo, vakafara, vakakudza shoko raShe; navose vakanga vatarirwa vupenyu bwusingaperi vakatenda.
Shoko raShe rikaparidzirwa kunyika yose.
Asi vaJudha vakakurudzira vakadzi vainamata Mwari, vaikudzwa, navakuru veguta; vakamutsira Pauro naBharnabhasi dambudziko, vakavadzinga munyika yavo.
Asi ivo vakazuza guruva patsoka dzavo, vakaenda Ikonio.
Vadzidzi vakaramba vachizadzwa nomufaro noMweya Mutsvene.
Zvino paIkonio vakapinda pamwechete vose musinagoge ravaJudha, vakataura nokudaro kuti vazhinji-zhinji vavaJudha navaGiriki vakatenda.
Asi vaJudha vasina kuterera, vakamutsa moyo yavahedheni, kuti vavenge hama.
Naizvozvo vakagarapo nguva refu, vachitaura munaShe vasingatyi; iye akapupurira shoko renyasha dzake, akavapa simba kuti zviratidzo nezvishamiso zviitwe namavoko avo.
Asi vanhu vazhinji veguta vakapesana, vamwe vakava kuvaJudha, vamwe kuvaapostora.
Zvino vahedheni, navaJudha, navabati vavo vakati vachivavarira kuvaitira zvakaipa nokuvataka namabwe;
ivo vakazviziva, vakatizira Ristra neDerbe, aiva maguta eRikaonia, nokunyika yakapoteredza;
vakaparidzira Evhangeri ikoko.
Zvino paRistra paigara mumwe murume wakanga asinesimba patsoka dzake, chirema kubva padumbu ramai vake, asina kutongofamba.
Iye wakanzwa Pauro achitaura; zvino iye wakati achimutarisisa, akavona kuti unokutenda kuti ungaporeswa,
akati nenzwi guru: Mira kwazvo netsoka dzako.
Iye akavhazuka, akafamba.
Vanhu vazhinji vakati vavona zvaitwa naPauro, vakadanidzira norurimi rwavaRikaonia, vachiti: Vamwari vaburukira kwatiri, vakaita savanhu.
Bharnabhasi vakamutumidza Jupiteri, naPauro Merkurio, nokuti ndiye waiva mutauri mukuru.
Ipapo muPirisita waJupiteri waiva netembere yake pamberi peguta, akavuya pamasuvo nenzombe namaruva okushonga, achida kuvabayira, anavanhu vazhinji naye.
Zvino vaapostora, Bharnabhasi naPauro, vakati vachinzwa izozvo, vakabvarura nguvo dzavo, vakamhanyira pakati pavanhu vazhinji, vakadanidzira.
vachiti: Varume, munoitireiko izvozvi?
Nesu tiri vanhu semi vo; tinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka, kuti mubve panaizvozvo zvisinamaturo, mutendevukire kunaMwari mupenyu wakaita denga napasi, negungwa, nezvose zviri mukati mazvo.
Iye, panguva dzakapfuvura wakatendera vahedheni vose kufamba nenzira dzavo.
Asi haana kurega kuzvipupurira, achiita zvakanaka, achikupai mvura yokudenga, nenguva dzezviyo zvizhinji, achizadza moyo yenyu nezvokudya nomufaro.
Nokutaura kwavo saizvozvo, vakatambura kwazvo kudzivisa vanhu kuti varege kuvabayira.
Ipapo vaJudha vakabva Antiokia neIkonio, vakasvika, vakamutsa moyo yavanhu vazhinji, vakataka Pauro namabwe, vakamukwevera kunze kweguta vachiti wafa.
Asi vadzidzi vakati vamukomba, iye akasimuka, akapinda muguta.
Fume mangwana akaenda Derbe naBharnabhasi.
Vakati vaparidza Evhangeri paguta iro, vakaita vadzidzi vazhinji, ndokudzokera Ristra, neIkonio, neAntiokia,
vachisimbisa mweya yavadzidzi, vachivaraira kuti vatsungirire pakutenda, vachiti, tinofanira kupinda vushe bwaMwari namadambudziko mazhinji.
Vakavasanangurira vakuru pakereke imwe neimwe, vakanyengetera, vachizvinyima zvokudya, vakavaisa kunaShe, wavaitenda.
Vakagura nePisidia, ndokusvika Pamfiria.
Vakati vaparidza shoko paPerga, vakaburukira Ataria.
Vakabvapo, vakaenda Antiokia nechikepe, apo pavakanga vaiswa panyasha dzaMwari kubata basa ravakanga vapedzisa zvino.
Vakati vasvika, vakavunganidza kereke, vakarondedzera zvose zvakanga zvaitwa naMwari navo, vuye kuti wakanga azarurira vahedheni mukova wokutenda.
Vakagara nguva huru navadzidzi.
Zvino vamwe vakaburuka Judhea, vakadzidzisa hama, vachiti: Kana musingadzingiswi netsika yaMosesi, hamungaponeswi.
Asi Pauro naBharnabhasi vakapesana kwazvo navo, nokuita nharo navo, vakazotenderana kuti Pauro naBharnabhasi navamwe vavo vakwire Jerusarema kuvaapostora navakuru pamusoro peshoko iri.
Naizvozvo vakaperekedzwa nekereke, vakagura neFenike neSamaria, vakataura zvokutendevuka kwavahedheni; vakafadza zvikuru hama dzose.
Zvino vakati vasvika Jerusarema, vakagamuchirwa nekereke, navaapostora, navakuru; vakarondedzera zvose zvakaitwa naMwari navo.
Asi vamwe vedzidziso yavaFarise, vaitenda, vakasimuka, vakati, vanofanira kudzingiswa nokurairwa kuti vachengete murairo waMosesi.
Ipapo vaapostora navakuru vakavungana kuti varangane pamusoro peshoko iri.
Zvino, nharo huru dzakati dzavapo.
Petro akasimuka akati kwavari: Varume, hama, munoziva kuti kubva pamazuva akare Mwari wakandisanangura pakati penyu, kuti vahedheni vanzwe shoko reEvhangeri nomuromo wangu, vatende.
Zvino Mwari, muzivi womoyo, wakavapupurira, akavapa Mweya Mutsvene sesu;
haana kutsaura pakati pedu navo, zvaakanatsa moyo yavo nokutenda.
Naizvozvo zvino munoidzirei Mwari, muchiisa pamitsipa yavadzidzi joko, rakanga risingagoni kutakurwa namadzibaba edu kunyange nesu?
Asi tinotenda kuti isu tichaponeswa nenyasha dzaShe Jesu Kristu nomutovo mumwe navo.
Ipapo vanhu vazhinji vose vakaramba vanyerere, vakaterera vana Bharnabhasi naPauro vachirondedzera zviratidzo nezvishamiso, zvakaitwa naMwari navo pakati pavahedheni.
Zvino vakati vanyarara, Jakobho akapindura, akati: Varume, hama, nditererei.
Simeoni wakarondedzera mutangire waMwari kumutsa vahedheni, kuti atore kwavari vanhu vezita rake.
Namashoko avaporofita anobvumira izvozvi; sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi:
Shure kwaizvozvi ndichadzoka, Ndivake tabernakeri yaDhavhidhi, yakawa;Ndichavaka zve matongo ayo, Ndichiimutsa;
Ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe, Navahedheni vose vakadanwa nezita rangu,
Mabasa ake ose kubva pakuvamba kwenyika anozikanwa kunaMwari.
Naizvozvi ini ndinoti, ngatirege kugumbusa avo pakati pavahedheni vakatendevukira kunaMwari;
asi tivanyorere kuti varege zvakashatiswa nezvifananidzo, novupombwe, ne zvakadzipwa, neropa.
Nokuti Mosesi kubva pamarudzi ekare, waiva navanomuparidza paguta rimwe nerimwe, achirabwa mumasinagoge sabata rimwe nerimwe.
Ipapo vaapostora, navakuru, nekereke yose, vakati zvakanaka kuti vasanangure varume pakati pavo, vavatumire Antiokia pamwe chete naPauro naBharnabhasi, naSirasi, vakuru pakati pehama.
Vakanyora mwadhi, vakaituma navo, yaiti: Vaapostora navakuru kuhama, dzokuvahedheni paAntiokia, napaSiria, napaKirikia; Mufaro!
Zvatakanzwa, kuti vamwe vakabva kwatiri, vatisina kuraira, vakakukanganisai namashoko, vachidziyanisa mweya yenyu vachiti munofanira kudzingiswa nokuchengeta murairo.
takati nomwoyo mumwe zvakanaka kuti tisanangure varume, tivatumire kwamuri, pamwe chete naBharnabhasi naPauro, vadikanwa vedu;
vanhu vakazvidza vupenyu bwavo nokuda kwezita raShe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Zvino tatuma Judhasi naSirasi, ivo vanozokuvudzai vamene izvozvi nomuromo.
Nokuti Mweya Mutsvene nesu takati zvakanaka, kuti tirege kukutakudzai mutoro mukuru kunezvinhu izvi zvakafanira,
zvinoti: Regai zvakabayirwa zvifananidzo, neropa, nezvakadzipwa, novupombwe; kana mukazvidzora pazviri, muchaita zvakanaka.
Sarai zvakanaka.
Zvino vakati vaendiswa, vakaburukira Antiokia; vakavunganidza vanhu vazhinji,vakavapa mwadhi.
Ivo vakati vairava, vakafara zvikuru pamusoro pokuvaraidzwa.
Judhasi naSirasi, vaiva vaporofita vamene, vakavaraidza hama namashoko mazhinji, nokuvasimbisa.
Vakati vagarako nguva, vakaendiswa nehama nomufaro, vakaenda kunavakanga vavatuma.
[Kunyange zvakadaro Sirasi wakavona zvakanaka kugarapo.]
Pauro naBaranabasi vakagara Antiokia, vachidzidzisa nokuparidza shoko raShe, navamwe vazhinji vo.
Pauro naBharnabhasi vanoparadzana.
Rwendo rwechipiri rwaPauro.
Zvino mamwe mazuva akati apfuvura, Pauro akati kunaBharnabhasi: Ngatidzoke zve tindoshanyira hama muguta rimwe nerimwe matakaparidza shoko raShe, tivone kuti vakadini.
Zvino Bharnabhasi wakanga achida kutora Johane vo, wainzi Marko;
asi Pauro wakati hazvina kunaka kumutora iye, wakambovasiya paPamfiria, akasaenda navo kubasa.
Ipapo kupesana kukavapo, nokudaro vakaparadzana, Bharnabhasi akatora Marko, akaenda Kupro nechikepe;
asi Pauro wakasanangura Sirasi; akenda, akaiswa nehama panyasha dzaShe;
akagura neSiria neKirikia, achisimbisa kereke.
Akasvika vo paDerbe neRistra.
Zvino ipapo paiva nomumwe mudzidzi, wainzi Timotio, mwanakomana womukadzi mutendi, waiva muJudha; asi baba vake vaiva muGiriki.
Iye waipupurirwa zvakanaka nehama dzapaRistra neIkonio.
Pauro akada kuti aende naye, akamutora, akamudzingisa nokuda kwavaJudha vaiva kunzvimbo idzo; nokuti vose vakanga vachiziva kuti baba vake muGiriki.
Vakafamba namaguta, vakavapa zvirevo zvakatemwa navaapostora navakuru vapaJerusarema, kuti vazvichengete.
Naizvozvo kereke dzakasimbiswa pakutenda, dzikawanda pakuverengwa kwadzo zuva rimwe nerimwe.
Vakagura nenyika yeFrigia neyeGaratia, vambodziviswa noMweya Mutsvene kuparidza shoko paAsia.
Zvino vakati vasvika pakatarisana neMisia, vakaidza kuenda Bitinia, asi Mweya haana kuvatendera.
Vakati vapfuvura Misia, vakaburukira Troa.
Chiratidzo chikavonekwa naPauro vusiku; murume weMakedhonia wakanga amire, akakumbira zvikuru kwaari, achiti: Yambukira Makedhonia, utibatsire.
Zvino wakati avona chiratidzo, pakarepo tikatsvaka kuenda Makedhonia, tichiti, Mwari watidana kuti tindovaparidzira Evhangeri.
Pauro naSirasi paFiripi
Naizvozvo takabva Troa nechikepe, tikaruramira Samotrake; fume mangwana tikasvika Neapori;
tikabvapo, tikaenda Firipi, guta guru renyika yeMakedhonia, raiva koroni yeRoma; tikagara mamwe mazuva muguta iro
Nezuva resabata tikabuda kunze kwesuvo kurwizi, pataiti vanenge vanonyengeterapo; tikagara pasi, tikaparidzira vakadzi vakanga vavunganapo.
Zvino mumwe mukadzi, wainzi Ridia, mutengesi wenguvo tsvuku, womusha weTiatira, wainamata Mwari, akatinzwa; Ishe akazarura moyo wake, kuti aterere zvaitaurwa naPauro.
Wakati abhabhatidzwa, iye naveimba yake, akakumbira zvikuru; achiti: Kana muchiti ndakatenda kunaShe, pindai mumba mangu mugare.
Akatitendisa.
Zvino takati tichipinda panzvimbo yokunyengetera, tikasongana nomumwe musikana waiva nomweya wokuvuka, waiwanira vatenzi vake mari zhinji nokuvuka kwake.
Iye akatevera Pauro nesu, akadanidzira achiti: Vanhu ava varanda vaMwari Wokumusoro-soro, vanokuparidzirai nzira yokuponeswa nayo.
Akaita izvozvo mazuva mazhinji.
Zvino Pauro akafa neshungu, akatendevuka, akati kumweya: Ndinokuraira muzita raJesu Kristu kuti ubude kwaari.
Ukabuda nenguva iyeyo.
Zvino vatenzi vake vakati vachivona kuti tariro yokufumiswa kwavo yaenda, vakabata Pauro naSirasi, vakavakakatira, kudare pamberi pavabati,
vakaenda navo kuvatongi, vakati: Vanhu ava vaJudha, vanopesanisa guta redu,
vachiparidza tsika dzatisinakutenderwa kugamuchira, kana kuita, isu vaRoma.
Ipapo vanhu vazhinji vakavamukira vose, vatongi vakava bvarurira nguvo dzavo, vakaraira kuti varobwe neshamhu.
Zvino vakati vavarova zvikuru, vakavaisa mutorongo, vakaraira murindi wetorongo kuti ava chengete kwazvo.
Iye akati arairwa kudaro, akavaisa mutorongo yomukati, akasunga makumbo avo mumatanda.
Zvino panenge pakati povusiku, Pauro naSirasi vakanga vachinyengetera nokuimbira Mwari nziyo; vakanga vakasungwa vakavaterera.
Pakarepo kudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru kukavapo, naizvozvo nheyo dzeimba dzikazununguswa; pakarepo mikova yose yeimba ikazarurwa, nemisungo yavose ikasununguka.
Ipapo murindi wetorongo akapepuka, ndokuvona mikova yetorongo yakazaruka, akavhomora munondo wake, akada kuzvivuraya, achiti vasungwa vatiza.
Ipapo Pauro akadanidzira nenzwi guru, akati: Usazvikuvadza, nokuti tiri muno tose.
Zvino wakati akumbira mwenje, akamhanyiramo, ndokuwira pasi pamberi paPauro naSirasi, a chibvunda;
akavabudisira kunze, akati: Vatenzi, ndinofanira kuitei kuti ndiponeswe?
Vakati: Tenda kunaShe Jesu Kristu, ugoponeswa, iwe nemhuri yako.
Vakaparidza shoko raMwari kwaari navose vaiva mumba make.
Akavatora nenguva iyeyo yovusiku, akakupa mavanga avo, ndokubhabhatidzwa pakarepo, iye navose vake.
Akaenda navo mumba make, ndokuisa zvokudya pamberi pavo, akafara zvikuru, iye nemhuri yake yose, achitenda kunaMwari.
Zvino kwakati kwaedza, vatongi vakatuma mapurisa, vachiti: Sunungurai vanhu vaya.
Murindi wetorongo akavudza Pauro mashoko iwayo, achiti: Vatongi vatuma shoko kuti musunungurwe; naizvozvo budai henyu zvino, muende norugare.
Asi Pauro wakati kwavari: Vakatirova pachena, isu vanhu vaRoma tisina kutongwa, vakatiisa mutorongo; zvino vodokutibudisa chinyararire here?
Haiwa, kwete!
Ngavavuye vamene vatibudise.
Mupurisa akavudza vatongi mashoko iwayo; vakatya vachinzwa kuti vaRoma;
vakasvika, vakakumbira zvikuru kwavari; vakavabudisa, ndokukumbira kuti vabve muguta ravo.
Ipapo vakabuda mutorongo, vakapinda mumba maRidia; vakavona hama, vakavanyaradza, ndokuenda.
Zvino vakati vagura neAmfipori neAporonia, vakasvika paTesaronika paiva nesinagoge ravaJudha.
Zvino Pauro, sezvaaisiita, akapinda kwavari; akataurirana navo zvaMagwaro masabata matatu,
achivazarurira nokuvazivisa, kuti Kristu waifanira kutambudzika nokumuka kuvakafa, vuye kuti Jesu uyu, wandinokuparidzirai, ndiye Kristu.
Vamwe vavo vakatendiswa, vakatevera Pauro naSirasi, navazhinji vavaGiriki, vainamata Mwari, navakadzi vaikudzwa vazhinji.
Asi vaJudha vakanga vasingatendi vakaita godo, vakatora vamwe varume vakaipa, dzaiva simbe, vakavunganidza vanhu vazhinji, vakakanganisa guta; vakawira imba yaJasoni, vachida kuvabudisira kuvanhu.
Vakati vachivashaiwa, vakakakatira Jasoni nedzimwe hama pamberi pavabati veguta, vakadana, vachiti: Ava vakakanganisa nyika yose, vakasvika napano vo,
Jasoni akavagamuchira; ava vose vanoita zvinopesana nezvirevo zvaKesari, vachiti, mumwe mambo uriko, unonzi Jesu.
Vakapesanisa vanhu navabati veguta, vachinzwa izvozvo.
Zvino, vakati vatora rubatso kunaJasoni navamwe, vakavarega.
Pauro naSirasi paBerea.
Pakarepo hama dzikatuma Pauro naSirasi Berea vusiku.
Ivo vakati vachisvikapo, vakapinda musinagoge ravaJudha.
Ava vakanga vachinzwisisa kukunda veTesaronika, vakagamuchira shoko nomwoyo wose, vachinzvera Magwaro zuva rimwe nerimwe, kana zvinhu izvozvo zviri izvo.
Naizvozvo vazhinji vavo vakatenda, navakadzi vaikudzwa vavaGiriki, navarume vazhinji.
Asi vaJudha veTesaronika, vakati vachinzwa kuti shoko raMwari roparidzwa naPauro paBerea, vakasvika vo ipapo, vakamutsa nokupesanisa vazhinji.
Ipapo hama dzakatuma Pauro pakarepo kusvikira kugungwa, asi Sirasi naTimotio vakasarapo.
Zvino avo vakaperekedza Pauro, vakamusvitsa Atene; vakati varairwa kuvudza Sirasi naTimotio, kuti vakurumidze kuvuya kwaari, vakabva.
Pauro paAtene.
Zvino Pauro, achakavagarira paAtene, akanzwa shungu pamoyo, achivona kuti guta rizere nezvifananidzo.
Naizvozvo akataurirana musinagoge navaJudha, navainamata Mwari, napadare zuva rimwe nerimwe, navaakasongana navo.
Zvino vamwe vakachenjera vavaEpikuro navaStoiko, vakaita nharo naye; vamwe vakati: Ko uyu mutauri wezvisinamaturo unoda kureveiko?
Vamwe zve vakati: Unenge muparidzi wavamwari vasingazikanwi; nokuti wakavaparidzira Jesu nokumuka kwavakafa.
ipapo vakamubata, vakamuisa paAreopago, vakati: Ngatinzwe vo kuti dzidziso iyi itsva, inotaurwa newe, ndeyeiko?
Nokuti unoreva zvimwe zvinoshamisa panzeve dzedu; naizvozvo tinoda kunzwa, kuti zvinhu izvi ndezveiko?
(Zvino vaAtene vose, navatorwa vaigarapo, vaingofarira chinhu chimwe chete, kutaura kana kunzwa chinhu chitsva.)
Zvino Pauro, amire pakati peAreopago, akati: Imi varume veAtene, pazvinhu zvose ndinovona kuti munonamata zvikuru.
Nokuti ndakati ndichipfuvura, ndichicherekedza zvamunonamata, ndakawana vo aritari yakanyorwa izvi: KUNAMWARI USINGAZIKANWI.
Zvino chamunonamata musingachizivi, ndicho chandinokuparidzirai.
Mwari wakasika nyika nezvose zviri mairi, iye Tenzi wedenga napasi, haagari mutembere dzakaitwa namavoko.
Haashumirwi namavoko avanhu, saachinge achishaiwa chinhu, zvaari iye amene unopa vose vupenyu, nokufema, nezvose;
wakaita neropa rimwe marudzi ose avanhu, achibva kunomumwe chete, kuti agare pose panyika; ambotara nguva dzavakatemerwa, nemiganhu yukugara kwavo;
kuti vatsvake Mwari, zvimwe vamutsvangadzire vamuwane, kunyange asiri kure nomumwe nomumwe wedu.
Nokuti maari tinovupenyu, tinofamba, tiripo; sezvavakareva vamwe vanyori venziyo vokwenyu, vachiti: Nokuti tiri rudzi rwake vo,
Zvatiri rudzi rwaMwari, hatifaniri kufunga kuti vuMwari bwakafanana nendarama, kana sirivheri, kana ibwe, rakavezwa novumhizha kana kuchenjera kwomunhu.
Naizvozvo Mwari wakarega hake kurangarira nguva dzokusaziva; asi zvino unoraira vanhu vose kwose-kwose kuti vatendevuke.
Nokuti wakatara zuva, raachatonga nyika naro nokururama, nomurume waakagadza; akasimbisa shoko iro kunavose, pakumumutsa kuvakafa.
Zvino vakati vachinzwa zvokumuka kwavakafa, vamwe vakaseka, asi vamwe vakati: Tichazokunzwa zve pamusoro paizvozvi,
Naizvozvo Pauro akabuda pakati pavo,
Asi vamwe varume vakamunamatira, vakatenda; pakati pavo kwaiva naDhionisio, muAreopago, nomukadzi wainzi Dhamari, navamwe pamwe chete navo.
Shure kwaizvozvo, Pauro wakabva Atene, akasvika Korinte;
akawana mumwe muJudha, wainzi Akwira, chizvagwa chePonto, achangobva Itaria, naPrisira mukadzi wake; (nokuti Kraudio wakanga araira kuti vaJudha vose vabve Roma); akaenda kwavari;
zvino zvaakanga anebasa rimwe navo, akagara navo vachibata; nokuti basa ravo raiva rokuita matende.
Sabata rimwe nerimwe akataurirana navo musinagoge, akaidza kugombedzera vaJudha navaGiriki.
Zvino Sirasi naTimotio vakati va chizoburuka vachibva Makedhonia, Pauro akamanikidzwa neshoko, achipupurira vaJudha kwazvo kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu.
Zvino vakati vachimudzivisa, nokumutuka, akazuza nguvo dzake, akati kwavari: Ropa renyu ngarive pamusoro penyu; ini ndakachena, kubva zvino ndichaenda kuvahedheni.
Akabvapo, akapinda mumba momumwe, wainzi Tito Justo, wainamata Mwari, imba yake yaiva pedo nesinagoge.
NaKrispo, mukuru wesinagoge.
Akatenda kunaShe naveimba yake yose; navazhinji veKorinte vakanzwa, vakatenda, vakabhabhatidzwa.
Zvino Ishe akati kunaPauro vusiku nechiratidzo: Usatya hako, asi taura, usanyarara;
nokuti ini ndinewe; hapanomunhu ungakumukira akakuitira zvakaipa, nokuti ndinavanhu vazhinji muguta rino.
Akagarapo gore rimwe nemwedzi mitanhatu, achidzidzisa shoko raMwari pakati pavo.
Zvino Gario wakati ava mubati weAkaya, vaJudha vakamukira Pauro nomwoyo mumwe, vakavuya naye pachigaro chokutonga,
vachiti: Uyu unogombedzera vanhu kuti vanamate Mwari nenzira isingatenderwi nomurairo.
Zvino Pauro wakati odakushamisa muromo wake, Gario akati kuvaJudha: Dai yaiva mhosva yezvisakarurama, kana kutadza kwakaipa, ndaifanira kuva nomoyo murefu kwamuri, imi vaJudha
Asi kana dziri nharo pamusoro pamashoko namazita nomurairo wenyu, tambai henyu imi mhosva iyo; ini handidi kuva mutongi waizvozvo.
Akavadzinga pachigaro chokutonga.
Zvino vose vakabata Sosteni, mukuru wesinagoge, vakamurova pamberi pechigaro chokutonga; asi Gario haana kuva nehanya nechinhu chimwe chaizvozvo.
Pauro wakati agarapo mazuva mazhinji, akawonekana nehama, akabvapo, akaenda Siria nechikepe, anaPrisira naAkwira, avevura musoro wake paKenkrea, nokuti wakanga apika.
Vakasvika Efeso, akavasiyapo; asi iye amene wakapinda musinagoge, akataurirana navaJudha.
Zvino vakati vachikumbira kuti agare navo nguva refu, haana kutenda;
akawonekana navo, achiti: Ndinofanira chose kuchengeta mutambo uyu unoitwa muJerusarema.
Ndichadzokera zve kwamuri, kana Mwari achida, akabva paEfeso nechikepe.
Wakati asvika Kesaria, akakwira kundokwazisa kereke, akaburukira Antiokia.
Rwendo rwechitatu rwaPauro.
Aporo paEfeso.
Wakati agarapo nguva, akabva, akagura nenyika dzeGaratia neFrigia achidzitevedzanisa, achisimbisa vadzidzi vose.
Zvino mumwe muJudha wainzi Aporo, worudzi rwapaArekasandira, murume wakanga akadzidza zvikuru, wakasvika Efeso; wakanga anesimba pamagwaro.
Uyu wakanga adzidziswa nzira yaShe, akashingaira nomweya, achitaura nokunatsodzidzisa zvaJesu, achiziva rubhabhatidzo rwaJohane bedzi.
Iye akatanga kutaura musinagoge asingatyi.
Zvino Prisira naAkwira vakati vamunzwa, vakamutora, vakanatsomududzira nzira yaMwari.
Zvino wakati achida kuyambukira Akaya, hama dzikamusimbisa, vakanyorera vadzidzi kuti vamugamuchire.
Zvino wakati asvika, akabatsira zvikuru ivo vakatenda nenyasha.
Nokuti wakakunda vaJudha nesimba pachena, achiratidza naMagwaro, kuti Jesu ndiyeKristu.
Zvino Aporo achiri paKorinte, Pauro wakati agura namativi enyika okumusoro, akasvika Efeso, akawana vamwe vadzidzi,
akati kwavari: Makagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene pakutenda kwenyu here? vakati kwaari kwete, hatina kutongonzwa kuti Mweya Mutsvene uripo.
Akati: ko makabhabhatidzwa norubhabhatidzo rwupiko?
Vakati: Norubhabhatidzo rwaJohane.
Zvino Pauro akati: Johane wakabhabhatidza norubhabhatidzo rwokutendevuka, achivudza vanhu kuti vatende kunaiye unozovuya shure kwake, iye Jesu Kristu.
Vakati vazvinzwa izvozvo, vakabhabhatidzwa muzita raShe Jesu,
Zvino Pauro wakati aisa mavoko ake pamusoro pavo, Mweya Mutsvene akavuya pamusoro pavo, vakataura nendimi, vakaporofita.
Ivavo vose vaiva varume vanenge gumi navaviri.
Zvino wakapinda musinagoge, akataura asingatyi mwedzi mitatu, achitaurirana navo, achivagombedzera namashoko ovushe bwaMwari.
Asi vamwe vakati vachiwomesa moyo, vasingatereri, vachizvidza Nzira iyo pamberi pavazhinji akabva kwavari, akataura navadzidzi, akataurirana navo zuva rimwe nerimwe muchikoro chaTirano.
Izvozvo zvikaitwa makore maviri; nokudaro vose vakanga vagere paAsia vakanzwa shoko raShe Jesu, vaJudha navaGiriki.
NaMwari akaita zvishamiso nemavoko aPauro,
nokudaro micheka nenguvo, zvaibva pamuviri wake, zvaiiswa kuvarwere, hosha dzikabva kwavari, nemweya yakaipa ikabuda.
Zvino vamwe vaJudha, vavuki, vaipota-pota, vakaidza kudana zita raShe Jesu pamusoro pavaiva nemweya yakaipa, vachiti: Ndinokupikirai naJesu unoparidzwa naPauro.
Vaiva vanakomana vanomwe vomumwe muJudha, wainzi Skevha, muPirisita mukuru, vaiita izvozvo.
Mweya wakaipa ukapindura, ukati kwavari: Jesu ndinomuziva, naPauro ndinomuziva, asi imi ndimi vananiko?
Ipapo munhu waiva nomweya wakaipa akavamukira simba, akavakurira vose vari vaviri, akavakunda; nokudaro vakatiza mumba imomo, vasinenguvo, vakuvadzwa.
Izvozvo zvakazikanwa navose vaJudha navaGiriki, vakanga vagere Efeso vakatya vose, zita raShe Jesu rikakudzwa.
Zvino vazhinji vavakanga vatenda vakavuya, vakazvirevurura, nokurondedzera mabasa avo.
Navamwe vazhinji vaiita zvovunanga, vakavunganidza bhuku dzavo, vakadzipisa pamberi pavose; vakaverenga mutengo wadzo, vakawana kuti waiva masirivheri anezvuru zvinamakumi mashanu.*
Naizvozvo shoko raShe rikakura nesimba, rikakunda.
Izvozvo zvakati zvapedziswa, Pauro akafunga mumoyo make kuenda Jerusarema, kana ambogura napaMakedhonia neAkaya, achiti: Kana ndamboenda ikoko, ndinofanira kundovona Roma vo.
Zvino akatumira Makedhonia vaviri vavaimushumira, vanaTimoito naErasto, iye amene akagara Asia nguva duku.
Bope rakamutswa naDhemetrio.
Zvino nenguva iyo bope guru rikavapo pamusoro peNzira iyo.
Nokuti mumwe, wainzi Dhemetrio, mupfuri wesirvheri, waiita zvitembere zvaDhiana zvesirvheri, waifumisa zvikuru mhizha dzapo.
Akavavunganidza ivo pamwe chete navamwe vabati vezvakadaro, akati: Varume, munoziva kuti nebasa iri tinowana fuma yedu.
Zvino munovona, nokunzwa, kuti Pauro uyu wakatendisa nokutsausa vazhinji, pasati pari paEfeso bedzi, asi panenge paAsia yose, achiti, zvakaitwa namavoko havazi vamwari.
Zvino njodzi ndiyo kuti habwuzi vumhizha bwedu bedzi bwungazvidzwa, asi kuti tembere yamwarikadzi mukuru Dhiana ichashovorwa, naiye amene, unonamatwa paAsia yose nenyika yose, abviswe pavukuru bwake.
Zvino vakati vachinzwa izvozvo, vakafa neshungu kwazvo, vakadanidzira, vachiti: Dhiana wavaEfeso mukuru!
Guta rikakanganiswa kwazvo; vakamhanyira nomoyo mumwe panzvimbo paitambwa, vabata Gayo naAristarko, varume veMakedhonia, vaiperekedza Pauro.
Zvino Pauro akada kupinda kuvanhu, vadzidzi vakasamutendera.
Navamwe vakuru veAsia, vaiva shamwari dzake, vakatuma shoko kwaari, vachikumbira zvikuru kwaari kuti arege kupinda panzvimbo paitambwa.
Zvino vamwe vakadanidzira zvimwe, vamwe zvimwe zve; nokuti vungano yakanga yanyonganiswa, vazhinji vasingazivi zvavakavunganira.
Ipapo vakabudisa Areksandro mukati mavanhu vazhinji, vaJudha vachimusundira mberi; zvino Areksandro akaninira noruvoko, achida kuzvidavirira pamberi pavanhu.
Ipapo vakati vachivona kuti iye muJudha, inzwi rimwe rikamuka kuna vose, vakadanidzira nguva dzinenge mbiri, vachiti: Dhiana wavaEfeso mukuru!
Zvino munyori weguta wakanyaradza vanhu, akati: Varume veEfeso, munhu ndoupiko usingazivi, kuti guta ravaEfeso ndiro mushumiri wamwari kadzi mukuru Dhiana nowechifananidzo chakawa kubva kunaJupiteri.
Zvazvisingagoni kurambwa izvozvi, maifanira kunyarara musingaiti chinhu nokusarangarira kwazvo.
Nokuti mavuya navarume ava, vasati vari mbavha dzetembere kana vamhuri vamwarikadzi wedu.
Zvino kana Dhemetrio nedzimwe mhizha dzinaye vanemhosva nomunhu, misi yokutonga iripo, navatongi varipo; ngavakwirirane havo.
Asi kana muchitsvaka chimwe chinhu pamusoro pedzimwe mhosva, zvingatemwa pavungano yakafanira.
Nokuti njodzi ndiyo kuti tingakwirirwa pamsoro pebope ranhasi, zvakusinemhosva; kana chiri chinhu ichi hatingagoni kupindura pamsoro pemhere-mhere iyi.
Wakati ataura izvozvo, akaendisa vungano.
Bopoto rakati ranyarara, Pauro akadana vadzidzi, akavaraira, ndokuwonekana navo, akabva achida kuenda Makedhonia.
Akagura namativi enyika idzo, akaraira vatendi namashoko mazhinji, ndokusvika panyika yavaGiriki.
Akati agara mwedzi mitatu, rangano yakaipa ikaitwa navaJudha pamusoro pake, oda kuenda Siria nechikepe, akati ndodzokera napaMakedhonia.
Akaperekedzwa naSopatro weBerea, mwanakomana waPiro; naAristarko naSekundo, veTesaronika; naGayo weDerbe, naTimotio; vuye Tikiko naTrofimo veAsia.
Ivo vakatungamira, vakatimirira paTroa.
Isu tikabva Firipi nechikepe mazuva ezvingwa zvisinembiriso apfuvura; tikasvika kwavari paTroa namazuva mashanu; tikagarapo, mazuva manomwe.
Zvino nomusi wokutanga wevhiki, takavungana kuti timedure chingwa, Pauro akataurirana navo, achida kuenda mangwana; akaramba achiparidza shoko kusvikira pakati povusiku.
Kwakanga kunemwenje mizhinji muimba yokumusoro matakanga tavungana.
Zvino pahwindi pakanga pagere rimwe jaya, rainzi Yutiko, rikabatwa nehope kwazvo, zvino Pauro, wakati achingoramba achiparidza, iye akabatwa nehope, akawira pasi, achibva paimba yechitatu yokumusoro, akasimudzwa afa.
Ipapo Pauro akaburuka, akazviwisira pamusoro pake, akamufungatira, akati: Musaita bopoto, nokuti mweya wake uchiri maari.
Zvino wakati akwirazve kumusoro, akamedura chingwa, akadya, akataura navo nguva refu kusvikira kuchiedza, ndokuenda.
Vakavuya nomukomana ari mupenyu, vakanyaradzwa kwazvo.
Asi isu takatungamira kuchikepe, tikaenda Aso, tichida kutora Pauro ipapo, nokuti wakanga araira saizvozvo, iye achida kufamba namakumbo.
Takati tasongana naye paAso, tikamutora, tikandosvika Mitirene;
tikabva ipapo nechikepe, fume mangwana tikasvika pakatarisana neKiyo; fume mangwana tikapfuvura napaSamo; fume mangwana zve tikasvika Mireto.
Nokuti Pauro wakanga achiti: Ndichapfuvura Efeso nechikepe, kuti arege kunonoka paAsia; nokuti wakanga achikurumidza kuti kana zvichibvira ave Jerusarema nezuva rePentekosta.
Pauro unoraira vakuru veEfeso.
Zvino iye ari paMireto, akatumira Efeso kundodana vakuru vekereke.
Vakati vasvika kwaari, akati kwavari: Imi munoziva mugarire wangu pakati penyu nguva dzose, kubva pazuva rokutanga randakasvika naro paAsia;
ndichibatira Ishe nokuzvininipisa zvikuru, nemisodzi, namadambudziko akandiwira nerangano dzakaipa dzavaJudha;
kuti handina kutya kukuparidzirai zvingakubatsirai nokukudzidzisai pachena padzimba dzose;
ndichipupurira kwazvo vaJudha navaGiriki, kuti vatendevukire kunaMwari, nokutenda kunaShe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Zvino tarirai, ndinoenda Jerusarema ndakasungwa pamweya ndisingazivi zvichandiwira ikoko;
asi kuti Mweya Mutsvene unondipupurira kwazvo muguta rimwe nerimwe, kuti kusungwa nenhamo zvakandigarira.
Asi hakuna chimwe chezvinhu izvi chinondidzosera shure uye handiverengi kuti upenyu hwangu hunokosha kwandiri kuti ndipedze rwendo rwangu nomufaro nebasa randakagamuchira kuna Ishe Jesu rokupupura kwazvo Evhangeri yenyasha dzaMwari.
Zvino tarirai, ndinoziva kuti imi mose, vandakafamba pakati penyu, ndichiparidza vushe bwaMwari hamuchazovoni chiso changu.
Naizvozvo ndinokupupurirai nhasi kuti ndakachena paropa ravanhu vose.
Nokuti handina kutya kukuparidzirai kuda kwose kwaMwari.
Zvichenjererei imi, neboka rose ramakaitwa vatariri varo noMweya Mutsene, kuti mufudze kereke yaMwari, yaakatenga neropa rake.
Ini ndinoziva kuti kana ndaenda mapere anoparadza achapinda pakati penyu, asingaregi boka.
Vuye, napakati penyu pamene pachamuka varume, vachataura zvinopesanisa, kuti vatsause vadzidzi vavatevere.
Naizvozvo rindai, murangarire kuti makore matatu handina kurega vusiku namasikati kuraira mumwe nomumwe nemisodzi.
Zvino hama dzangu ndinokuisai kunaShe, neshoko renyasha dzake, iye unesimba rokukuvakisai, nokukupai nhaka pakati pavakaitwa vatsvene vose.
Handina kuchochora sirvheri, kana ndarama, kana nguvo dzomunhu mumwe.
Hongu munoziva imi mumene, kuti mavoko awa akabatira kushaiwa kwangu nokwavanhu vandaiva navo.
Pazvinhu zvose ndakakuratidzai, kuti muchibata muchidai, munofanira kubatsira vasinesimba, nokurangarira mashoko aShe Jesu, sezvaakataura amene achiti: Kupa kunamaropafadzo kupfuvura kugamuchira.
Wakati ataura izvozvo, akafugama, akanyengetera navo vose.
Vakachema zvikuru vose; vakawira pamutsipa waPauro, vakawonekana naye nokumusveta,
vaneshungu kwazvo neshoko raakataura rokuti havachazovoni chiso chake.
Ipapo vakamuperekedza kuchikepe.
Zvino takati taparadzana navo, tikabva nechikepe, tikarurama, tikasvika Kose; fume mangwana tikasvika Rode; tikabvapo, tikasvika Patara.
Takati tawanapo chikepe, chaiyambukira Finikia, tikapinda mukati macho, tikaenda.
Takati tavona Kupro, tikaisiya kuruboshwe, tichienda Siria, tikasvika Tire; nokuti chikepe chaifanira kututunura mutoro ipapo;
zvino takati tawanapo vadzidzi, tikagarapo mazuva manomwe; ivo vakati nomweya kunaPauro kuti arege kukwira Jerusarema.
Zvino takati tapedzapo mazuva tikabva, tikaenda; ivo vose, navakadzi navana, vakatiperekedza kusvikira tabuda paguta; ipapo tikafugama pamhenderekedzo, tikanyengetera.
Tikawonekana, isu tikaenda kuchikepe, ivo vakadzokera kumusha kwavo.
Isu takati tapedza rwendo tichibva Tire, tikasvika Toremai, tikakwazisa hama, ndokuswera zuva rimwe navo.
Fume mangwana isu taiva veboka raPauro tikabvapo, tikasvika Kesaria; ipapo tikapinda mumba maFiripo, Muevhangeri, mumwe wavanomwe, tikagara naye.
Iye wakanga anavakunda vana, mhandara, vaiporofita.
Zvino takati tichigarapo mazuva mazhinji, mumwe muporofita, wainzi Akabo, akaburuka achibva Judhea,
akavuya kwatiri, akatora bhanire raPauro, akazvisunga makumbo namavoko ake, akati: Mweya Mutsvene unoreva kudai: Saizvozvo vaJudha paJerusarema vachasunga murume, mwene webhanire iri, nokumuisa pamavoko avahedheni.
Takati tichinzwa izvozvo, isu navamwe vaipapo tikakumbira zvikuru kwaari, kuti arege kukwira Jerusarema.
Ipapo Pauro akapindura, akati; Munoiteiko, muchichema nokuputsa moyo wangu?
Nokuti ini handina kuzvigadzirira kusungwa bedzi, asi kunyange kufira zita raShe Jesu paJerusarema.
Zvino wakati achiramba kukundwa, tikanyarara, tikati: Kuda kwaShe ngakuitwe.
Mazuva iwayo akati apera, tikarongedza, tikakwira Jerusarema.
Navamwe vadzidzi veKesaria vakaenda nesu, vakavuya vo nomumwe, wainzi Mnasoni, mudzidzi wakare weKupro, wataindogara naye.
Zvino takati tichisvika Jerusarema, hama dzikatigamuchira nomufaro.
Fume mangwana Pauro akapinda nesu kunaJakobho; navakuru vakanga varipo vose.
Akavakwazisa, ndokuvarondedzera, chimwe nechimwe, zvakaitwa naMwari pakati pavahedheni nebasa rake.
Ivo vakati vazvinzwa, vakakudza Mwari, vakati kwaari: Hama, unovona kuti zvuru zvingani zvavaJudha vanotenda; vose vanoshingairira murairo;
zvino vakavudzwa kuti iwe unodzidzisa vaJudha vose vari pakati pavahedheni, kuti varambe Mosesi, uchiti, varege kudzingisa vana vavo, kana kufamba netsika dzomurairo.
Zvino todiniko?
Vachanzwa havo kuti wasvika.
Naizvozvo ita izvi zvatinotaura kwauri: Tinavarume vana vakazvisunga nokupika;
uvatore, uzvinatse pamwe chete navo, uvaripire, vagovevura misoro yavo; ipapo vose vachaziva, kuti haazi mashoko ezvokwadi, avakavudzwa pamusoro pako; asi kuti iwe vo unofamba zvakanaka uchichengeta murairo umene.
Asi kana vari vahedheni vakatenda, takavanyorera kuti vasachengeta zvinhu zvakadai, asi kuti vazvidzore panezvakabayirwa zvifananidzo, neropa nezvakadzipwa novupombwe.
Ipapo Pauro akatora varume avo, akazvinatsa pamwe chete navo nezuva rakatevera, akapinda mutembere kuti azivise kupera kwamazuva okunatsa, kusvikira mumwe nomumwe abayirwa chibayiro.
Zvino mazuva manomwe akati opera, vaJudha veAsia vakamuvona mutembere, vakamutsa vanhu vazhinji, vakamubata.
vakadanidzira, vachiti: Varume vaIsraeri, batsirai!
Uyu ndiye munhu unodzidzisa vanhu kwose-kwose zvinopesana navanhu, nomurairo, nenzvimbo ino, vuye zve vakavuya navaGiriki mutembere, akasvibisa nzvimbo ino tsvene.
Nokuti vakanga vavona Trofimo muEfeso, anaye muguta, vakati zvimwe Pauro wapinda naye mutembere.
Ipapo guta rose rakanyonganiswa, vanhu vakamhanyira pamwe chete; vakabata Pauro, vakamukwevera kunze kwetembere, mikova ikazarirwa pakarepo.
Zvino vakati vachitsvaka kumuvuraya, shoko rikakwira kumukuru wechuru chamazana, kuti Jerusarema rose ranyonganiswa.
Iye akatora pakarepo varwi navakuru vezana, akaburuka achimhanyira kwavari: ivo vakati vachivona mukuru wechuru chemazana navarwi, vakarega kurova Pauro.
Zvino mukuru wechuru chemazana akaswedera, akamubata, ndokuraira kuti asungwe namaketani maviri; akabvunza kuti ndiani, vuye kuti waiteiko.
Zvino vamwe pakati pavazhinji vakadanidzira chimwe chinhu, vamwe chimwe chinhu; zvino iye asingagoni kuziva zvokwadi nokuda kwebopoto, akaraira kuti vamuise kuimba yavarwi.
Wakati achisvika pazvikwiriso, akaita sokutakurwa navarwi, nokuda kwesimba ravanhu vazhinji;
nokuti vanhu vazhinji vakatevera, vachidanidzira, vachiti: Mubvisei!
Zvino oda kupinzwa muimba yavarwi, Pauro akati kumukuru wechuru chamazana; Ko ndingataura nemi here?
Iye akati unoziva chiGiriki here?
Ko hauzi uya muIjipiti, wakadeya kukanganisa vanhu panguva yapfuvura, akaenda navavurayi vanezvuru zvina kurenje here?
Ipapo Pauro akati: Ini ndiri muJudha weTarso muKirikia, munhu weguta rakakurumbira.
Ndinokumbira kuti munditendere nditaure navanhu.
Zvino wakati amutendera, Pauro akamira pazvikwiriso, akaninira vanhu noruvoko rwake; zvino vakati vanyarara kwazvo, akataura norurimi rwechiHebheru, achiti:
Varume, hama, namadzibaba, inzwai kuzvidavirira kwangu pamberi penyu zvino.
Ivo vakati vachinzwa, kuti wotaura navo norurimi rwechiHebheru, vakanyanya kunyarara.
Iye akati:
Ini ndiri muJudha, ndakaberekwa paTarso muKirikia, asi ndakarerwa muguta rino, pamakumbo aGamarieri, ndikadzidziswa netsika kwadzo dzomurairo wamadzibaba edu, ndichishingairira Mwari, semi mose nhasi;
ndikatambudza veNzira Iyi kusvikira pakuvuraya, ndichisunga varume navakadzi nokuvaisa mutorongo.,
muPirisita mukuru sezaangandipupurira vo namakurukota ose; ndikapiwa mwadhi navo kuhama, ndikaenda Dhamaseko kuti ndiise Jerusarema avo vaigarako, vakasungwa, kuti varobwe.
Zvino ndakati ndichifamba, ndoswedera Dhamaseko, anenge masikati, pakarepo ndikapenyerwa kwose nechiedza chikuru, chaibva kudenga.
Ndikawira pasi, ndikanzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri: Sauro, Sauro, unonditambudzireiko?
Ndikapindura, ndikati: Ndimi aniko Ishe?
Akati kwandiri: Ndini Jesu weNazareta, waunotambudza.
Zvino vaiva neni vakavona chiedza, vakatya asi havana kunzwa inzwi rowakataura neni.
Ndikati: Ndodiniko, Ishe?
Ishe akati kwandiri: Simuka, uende Dhamaseko; apo uchavudzwa zvose zvakatarwa kuti uzviite.
Zvino zvandakanga ndisingagoni kuvona nokupenya kwechiedza icho, ndikasesedzwa noruvoko navaiva neni, ndikasvika Dhamaseko.
Zvino mumwe murume, wainzi Ananiasi, munhu wainamata Mwari sezvinoreva murairo, waipupurirwa zvakanaka navaJudha vose vakanga vagerepo,
akavuya kwandiri akamira, akati kwandiri: Sauro, hama, chivona!
Nenguva iyo ndikamuvona.
Iye akati: Mwari wamadzibaba edu wakakusanangura, kuti uzive kuda kwake, nokumuvona iye wakarurama, nokunzwa inzwi rinobva mumuromo make.
Nokuti iwe uchava chapupu chake kuvanhu vose chezvawakavona nezvawakanzwa.
Zvino uchanonokereiko?
Simuka, ubhabhatidzwe, usukwe zvivi zvako, udane zita raShe.
Zvino ndakati ndadzokera Jerusarema, ndichinyengetera mutembere, ndikaita sokubatwa nomweya,
ndikamuvona, achiti kwandiri: Kurumidza, ubve Jerusarema zvino-zvino, nokuti havangagamuchiri kupupura kwako pamusoro pangu.
Ipapo ndikati: Ishe, vanoziva vamene kuti ini ndaiisa mutorongo, nokurova mumasinagoge, avo vaitenda kwamuri;
vuye, musi wakadururwa ropa raStafano, chapupu chenyu, neni vo ndakanga ndimirepo, ndichibvumira, kuvurawa kwake ndikachengeta nguvo dzavaimuvuraya.
Ipapo akati kwandiri: Enda, ndichakutuma kure kuvahedheni.
Vakamuterera kusvikira pashoko iro; ipapo vakadanidzira, vachiti: Wakadai ngaabviswe panyika; nokuti haafaniri kurarama.
Vakadanidzira, vakakandira nguvo dzavo pasi, vachikushira ivhu kudenga,
mukuru wechuru chamazana akaraira, kuti aiswe kuimba yavarwi, achiti abvunzwe nokurobwa zvikuru, kuti azive mhosva yavaimupopotera kudai.
Zvino vakati vamusunga namakashu, Pauro akati kumukuru wezana, wakanga amirepo: Makatenderwa kurova munhu uri muRoma, asina kutongwa here?
Zvino mukuru wezana wakati achizvinzwa, akaenda kumutungamiri mukuru, akati kwaari chenjerai zvamunoita, Nokuti munhu uyu muRoma.
Mutungamiri mukuru akavuya akati kwaari: Ndivudze, uri muRoma here?
Akati: Hongu.
Mutungamiri mukuru akati: Ini ndakatenga simba iri rokuve muRoma nomutengo mukuru.
Pauro akati: Ini ndakaberekwa ndiri muRoma.
Zvino vakanga vomubvunzisisa, vakabva kwaari pakarepo, nomutungamiri mukuru wakatya vo achiziva kuti iye muRoma, vuye nokuti wakanga amusunga.
Pauro pamberi pamakurukota.
Zvino fume mangwana, achida kuziva kwazvo kuti vaJudha vakamupomera mhosva yei, akamusunungura, akaraira kuti vaPirisita vakuru namakurukota ose vavungane, akaburusa Pauro, ndokumuisa pamberi pavo.
Zvino Pauro wakati achitarisisa kumakurukota, akati: Varume, hama, ini ndakafamba pamberi paMwari nehana yakarurama kusvikira zuva ranhasi.
Ipapo Ananiasi, muPirisita mukuru, akaraira vakanga vamire naye kuti vamurove muromo.
Ipapo Pauro akati kwaari: Mwari uchakurova iwe, rusvingo rwakacheneswa; ugerepo kuti unditonge nomurairo, zvino woraira kuti ndirobwe, uchidarika murairo here?
Vakanga vamirepo vakati: Ko unotuka muPirisita mukuru waMwari here?
Pauro akati: Hama dzangu, ndakanga ndisingazivi kuti ndiye muPirisita mukuru; nokuti kwakanyorwa, kuchinzi: Usataura zvakaipa pamusoro pomubati wavanhu vako.
Zvino Pauro wakati achivona kuti vamwe ndivaSadhuse navamwe vaFarise, akadanidzira mumakurukota, akati: Varume, hama, ini ndiri muFarise, mwanakomana wavaFarise, ndotongwa pamusoro petariro nokumuka kwavakafa.
Wakati adaro, kupesana kukavapo pakati pavaFarise navaSaduse; vungano ikaparadzana.
Nokuti vaSadhuse vaiti hapana kumuka kwavakafa, kana mutumwa, kana mweya; asi vaFarise vaitenda izvozvo zvose.
Zvino bope guru rikavapo; vamwe vanyori vokuvaFarise vakasimuka, vakaita nharo, vachiti: Ngatirege kugwa naMwari, hativoni chinhu chakaipa kumunhu uyu; zvimwe mweya wakataura naye, kana mutumwa.
Zvino kupesana kukuru kuchida kumuka, mutungamiri Mukuru akatya kuti Pauro ungabvamburwa navo, akaraira varwi kuti vaburuke, vamubvute pakati pavo, vamuise muimba yavarwi.
Vusiku; bwakatevera, Ishe akamira naye, akati: Tsunga moyo, sezvawakandipupurira kwazvo paJerusarema, unofanira kupupura paRoma vo.
Vamwe vaJudha vanozvisunga kuvuraya Pauro; unoiswa Kesaria
Zvino kwakati kwaedza, vaJudha vakaita rangano, vakazvisunga nokupika, vachiti, havangadyi kana kunwa kusvikira vavuraya Pauro.
Vakanga vaita rangano iyo, vakapfuvura makumi mana.
Ava vakaenda kuvaPirisita vakuru navakuru, vakati: Tazvisunga nokupika kukuru, kuti hatingadyi chinhu, kusvikira tavuraya Pauro.
Naizvozvo zvino imi, namakurukota, mutaridzire mutungamiri mukuru, kuti amuburusire kwamuri mangwana, muchiita somunoda kunatso-bvunzisisa mhosva yake; isu tazvigadzira kuti timuvuraye, asati aswedera.
Zvino mwanakomana wehanzvadzi yaPauro akanzwa zvokuvandira kwavo, akaenda, akapinda mumba mavarwi, akavudza Pauro.
Ipapo Pauro akadana mumwe wavakuru vezana, akati: Isa jaya iri kumutungamiri Mukuru; nokuti uneshoko raanoda kumuvudza.
Naizvozvo akamutora, akaenda naye kumutungamiri Mukuru, akati: Pauro musungwa, wakandidana akakumbira, kuti ndivuye nejaya iri kwamuri; uneshoko raanoda kukuvudzai.
Mutungamiri Mukuru akabata ruvoko rwake, akaenda naye vari voga, akamubvunza vari voga, akati: Uneshoko reiko, raunoda kundivudza?
Iye akati: VaJudha vakatenderana kukumbira kwamuri, kuti muburuse Pauro kumakurukota mangwana, vachiita savanoda kumubvunzisisa mhosva yake.
Naizvozvo musavatendera; nokuti pakati pavo kunavarume vanopfuvura makumi mana vanomuvandira vakazvisunga nokupika, kuti havangadyi, kana kunwa, kusvikira vamuvuraya; zvino vakazvigadzirira vachimirira chivimbiso, chinobva kwamuri.
Naizvozvo Mutungamiri Mukuru akaendesa jaya amuraira achiti: Usavudza munhu, kuti wandizivisa izvozvo.
Zvino akadana vakuru vezana vaviri, akati: Gadzirai varwi vanamazana maviri, navanotasva mabhiza vanamakumi manomwe, navanamapfumo vanamazana maviri, vaende Kesaria nenguva yechitatu yovusiku;
muvatsvakire zvipfuwo, kuti vatasvise Pauro, vagonyatsomuisa kumubati Feriksi.
Akanyora mwadi yakanga ichiti:
Kraudio Risia, kunaFeriksi, mubati wakakurumbira kwazvo, kwaziwai!
Uyu munhu wakabatwa navaJudha, akanga oda kuvurawa navo, ini ndikasvika navarwi, ndikamurwira, zvandakanzwa kuti muRoma.
Zvino ndakati ndichida kuziva mhosva yavakamukwirira nayo, ndikamuburusira kumakurukota avo;
ndakawana kuti wakwirirwa pamusoro pamashoko omurairo wavo, asi asinemhosva yechinhu chingafanira rufu kana kusungwa.
Zvino ndakati ndavudzwa, kuti voda kuvandira munhu uyu, ndikamutumira kwamuri pakarepo, ndikaraira vanomukwirira kuti vataure pamberi penyu mhosva yake.
Zvino varwi vakatora Pauro sezvavakarairwa, vakamuisa Antipatri vusiku.
Fume mangwana vakarega vatasvi vamabhiza, kuti vaende naye, ivo vakadzokera kuimba yavarwi.
Vaya vakati vasvika Kesaria, vakapa mubati mwadhi, vakaisa vo Pauro pamberi pake.
